name: beddings
trans: 寝具；（建筑）[建] 基床；（家畜）草垫

detailed_translations.chinese: 寝具；（建筑）[建] 基床；（家畜）草垫

sentences.english: Although in poor health, she continued to carry out her duties.
sentences.chinese: 尽管身体不好，她仍继续执行任务。

sentences.english: We decided to take rooms in Longwood House, although we knew we could not really afford the rent.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我们知道自己其实付不起租金，但还是决定住朗伍德庄园的房间。

sentences.english: Although I can’t help admiring the man’s courage, I do not approve of his methods.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我不得不佩服那个男子的勇气，却并不赞成他的方法。

detailed_translations.english: used to introduce a statement that makes your main statement seem surprising or unlikely

sentences.english: Lou lifted the box easily, without using much effort.
sentences.chinese: 卢没费多大力气就把箱子搬了起来。

sentences.english: Frank put a lot of effort into the party.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克办这次聚会花了不少精力。

sentences.english: Learning to speak another language takes effort.
sentences.chinese: 学说外语要下功夫。

sentences.english: I'm afraid this essay is a poor effort.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，这篇文章写得不好。

detailed_translations.english: the physical or mental energy that you need to do sth; sth that takes a lot of energy

sentences.english: Do you have a colour preference ?
sentences.chinese: 你有什么颜色上的偏好吗？

sentences.english: Parents may be able to express a preference as to the school their child will attend.
sentences.chinese: 家长也许可以表明愿意让孩子就读哪所学校。

sentences.english: The amount of sugar you add will depend on personal preference .
sentences.chinese: 加多少糖取决于个人的喜好。

sentences.english: Many elderly people expressed a strong preference to live in their own homes.
sentences.chinese: 许多老年人强烈表示喜欢住在自己的家里。

sentences.english: In allocating housing, preference is given to families with young children.
sentences.chinese: 房屋优先分配给有年幼孩子的家庭。

detailed_translations.english: if you have a preference for something, you like it more than another thing and will choose it if you can

sentences.english: The top layer should now point down to the layer beneath.
sentences.chinese: 现在，顶部图层应当有小箭头指向下面的图层。

sentences.english: The fortress on the hill covered the harbour area beneath.
sentences.chinese: 山上的炮楼把下面的海港地区置于射程之内。

sentences.english: They must all be drowning beneath him, in the watery caves of the rock!
sentences.chinese: 他们一定是在他下面的水里，就在那岩石充满了水的洞中游泳了！

detailed_translations.english: in or to a lower position than something, or directly under something

sentences.english: The bank can supply you with foreign currency .
sentences.chinese: 这家银行能为你提供外币。

sentences.english: There are moves towards a single currency in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲有向单一货币发展的趋势。

sentences.english: The local currency is the Swiss franc.
sentences.chinese: 当地的货币是瑞士法郎。

detailed_translations.english: the system or type of money that a country uses

sentences.english: the warmth of the summer sun
sentences.chinese: 夏天太阳的暖意

sentences.english: the warmth of her smile
sentences.chinese: 她微笑中的热情

detailed_translations.english: the heat something produces, or when you feel warm

sentences.english: The ability to adapt is a definite asset in this job.
sentences.chinese: 适应能力是做这份工作的绝对有利条件。

sentences.english: Many children buy books after they have been adapted for television.
sentences.chinese: 许多小孩子都是在书被改编成电视剧之后才去买的。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually change your behaviour and attitudes in order to be successful in a new situation

name: rewrite
trans: 重写或改写的文稿；改写的作品

sentences.english: I’ll have to rewrite most of the essay.
sentences.chinese: 这篇论文大部分我都得重写。

detailed_translations.english: to change something that has been written, especially in order to improve it, or because new information is available

detailed_translations.chinese: 重写或改写的文稿；改写的作品

name: fourteen
trans: 十四的记号；十四岁；十四点钟；十五世纪

sentences.english: He used to work fourteen hours a day.
sentences.chinese: 他过去一天工作14个小时。

sentences.english: I started playing the guitar when I was fourteen (= 14 years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 我14岁开始弹吉他。

detailed_translations.english: the number 14

detailed_translations.chinese: 十四的记号；十四岁；十四点钟；十五世纪
detailed_translations.english: the number 14

sentences.english: Steam rose from the hot tub.
sentences.chinese: 水蒸气从热腾腾的浴缸里升起。

detailed_translations.english: the hot mist that water produces when it is boiled
if something steams, steam rises from it, especially because it is hot
if something steams, steam rises from it, especially because it is hot

sentences.english: Jean accompanied her on the piano .
sentences.chinese: 琼为她钢琴伴奏。

detailed_translations.english: a large musical instrument that has a long row of black and white  key s  . You play the piano by sitting in front of it and pressing the keys.

name: firm
trans: 坚定的；牢固的；严格的；结实的

sentences.english: She works for an electronics firm.
sentences.chinese: 她在一家电子公司工作。

detailed_translations.english: a business or company, especially a small one

sentences.english: I’m baking some bread.
sentences.chinese: 我在烤一些面包。

sentences.english: baked potatoes
sentences.chinese: 烤马铃薯

sentences.english: Bake at 250 degrees for 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 用250度的温度烤20分钟。

sentences.english: The bricks were baked in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 砖块放在太阳光下晒硬。

detailed_translations.english: to cook something using dry heat, in an oven

name: suggest
trans: 提议，建议；启发；使人想起；显示；暗示

sentences.english: The zoo asked its visitors to suggest a name for the new baby panda.
sentences.chinese: 动物园请游客提建议，给刚出生的大熊猫起一个名字。

sentences.english: It has been suggested that the manager will resign if any more players are sold.
sentences.chinese: 有人提议，如果再有球员被出售，球队主教练就辞职。

detailed_translations.chinese: 提议，建议；启发；使人想起；显示；暗示
detailed_translations.english: to tell someone your ideas about what they should do, where they should go etc

name: happily
trans: 快乐地；幸福地；幸运地；恰当地

sentences.english: Michelle smiled happily.
sentences.chinese: 米歇尔高兴地笑了。

sentences.english: I’m a happily married man.
sentences.chinese: 我是个快乐的已婚男人。

sentences.english: So she married the prince, and they lived happily ever after (= used at the end of children’s stories to say that someone was happy for the rest of their life ).
sentences.chinese: 她嫁给了王子，他们从此过着幸福的生活。

detailed_translations.chinese: 快乐地；幸福地；幸运地；恰当地
detailed_translations.english: in a happy way

name: changeable
trans: 无常的；可改变的；易变的；不定的

sentences.english: changeable weather
sentences.chinese: 变化无常的天气

detailed_translations.chinese: 无常的；可改变的；易变的；不定的
detailed_translations.english: likely to change, or changing often

sentences.english: When did the accident happen?
sentences.chinese: 事故什么时候发生的？

sentences.english: It’s impossible to predict what will happen next.
sentences.chinese: 不可能预测接下来会发生什么。

sentences.english: She carried on as if nothing had happened.
sentences.chinese: 她继续干，似乎什么都未曾发生。

sentences.english: This was bound to happen sooner or later.
sentences.chinese: 这事注定早晚会发生。

sentences.english: This kind of thing happens all the time.
sentences.chinese: 这种事一直在发生。

sentences.english: As it happens, I know someone who might be able to help.
sentences.chinese: 真巧，我正好认识一个人，这个人也许帮得上忙。

sentences.english: We happened to discover we had a friend in common.
sentences.chinese: 我们碰巧发现我们有个共同的朋友。

detailed_translations.english: when something happens, there is an event, especially one that is not planned

sentences.english: Tears streamed down their faces.
sentences.chinese: 泪水顺着他们的脸颊流下来。

detailed_translations.english: to flow quickly and in great amounts
a natural flow of water that moves across the land and is narrower than a river

name: late
trans: 晚的；迟的；已故的；最近的

sentences.english: Sorry I’m late – I overslept.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，来晚了——我睡过头了。

sentences.english: The train was even later than usual.
sentences.chinese: 火车到得甚至比平时还晚。

sentences.english: We apologize for the late departure of flight AZ709.
sentences.chinese: 我们为AZ709航班延误起飞表示歉意。

sentences.english: There are penalties if loan repayments are late.
sentences.chinese: 逾期偿还贷款会被处以罚金。

sentences.english: The stores are open later on Thursdays.
sentences.chinese: 商店星期四开门较晚。

detailed_translations.english: arriving, happening, or done after the time that was expected, agreed, or arranged
after the usual time

name: hey
trans: 喂！（引起注意等）；你好！（表示问候）

sentences.english: Hey, wait a minute!
sentences.chinese: 喂，等一下！

detailed_translations.chinese: 喂！（引起注意等）；你好！（表示问候）
detailed_translations.english: a shout used to get someone’s attention or to show surprise, interest, or annoyance

name: charge
trans: 费用；电荷；掌管；控告；命令；负载
使充电；使承担；指责；装载；对…索费；向…冲去

sentences.english: Leave the battery on charge all night.
sentences.chinese: 让电池充一晚上的电

sentences.english: Please charge your glasses and drink a toast to the bride and groom!
sentences.chinese: 请各位斟满酒杯向新娘、新郎敬酒！

detailed_translations.english: electricity that is put into a piece of electrical equipment such as a battery
to fill a glass

sentences.english: She treats me like one of the family.
sentences.chinese: 她把我当作家人看待。

sentences.english: sewage treated so that it can be used as fertilizer
sentences.chinese: 经过处理可用作肥料的污水

sentences.english: Let's go out for lunch─ my treat (= I will pay) .
sentences.chinese: 咱们到外面去吃午餐，我请客。

detailed_translations.english: to behave towards someone or something in a particular way
something special that you give someone or do for them because you know they will enjoy it

sentences.english: an attempt to simplify the tax system
sentences.chinese: 简化税制的尝试

sentences.english: The law needs to be simplified.
sentences.chinese: 这部法律需要简化。

sentences.english: a simplified version of the game
sentences.chinese: 这个游戏的简化版

detailed_translations.english: to make something easier or less complicated

sentences.english: a respected elder statesman
sentences.chinese: 一位受人尊敬的政界元老

detailed_translations.english: a political or government leader, especially one who is respected as being wise and fair

sentences.english: a dinner reservation
sentences.chinese: 预订晚餐

sentences.english: Customers are advised to make seat reservations well in advance.
sentences.chinese: 建议顾客提前订座。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement which you make so that a place in a hotel, restaurant, plane etc is kept for you at a particular time in the future

sentences.english: We have to act within the existing legal framework.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须在现行的法律框架下行事。

detailed_translations.english: a set of ideas, rules, or beliefs from which something is developed, or on which decisions are based

sentences.english: We will have to consider your offer carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们得仔细考虑你的提议。

sentences.english: The local authority considered that the school did not meet requirements.
sentences.chinese: 当地政府认为这所学校达不到要求。

sentences.english: Have you considered my feelings?
sentences.chinese: 你考虑过我的感受吗？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something carefully, especially before making a choice or decision

sentences.english: Then they chose one gram for weighing water in a cubic centimetre.
sentences.chinese: 然后他们将一立方厘米的水的重量定为一克。

sentences.english: Theanalysis module can process up to one gram of flowing sample per minute.
sentences.chinese: 这种分析模块可以在每分钟内处理一克流体的样本。

sentences.english: One of them combines lithium manganese oxide with other ions, and operates at about three to five volts with a charge capacity of 200 milliamp hours per gram.
sentences.chinese: 平面能源正在研发三种不同的电池化学配方。 其中之一是把锂锰氧化物与其他离子化合，充电电压三到五伏，容量200毫安时每克。

detailed_translations.english: the basic unit for measuring weight in the  metric system

name: DVD
trans: 数字化视频光盘（Digital Video Disk）

detailed_translations.chinese: 数字化视频光盘（Digital Video Disk）

name: superior
trans: 上级的；优秀的，出众的；高傲的
上级，长官；优胜者，高手；长者

sentences.english: She had that superior tone of voice.
sentences.chinese: 她带着那种傲慢的语气。

detailed_translations.chinese: 上级的，较高的；优越的；有优越感的，高傲的
detailed_translations.english: thinking that you are better than other people – used to show disapproval
someone who has a higher rank or position than you, especially in a job

sentences.english: His great achievement is to make all the players into a united team.
sentences.chinese: 他的伟大成就在于把所有选手组织成一支团结的队伍。

sentences.english: As we climbed the final few metres, we felt a sense of achievement.
sentences.chinese: 我们攀登最后几米的时候，有一种成就感。

detailed_translations.english: something important that you succeed in doing by your own efforts

sentences.english: He was in urgent need of medical attention.
sentences.chinese: 他急需治疗。

sentences.english: The report called for urgent action to reduce lead in petrol.
sentences.chinese: 报告呼吁迅速采取行动，减少汽油中的铅含量。

sentences.english: an urgent message
sentences.chinese: 一封急报

detailed_translations.english: very important and needing to be dealt with immediately

name: sense
trans: 感觉，功能；观念；道理；理智

sentences.english: Cats have a very acute sense of hearing (= very good, so that they can hear even the smallest sound ) .
sentences.chinese: 猫的听觉非常敏锐。

sentences.english: Employees need the sense of being appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 雇员需要被赏识的感觉。

sentences.english: It was dark and he had completely lost his sense of direction.
sentences.chinese: 天黑了，他完全失去了方向感。

sentences.english: This is true in a general sense.
sentences.chinese: 从一般意义上来讲，这是对的。

sentences.english: Perhaps he sensed your distrust.
sentences.chinese: 也许他感觉到了你的不信任。

detailed_translations.chinese: 感官；感觉；理解力；判断力；意义
detailed_translations.english: one of the five natural powers of sight, hearing, feeling, taste, and smell, that give us information about the things around us
if you sense something, you feel that it exists or is true, without being told or having proof

sentences.english: I’ve put your name on the list and I don’t foresee any problems.
sentences.chinese: 我把你的名字写在名单上了，估计不会有什么问题。

sentences.english: The disaster could not have been foreseen.
sentences.chinese: 这场灾难是始料未及的。

detailed_translations.english: to think or know that something is going to happen in the future

name: try
trans: 试图，努力；试验；审判；考验

sentences.english: Let’s have a rest and then we’ll try again.
sentences.chinese: 我们休息一下，然后再试。

sentences.english: I tried everything to lose weight with no success.
sentences.chinese: 我试了各种方法减肥，但都没有成功。

sentences.english: I tried and tried (= kept making an effort ) and eventually I was offered a job.
sentences.chinese: 我一次次地尝试，终于有人给了我一份工作。

sentences.english: Try as he might (= as hard as he could ) , he could not get the incident out of his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他想尽办法，但脑子里仍摆脱不掉那件事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 试图，努力；试验；审判；考验
detailed_translations.english: to take action in order to do something that you may not be able to do
an attempt to do something

sentences.english: a map and compass
sentences.chinese: 地图和指南针

detailed_translations.english: an instrument that shows directions and has a needle that always points north

sentences.english: I know a number of parents have rung the headteacher about what has happened but I would appeal for everyone to be calm, particularly in relation to those people involved.
sentences.chinese: 我知道一些家长正围着校长问事情发生的经过，但我呼吁大家要保持冷静，特别是在那些跟这件事有直接关系的人。

name: earn
trans: 赚，赚得；获得，挣得；使得到；博得

sentences.english: He earns nearly £20,000 a year.
sentences.chinese: 他每年挣近20,000英镑。

sentences.english: You don’t earn much money being a nurse.
sentences.chinese: 当护士挣钱并不多。

sentences.english: He did all sorts of jobs to earn a living.
sentences.chinese: 他为谋生什么活都干。

sentences.english: I was the only person in the house who was earning.
sentences.chinese: 我是家里唯一上班挣钱的人。

sentences.english: She was earning good money at the bank.
sentences.chinese: 她在银行工作，收入不错。

sentences.english: You could earn a higher rate of interest elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 你在别处可以获得更高的利率。

detailed_translations.english: to receive a particular amount of money for the work that you do

sentences.english: After 25 years of collecting recipes, she has compiled them into a cookbook.
sentences.chinese: 她搜集了25年食谱，把它们编成一本烹饪书。

sentences.english: The company collects information about consumer trends.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司搜集有关消费者趋向的信息。

sentences.english: We’ve been out collecting signatures for our petition.
sentences.chinese: 我们出去为我们的请愿征集签名。

detailed_translations.english: to get things of the same type from different places and bring them together
to get things of the same type from different places and bring them together

sentences.english: a surgical face mask
sentences.chinese: 外科手术口罩

sentences.english: He was attacked and robbed by two people wearing masks .
sentences.chinese: 他被两个蒙面人袭击并抢劫。

detailed_translations.english: something that covers all or part of your face, to protect or to hide it
if a smell, taste, sound etc is masked by a stronger one, it cannot be noticed because of the stronger one

sentences.english: I think we can safely assume (=  it is almost certain  ) that interest rates will go up again soon.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们几乎可以肯定，利率很快会再次上调。

sentences.english: When it got to midnight and Paul was still not back, I began to assume the worst (=  think that the worst possible thing had happened  ) .
sentences.chinese: 到午夜时保罗还没回来，我就开始往最坏的地方想了。

sentences.english: Whoever they appoint will assume responsibility for all financial matters.
sentences.chinese: 不管他们任命的是谁，他都要负责财务方面的所有事务。

sentences.english: These relationships assume great importance in times of crisis.
sentences.chinese: 在危急时刻，这些关系显得尤为重要。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is true, although you do not have definite proof

name: player
trans: 运动员，比赛者；游戏者，做游戏的人；演奏者，表演者；演员；播放器

sentences.english: a game for four players
sentences.chinese: 四人玩的游戏

sentences.english: a tennis/rugby/chess, etc. player
sentences.chinese: 网球、橄榄球、国际象棋等选手

detailed_translations.english: a person who takes part in a game or sport

sentences.english: I know I haven’t done enough revision for tomorrow’s exam.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我对明天的考试准备不足。

detailed_translations.english: the process of changing something in order to improve it by correcting it or including new information or ideas

sentences.english: a 300-hectare farm
sentences.chinese: 一座300公顷的农场

sentences.english: farm workers
sentences.chinese: 农场工人

sentences.english: farm animals
sentences.chinese: 农场牲畜

sentences.english: Joe had worked on the farm all his life.
sentences.chinese: 乔在农场干了一辈子。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land used for growing crops or keeping animals

name: hive
trans: 群居；入蜂房；生活在蜂房中
蜂房，蜂巢；热闹的场所；熙攘喧闹的人群

sentences.english: The most important member of any hive is the queen bee.
sentences.chinese: 任何一个蜂房中最重要的成员都是蜂王。

sentences.english: What people must remember is that one hive quickly become two, two become four and four become eight.
sentences.chinese: 人们一定要记住的是，一个蜂巢很快会变成两个，两个变成四个，四个变成八个。

detailed_translations.english: a small box where  bees  are kept, or the bees that live in this box

name: year
trans: 年；年度；历年；年纪；一年的期间；某年级的学生

sentences.english: I arrived here two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我两年前来到这里。

sentences.english: We’ve known each other for over a year.
sentences.chinese: 我们相识一年多了。

sentences.english: It’s almost a year since Sue died.
sentences.chinese: 休去世快一年了。

sentences.english: Jodi is 15 years old.
sentences.chinese: 约迪15岁。

sentences.english: a three-year business plan
sentences.chinese: 三年的业务发展计划

sentences.english: a four-year-old child
sentences.chinese: 四岁的孩子

detailed_translations.chinese: 年；年度；历年；年纪；一年的期间；某年级的学生
detailed_translations.english: a period of about 365 days or 12 months, measured from any particular time

sentences.english: He will be continuing his education in the US.
sentences.chinese: 他将在美国继续求学。

sentences.english: 英文例句: I felt too sick to continue.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉很难受，无法继续下去了。

sentences.english: 英文例句:The road continues northwards to the border.
sentences.chinese: 中文例句: 这条路往北一直延伸到边境。

detailed_translations.english: to not stop happening, existing, or doing something

name: contradict
trans: 反驳；否定；与…矛盾；与…抵触

sentences.english: Deborah opened her mouth to contradict, but closed it again.
sentences.chinese: 黛博拉张口想要反驳，但又把嘴闭上了。

sentences.english: Dad just can’t bear to be contradicted.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸就是受不了有人反驳他。

sentences.english: The article flatly contradicts their claims.
sentences.chinese: 这篇文章断然驳斥他们的说法。

detailed_translations.english: to disagree with something, especially by saying that the opposite is true

sentences.english: Women usually live longer than men.
sentences.chinese: 女人通常比男人长寿。

sentences.english: Usually I wear black, grey, or brown.
sentences.chinese: 通常我都穿黑色、灰色或者棕色的衣服。

sentences.english: The drive usually takes 15 or 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 这段车程通常需要 15 或 20 分钟。

detailed_translations.english: used to talk about what happens on most occasions or in most situations

name: persuade
trans: 说服，劝说；使某人相信；劝某人做（不做）某事

sentences.english: He was fairly easily persuaded .
sentences.chinese: 他很轻易就被说服了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 说服，劝说；使某人相信；劝某人做（不做）某事
detailed_translations.english: to make someone decide to do something, especially by giving them reasons why they should do it, or asking them many times to do it

sentences.english: The centre provides help for people suffering from mental illness .
sentences.chinese: 该中心对精神病患者提供帮助。

sentences.english: Stress has an effect on both your physical and mental health .
sentences.chinese: 压力对身体健康和心理健康都有影响。

detailed_translations.chinese: 心理的， 精神的， 思想上的； 精神病的； 智力的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the health or state of someone’s mind

name: hawk
trans: 兜售，沿街叫卖；捕捉；咳出
鹰；鹰派成员；掠夺他人的人

sentences.english: Oil thieves sometimes hawk stolen gasoline on the side of highways.
sentences.chinese: 石油大盗们有时在公路边上兜售偷来的石油。

detailed_translations.english: a large bird that hunts and eats small birds and animals
to try to sell goods, usually by going from place to place and trying to persuade people to buy them

sentences.english: What sort of clothes was he wearing?
sentences.chinese: 他穿着什么样的衣服？

sentences.english: I showered and put on clean clothes.
sentences.chinese: 我淋浴后穿上干净的衣服。

sentences.english: He was still in his work clothes.
sentences.chinese: 他仍然穿着工作服。

sentences.english: a clothes shop
sentences.chinese: 服装店

detailed_translations.english: the things that people wear to cover their body or keep warm

name: plastic
trans: 塑料的；（外科）造型的；可塑的

sentences.english: a plastic spoon
sentences.chinese: 塑料汤匙

sentences.english: plastic bags
sentences.chinese: 塑料袋

detailed_translations.english: made of plastic

name: terrible
trans: 可怕的；很糟的；令人讨厌的

sentences.english: The hotel was absolutely terrible.
sentences.chinese: 这家宾馆糟糕透了。

sentences.english: I’d better write this down; I have a terrible memory.
sentences.chinese: 我最好把它记下来，我的记性很差。

sentences.english: You’re making a terrible mistake.
sentences.chinese: 你犯了一个极大的错误。

detailed_translations.english: very bad

sentences.english: Momma was cleaning inside, changing the bedclothes.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈在里面清扫，换卧具。

detailed_translations.english: the sheets, covers etc that you put on a bed

sentences.english: Moodie has been awarded a golf scholarship at the University of Hawaii.
sentences.chinese: 穆迪获授夏威夷大学高尔夫奖学金。

sentences.english: The movie has won a number of awards.
sentences.chinese: 该片获得了多个奖项。

detailed_translations.english: to officially give someone something such as a prize or money to reward them for something they have done
something such as a prize or money given to someone to reward them for something they have done

sentences.english: He glared at the people who surrounded the tent.
sentences.chinese: 他怒视着围住帐篷的那些人。

detailed_translations.english: to be all around someone or something on every side

sentences.english: his humour and charm
sentences.chinese: 他的幽默感和魅力

sentences.english: Greg’s feeble attempt at humour
sentences.chinese: 格雷格干巴巴的幽默

sentences.english: English humour
sentences.chinese: 英国式幽默

sentences.english: It’s vital to have a sense of humor in this job.
sentences.chinese: 做这份工作必须具备幽默感。

sentences.english: The host puts the contestants at ease with his own brand of humour .
sentences.chinese: 主持人以他别具一格的幽默让参赛者放松心情。

sentences.english: He showed flashes of humor that delighted the audience.
sentences.chinese: 他不时冒出些幽默话逗得观众忍俊不禁。

detailed_translations.english: the ability or tendency to think that things are funny, or funny things you say that show you have this ability
to do what someone wants or to pretend to agree with them so that they do not become upset

name: hostess
trans: 女主人，女老板；女服务员；舞女；女房东

sentences.english: The hostess introduced them.
sentences.chinese: 女主人介绍了他们。

detailed_translations.chinese: 女主人，女老板；女服务员；舞女；女房东
detailed_translations.english: a woman at a party, meal etc who has invited all the guests and provides them with food, drink etc

name: speaker
trans: 演讲者；扬声器；说话者；说某种语言的人

sentences.english: The keynote speaker (= main or most important speaker ) was Robert Venturi, the architect.
sentences.chinese: 主要发言人是建筑师罗伯特·文图里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 演讲者；扬声器；说话者；说某种语言的人
detailed_translations.english: someone who makes a formal speech to a group of people

sentences.english: The operation was successful.
sentences.chinese: 手术成功了。

sentences.english: a highly successful (= very successful ) meeting
sentences.chinese: 十分成功的会议

detailed_translations.english: achieving what you wanted, or having the effect or result you intended

name: chance
trans: 机会，际遇；运气，侥幸；可能性

sentences.english: If someone invited me over to Florida, I’d jump at the chance (= use the opportunity eagerly ) .
sentences.chinese: 如果有人邀请我去佛罗里达，我会赶紧抓住这个机会。

sentences.english: There’s always the chance that something will go wrong.
sentences.chinese: 总有可能会出现问题。

sentences.english: If we did move to London, I’d stand a much better chance (= have a much better chance ) of getting a job.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们真的搬到伦敦去，我找到工作的机会就大多了。

sentences.english: There is little chance of her being found alive.
sentences.chinese: 她生还的可能性很小。

detailed_translations.english: a time or situation which you can use to do something that you want to do

sentences.english: keeping the lid on inflation
sentences.chinese: 控制通货膨胀

detailed_translations.english: a cover for the open part of a pot, box, or other container

sentences.english: It cost three dollars.
sentences.chinese: 它要三美元。

sentences.english: a ten-dollar bill
sentences.chinese: 一张十元钞票

sentences.english: You can pay in dollars or euros at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 在机场你可以使用美元或欧元。

detailed_translations.english: the standard unit of money in the US, Canada, Australia, and some other countries, divided into 100  cent s  : symbol $

name: man
trans: 操纵；给…配置人员；使增强勇气；在…就位

sentences.english: There were two men and a woman in the car.
sentences.chinese: 车上有两男一女。

sentences.english: He’s a very kind man.
sentences.chinese: 他是个非常和蔼的人。

sentences.english: a man’s watch
sentences.chinese: 男式手表

sentences.english: All men are equal in the eyes of the law.
sentences.chinese: 法律面前人人平等。

sentences.english: This is one of the worst diseases known to man.
sentences.chinese: 这是人类已知最严重的疾病之一。

detailed_translations.english: an adult male human

sentences.english: Snow had been falling steadily for ten days.
sentences.chinese: 雪已经连续下了10天了。

sentences.english: I need to be home by ten (= ten o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 我得在10点之前回家。

sentences.english: At the time, she was about ten (= ten years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 那时她10岁左右。

detailed_translations.english: the number 10

sentences.english: How would you like to pay?
sentences.chinese: 你想怎么付款？

detailed_translations.english: to give someone money for something you buy or for a service

sentences.english: These toys are not suitable for children under five.
sentences.chinese: 这些玩具不适合五岁以下的儿童玩。

sentences.english: Most of the events listed cost under £60.
sentences.chinese: 所列活动项目的花费大多低于 60 英镑。

sentences.english: I spend just under four hours a day seeing customers.
sentences.chinese: 我一天接待客户所花的时间将近四小时。

sentences.english: He took a deep breath before he went under.
sentences.chinese: 他在钻下水前深深地吸了口气。

detailed_translations.english: less than a particular number, amount, age, or price
Under is also an adverb

sentences.english: The army played a leading role in organizing the attempted coup.
sentences.chinese: 军队在策划这场未遂政变的过程中起了最主要的作用。

sentences.english: the leading industrial nations
sentences.chinese: 主要的工业国

sentences.english: a leading heart specialist
sentences.chinese: 最好的心脏病专家

sentences.english: leading members of the government
sentences.chinese: 政府要员

detailed_translations.english: best, most important, or most successful

sentences.english: The European powers extended their authority in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲列强在亚洲扩大他们的管辖权。

sentences.english: The teacher chalked out a map of Asia on the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 老师用粉笔在黑板上画了一张亚洲地图。

sentences.english: His extensive experience in other parts of Asia helped him to overcome cultural barriers.
sentences.chinese: 在亚洲其他地区的广泛经历帮助他克服了文化障碍。

sentences.english: She tapped out a letter on the typewriter.
sentences.chinese: 她用打字机打出了一封信。

sentences.english: He tapped out an article on the typewriter.
sentences.chinese: 他用打字机打出了一篇文章。

sentences.english: The secretary transcribed those letters on the typewriter.
sentences.chinese: 秘书用打字机打出了那些信。

detailed_translations.english: a machine with keys that you press in order to print letters of the alphabet onto paper

name: even
trans: [数] 偶数的；平坦的；相等的

sentences.english: Most companies have suffered a drop in their profits, even very large companies.
sentences.chinese: 大多数公司的利润都出现下滑，甚至连很大的公司也不例外。

sentences.english: It was quite difficult to see, even with the light on.
sentences.chinese: 这很难看得见，即使开着灯也没有用。

sentences.english: He became quite successful and even appeared on a television show once.
sentences.chinese: 他相当成功，甚至还上了一次电视节目。

sentences.english: She did not even bother to phone us.
sentences.chinese: 她甚至连电话都没打给我们。

sentences.english: He never even acknowledged my letter.
sentences.chinese: 他收到我的信甚至从不会告知一声。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize something that is unexpected or surprising in what you are saying

sentences.english: They searched his luggage for illegal drugs.
sentences.chinese: 他们搜查他的行李看是否藏有毒品。

detailed_translations.english: the cases, bags etc that you carry when you are travelling

name: escape
trans: 逃避，避开，避免；被忘掉；被忽视
逃跑；逃亡；逃走；逃跑工具或方法；野生种；泄漏

sentences.english: He broke down the locked door and escaped.
sentences.chinese: 他砸开上锁的门，逃走了。

sentences.english: Vents allow any steam to escape if the system overheats.
sentences.chinese: 如果系统过热，排放口可使蒸汽逸出。

sentences.english: The girl had no chance of escape.
sentences.chinese: 那女孩没有机会逃跑。

detailed_translations.english: to leave a place when someone is trying to catch you or stop you, or when there is a dangerous situation
the act of getting away from a place, or a dangerous or bad situation

name: powder
trans: 粉；粉末；[化工][军] 火药；尘土

sentences.english: curry powder
sentences.chinese: 咖喱粉

sentences.english: talcum powder
sentences.chinese: 滑石[爽身]粉

sentences.english: Grind the sugar into a powder .
sentences.chinese: 把糖碾成粉末。

sentences.english: The paint is supplied in powder form .
sentences.chinese: 这种涂料以粉末状供应。

detailed_translations.chinese: 粉；粉末；[化工][军] 火药；尘土
detailed_translations.english: a dry substance in the form of very small grains

sentences.english: The neck of the zebra was nipped by a lion.
sentences.chinese: 狮子咬断了那头斑马的脖子。

sentences.english: But what if your horse suddenly grows zebra stripes?
sentences.chinese: 可是如果那匹马突然长出了斑马的条纹呢？

sentences.english: Sixty acres of woods and ponds are home to camels, zebra, bison, water buffalo, ostrich and antelope.
sentences.chinese: 六十英亩的森林和池塘是骆驼，斑马，野牛，水牛，鸵鸟和羚羊的家园。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that looks like a horse but has black and white lines all over its body

sentences.english: I sprang 400 pounds for  her overcoat.
sentences.chinese: 给她买那件大衣，我花了400镑。

sentences.english: He placed his cap and overcoat on a chair.
sentences.chinese: 他把帽子和大衣搁在一张椅子上。

sentences.english: She removed all the grease stains from her overcoat.
sentences.chinese: 她把她大衣上所有油渍都去掉了。

detailed_translations.english: a long thick warm coat

sentences.english: You tasted like popcorn.
sentences.chinese: 你尝起来像爆米花。

sentences.english: I have the popcorn!
sentences.chinese: 我有爆米花。

sentences.english: Once you believe, then it’s on and popping like popcorn.
sentences.chinese: 一旦你相信，它就会像爆米花一样“砰”地弹出来。

detailed_translations.english: a kind of corn that swells and bursts open when heated, and is usually eaten warm with salt or sugar as a  snack

name: affair
trans: 事情；事务；私事；（尤指关系不长久的）风流韵事

sentences.english: Are you interested in world affairs?
sentences.chinese: 你对世界大事感兴趣吗？

sentences.english: the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
sentences.chinese: 外交部

sentences.english: Women had little role in public affairs.
sentences.chinese: 女性过去几乎不参与公共事务。

sentences.english: the Watergate affair
sentences.chinese: 水门事件

sentences.english: He had an affair with his boss that lasted six years.
sentences.chinese: 他和老板的暧昧关系持续了六年。

detailed_translations.english: public or political events and activities

name: steward
trans: 管家；乘务员；膳务员；工会管事

sentences.english: race stewards
sentences.chinese: 比赛组织者

detailed_translations.chinese: 管家；乘务员；膳务员；工会管事
detailed_translations.english: a man whose job is to serve food and drinks to passengers on a plane or ship

name: available
trans: 可获得的；可购得的；可找到的；有空的

sentences.english: Tickets are available from the box office.
sentences.chinese: 售票处有票出售。

sentences.english: Meetings were held to update employees as soon as new information became available .
sentences.chinese: 一有新的信息就开会告诉员工。

sentences.english: Further building can continue when money is made available .
sentences.chinese: 有了资金就可以继续进一步的施工。

sentences.english: Every available space on the wall was covered in pictures.
sentences.chinese: 墙上每一个可用的地方都挂上了画。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可利用的，现有的；可获得的
detailed_translations.english: something that is available is able to be used or can easily be bought or found

name: import
trans: 进口，进口货；输入；意思，含义；重要性

sentences.english: a ban on beef imports
sentences.chinese: 禁止进口牛肉

sentences.english: In 2001, Britain exported more cars than it imported.
sentences.chinese: 2001年英国的汽车出口量大于进口

detailed_translations.english: a product that is brought from one country into another so that it can be sold there, or the business of doing this
to bring a product from one country into another so that it can be sold there

sentences.english: It’s in the kitchen cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 它在厨房的碗柜里。

sentences.english: The cupboard doors were open.
sentences.chinese: 柜门开着。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture with doors, and sometimes shelves, used for storing clothes, plates, food etc

name: date
trans: 过时；注明日期；始于（某一历史时期）

sentences.english: The date on the letter was 30th August 1962.
sentences.chinese: 信上的日期是1962年8月30日。

sentences.english: What’s today’s date?
sentences.chinese: 今天几号？

sentences.english: Make sure you sign and date it at the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 一定要在底下签上姓名和日期。

detailed_translations.english: a particular day of the month or year, especially shown by a number
to write or print the date on something

sentences.english: California’s tough anti-pollution laws
sentences.chinese: 加利福尼亚州严厉的反污染法

detailed_translations.english: the process of making air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty and not suitable for people to use, or the state of being dangerously dirty

name: jar
trans: 冲突；不一致；震惊；发刺耳声

sentences.english: a jam jar
sentences.chinese: 果酱罐

sentences.english: half a jar of peanut butter
sentences.chinese: 半瓶花生酱

sentences.english: The ship jarred a little.
sentences.chinese: 船轻微震了一下。

sentences.english: The sudden movement jarred the box and it fell off the table.
sentences.chinese: 这突然一动震动了那个箱子，然后它从桌上掉了下去。

detailed_translations.english: a glass container with a wide top and a lid, used for storing food such as jam or honey, or the amount it contains

detailed_translations.chinese: 冲突；不一致；震惊；发刺耳声
detailed_translations.english: If an object jars, or if something jars it, the object moves with a fairly hard shaking movement

sentences.english: You can buy anything you want.
sentences.chinese: 你想要什么都可以买。

sentences.english: He was prepared to do anything to make a bit of money.
sentences.chinese: 只要能赚一点钱，他什么都愿意做。

sentences.english: Anything would be better than staying at home!
sentences.chinese: 做什么都比待在家里好！

sentences.english: You can write about swimming, skiing, or anything else you enjoy doing.
sentences.chinese: 你可以写游泳、写滑雪或者其他任何你喜欢的活动。

detailed_translations.english: any thing, event, situation etc, when it is not important to say exactly which

sentences.english: He received a six-month suspension for unprofessional behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 他因有违职业道德的行为被停职六个月。

detailed_translations.english: when something is officially stopped for a period of time

name: Italian
trans: 意大利的；意大利文化的；意大利语的

sentences.english: I watch Italian football a lot.
sentences.chinese: 我常看意大利足球。

sentences.english: The Italian way is to round off a meal with an ice-cream.
sentences.chinese: 意大利人总是在用餐结束时来份冰激凌。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Italy, its people, or its language
someone from Italy

sentences.english: an essay on Bernard Shaw
sentences.chinese: 关于萧伯纳的文章

sentences.english: We asked Jason to write an essay about his hometown.
sentences.chinese: 我们让杰森写一篇关于他家乡的短文。

detailed_translations.english: a short piece of writing about a particular subject by a student as part of a course of study

name: honest
trans: 诚实的，实在的；可靠的；坦率的

sentences.english: He was a hard-working, honest man.
sentences.chinese: 他勤奋老实。

sentences.english: Ann had an honest face.
sentences.chinese: 安有一张诚实的面孔。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is honest always tells the truth and does not cheat or steal

name: new
trans: 新的，新鲜的；更新的；初见的

sentences.english: the city’s new hospital
sentences.chinese: 市里新建的医院

sentences.english: the new issue of ‘Time’ magazine
sentences.chinese: 新一期《时代周刊》

sentences.english: new products on the market
sentences.chinese: 市场上的新产品

sentences.english: The hardest part of this job is understanding the new technology.
sentences.chinese: 这项工作最难的地方是理解新技术。

sentences.english: a young man with new ideas
sentences.chinese: 一个有新观念的年轻人

detailed_translations.english: recently made, built, invented, written, designed etc

sentences.english: There was a pause while Alice changed the tape.
sentences.chinese: 艾丽斯换磁带的时候出现了短暂的停顿。

sentences.english: After a long pause , she went on.
sentences.chinese: 停了好一会儿，她才继续下去。

detailed_translations.english: a short time during which someone stops speaking or doing something before starting again
to stop speaking or doing something for a short time before starting again

sentences.english: The water sparkled in the bright sunlight.

sentences.chinese: 能给我一些面包和黄油吗?。

trans: 问，询问；要求；需要；邀请；讨价

sentences.chinese: “你叫什么名字？”她问道 。

sentences.chinese: 他用粉笔把这条消息写在黑板上。

sentences.chinese: 他想念在部队时候的战友。

sentences.chinese: 他把盘子在一摞书上放稳。

sentences.chinese: 妈妈把杯盘堆叠起来。

name: worn
trans: 穿；磨损（wear的过去分词）；佩戴

sentences.chinese: 地毯上一小块磨破的地方

sentences.english: well worn stone steps
sentences.chinese: 残破的石阶

sentences.chinese: 门在我身后咔嗒一声关上了。

sentences.chinese: 他相信他和妻子有一天会在天国重聚。

sentences.chinese: 那个木匠想当律师， 但别人劝他安分守己地干他自己的老本行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 自行车、 摩托车； 循环
detailed_translations.english: a number of related events that happen again and again in the same order

sentences.chinese: 当地的报纸刊登了一幅我站在活梯上的特写，下面写着：“温迪登上了成功之梯。”

sentences.chinese: 她的双手开始拧她拎着的那个包的拎柄。

sentences.english: He smiled, a slow cynical twist of his lips.
sentences.chinese: 他笑了，嘴巴慢慢一歪，带着嘲笑的意味。

sentences.chinese: 她更喜欢喝黑咖啡。

sentences.chinese: 从军十年后重新过平民生活不容易。

used to describe people or things that are not military

sentences.chinese: 他猛地把她往前一拉。

trans: 静止的，不动的；寂静的，平静的；不起泡的

sentences.chinese: 你还留着朱莉的电话号码吗？

detailed_translations.english: up to a particular point in time and continuing at that moment

a photograph of a scene from a film

sentences.chinese: 警察驾驶员都得接受强化训练。

sentences.chinese: 他们发现一个群落说什么样的语言很大程度上取决于男人的进驻，无论这些人是移居的垦荒农民还是军事入侵者。

detailed_translations.english: the form of language that you speak rather than write

trans: 本国的；土著的；天然的；与生俱来的；天赋的

sentences.chinese: 新加坡有很多土生的棕榈树种。

sentences.chinese: 游客与当地人之间的区别一望即知。

trans: 长辈；较好者；打赌的人（等于bettor）

sentences.chinese: 你的音响比我的好。

sentences.chinese: 我真是羡慕你和伊恩，你俩在一起看起来多幸福。

sentences.english: a mountain rescue team

sentences.chinese: 她是攀登这座山峰的第一位英国女子。

trans: 盖印；强征；传送；给予某人深刻印象

sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫借来他爸爸的跑车向女友炫耀。

sentences.chinese: 苏格兰给我各种各样愉快的联想。

sentences.chinese: 鲨鱼在我们的小船周围游弋。

sentences.english: Beware the sharks when you are making up your mind how to invest.

sentences.chinese: 大多数受害者都出现了这样那样的心理问题。

sentences.chinese: 他们供应汉堡包、比萨饼什么的。

sentences.english: The eggs are sorted according to size.
sentences.chinese: 这些鸡蛋是按大小分类的。

sentences.chinese: 牵牛要牵牛鼻子。

trans: 看护，护理；照顾；培养；给…喂奶

sentences.english: The nurse is coming to give you an injection.
sentences.chinese: 护士会来给你打针。

sentences.english: The school nurse sent Sara home.
sentences.chinese: 学校的护士送萨拉回家。

sentences.english: a male nurse
sentences.chinese: 男护士

sentences.english: a senior nurse
sentences.chinese: 高级护士

sentences.english: a student nurse (= someone who is learning to be a nurse )
sentences.chinese: 实习护士

sentences.english: a psychiatric nurse (= a nurse for people who are mentally ill )
sentences.chinese: 精神病院护士

sentences.english: He’s been nursing an elderly relative.
sentences.chinese: 他一直在照顾一位年老的亲戚。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to look after people who are ill or injured, usually in a hospital
to look after someone who is ill or injured

sentences.english: She’s a dangerous enemy to have.
sentences.chinese: 与她为敌很危险。

sentences.english: Cats and dogs have always been natural enemies.
sentences.chinese: 猫和狗向来是天敌。

sentences.english: an old enemy of her father
sentences.chinese: 她父亲的一个宿敌

sentences.english: the unforgettable sight of the president shaking hands with his sworn enemy
sentences.chinese: 董事长与其死敌握手的难忘情景

sentences.english: I wouldn’t wishthis on my worst enemy.
sentences.chinese: 即使是我的死对头，我也不愿看到他发生这样的事情。

detailed_translations.english: someone who hates you and wants to harm you

sentences.english: I grasped his arm firmly and led him away.
sentences.chinese: 我紧紧抓住他的胳膊把他带走。

sentences.english: Alan grasped the handle and pulled it.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦抓住手柄一拉。

sentences.chinese: 开篇的小段落使读者很快就能掌握文章的大意。

sentences.english: Luke took her arm in a firm grasp and led her through the gate.
sentences.chinese: 卢克紧紧抓着她的胳膊，领她进了门。

detailed_translations.english: to take and hold something firmly

sentences.english: It was like one of those old John Wayne movies.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影有点像约翰•韦恩演的一部老片子。

sentences.english: We took the kids to the movies.
sentences.chinese: 我们带孩子们去看电影。

detailed_translations.english: a film made to be shown at the cinema or on television

sentences.english: ‘I’m going to Appleby tomorrow.’ ‘ What a coincidence ! I’m going there too.’
sentences.chinese: “明天我要去阿普尔比。”“太巧了！我也要去那里。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 巧合， 巧事； 一致， 符合
detailed_translations.english: when two things happen at the same time, in the same place, or to the same people in a way that seems surprising or unusual

sentences.english: He was always criticising his wife’s appearance.
sentences.chinese: 他老是批评妻子的外表。

sentences.english: We are often attracted to somebody first by their physical appearance .
sentences.chinese: 我们经常先被一个人的外貌吸引。

sentences.chinese: 总的来说，女性比男性更注重自己的仪容。

sentences.english: She had an outward appearance of calm, but deep down she was really worried.
sentences.chinese: 她表面上很镇静，内心却十分担忧。

sentences.english: The metal posts spoiled the appearance of the garden.
sentences.chinese: 金属柱子破坏了花园的外观。

sentences.english: A garnish helps to enhance the appearance of any dish.
sentences.chinese: 装饰菜能为任何菜肴增色。

sentences.english: She’s the kind of woman who takes pride in her appearance .
sentences.chinese: 她是那种对自己的外貌感到自豪的女人。

sentences.english: You shouldn’t judge by appearances .
sentences.chinese: 你不该以貌取人。

sentences.chinese: 他们在学校里学习很用功，只是表面上并不显得特别如此。

sentences.chinese: 从所有迹象来看，这个案件都像一宗简单的谋杀。

sentences.english: The pupils looked angelic – but appearances can be deceptive .
sentences.chinese: 这些学生看上去如天使一般，但外表可能是会骗人的。

sentences.english: He was, to all appearances , a respectable, successful businessman.
sentences.chinese: 从各方面看，他都是个体面而成功的商人。

sentences.english: The industry has changed greatly with the appearance of new technologies.
sentences.chinese: 新技术问世后，这一行业出现了天翻地覆的变化。

detailed_translations.english: the way someone or something looks to other people

sentences.english: She pulled the garment on and zipped it up.
sentences.chinese: 她穿上衣服并拉好拉链。

sentences.english: She works in the garment district of Manhattan.
sentences.chinese: 她在曼哈顿的服装加工区工作。

sentences.english: I’m getting used to managing without a car.

trans: 聪明的；巧妙的；敏捷的；厉害的；潇洒的；剧烈的；时髦的

sentences.chinese: 我的眼睛被烟熏得发痛。

trans: [电影][电视] 淡出；[电影][电视] 淡入

to succeed in achieving something after trying for a long time

trans: 希腊的；希腊人的，希腊语的

sentences.chinese: 希腊式酸奶

detailed_translations.english: relating to Greece, its people, or its language
someone from Greece

sentences.chinese: 她的笑脸

an expression in which your mouth curves upwards, when you are being friendly or are happy or amused

sentences.chinese: 他终于逃脱并返回英格兰。

sentences.chinese: 最终，她找到了工作并移居伦敦。

sentences.chinese: 我有幸与一位出色的部门主管共事。

sentences.chinese: 这次会议的目的是选出一位新主席。

to make your muscles tight and stiff, or to become tight and stiff

any of the forms of a verb that show the time, continuance, or completion of an action or state that is expressed by the verb. ‘I am’ is in the present tense, ‘I was’ is past tense, and ‘I will be’ is future tense.

sentences.english: He walked back over the railway bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他从铁路桥上走了回去。

sentences.chinese: 一杯柠檬汽水

sentences.chinese: 你要来一杯柠檬汽水吗？

sentences.chinese: 曼联（队）足球俱乐部

sentences.chinese: 我们去夜总会怎样？

sentences.chinese: 她非常怀疑他在对她撒谎。

sentences.chinese: 旧的锡浴缸

made of  tin

trans: 适当的；本身的；特有的；正派的

sentences.chinese: 父母负责督促子女上学上课，这是天经地义的事。

sentences.chinese: 它们经常可以以折扣价买到。

trans: 延期；耽搁；被耽搁或推迟的时间

trans: 时间；时代；次数；节拍；倍数
计时；测定…的时间；安排…的速度

sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦改变了我们的时空概念。

sentences.chinese: 长期建立起来的亲密关系

sentences.chinese: 顾客只有有限的时间可以检查商品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 时间；时代；次数；节拍；倍数

trans: 打击；袭击；碰撞；偶然发现；伤…的感情
打；打击；（演出等）成功；讽刺

sentences.chinese: 《波希米亚狂想曲》是哪支乐队风行一时的歌曲？

trans: [指无生命的东西、动物、植物]它；这；那

sentences.chinese: “你的办公室在哪儿？”“在三楼。”

sentences.chinese: 我喜欢春季——这是一年里最美妙的时节。

sentences.chinese: 有人在哭喊，楼房在燃烧―太可怕了！

sentences.chinese: 这小动物是狐猴，生活在马达加斯加。

sentences.chinese: 阿尔加维对河边的垂钓者或深海的渔民都是一个天堂。

trans: 退休金，抚恤金；津贴；膳宿费

sentences.chinese: 从多少岁可以开始领取养老金？

sentences.chinese: 如果你是自由职业者，应该考虑办理私人养老金事宜。

sentences.chinese: 许多人发现仅凭国家基本养老金不能养活自己。

sentences.chinese: 我们为将要开始的长途旅行做好了准备。

sentences.chinese: 在电视上看到自己感觉很奇怪。

sentences.chinese: 她被判入狱11个月。

sentences.english: I never go to bed before eleven (= 11 o’clock ).
sentences.chinese: 我从不在11点钟以前上床睡觉。

sentences.english: James had worked every summer since he was eleven (= 11 years old ).
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯自11岁起每年夏天都打工。

detailed_translations.english: the number
the number

sentences.english: I can’t come out tonight – my dad won’t let me.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上我不能出来，我爸爸不允许。

detailed_translations.english: to allow someone to do something

trans: 好的；优良的；愉快的；虔诚的

sentences.chinese: 一家不错的宾馆

sentences.english: good quality cloth
sentences.chinese: 优质布料

sentences.english: The train service is not very good.
sentences.chinese: 火车服务不是很好。

sentences.english: My French is better than my Spanish.
sentences.chinese: 我的法语比西班牙语好。

sentences.english: Alex is very good at languages.
sentences.chinese: 亚历克斯在语言方面很擅长。

sentences.english: She’s a very good player.
sentences.chinese: 她是一名非常优秀的球员。

name: unfortunate
trans: 不幸的；令人遗憾的；不成功的

sentences.chinese: 我们进教室的时候，老师正在对着一个倒霉的学生吼叫。

sentences.chinese: 晚间新闻节目

sentences.english: I hope to have some good news for you soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望很快就能给你好消息。

sentences.english: Do you mind if I watch?
sentences.chinese: 你介意我看着吗？

sentences.english: We sat and watched the sunset.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐下来看日落。

sentences.english: Ruth could not bear to watch her parents arguing.
sentences.chinese: 露丝看不得父母争吵。

sentences.english: Most parents don’t know what their kids are watching on TV.
sentences.chinese: 大多数父母不知道自己的孩子都在看什么电视节目。

sentences.chinese: 他们达成协议，平分利润。

sentences.chinese: 他们商量后，他会不会同意去看望继母？

trans: 存款；押金；订金；保证金；沉淀物

sentences.chinese: 建议您把贵重物品存到酒店保险箱里。

sentences.chinese: 河水流速变慢时，一层泥土便沉积下来。

sentences.english: I’d like to make a deposit (= pay some money ) into my savings account.
sentences.chinese: 我想存一笔钱到我的储蓄账户里。

an amount of money that is paid into a bank account

sentences.chinese: 调查人员仍在设法弄清失火的原因。

detailed_translations.english: to find out the facts about something

sentences.chinese: 墨西哥政府

sentences.english: the Mexican border
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥边界

sentences.english: Mexican food
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥菜

detailed_translations.english: relating to Mexico or its people
someone from Mexico

sentences.english: He sent his work to his publishers by modem.
sentences.chinese: 他通过调制解调器把作品发给他的出版商。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of electronic equipment that allows information from one computer to be sent along telephone wires to another computer

sentences.english: Would you like some salad with your pasta?
sentences.chinese: 你的意大利面要配些色拉吗？

sentences.english: a spinach salad
sentences.chinese: 菠菜色拉

detailed_translations.english: a mixture of raw vegetables, especially  lettuce  ,  cucumber  , and tomato

sentences.english: Two contrary views emerged.
sentences.chinese: 出现了两种相反的观点。

sentences.english: The men shouted contrary orders.
sentences.chinese: 这些人大声喊叫的命令互相矛盾。

sentences.english: It wasn’t a good thing; on the contrary it was a huge mistake.
sentences.chinese: 那不是好事，恰恰相反，是个巨大的错误。

sentences.english: She also hopes her children will get a good education.
sentences.chinese: 她也希望她的孩子可以受到良好的教育。

sentences.english: efforts to improve girls’ access to education
sentences.chinese: 为增加女孩受教育机会所作的努力

detailed_translations.english: the process of teaching and learning, usually at school, college, or university

name: cheer
trans: 欢呼；愉快；心情；令人愉快的事

sentences.chinese: 消防员到达时，大家都欢呼起来。

sentences.chinese: 观众在呐喊欢呼。

sentences.english: The spectators cheered him wildly.
sentences.chinese: 观众拼命为他加油。

detailed_translations.chinese: 欢呼；愉快；心情；令人愉快的事
detailed_translations.english: a shout of happiness, praise, approval, or encouragement

sentences.chinese: 用不着大声喊叫！我听得见！

sentences.chinese: “小心！”汽车开动时，她大声喊道。

detailed_translations.english: to say something very loudly

sentences.chinese: 他恳求老师原谅他。

The Arctic is the area of the world around the North Pole. It is extremely cold and there is very little light in winter and very little darkness in summer.

trans: 可以，能够；可能，也许；祝，愿；会，能

sentences.chinese: 我可能会迟到，所以别等我。

sentences.chinese: 有些化学物品可能会给环境造成破坏。

sentences.chinese: 好了，可能是我错了。
