sentences.english: He was a painter and poet.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位画家兼诗人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who writes poems

sentences.english: Groups of football fans began heading towards the ground.
sentences.chinese: 成群结队的球迷开始向球场走去。

detailed_translations.english: someone who likes a particular sport or performing art very much, or who admires a famous person

sentences.english: These bras are specially designed for women with large breasts.
sentences.chinese: 这些胸罩专为乳房丰满的女性设计。

sentences.english: breast milk
sentences.chinese: 母乳

sentences.english: breast cancer
sentences.chinese: 乳腺癌

sentences.english: Dick cradled her photograph against his breast.
sentences.chinese: 迪克把她的照片轻轻拥在胸前。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two round raised parts on a woman’s chest that produce milk when she has a baby

name: sleeve
trans: [机] 套筒，[机] 套管；袖子，[服装] 袖套

sentences.english: a dress with long sleeves
sentences.chinese: 长袖连衣裙

detailed_translations.chinese: [机] 套筒，[机] 套管；袖子，[服装] 袖套
detailed_translations.english: the part of a piece of clothing that covers all or part of your arm

sentences.english: Above all be mentally prepared for the rigors of each trading day from the time you get up each morning until you go to bed at night.
sentences.chinese: 最重要的是在精神上对每个交易日的严峻场面作好准备，从每天早晨你爬起来，一直到晚上回到床上。

name: power
trans: 力量，能力；电力，功率；政权，势力；[数] 幂
激励；供以动力；使…有力量
借影响有权势人物以操纵权力的

sentences.english: It is not within my power (= I am unable or not in a position) to help you.
sentences.chinese: 我是爱莫能助啊。

sentences.english: The ship was helpless against the power of the storm.
sentences.chinese: 那艘船只能任凭强大的暴风雨肆虐。

sentences.english: The Secretary of State has the power to approve the proposals.
sentences.chinese: 国务卿有权批准这些提议。

sentences.english: 4 to the power of 3 is 4^3 (= 4 × 4 × 4 = 64).
sentences.chinese: 4的3次方是4^3。

detailed_translations.english: the ability or right to control people or events

sentences.english: We flew to Athens via Paris.
sentences.chinese: 我们经由巴黎飞往雅典。

detailed_translations.english: travelling through a place on the way to another place

sentences.english: The old clock ticked noisily.
sentences.chinese: 那只古老的钟大声地嘀嗒着。

detailed_translations.english: if a clock or watch ticks, it makes a short repeated sound
A tick is a written mark like a V. It is used to show that something is correct or has been selected or dealt with.
to mark a test, list of questions etc with a tick, in order to show that something is correct, to choose something etc

name: relax
trans: 放松，休息；松懈，松弛；变从容；休养

sentences.english: Gentle exercise can relax stiff shoulder muscles.
sentences.chinese: 和缓的运动可以使僵硬的肩部肌肉放松。

detailed_translations.english: if you relax a part of your body or it relaxes, it becomes less stiff or less tight
to rest or do something that is enjoyable, especially after you have been working

sentences.english: a drawing of Canterbury Cathedral
sentences.chinese: 一幅坎特伯雷大教堂的素描画

sentences.english: I’ve never been very good at drawing.
sentences.chinese: 我向来不擅长画图。

detailed_translations.english: a picture that you draw with a pencil, pen etc

name: rough
trans: 粗糙的；粗略的；粗野的；艰苦的；未经加工的
艰苦；高低不平的地面；未经加工的材料；粗糙的部分

sentences.english: Her hands were rough from hard work.
sentences.chinese: 她的双手因为干重活而变得很粗糙。

sentences.english: the rough terrain at the base of the mountains
sentences.chinese: 山脚下崎岖不平的地形

sentences.english: We were bumping over the rough ground.
sentences.chinese: 我们在崎岖的地面上颠簸而行。

sentences.english: a rough translation
sentences.chinese: 粗略的翻译

detailed_translations.english: having an uneven surface

name: systematic
trans: 系统的；体系的；有系统的；[图情] 分类的；一贯的，惯常的

sentences.english: a systematic approach to solving the problem
sentences.chinese: 系统解决问题的办法

detailed_translations.english: done according to a system or plan, in a thorough, efficient or determined way

sentences.english: My father marched me over to Otto, the local barber, to have my hair cut short.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸把我拽到当地理发师奥托跟前，让他把我的头发剪短。

detailed_translations.english: a man whose job is to cut men’s hair and sometimes to  shave  them

sentences.english: Recent stock market losses point to trouble ahead.
sentences.chinese: 最近股市的下跌预示着未来将有麻烦。

detailed_translations.english: problems or difficulties
to say something or ask someone to do something which may use or waste their time or upset them

sentences.english: a deep male voice
sentences.chinese: 低沉的男声

sentences.english: traditional male values
sentences.chinese: 传统的男性价值观

sentences.english: Motor-racing has largely been a male preserve (= something that only men have been involved with ) .
sentences.chinese: 赛车基本上是男人的专利。

detailed_translations.english: typical of or relating to men or boys
a man

sentences.english: That model won't go into production before late 2007.
sentences.chinese: 那种型号要到2007年底才会投入生产。

sentences.english: a drop in oil and gas production
sentences.chinese: 石油和天然气产量的下降

detailed_translations.english: the process of making or growing things to be sold, especially in large quantities

name: down
trans: 软毛，绒毛；[地质] 开阔的高地

sentences.english: David bent down to tie his shoelace.
sentences.chinese: 戴维弯腰系鞋带。

sentences.english: Get down off the table.
sentences.chinese: 从桌子上下来。

sentences.english: Tears were streaming down my face.
sentences.chinese: 我泪流满面。

sentences.english: The sun was going down and it would soon be dark.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳西下，天很快就要黑了。

sentences.english: They came running down the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 他们跑下楼来。

sentences.english: She stood on a balcony looking down into the courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 她站在阳台上朝下面的院子望去。

sentences.english: Glancing down the list of runners, I noticed a familiar name.
sentences.chinese: 我往下扫了一眼赛跑选手的名单，注意到了一个熟悉的名字。

sentences.english: Her hair came down to her waist.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发一直垂到腰际。

sentences.english: Ken fell asleep face down (= with his face towards the ground ) on the couch.
sentences.chinese: 肯趴在长沙发上睡着了。

sentences.english: We heard the sound of laughter down below.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到下面有笑声。

sentences.english: The bathroom is down those stairs.
sentences.chinese: 浴室在那段楼梯下面。

detailed_translations.english: to or towards a lower place or position

name: liquid
trans: 液体的；清澈的；明亮的；易变的

sentences.english: Add a little more liquid to the sauce.
sentences.chinese: 在酱汁中再加一点水。

sentences.english: Children take antibiotics in liquid form.
sentences.chinese: 儿童服用液态抗生素。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that is not a solid or a gas, for example water or milk
in the form of a liquid instead of a gas or solid

sentences.english: Some young people suddenly become self-conscious and tongue-tied in early adolescence.
sentences.chinese: 一些年青人在青春期早期突然变得害羞结舌。

detailed_translations.english: the time, usually between the ages of 12 and 18, when a young person is developing into an adult

sentences.english: One of the neighbors complained about the noise from the party.
sentences.chinese: 有位邻居抱怨聚会太吵。

sentences.english: FBI agents were interviewing all their friends and neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 联邦调查局人员正在向他们所有的朋友和邻居问话。

sentences.english: Our next-door neighbours (= the people who live in the house next to us ) say they’ll look after our cat for us while we’re away.
sentences.chinese: 我们隔壁的邻居说，我们不在时他们会照顾我们的猫。

detailed_translations.english: someone who lives next to you or near you

name: potential
trans: 潜能；可能性；[电] 电势

sentences.english: The company has identified 60 potential customers.
sentences.chinese: 该公司已确定了60位潜在的客户。

detailed_translations.english: likely to develop into a particular type of person or thing in the future
the possibility that something will develop in a particular way, or have a particular effect

sentences.english: These results are firsts in the history of women’s athletics.
sentences.chinese: 这些成绩在女运动员历史上是第一次。

sentences.english: First I had to decide what to wear.
sentences.chinese: 首先我得决定穿什么。

detailed_translations.english: 1st
at the beginning

sentences.english: This diagram will illustrate what I mean.
sentences.chinese: 这个图表可说明我的意思。

sentences.english: This is a simpler diagram than the one I just showed you but the principles are the same.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个比我刚展示的还要更简单的图解，但是原理是一样的。

sentences.english: A table or diagram containing the name and address range of each peripheral addressable by the processor within the memory space.
sentences.chinese: 一个在内存空间中的，包含每个外设的名字和可由处理器设置的地址范围的表格或图表。

detailed_translations.english: to show or represent something in a diagram

detailed_translations.chinese: 图解， 简图， 图表
detailed_translations.english: a simple drawing or plan that shows exactly where something is, what something looks like, or how something works

name: memory
trans: 记忆，记忆力；内存，[计] 存储器；回忆

sentences.english: He has lots of happy memories of his stay in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 他对在日本逗留的那段时光有许多美好的回忆。

sentences.english: The data is stored in the computer’s memory.
sentences.chinese: 数据储存在电脑的存储器里

detailed_translations.english: something that you remember from the past about a person, place, or experience

name: unhappy
trans: 不快乐的；不幸福的；不适当的

sentences.english: If you’re so unhappy, why don’t you change jobs?
sentences.chinese: 你要是那么不开心，为什么不换个工作呢？

sentences.english: Leslie had an unhappy childhood.
sentences.chinese: 莱斯利的童年很不幸。

sentences.english: an unhappy marriage
sentences.chinese: 不幸的婚姻

sentences.english: I was desperately unhappy.
sentences.chinese: 我非常不快乐。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不快乐的；不幸福的；不适当的
detailed_translations.english: not happy

name: distant
trans: 遥远的；冷漠的；远隔的；不友好的，冷淡的

sentences.english: the sound of distant gunfire
sentences.chinese: 远处的炮火声

sentences.english: Her honeymoon seemed a distant memory.
sentences.chinese: 她的蜜月似乎成了遥远的记忆。

sentences.english: That affair was in the dim and distant past (= a long time ago ) .
sentences.chinese: 那件事已成为遥远的过去了。

sentences.english: The President hopes to visit Ireland in the not too distant future (= quite soon ) .
sentences.chinese: 总统希望在不久的将来访问爱尔兰。

sentences.english: After the quarrel Sue remained cold and distant.
sentences.chinese: 那次争吵之后，休一直冷淡疏远。

detailed_translations.english: far away in space or time

name: fence
trans: 防护；用篱笆围住；练习剑术

sentences.english: Villagers say the fence would restrict public access to the hills.
sentences.chinese: 村民们说栅栏将限制公众进入山区。

detailed_translations.english: a structure made of wood, metal etc that surrounds a piece of land

detailed_translations.chinese: 防护；用篱笆围住；练习剑术
detailed_translations.english: to fight with a long thin sword as a sport

name: crowd
trans: 群众,一伙;一堆,许多,大众

sentences.english: A vast crowd gathered in the main square.
sentences.chinese: 主广场上聚集了一大群人。

sentences.english: She mingled with the crowd of guests, exchanging greetings.
sentences.chinese: 她穿梭在宾客中间和他们打招呼。

sentences.english: Saturday’s game was watched by a capacity crowd (= the maximum number of people that a sports ground etc can hold ) .
sentences.chinese: 星期六的比赛座无虚席。

sentences.english: Troops fired tear gas and shots to disperse a crowd of 15,000 demonstrators.
sentences.chinese: 军队发射催泪弹并开枪来驱散15,000名示威群众。

sentences.english: I didn’t know him; he wasn’t one of the usual crowd.
sentences.chinese: 我不认识他，他不是平时那一群人里的。

sentences.english: He wanted to go unnoticed, to be one of the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 他想默默无闻地做个普通人。

detailed_translations.english: a large group of people who have gathered together to do something, for example to watch something or protest about something

name: function
trans: 功能；[数] 函数；职责；盛大的集会

sentences.english: Her legs have now ceased to function .
sentences.chinese: 她的双腿现在已经丧失正常功能了。

sentences.english: You know I can’t function (= cannot perform normal activities ) without a coffee in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 你知道的，我早上不喝杯咖啡就无法工作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作， 运行； 起作用
detailed_translations.english: to work in the correct or intended way

detailed_translations.chinese: 功能，职务；【数】函数；重大聚会
detailed_translations.english: the purpose that something has, or the job that someone or something does

sentences.english: wild birds
sentences.chinese: 野鸟

sentences.english: The dawn was filled with the sound of birds.
sentences.chinese: 黎明时分，鸟鸣声不绝于耳。

sentences.english: a flock of birds
sentences.chinese: 一群飞鸟

sentences.english: a wooden bird cage
sentences.chinese: 木制鸟笼

detailed_translations.english: a creature with wings and feathers that can usually fly. Many birds sing and build nests, and female birds lay eggs

sentences.english: We’d classify Drabble’s novels under ‘Romance’.
sentences.chinese: 我们把德拉布尔的小说归类为“言情小说”。

sentences.english: Families are classified according to the father’s occupation.
sentences.chinese: 各个家庭按父亲的职业分类。

detailed_translations.english: to decide what group something belongs to

name: explicit
trans: 明确的；清楚的；直率的；详述的

sentences.english: The contrast could not have been made more explicit.
sentences.chinese: 这个对比再清楚不过了。

sentences.english: explicit knowledge of grammar
sentences.chinese: 清楚易懂的语法知识

sentences.english: The kidnappers gave us explicit instructions not to involve the police.
sentences.chinese: 绑匪明确告诉我们不许报警。

sentences.english: Be explicit when you talk about money with your family.
sentences.chinese: 与家人谈钱的问题要直截了当。

detailed_translations.english: expressed in a way that is very clear and direct

sentences.english: a lightning attack
sentences.chinese: 闪电式突袭

detailed_translations.english: very fast, and often without warning
a powerful flash of light in the sky caused by electricity and usually followed by thunder

sentences.english: a video of baby’s first steps
sentences.chinese: 一盒婴儿学步的录像带

sentences.english: He took one step and fell.
sentences.chinese: 他走了一步就跌倒了。

sentences.english: I had to retrace my steps (= go back the way I came ) several times before I found the shop.
sentences.chinese: 我来回走了几次才找到那家商店。

sentences.english: This is the first step in reforming the welfare system.
sentences.chinese: 这是福利制度改革的第一步。

sentences.english: Jenny sat on the step in front of the house, waiting.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮坐在房前的台阶上等着。

sentences.english: I accidentally stepped in a puddle.
sentences.chinese: 我不小心踩进了水坑。

detailed_translations.english: the movement you make when you put one foot in front of or behind the other when walking
to bring your foot down on something

name: jog
trans: 慢跑；轻推；蹒跚行进；使颠簸

sentences.english: I go jogging every morning.
sentences.chinese: 我每天早晨都去慢跑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 慢跑；轻推；蹒跚行进；使颠簸
detailed_translations.english: to run slowly and steadily, especially as a way of exercising
a slow steady run, especially done as a way of exercising

sentences.english: ‘Lunch? ’ ‘No thanks, I've already eaten. ’
sentences.chinese: “午餐？”“不，谢谢，我已吃过了。”

sentences.english: We got there early but Mike had already left.
sentences.chinese: 我们及早到了那里，但是迈克已经离开了。

detailed_translations.english: before now or before a particular time in the pas

sentences.english: It was a cold moonlit night.
sentences.chinese: 那是个寒冷的月夜。

sentences.english: I didn’t sleep too well last night.
sentences.chinese: 我昨晚睡得不太好。

detailed_translations.english: the dark part of each 24-hour period when the sun cannot be seen and when most people sleep

name: drawer
trans: 抽屉；开票人；出票人；起草者；酒馆侍

sentences.english: She took a file from her desk drawer .
sentences.chinese: 她从书桌的抽屉里拿出了一个文件夹。

sentences.english: The scissors are in the kitchen drawer (= drawer in a piece of kitchen furniture ) .
sentences.chinese: 剪刀在厨房的抽屉里。

detailed_translations.english: part of a piece of furniture, such as a desk, that you pull out and push in and use to keep things in

sentences.english: a wooden bench
sentences.chinese: 木制长椅

detailed_translations.english: made of wood

name: accessible
trans: 易接近的；可进入的；可理解的

sentences.english: The island is only accessible by boat.
sentences.chinese: 这个岛只有坐船才能到。

sentences.english: There is a church which is easily accessible from my home.
sentences.chinese: 有座教堂离我家很近。

detailed_translations.chinese: 易接近的；可进入的；可理解的
detailed_translations.english: a place, building, or object that is accessible is easy to reach or get into

name: passive
trans: 被动的，消极的；被动语态的

sentences.english: Kathy seems to take a very passive role in the relationship.
sentences.chinese: 凯茜在这一关系中似乎扮演着十分被动的角色。

sentences.english: their passive acceptance of their fate
sentences.chinese: 他们对命运的消极接受

detailed_translations.english: someone who is passive tends to accept things that happen to them or things that people say to them, without taking any action

sentences.english: What are they going to do now, I wonder ?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道，他们现在打算怎么办呢？

sentences.english: He’s been leaving work early a lot – it makes you wonder , doesn’t it?
sentences.chinese: 他最近经常提早下班——让人觉得奇怪，是不是？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something that you are not sure about and try to guess what is true, what will happen etc

sentences.english: I realize I ought to have told you about it.
sentences.chinese: 我意识到我本该告诉你这件事的。

detailed_translations.english: You use ought to have with a past participle to indicate that although it was best or correct for someone to do something in the past, they did not actually do it.

sentences.english: Increased population has transformed the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 人口的增加使景观发生了变化。

detailed_translations.english: to completely change the appearance, form, or character of something or someone, especially in a way that improves it

sentences.english: She was always defending her husband in front of their daughter.
sentences.chinese: 她在女儿面前总是为丈夫辩解。

sentences.english: Students should be ready to explain and defend their views.
sentences.chinese: 学生应该勇于为自己的观点进行解释和辩护。

detailed_translations.english: to use arguments to protect something or someone from criticism, or to prove that something is right

name: kilometre
trans: [计量] 公里；[计量] 千米

sentences.english: He was a kilometre out from home when the storm struck.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨袭来时他离家有一公里远。

sentences.english: They ran to the main road and on for a kilometre until ambulances could reach them.
sentences.chinese: 接着他们就向大道跑去，到了以后再跑了一千米，直到碰到救护车。

sentences.english: Every cubic kilometre of the ring contains around 20 tiny particles of dust, making it so tenuous, it would be invisible from the inside.
sentences.chinese: 这个光环每立方公里含有约20颗尘埃微粒，结构非常稀薄，站在光环内部都看不见它本身。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring distance, equal to 1,000 metres

sentences.english: I could hear Sarah and Andy talking in the next room.
sentences.chinese: 我听到萨拉和安迪在隔壁讲话。

sentences.english: Sue and Bob still aren’t talking (= are refusing to talk to each other ) .
sentences.chinese: 休和鲍勃仍然互不理睬。

detailed_translations.english: to say things to someone as part of a conversation
to say things to someone as part of a conversation

name: girl
trans: 女孩；姑娘，未婚女子；女职员，女演员；（男人的）女朋友

sentences.english: Both boys and girls can apply to join the choir.
sentences.chinese: 男孩和女孩均可申请加入合唱团。

sentences.english: Girls! Please be quiet.
sentences.chinese: 姑娘们！请安静。

sentences.english: a teenage girl
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的女孩

sentences.english: They have two girls and a boy.
sentences.chinese: 他们有两个女孩和一个男孩。

detailed_translations.english: a female child

sentences.english: the US ambassador to Spain
sentences.chinese: 美国驻西班牙大使

detailed_translations.english: an important official who represents his or her government in a foreign country

sentences.english: I walked across the grass.
sentences.chinese: 我走在草地上。

sentences.english: Keep off the grass.
sentences.chinese: 请勿践踏草地。

detailed_translations.english: an area of grass, especially an area where the grass is kept cut short

sentences.english: The final cost could be as much as one billion dollars.
sentences.chinese: 最后的费用可能高达十亿美元。

detailed_translations.english: the number 1,000,000,000

sentences.english: A brief summary is given on a separate sheet.
sentences.chinese: 摘要另写一页。

sentences.english: It says torture and summary execution are common.
sentences.chinese: 据说酷刑和草草处决很常见。

detailed_translations.english: a short statement that gives the main information about something, without giving all the details
a summary report, statement etc gives the main facts in a report etc without any of the details or explanations

name: Moslem
trans: 穆斯林的；伊斯兰教的；回教的
穆斯林；穆罕默德信徒；伊斯兰

sentences.english: She tells me that if the religious scholars say so, she will engage in Moslem operations: suicide attacks.
sentences.chinese: 她告诉我如果宗教学者希望他们那么做，她也将义无反顾的采取穆斯林的反抗活动—自杀攻击。

sentences.english: The Buddhist, the Christian, the Moslem, and the Jew may all get answers to their prayers, in spite of the enormous differences among their stated beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 佛教徒、基督教徒、伊斯兰教徒和犹太教徒，尽管他们所宣称的信仰有极大的不同，但是，他们的祈祷大概都能得到回应。

detailed_translations.chinese: 穆斯林的；伊斯兰教的；回教的
穆斯林；穆罕默德信徒；伊斯兰

sentences.english: Please wire me when you arrive.
sentences.chinese: 你到达后请打电报给我。

sentences.english: He got a wire to go home.
sentences.chinese: 他接到一封让他回家的电报。

detailed_translations.english: to send money electronically
thin metal in the form of a thread, or a piece of this
to send money electronically

sentences.english: I hated those cold winter mornings.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌冬天里寒冷的早晨。

sentences.english: I’m not feeling very well this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上我觉得不大舒服。

sentences.english: He stayed in bed late on Sunday morning.
sentences.chinese: 星期日早上他睡到很晚。

sentences.english: She took the early morning train.
sentences.chinese: 她搭乘了一大早的火车。

detailed_translations.english: the early part of the day, from when the sun rises until 12 o’clock in the middle of the day

name: depend
trans: 依赖，依靠；取决于；相信，信赖

sentences.english: He depended on his writing for his income.
sentences.chinese: 他靠写作谋生。

sentences.english: You can depend on Jane – she always keeps her promises.
sentences.chinese: 你可以相信简——她一向都信守诺言。

detailed_translations.english: to need the support, help, or existence of someone or something in order to exist, be healthy, be successful etc

sentences.english: Fold the paper along the dotted line.
sentences.chinese: 沿虚线将纸折起来。

sentences.english: It’ll fit in if you fold it in half .
sentences.chinese: 对折的话就能放下了。

detailed_translations.english: to bend a piece of paper, cloth etc by laying or pressing one part over another
a line made in paper or material when you fold one part of it over another

sentences.english: precise sales figures
sentences.chinese: 准确的销售数据

sentences.english: It was difficult to get precise information.
sentences.chinese: 很难得到确切的消息。

sentences.english: ‘She’s a lot older than you, isn’t she?’ ‘Fifteen years, to be precise .’
sentences.chinese: “她比你大很多，是不是？”“准确地说，大了15岁。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 精确的， 准确的； 严谨的
detailed_translations.english: precise information, details etc are exact, clear, and correct

name: quick
trans: 快的；迅速的，敏捷的；灵敏的

sentences.english: That was quick! I thought you’d be another hour.
sentences.chinese: 很快啊！我以为你还要一个小时呢。

sentences.english: It’s probably quicker by train.
sentences.chinese: 乘火车可能会快一点。

sentences.english: Have we got time for a quick drink?
sentences.chinese: 我们有时间喝口东西吗？

sentences.english: What’s the quickest way to the station?
sentences.chinese: 到车站怎么走最快？

sentences.english: We stopped to have a quick look at the church.
sentences.chinese: 我们停下来迅速地扫了一眼教堂。

sentences.english: Three bombs went off in quick succession (= quickly, one after the other ).
sentences.chinese: 瞬间有三个炸弹连续爆炸。

detailed_translations.english: lasting for or taking only a short time

name: conference
trans: 会议；讨论；协商；联盟；（正式）讨论会；[工会、工党用语]（每年的）大会

sentences.english: Representatives from over 100 countries attended the International Peace Conference in Geneva.
sentences.chinese: 来自一百多个国家的代表出席了在日内瓦举行的国际和平大会。

detailed_translations.english: a large formal meeting where a lot of people discuss important matters such as business, politics, or science, especially for several days

sentences.english: You probably picked up my keys instead of yours.
sentences.chinese: 你可能没拿你的钥匙而错拿了我的。

sentences.english: Could I have tuna instead of ham?
sentences.chinese: 我可否要金枪鱼来代替火腿？

sentences.english: Instead of being annoyed, he seemed quite pleased.
sentences.chinese: 他没有生气，反而似乎很高兴。

detailed_translations.english: used to say what is not used, does not happen etc, when something else is used, happens etc

sentences.english: What about the Canadian policy?
sentences.chinese: 那么加拿大的政策呢？

sentences.english: The fugitive is believed to be headed for the Canadian border.
sentences.chinese: 据信，逃亡者正向加拿大边界方向逃窜。

sentences.english: Most English people bracket American and Canadian accents together.
sentences.chinese: 大多数英国人都把美国音和加拿大音相提并论。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Canada or its people
someone from Canada

sentences.english: The brakes don’t seem to be working properly.
sentences.chinese: 刹车似乎不正常。

sentences.english: Then he’s not doing his job properly.
sentences.chinese: 那么他没把分内事做好。

sentences.english: Parents should teach their children to behave properly in public.
sentences.chinese: 家长应该教导子女在公共场合要有规有矩。

sentences.english: properly trained staff
sentences.chinese: 训练有素的员工

detailed_translations.english: correctly, or in a way that is considered right

sentences.english: I have absolute confidence in her.
sentences.chinese: 我对她充满信心。

sentences.english: Some of the stuff on TV is absolute rubbish.
sentences.chinese: 电视上播放的有些东西简直就是垃圾。

sentences.english: How did you do that? You’re an absolute genius.
sentences.chinese: 你是怎么做的？ 你绝对是个天才。

sentences.english: That meal last night cost an absolute fortune.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚那顿饭花了一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.english: complete or total

name: example
trans: 作为…的例子；为…做出榜样

sentences.english: Many countries, for example Mexico and Japan, have a lot of earthquakes.
sentences.chinese: 许多国家，例如墨西哥和日本，经常发生地震。

sentences.english: Her courage is an example to us all.
sentences.chinese: 她的勇气是我们大家的榜样。

detailed_translations.english: something such as an object, a fact or a situation that shows, explains or supports what you say

name: bill
trans: [法] 法案；广告；账单；[金融] 票据；钞票；清单
宣布；开账单；用海报宣传

sentences.english: Have you paid the phone bill?
sentences.chinese: 电话费你付了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a written list showing how much you have to pay for services you have received, work that has been done etc

name: since
trans: 因为；由于；既然；自…以来；自…以后

sentences.english: We’ve been waiting here since two o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 我们从两点钟开始就在这里等了。

sentences.english: I haven’t played rugby since I left university.
sentences.chinese: 我大学毕业后就没打过橄榄球。

sentences.english: She left London ten years ago, and I haven’t seen her since.
sentences.chinese: 她十年前离开伦敦，此后我再没有见过她。

sentences.english: The factory has been here since the 1970s.
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂从 20 世纪 70 年代起就在这里了。

sentences.english: It was exactly five years since her father had died.
sentences.chinese: 从她父亲去世到现在正好满五年。

sentences.english: Since the end of the war, over five thousand prisoners have been released.
sentences.chinese: 自从战争结束以后，已有五千多名战俘获释。

sentences.english: He lost his job five years ago, but has since found other work.
sentences.chinese: 他五年前失去工作，但此后找到了其他工作。

sentences.english: I left school in 1995, and since then I’ve lived in London.
sentences.chinese: 我 1995 年离开学校，此后就在伦敦生活。

sentences.english: About six thousand people were arrested, several hundred of whom have since been released.
sentences.chinese: 约六千人被逮捕，不过他们中有几百人后来被释放了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 因为；由于；既然；自…以来；自…以后

detailed_translations.english: from a particular time or event in the past until the present, or in that period of time
When you are talking about an event or situation in the past, you use since to indicate that another event happened at some point later in time

sentences.english: Have you almost finished?
sentences.chinese: 你差不多完成了吗？

sentences.english: Supper’s almost ready.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭就要做好了。

sentences.english: It was almost midnight.
sentences.chinese: 午夜将至。

sentences.english: Almost nothing was done to improve the situation.
sentences.chinese: 几乎没有采取什么措施来改善这个情况。

sentences.english: The story is almost certainly true.
sentences.chinese: 这故事几乎肯定是真实的。

sentences.english: He’s almost as old as I am.
sentences.chinese: 他差不多跟我一样大。

detailed_translations.english: nearly, but not completely or not quite

sentences.english: He married Bea in 1925.
sentences.chinese: 他在1925年娶了贝亚。

sentences.english: I’m going to ask her to marry me on St Valentine’s Day.
sentences.chinese: 我打算在情人节向她求婚。

sentences.english: She married young (= at a young age ) .
sentences.chinese: 她结婚早。

sentences.english: People in higher social classes are more likely to marry late (= when they are older than is usual ) .
sentences.chinese: 社会阶层较高的人士倾向于晚婚。

sentences.english: Sophia had, in a sense, married beneath her (= married someone of a lower social class than her ) .
sentences.chinese: 索菲娅在某种意义上是下嫁了。

detailed_translations.english: if you marry someone, you become their husband or wife
if you marry someone, you become their husband or wife

sentences.english: Betty adores her grandchildren.
sentences.chinese: 贝蒂非常宠爱孙辈。

detailed_translations.english: to love someone very much and feel very proud of them

sentences.english: people dying of starvation
sentences.chinese: 快饿死的人们

detailed_translations.english: suffering or death caused by lack of food

sentences.english: The boy picked up a handful of stones and started throwing them at us.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩捡起一把石子，开始朝我们扔过来。

sentences.english: There were only a handful of people there.
sentences.chinese: 文例句：那里只有几个人。

detailed_translations.english: an amount that you can hold in your hand

sentences.english: I'll pass on the fried potato crisp, but take the porridge.
sentences.chinese: 炸土豆片我不吃了，粥还是要喝的。

detailed_translations.english: oats  that are cooked with milk or water and served hot for breakfast

name: jet
trans: 喷射，喷嘴；喷气式飞机；黑玉

sentences.english: He owns a private jet.
sentences.chinese: 他拥有一架私人喷气式飞机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 喷射，喷嘴；喷气式飞机；黑玉
detailed_translations.english: a fast plane with a jet engine
if a liquid or gas jets out from somewhere, it comes quickly out of a small hole

sentences.english: I like playing beach volleyball.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢打沙滩排球。

sentences.english: Every sunday, they played volleyball in the park.
sentences.chinese: 每个周日他们在公园打排球。

sentences.english: Balloon, baseball, basketball, football and volleyball all dance  ballet on the  volcano.
sentences.chinese: 气球、棒球、篮球、足球和排球都在火山上跳芭蕾舞。

detailed_translations.english: a game in which two teams use their hands to hit a ball over a high net

name: draft
trans: 汇票；草稿；选派；（尤指房间、烟囱、炉子等供暖系统中的）（小股）气流
初步画出或（写出）的；（设计、草图、提纲或版本）正在起草中的，草拟的；以草稿形式的；草图的

sentences.english: the rough draft of his new novel
sentences.chinese: 他的新小说的草稿

sentences.english: I read the first draft and thought it was very good.
sentences.chinese: 我读了第一稿，觉得非常好。

sentences.english: All parties eventually approved the final draft (= finished form ) of the peace treaty.
sentences.chinese: 各方最后都同意了和平条约的终稿。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing or a plan that is not yet in its finished form
to write a plan, letter, report etc that will need to be changed before it is in its finished form

name: festival
trans: 节日；庆祝，纪念活动；欢乐

sentences.english: the Swansea Festival of Music and the Arts
sentences.chinese: 斯旺西音乐艺术节

sentences.english: Christmas is one of the main festivals in the Christian Calendar.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节是基督教历的重大节日之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔电影、戏剧、音乐等的〕节，节庆，会演；节日
detailed_translations.english: an occasion when there are performances of many films, plays, pieces of music etc, usually happening in the same place every year

sentences.english: I forgot to set the burglar alarm.
sentences.chinese: 我忘记打开防盗警报器了。

sentences.english: Car alarms are always going off in the street.
sentences.chinese: 街上总有汽车警报器在响。

sentences.english: a sophisticated alarm system
sentences.chinese: 精密的警报系统

sentences.english: We could not see what had alarmed him.
sentences.chinese: 我们不明白是什么吓着他了。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that makes a loud noise to warn you of danger
If something alarms you, it makes you afraid or anxious that something unpleasant or dangerous might happen

name: sharp
trans: 急剧的；锋利的；强烈的；敏捷的；刺耳的

sentences.english: Make sure you use a good sharp knife.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要用锋利的好刀。

sentences.english: Its teeth are razor sharp (= very sharp ) .
sentences.chinese: 它的牙齿非常锋利。

sentences.english: Do not cross the bridge but turn sharp left to go down on to the towpath.
sentences.chinese: 不要过桥，而是向左急转下到纤道上去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 急剧的；锋利的；强烈的；敏捷的；刺耳的
detailed_translations.english: having a very thin edge or point that can cut things easily
Sharp is also an adverb

name: regular
trans: 定期的；有规律的；合格的；整齐的；普通的
常客；正式队员；中坚分子

sentences.english: The company holds regular meetings with employees.
sentences.chinese: 公司定期召集雇员开会。

sentences.english: His breathing was slow and regular.
sentences.chinese: 他的呼吸缓慢而均匀。

sentences.english: Trains will run at regular intervals from 11 am to 4 pm.
sentences.chinese: 火车从上午11点到下午4点每隔一定时间开行。

sentences.english: We hear from him on a regular basis .
sentences.chinese: 我们定期收到他的来信。

sentences.english: He phones us every Sunday at six, regular as clockwork (= always at the same time ) .
sentences.chinese: 他每逢星期天6点钟打电话给我们，非常准时。

sentences.english: a regular job
sentences.chinese: 固定的工作

detailed_translations.english: happening every hour, every week, every month etc, usually with the same amount of time in between

name: application
trans: 应用；申请；应用程序；敷用

sentences.english: We receive hundreds of job applications each year.
sentences.chinese: 我们每年收到数百封求职信。

sentences.english: I filled in the application form and sent it off.
sentences.chinese: 我填完申请表后把它寄了出去。

sentences.english: You have to submit your application before the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 月底之前必须递交申请。

sentences.english: I’ve put in an application for a transfer.
sentences.chinese: 我已递交了调动申请。

sentences.english: He received a letter saying that his application had been rejected .
sentences.chinese: 他收到一封信，告知他的申请已被拒绝。

sentences.english: It can take a long time for your visa application to be processed .
sentences.chinese: 办理签证申请可能需要很长时间。

sentences.english: The Council is currently reviewing the way it deals with planning applications .
sentences.chinese: 市政会目前正在审查其处理规划申请的方式。

sentences.english: Thank you for your letter of application , which we received yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 你的申请信昨天收悉，谢谢。

detailed_translations.chinese: 申请， 申请书； 施用， 涂抹； 应用， 实施； 实用性
detailed_translations.english: a formal, usually written, request for something such as a job, place at university, or permission to do something

sentences.english: the former Federal Republic of Germany
sentences.chinese: 前德意志联邦共和国

sentences.english: Nine republics took part in the referendum.
sentences.chinese: 有九个共和国参加了全民公决。

detailed_translations.english: a country governed by elected representatives of the people, and led by a president, not a king or queen

sentences.english: a rubbish bin
sentences.chinese: 垃圾桶

detailed_translations.english: food, paper etc that is no longer needed and has been thrown away

name: heavy
trans: 沉重的；繁重的，巨大的；拥挤的；阴沉的

sentences.english: The wardrobe was too heavy for me to move on my own.
sentences.chinese: 衣橱太重，我一个人移不动。

sentences.english: a heavy suitcase
sentences.chinese: 沉重的手提箱

sentences.english: The males are seven times heavier than the females.
sentences.chinese: 雄性的重量是雌性的七倍。

sentences.english: Heavy rain has caused flooding in many areas.
sentences.chinese: 大雨在很多地区造成水灾。

sentences.english: The apple trees were heavy with fruit.
sentences.chinese: 苹果树上果实累累。

detailed_translations.english: weighing a lot

sentences.english: Many people drowned when the boat overturned.
sentences.chinese: 船翻后许多人淹死了。

sentences.english: Jane was drowned in the river.
sentences.chinese: 简在那条河里溺水身亡。

detailed_translations.english: to die from being under water for too long, or to kill someone in this way

name: quality
trans: 质量，[统计] 品质；特性；才能
优质的；高品质的；<英俚>棒极了

sentences.english: Much of the land was of poor quality.
sentences.chinese: 很多地的土质很差。

sentences.english: Use only high quality ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 只使用上等的材料。

sentences.english: the drug’s addictive quality
sentences.chinese: 毒品令人上瘾的特性

detailed_translations.english: how good or bad something is

sentences.english: a mail order catalog
sentences.chinese: 邮购商品目录

sentences.english: an online catalogue
sentences.chinese: 网上目录

detailed_translations.english: a complete list of things that you can look at, buy, or use, for example in a library or at an art show
to make a complete list of all the things in a group

name: cube
trans: 使成立方形；使自乘二次；量…的体积

sentences.english: a sugar cube
sentences.chinese: 一块方糖

sentences.english: an ice cube
sentences.chinese: 一小方块冰

sentences.english: Cut the meat into small cubes.
sentences.chinese: 把肉切成丁。

detailed_translations.english: a solid object with six equal square sides

detailed_translations.chinese: 使成立方形；使自乘二次；量…的体积
detailed_translations.english: to multiply a number by itself twice

sentences.english: Her face was a mass of wrinkles.
sentences.chinese: 她的脸上布满皱纹。

sentences.english: Alex wrinkled up her nose at the smell.
sentences.chinese: 闻到那股味道，亚历克丝皱起了鼻子。

detailed_translations.english: wrinkles are lines on your face and skin that you get when you are old
if you wrinkle a part of your face, or if it wrinkles, small lines appear on it

sentences.english: His friends live above the bookshop.
sentences.chinese: 他的朋友们住在书店的楼上。

sentences.english: Do you know where I can find a good bookshop?
sentences.chinese: 你知道我在哪里可以找到好书店?

sentences.english: If you can't do anything on that scale (travel far and wide, or go back to college), you may chose to go to an interesting lecture at a bookshop and come away quite stimulated by what you hear.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在这一时期什么也不能做（比如旅行，郊游，读书等），那么你可以选择参加书店里有趣的演讲，你将会听到非常刺激的东西。

detailed_translations.english: a shop that sells books

sentences.english: Felix chatted cheerfully as he ate.
sentences.chinese: 费利克斯一边吃一边兴奋地聊天。

sentences.english: A small girl was eating an ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 一个小女孩在吃冰激凌。

sentences.english: We had plenty to eat and drink.
sentences.chinese: 我们有很多吃的喝的。

sentences.english: It’s important to eat healthily when you are pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 怀孕的时候吃得健康很重要。

sentences.english: I exercise and eat right and get plenty of sleep.
sentences.chinese: 我做运动，饮食得当，睡眠充足。

sentences.english: Would you like something to eat?
sentences.chinese: 想吃点什么吗？

sentences.english: She can eat like a horse and never put on weight.
