sentences.chinese: 你是什么星座的？别说，让我来猜猜看。

sentences.english: I’d say she’s about 35, but that’s only a guess.
sentences.chinese: 我说她大约35岁，不过那只是猜测。

detailed_translations.english: to try to answer a question or form an opinion when you are not sure whether you will be correct
an attempt to answer a question or make a judgement when you are not sure whether you will be correct

sentences.english: The outside of the house was painted white.
sentences.chinese: 这房子的外墙刷成了白色。

sentences.english: Outside observers said the election was free and fair.
sentences.chinese: 外部观察员说此次选举自由而公正。

detailed_translations.english: the part or surface of something that is furthest from the centre
involving people who do not belong to the same group or organization as you

name: absent
trans: 缺席的；缺少的；心不在焉的；茫然的

sentences.english: The dull, absent look on her face implied boredom.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上呆滞、茫然的神情说明她觉得无聊了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缺席的；缺少的；心不在焉的；茫然的
detailed_translations.english: not at work, school, a meeting etc, because you are sick or decide not to go
to not go to a place or take part in an event where people expect you to be

sentences.english: Young Geoffrey made money by chopping and selling firewood.
sentences.chinese: 年轻的杰弗里靠砍柴卖柴挣钱。

detailed_translations.english: wood that has been cut or collected in order to be burned in a fire

sentences.english: They partook of our triumph.
sentences.chinese: 他们分享我们的胜利。

sentences.english: She spread our lunch on the grass.
sentences.chinese: 她在草地上摆好了我们的午饭。

sentences.english: We avenged ourselves on  our enemy.
sentences.chinese: 我们向我们的敌人报仇。

name: Iceland
trans: 冰岛（欧洲岛名，在大西洋北部，近北极圈）

sentences.english: WHICH country will be the next Iceland?
sentences.chinese: 哪个国家会成为下一个冰岛？

sentences.english: Austria and Turkey beat out Iceland for the two seats allocated to this region.
sentences.chinese: 奥地利和土耳其击败冰岛赢得该地区分配到的两个席位。

detailed_translations.chinese: 冰岛（欧洲岛名，在大西洋北部，近北极圈）

sentences.english: the natural ecology of the Earth
sentences.chinese: 地球的自然生态

sentences.english: plant ecology
sentences.chinese: 植物生态学

detailed_translations.english: the way in which plants, animals, and people are related to each other and to their environment, or the scientific study of this

sentences.english: The U.S. Constitution promises freedom of religion.
sentences.chinese: 美国宪法保证宗教信仰自由。

sentences.english: a course on philosophy and religion
sentences.chinese: 关于哲学和宗教的课程

sentences.english: the Islamic religion
sentences.chinese: 伊斯兰教

detailed_translations.english: a belief in one or more gods

sentences.english: Some members refused to participate.
sentences.chinese: 有些会员拒绝参加。

detailed_translations.english: to take part in an activity or event

name: unusual
trans: 不寻常的；与众不同的；不平常的

sentences.english: an unusual feature
sentences.chinese: 不寻常的特点

sentences.english: unusual circumstances
sentences.chinese: 异常状况

sentences.english: It’s unusual for Dave to be late.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫迟到是很少见的。

sentences.english: (= it is quite common ) to feel very angry in a situation like this.
sentences.chinese: 遇到这样的情况觉得非常生气是很正常的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不平常的， 少有的； 独特的， 与众不同的
detailed_translations.english: different from what is usual or normal

name: gravity
trans: 重力，地心引力；严重性；庄严

sentences.english: the force of gravity
sentences.chinese: 重力

sentences.english: I could not hide from her the gravity of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 我不能向她隐瞒情况的严重性。

detailed_translations.english: the force that causes something to fall to the ground or to be attracted to another  planet

sentences.english: All the furniture was covered in dust .
sentences.chinese: 所有的家具都蒙上了灰尘。

sentences.english: a thick layer of dust
sentences.chinese: 厚厚的一层灰尘

sentences.english: There’s not a speck of dust in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 厨房里一尘不染。

sentences.english: Dust particles floated in the sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 阳光里飘浮着尘埃颗粒。

sentences.english: A sudden breeze sent motes of dust (= small bits of dust ) dancing in the air.
sentences.chinese: 突然刮起一阵微风吹得灰尘飞扬。

detailed_translations.english: dry powder consisting of extremely small bits of dirt that is in buildings on furniture, floors etc if they are not kept clean

sentences.english: Many leading scientists do not consider that science can give absolutely reliable knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 许多杰出科学家都不认为科学能够提供绝对可靠的知识。

sentences.english: the founder of modern science, Isaac Newton
sentences.chinese: 现代科学创始人艾萨克·牛顿

sentences.english: developments in science and technology
sentences.chinese: 科学技术的发展

detailed_translations.english: knowledge about the world, especially based on examining, testing, and proving facts

sentences.english: Don’t spend all your money on the first day of your holiday!
sentences.chinese: 别在度假的第一天就把钱都花完了！

sentences.english: The repairs will cost quite a lot of money.
sentences.chinese: 修理要花一大笔钱。

sentences.english: The family made their money in the woollen trade.
sentences.chinese: 这家人是做毛纺生意赚的钱。

detailed_translations.english: what you earn by working and can use to buy things. Money can be in the form of notes and coins or cheques, and can be kept in a bank

sentences.english: We'll ship your order to the address we print on your cheques.
sentences.chinese: 我们将把你预订的货物送到我们印在你单据上的地址。

detailed_translations.english: to send goods somewhere by ship, plane, truck etc
a large boat used for carrying people or goods across the sea

name: precious
trans: 宝贵的；珍贵的；矫揉造作的
(Precious)人名；(英)普雷舍斯，普雷舍丝(女名)

sentences.english: planes delivering precious supplies of medicine and food
sentences.chinese: 运送药品、食品等宝贵物资的飞机

sentences.english: our planet’s precious resources
sentences.chinese: 我们星球上的宝贵资源

detailed_translations.english: something that is precious is valuable and important and should not be wasted or used without care

sentences.english: I couldn’t go shopping yesterday so I’ll have to go today.
sentences.chinese: 我昨天没能去买东西，所以今天我必须去。

sentences.english: Ed has his music lesson today.
sentences.chinese: 埃德今天有音乐课。

detailed_translations.english: on the day that is happening now
the day that is happening now

name: overlook
trans: 忽略；俯瞰；远眺；检查；高耸于…之上

sentences.english: Our room overlooks the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 我们的房间可以俯视大海。

sentences.english: It is easy to overlook a small detail like that.
sentences.chinese: 那样的小细节很容易被忽略。

sentences.english: She found him entertaining enough to overlook his faults.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得他很有趣，足以让她包容他的缺点。

detailed_translations.english: if a house, room etc overlooks something, it has a view of it, usually from above

name: hang
trans: 悬挂，垂下；装饰；绞死；使悬而未决

sentences.english: Philip hung his coat on a hook behind the door.
sentences.chinese: 菲利普把自己的大衣挂在门后的钩子上。

sentences.english: She hung the sheets on the washing line.
sentences.chinese: 她把床单晾在晒衣绳上。

detailed_translations.chinese: [hung-hung] 悬挂， 吊； 徘徊； [hanged-hanged] 吊
detailed_translations.english: to put something in a position so that the top part is fixed or supported, and the bottom part is free to move and does not touch the ground

name: ticket
trans: 票；入场券，标签；（美）候选人名单；证明书；交通罚款单
加标签于；指派；对…开出交通违规罚单

sentences.english: Slow down or you'll get a ticket.
sentences.chinese: 开慢点儿，否则你会接到一张罚款通知单。

sentences.english: parking/speeding ticket
sentences.chinese: 违法停车/超速行驶罚款单

detailed_translations.english: a printed note ordering you to pay money because you have done something illegal while driving or parking your car
Mosquitos are small flying insects which bite people and animals in order to suck their blood

name: repairs
trans: 修理；[会计] 修理费；备件；修理工作（repair的复数形式）
修理；恢复（repair的三单形式）；弥补；纠正

sentences.english: Many women know how to make repairs on their cars.
sentences.chinese: 很多女性知道如何修理汽车。

sentences.english: Goldsmith has repaired the roof to ensure the house is windproof.
sentences.chinese: 戈德史密斯已经修理了房顶以确保房子可以抵御狂风。

detailed_translations.chinese: 修理；[会计] 修理费；备件；修理工作（repair的复数形式）
detailed_translations.english: A repair is something that you do to mend a machine, building, piece of clothing, or other thing that has been damaged or is not working properly

detailed_translations.chinese: 修理；恢复（repair的三单形式）；弥补；纠正
detailed_translations.english: If you repair something that has been damaged or is not working properly, you fix it

sentences.english: She lived in a college dormitory.
sentences.chinese: 她住在一幢大学宿舍楼里。

detailed_translations.english: a large building at a college or university where students live

sentences.english: I wrote her several letters , but she didn’t reply.
sentences.chinese: 我给她写了几封信，可是她没有回复。

detailed_translations.english: to put words in a letter to someone

name: seat
trans: 使…坐下；可容纳…的；使就职

sentences.english: I was in the back seat and Jo was driving.
sentences.chinese: 我在后座，乔开车。

sentences.english: a 10,000-seat stadium
sentences.chinese: 万人体育场

sentences.english: People were shifting in their seats, looking uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 人们在座位上动来动去，看上去不大自在。

sentences.english: He waved toward a chair, and seated himself at the desk.
sentences.chinese: 他朝一把椅子一挥手，在桌旁坐了下来。

detailed_translations.english: a place where you can sit, especially one in a vehicle or one from which you watch a performance, sports event etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…坐下；可容纳…的；使就职
detailed_translations.english: If you seat yourself somewhere, you sit down

sentences.english: She wandered aimlessly around the streets.
sentences.chinese: 她在大街上漫无目的地到处游荡。

sentences.english: Pauline started to wander from the point.
sentences.chinese: 保利娜开始偏题了。

sentences.english: Don’t let any of the kids wander off.
sentences.chinese: 不要让任何一个小孩走开去。

detailed_translations.english: to walk slowly across or around an area, usually without a clear direction or purpose

name: tentative
trans: 试验性的，暂定的；踌躇的

sentences.english: I passed on my tentative conclusions to the police.
sentences.chinese: 我把我的初步结论递交给了警方。

sentences.english: The government is taking tentative steps towards tackling the country’s economic problems.
sentences.chinese: 政府正在采取临时性措施来解决国家的经济问题。

detailed_translations.chinese: 试验性的，暂定的；踌躇的
detailed_translations.english: not definite or certain, and may be changed later

sentences.english: At least eighteen bullets were fired.
sentences.chinese: 至少射出了18颗子弹。

sentences.english: Jim was eighteen (= 18 years old ).
sentences.chinese: 吉姆18岁。

detailed_translations.english: the number 18
the number 18

name: hold
trans: 持有；拥有；保存；拘留；约束或控制

sentences.english: She was holding a large box.
sentences.chinese: 她提着一只大箱子。

sentences.english: I held the mouse by its tail.
sentences.chinese: 我抓着耗子的尾巴倒提起来。

sentences.english: Employees hold 30% of the shares.
sentences.chinese: 雇员持有30%的股份。

detailed_translations.english: to carry sth; to have sb/sth in your hand, arms, etc.

sentences.english: Regular exercise is a good habit.
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼是个好习惯。

sentences.english: Thinking negatively can become a habit.
sentences.chinese: 消极的思维方式会成为一种习惯。

sentences.english: She has a habit of playing with her hair when she’s nervous.
sentences.chinese: 她有一个习惯，一紧张就拨弄自己的头发。

sentences.english: Some people drink alcohol as much from habit as from desire.
sentences.chinese: 有些人喝酒既是因为想喝，也是出于习惯。

detailed_translations.english: something that you do regularly or usually, often without thinking about it because you have done it so many times before

sentences.english: What are your plans for the future?
sentences.chinese: 你未来有什么打算？

sentences.english: The islands should have the right to decide their own future.
sentences.chinese: 这些岛屿应当有权决定自己的未来。

sentences.english: a leader who will shape the organization’s future
sentences.chinese: 将决定该组织未来的一位领导者

detailed_translations.english: the time after the present

name: independent
trans: 独立的；单独的；无党派的；不受约束的

sentences.english: There are plans to split the corporation into a number of smaller independent companies.
sentences.chinese: 有计划要把这家大企业分割成一些独立的小公司。

sentences.english: an independent charity
sentences.chinese: 独立的慈善机构

sentences.english: small independent bookshops
sentences.chinese: 私营小书店

sentences.english: schools in the independent sector
sentences.chinese: 私立学校

detailed_translations.english: an independent organization is not owned or controlled by, or does not receive money from, another organization or the government

name: subject
trans: 主题；科目；[语] 主语；国民
服从的；易患…的；受制于…的

sentences.english: Paul has strong opinions on most subjects.
sentences.chinese: 保罗在大多数问题上观点激烈。

sentences.english: The subjects covered in this chapter are exercise and nutrition.
sentences.chinese: 本章涵盖的主题是运动和营养。

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目； 学科； 主语
detailed_translations.english: the thing you are talking about or considering in a conversation, discussion, book, film etc
to force a country or group of people to be ruled by you, and control them very strictly

name: say
trans: 讲；说明；例如；声称；假设；指明
(Say)人名；(土)萨伊；(法、老、柬)赛；(英)塞伊；(匈、罗)绍伊

sentences.english: ‘I’m so tired,’ she said.
sentences.chinese: “我太累了。”她说。

sentences.english: ‘Don’t cry,’ he said softly.
sentences.chinese: “别哭了。”他柔声说道。

sentences.english: Don’t believe anything he says.
sentences.chinese: 他说什么都不要相信。

sentences.english: I always said I would buy a motorbike when I had enough money.
sentences.chinese: 我一直说等我有了足够的钱就买一辆摩托车。

sentences.english: I would like to say how much we appreciate your hard work.
sentences.chinese: 我想说我们对你的辛勤劳动非常感谢。

sentences.english: ‘Why did she leave?’ ‘I don’t know – she didn’t say .’
sentences.chinese: “她为什么要离开？”“我不知道——她没说。”

sentences.english: Although he didn’t say so , it was clear that he was in pain.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他没说，但是他明显很痛苦。

sentences.english: (= why do you think that ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么会那么说呢？

sentences.english: I’d like to say a few words (= make a short speech ) .
sentences.chinese: 我想简单地说几句。

sentences.english: ‘So what are your plans now?’‘ I’d rather not say .’
sentences.chinese: “那么你现在的计划是什么？”“我还是不说的好。”

detailed_translations.english: to express an idea, feeling, thought etc using words

name: target
trans: 把……作为目标；规定……的指标；瞄准某物

sentences.english: There is no target date for completion of the new project.
sentences.chinese: 这个新的项目何时完工没有预定日期。

sentences.english: The government may fail to meet (= achieve ) its target of recycling 25% of domestic waste.
sentences.chinese: 政府可能达不到回收利用25%的生活垃圾的目标。

sentences.english: Jiang set annual growth targets of 8–9%.
sentences.chinese: 江确定了8%至9%的年增长目标。

detailed_translations.english: something that you are trying to achieve, such as a total, an amount, or a time
to make something have an effect on a particular limited group or area

sentences.english: His father died of heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲死于心脏病。

sentences.english: She contracted the disease while she was abroad on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 她在国外度假时染上了这种疾病。

detailed_translations.chinese: 病， 疾病； 不健全， 弊端
detailed_translations.english: an illness which affects a person, animal, or plant

sentences.english: 1.5 million people are in immediate danger of death from starvation.
sentences.chinese: 150万人正因饥饿而即将面临死亡的危险。

detailed_translations.english: a creature that looks like a human  skeleton  , used in paintings, stories etc to represent the fact that people die

sentences.english: They moved to a new house some time ago (=  a fairly long time ago  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们搬进新居已有些日子了。

sentences.english: We had our bicentenary celebrations not that long ago.
sentences.chinese: 不久前，我们举行了200周年庆典活动。

detailed_translations.english: used to show how far back in the past something happened

name: shore
trans: 支撑，使稳住；用支柱撑住

sentences.english: We could see a boat about a mile from shore.
sentences.chinese: 我们看见离岸边大约一英里的地方有一艘船。

sentences.english: Only a few survivors reached the shore.
sentences.chinese: 仅有几个生还者到达岸边。

sentences.english: She began to swim to shore.
sentences.chinese: 她开始朝岸边游去。

detailed_translations.chinese: 支撑，使稳住；用支柱撑住
detailed_translations.english: to prop or make safe with or as if with a shore
the land along the edge of a large area of water such as an ocean or lake

sentences.english: The little boy made no effort to obey.
sentences.chinese: 这小男孩不肯服从。

sentences.english: ‘Sit!’ he said, and the dog obeyed him instantly.
sentences.chinese: “坐下！”他说道，那只狗马上就服从了。

detailed_translations.english: to do what someone in authority tells you to do, or what a law or rule says you must do
to do what someone in authority tells you to do, or what a law or rule says you must do

sentences.english: Most of the time I'm just thankful that I've got a job.
sentences.chinese: 大部分时候我庆幸自己有了份工作。

detailed_translations.english: grateful and glad about something that has happened, especially because without it the situation would be much worse

sentences.english: He took her out for a five-course dinner in a fancy restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 他带她到一家豪华餐厅吃了一顿有五道菜的晚餐。

sentences.english: The company runs a chain of restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 公司经营连锁饭店。

sentences.english: A new restaurant has just opened across the road.
sentences.chinese: 马路对面刚开了一家新饭馆。

detailed_translations.english: a place where you can buy and eat a meal

name: awesome
trans: 令人敬畏的；使人畏惧的；可怕的；极好的

sentences.english: an awesome responsibility
sentences.chinese: 一项令人惊惧的责任

sentences.english: the awesome sweep of the scenery
sentences.chinese: 连绵的壮丽景色

detailed_translations.english: extremely impressive, serious, or difficult so that you feel great respect, worry, or fear

sentences.english: The bathroom is decorated in green and yellow.
sentences.chinese: 浴室里是用绿色和黄色装潢的。

sentences.english: We plan to spend the weekend decorating.
sentences.chinese: 我们计划用这个周末来装修。

detailed_translations.english: to paint the inside of a room, put special paper on the walls etc

name: judgement
trans: 意见；判断力；[法] 审判；评价

sentences.english: He trusted in his judgement.
sentences.chinese: 他相信他的判断。

sentences.english: All action is based on judgement.
sentences.chinese: 一切行动均以判断为基础。

sentences.english: The judgement is often biased by interest.
sentences.chinese: 判断往往因利害关系而有偏差。

sentences.english: letters of congratulation
sentences.chinese: 祝贺信

sentences.english: Give Oscar my congratulations.
sentences.chinese: 请向奥斯卡转达我的祝贺。

detailed_translations.english: when you tell someone that you are happy because they have achieved something or because something nice has happened to them

sentences.english: The timing of the announcement was particularly appropriate .
sentences.chinese: 通告发布的时机很合适。

sentences.english: Where appropriate , I delegate as much work as possible.
sentences.chinese: 只要合适，我就尽量把工作分派出去。

sentences.english: Mark box 1 or 2, as appropriate .
sentences.chinese: 把方框1和2中的合适者标出来。

sentences.english: I can assure you that appropriate action will be taken.
sentences.chinese: 我向你保证会采取适当的行动。

detailed_translations.english: correct or suitable for a particular time, situation, or purpose
to take something, especially money, to use for a particular purpose

sentences.english: a reading assessment test
sentences.chinese: 阅读评估测试

detailed_translations.english: a process in which you make a judgment about a person or situation, or the judgment you make

sentences.english: Why don’t you come over for supper on Friday?
sentences.chinese: 周五为什么不过来吃晚饭呢？

sentences.english: We had supper in a small Italian place.
sentences.chinese: 我们在一家意大利小餐馆吃了晚饭。

sentences.english: Have you eaten supper ?
sentences.chinese: 你吃过晚饭了吗？

detailed_translations.english: the meal that you have in the early evening

sentences.english: a bent nail
sentences.chinese: 弯曲的钉子

sentences.english: Stand with your knees slightly bent.
sentences.chinese: 双膝微曲站立。

sentences.english: He breathed in deeply, bent double in pain (=  with the top part of your body leaning forward towards your legs  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他深深地吸着气，痛得直不起腰来。

sentences.english: a bent old man (=  not standing straight  )
sentences.chinese: 一个驼背老汉

detailed_translations.english: special natural skill or interest in a particular area
no longer straight

sentences.english: Bob and Sue said they wouldn’t be able to come.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃和休说他们来不了。

sentences.english: Ken gave me some flowers. Aren’t they beautiful?
sentences.chinese: 肯送给我一些花。很漂亮吧？

sentences.english: They all want to come to the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 他们都想来参加婚礼。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to two or more people or things that have already been mentioned or are already known about

sentences.english: Please keep the doors closed while the train is moving.
sentences.chinese: 火车行驶时请保持车门关闭。

sentences.english: ‘Come on,’ Sue said. No one moved.
sentences.chinese: “来吧。”休说。但没有人动。

sentences.english: Could you move your car, please? It’s blocking the road.
sentences.chinese: 你能把车挪一下吗？挡着路了。

sentences.english: Becca moved down the steps and into the yard.
sentences.chinese: 贝卡走下台阶，来到院子里。

sentences.english: The bar was so crowded you could hardly move .
sentences.chinese: 酒吧很挤，人都难以挪动。

sentences.english: His speech moved the audience to tears.
sentences.chinese: 他的演讲让听众感动得落泪。

sentences.english: He made no move to come any nearer.
sentences.chinese: 他没有再靠近。

detailed_translations.english: to change from one place or position to another, or to make something do this
when someone moves for a short time in a particular direction

sentences.english: The eagle drooped its wings.
sentences.chinese: 那只鹰收拢双翅做俯冲。

sentences.english: Maybe they could not hold on to the arrival of the spring, but the female eagle thought what if their father could bring back the food?
sentences.chinese: 它们或许已经挨不到春天的到来了。 雌鹰这样想，但如果它们的爸爸会把食物带来呢？

sentences.english: She lacks the skill to accomplish this, but recognizes that an eagle can help her.
sentences.chinese: 她缺乏完成这项任务的能力，不过她认识到老鹰可以帮助她。

detailed_translations.english: a very large strong bird with a beak like a hook that eats small animals, birds etc

name: common
trans: 共同的；普通的；一般的；通常的

sentences.english: Heart disease is one of the commonest causes of death.
sentences.chinese: 心脏病是最常见的死因之一。

sentences.english: They share a common interest in photography.
sentences.chinese: 他们在摄影方面兴趣相投。

detailed_translations.english: happening often and to many people or in many places

sentences.english: We aim to offer good value and service to all our customers.
sentences.chinese: 我们力求为所有的客户提供物有所值的商品和服务。

sentences.english: We’ve had several letters from satisfied customers.
sentences.chinese: 我们收到了几封顾客表示满意的来信。

sentences.english: He’s one of our regular customers .
sentences.chinese: 他是我们的一个老主顾。

detailed_translations.english: someone who buys goods or services from a shop, company etc

name: cast
trans: 投，抛；计算；浇铸；投射（光、影、视线等）
投掷，抛；铸件，[古生] 铸型；演员阵容；脱落物

sentences.english: the shade cast by low-hanging branches
sentences.chinese: 低垂的树枝投下的阴影

detailed_translations.english: to make light or a shadow appear somewhere

detailed_translations.chinese: 演员表， 全体演员； 石膏绷带； 铸型， 铸件； 投， 抛
detailed_translations.english: all the people who perform in a play, film etc

sentences.english: The book sold more than a million copies.
sentences.chinese: 这本书售出了一百多万册。

sentences.english: I’ve got a million ideas.
sentences.chinese: 我主意多得很。

detailed_translations.english: the number 1,000,000
an extremely large number of people or things

name: custom
trans: 习惯，惯例；风俗；海关，关税；经常光顾；[总称]（经常性的）顾客

sentences.english: She was stopped at customs and questioned.
sentences.chinese: 她在海关被叫住接受问话。

sentences.english: It took ages to clear customs (= be allowed through customs ) but then we were out of the airport quite quickly.
sentences.chinese: 过海关花了很长时间，不过出机场倒是很快。

sentences.english: You won’t be able to take that through customs.
sentences.chinese: 你带着那东西过不了海关的。

detailed_translations.english: the place where your bags are checked for illegal goods when you go into a country

name: extra
trans: 临时演员；号外；额外的事物；上等产品
额外的，另外收费的；特大的

sentences.english: Could you get an extra loaf of bread?
sentences.chinese: 你能多拿一条面包吗？

sentences.english: Allow extra time for your journey.
sentences.chinese: 要给你的旅程多留出点时间。

sentences.english: Drivers are advised to take extra care.
sentences.chinese: 建议司机开车要格外小心。

sentences.english: You’re going to have to work extra hard to pass the exam.
sentences.chinese: 你要格外用功才能通过考试。

detailed_translations.english: more of something, in addition to the usual or standard amount or number
used to emphasize an adjective or adverb

sentences.english: cigarette ash
sentences.chinese: 香烟灰

sentences.english: The house burnt to ashes.
sentences.chinese: 那房子烧成了灰烬。

sentences.english: His ashes were scattered at sea.
sentences.chinese: 他的骨灰被撒向大海。

detailed_translations.english: the soft grey powder that remains after something has been burned

sentences.english: You should be able to evaluate your own work.
sentences.chinese: 你应该能够评估自己的工作。

sentences.english: We need to evaluate the success of the campaign.
sentences.chinese: 我们要评估一下这次运动是否成功。

sentences.english: It can be difficult to evaluate the effectiveness of different treatments.
sentences.chinese: 要对各种治疗方法的效果作出评估会很难。

detailed_translations.english: to judge how good, useful, or successful something is

name: suit
trans: 诉讼；恳求；套装，西装；一套外衣

sentences.english: Johnson has filed suit against her.
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊对她提起了诉讼。

sentences.english: a civil suit
sentences.chinese: 民事诉讼

sentences.english: There are countryside walks to suit everyone.
sentences.chinese: 有适合每个人的乡村步行路径。

detailed_translations.english: a problem or complaint that a person or company brings to a court of law to be settled
to be acceptable, suitable, or  convenient  for a particular person or in a particular situation

sentences.english: Many young girls became domestic servants .
sentences.chinese: 许多年轻姑娘成了家仆。

detailed_translations.english: someone, especially in the past, who was paid to clean someone’s house, cook for them, answer the door etc, and who often lived in the house

sentences.english: He undertook to finish the job by Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 他答应在星期三以前完成这项工作。

sentences.english: They have to vacate their offices before Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 他们必须在星期三以前将办公室腾出来。

sentences.english: The foreign guests will call on you next Wednesday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 外宾将在下周星期三下午拜访你。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Tuesday and Thursday

sentences.english: After the war many soldiers stayed in France.
sentences.chinese: 战后，许多士兵留在法国。

sentences.english: I go swimming every day after work.
sentences.chinese: 我每天下班后都去游泳。

sentences.english: Do you believe in life after death?
sentences.chinese: 你相信人死后还有来生吗？

sentences.english: The first attack started just after midnight.
sentences.chinese: 刚过午夜，第一波进攻开始了。

sentences.english: David went to bed straight after (=  immediately after  ) supper.
sentences.chinese: 戴维一吃完晚饭就去睡觉了。

sentences.english: After you’d called the police, what did you do?
sentences.chinese: 报警之后，你做了些什么？

sentences.english: Zimmerman changed his name after he left Germany.
sentences.chinese: 齐默尔曼离开德国后改了名字。

sentences.english: People still remember the 1958 revolution and what came after (=  happened after it  ) .
sentences.chinese: 人们依然记得1958年的那场革命和之后发生的事。

detailed_translations.english: when a particular event or time has happened, or when someone has done something

sentences.english: Weather conditions prevented them from attempting the jump.
sentences.chinese: 天气状况使他们无法尝试跳伞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 尝试， 试图， 努力
detailed_translations.english: to try to do something, especially something difficult

sentences.english: At the age when most people retire, he is ready to face a new career.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数人退休的年纪，他准备要面对一项新事业。

sentences.english: I retired late that evening.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上我睡得晚。

detailed_translations.english: to stop working, usually because you have reached a certain age

sentences.english: It was forty five minutes before she returned.
sentences.chinese: 过了45分钟她才回来。

sentences.english: Alison decided to return home.
sentences.chinese: 艾利森决定回家。

sentences.english: He left his country, never to return.
sentences.chinese: 他离开了祖国，一去不复返。

detailed_translations.english: to go or come back to a place where you were before
the act of returning from somewhere, or your arrival back in a place
used or paid for a journey from one place to another and back again

name: celebrate
trans: 庆祝；举行；赞美；祝贺；宣告

sentences.english: It’s Dad’s birthday and we’re going out for a meal to celebrate.
sentences.chinese: 今天是爸爸的生日，我们打算出去吃饭庆祝一下。

sentences.english: My folks are celebrating their 50th anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 我父母正在庆祝他们结婚50周年。

sentences.english: poems that celebrate the joys of love
sentences.chinese: 赞美爱之喜悦的诗歌

detailed_translations.english: to show that an event or occasion is important by doing something special or enjoyable

sentences.english: The terrorists will switch tactics .
sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子会改变战术。

detailed_translations.english: to change from doing or using one thing to doing or using another

name: cure
trans: 治疗；治愈；使硫化；加工处理
治疗；治愈；[临床] 疗法

sentences.english: Will you be able to cure him, Doctor?
sentences.chinese: 医生，你能把他治好吗？

sentences.english: The new treatment effected a miraculous cure.
sentences.chinese: 这种新疗法产生了奇迹般的疗效。

detailed_translations.english: to make a person or an animal healthy again after an illness
the act of making someone well again after an illness

sentences.english: Our primary concern is to provide the refugees with food and health care.
sentences.chinese: 我们的头等大事是向难民提供食品和医疗。

sentences.english: Many of the villagers rely on fishing as their primary source of income.
sentences.chinese: 很多村民以打鱼作为他们的主要收入来源。

sentences.english: Personal safety is of primary importance .
sentences.chinese: 人身安全至关重要。

detailed_translations.chinese: 首要的， 主要的； 基本的； 最初的， 初级的
detailed_translations.english: most important

sentences.english: The noise kept him awake.
sentences.chinese: 噪音使他一直醒着。

sentences.english: I was struggling to keep awake.
sentences.chinese: 我努力不让自己睡着。

detailed_translations.english: to stay in a particular state, condition, or position, or to make someone or something do this

sentences.english: different levels of the management pyramid
sentences.chinese: 金字塔式管理体系中的不同层次

detailed_translations.english: a large stone building with four  triangular (= three-sided )  walls that slope in to a point at the top, especially in Egypt and Central America

sentences.english: We can’t afford to wait any longer or we’ll miss the plane.
sentences.chinese: 我们再也不能等下去了，否则会赶不上飞机的。

sentences.english: The room affords a beautiful view over the city.
sentences.chinese: 这房间可以俯瞰城市美景。

sentences.english: The new law will afford protection to employees.
sentences.chinese: 新法律将为雇员提供保障。

detailed_translations.english: if you cannot afford to do something, you must not do it because it could cause serious problems for you

name: cut
trans: 伤口；切口；削减；（服装等的）式样；削球；切入

sentences.english: Do you want me to cut the cake?
sentences.chinese: 要我切蛋糕吗？

sentences.english: They’re introducing CCTV cameras in an attempt to cut street crime in the area.
sentences.chinese: 为了减少该地区的街头犯罪，他们安装了闭路电视摄像机。

sentences.english: You need to cut the amount of fat and sugar in your diet.
sentences.chinese: 你需要减少饮食中脂肪和糖的摄入量。

sentences.english: Scientists are warning that unless carbon emissions are cut, we could be heading for an environmental catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 科学家警告说如果不减少碳排放量，我们可能会面临环境灾难。

sentences.english: Seven hundred jobs will be lost in order to cut costs and boost profits.
sentences.chinese: 为了降低成本，提高利润，将削减700个职位。

sentences.english: The major aviation companies need to cut prices if they are to compete with budget airlines.
sentences.chinese: 大航空公司如果想和廉价的航空公司竞争，就需要降低价格。

sentences.english: Staffing levels had already been cut to the bone (= reduced to the lowest level possible ) .
sentences.chinese: 人员配备已经削减到了最低限度。

detailed_translations.english: to divide something or separate something from its main part, using scissors, a knife etc

sentences.english: Smoking is banned in the building.
sentences.chinese: 大楼内禁止吸烟。

detailed_translations.english: to say that something must not be done, seen, used etc
an official order that prevents something from being used or done

name: tablet
trans: 碑；药片；写字板；小块；平板电脑
用碑牌纪念；将(备忘录等)写在板上；将…制成小片或小块

sentences.english: She took a couple of headache tablets .
sentences.chinese: 她吃了几片头痛药。

detailed_translations.chinese: 碑；药片；写字板；小块；平板电脑
detailed_translations.english: a small round hard piece of medicine which you swallow

detailed_translations.chinese: 用碑牌纪念；将(备忘录等)写在板上；将…制成小片或小块

name: head
trans: 头；头痛；上端；最前的部分；理解力
前进；用头顶；作为…的首领；站在…的前头；给…加标题

sentences.english: He kissed the top of her head.
sentences.chinese: 他吻了一下她的头顶。

sentences.english: Alan fell asleep as soon as he put his head on the pillow.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦头一挨枕头就睡着了。

sentences.english: They dived head first into the water.
sentences.chinese: 他们一头跳进水中。

sentences.english: She was dressed in black from head to foot (= over all her body ).
sentences.chinese: 她从头到脚穿了一身黑。

sentences.english: He still has a full head of hair (= has all his hair, even though he is getting rather old ).
sentences.chinese: 他依然满头浓发。

sentences.english: Jenny marched proudly at the head of the procession.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮自豪地走在游行队伍的前列。

sentences.english: David was asked to head up the technical team.
sentences.chinese: 戴维被要求领导技术小组。

detailed_translations.english: the top part of your body that has your face at the front and is supported by your neck
to be in charge of a team, government, organization etc

sentences.english: Some of the local people are suspicious of foreigners.
sentences.chinese: 有些当地人不信任外国人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who comes from a different country

name: willing
trans: 乐意的；自愿的；心甘情愿的
决心；用意志力驱使；将（财产等）遗赠某人（will的现在分词）

sentences.english: How much are they willing to pay?
sentences.chinese: 他们愿意付多少钱？

detailed_translations.english: prepared to do something, or having no reason to not want to do it

name: mineral
trans: 矿物；（英）矿泉水；无机物；苏打水（常用复数表示）

sentences.english: The area is very rich in minerals .
sentences.chinese: 该地区矿产非常丰富。

sentences.english: a country with few mineral resources
sentences.chinese: 矿产资源稀少的国家

sentences.english: mineral water
sentences.chinese: 矿泉水

detailed_translations.english: a substance that is formed naturally in the earth, such as coal, salt, stone, or gold. Minerals can be dug out of the ground and used
of or containing or derived from minerals

name: shade
trans: 树荫；阴影；阴凉处；遮阳物；（照片等的）明暗度；少量、些微；细微的差别
使阴暗；使渐变；为…遮阳；使阴郁；掩盖

sentences.english: a delicate/pale/rich/soft shade of red
sentences.chinese: 淡 / 浅 / 艳 / 柔和的红色

detailed_translations.english: a particular type of red, green, blue etc

sentences.english: The jacket is available in various colours.
sentences.chinese: 这种夹克有好多种颜色可选。

sentences.english: There are various ways to answer your question.
sentences.chinese: 有多种方法可以回答你的问题。

sentences.english: He decided to leave school for various reasons.
sentences.chinese: 出于种种原因，他决定辍学。

detailed_translations.chinese: 各种各样的， 不同的
detailed_translations.english: if there are various things, there are several different types of that thing

sentences.english: You need to touch up the poem.
sentences.chinese: 你需要给这首诗润色一下。

sentences.english: The poem was all the rage then.
sentences.chinese: 这首诗在当时十分流行。

sentences.english: His poem compares poorly with yours.
sentences.chinese: 他的诗做得不如你的好。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing that expresses emotions, experiences, and ideas, especially in short lines using words that  rhyme (= end with the same sound )

sentences.english: He lived in a flat above the shop.
sentences.chinese: 他住在那商店上面的一套房间里。

sentences.english: The airliner flew above the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 大型客机在云层上面飞行。

sentences.english: The salaries we offer are well above (= much higher than ) average.
sentences.chinese: 我们提供的薪资远高于平均水平。

detailed_translations.english: in a higher position than something else

name: dinosaur
trans: 恐龙；过时、落伍的人或事物

sentences.english: How then would this dinosaur have moved?
sentences.chinese: 那么这种恐龙要如何移动呢？

sentences.english: Like shark and dinosaur teeth they would break, but then regenerate.
sentences.chinese: 它们就像鲨鱼和恐龙的牙齿一样会断裂，但也会再生。

sentences.english: From there you can look straight down to the dinosaur fossils displayed on the floor below.
sentences.chinese: 从那儿往向下看，你可以看到陈列在地面上的恐龙化石。

detailed_translations.english: one of a group of  reptile s  that lived millions of years ago

name: valuable
trans: 有价值的；贵重的；可估价的

sentences.english: He swallowed the last of his coffee and asked for the bill.
sentences.chinese: 他喝完最后一口咖啡，要求结账。

sentences.english: Most snakes swallow their prey whole .
sentences.chinese: 大多数蛇都是把猎物囫囵吞下。

detailed_translations.english: to make food or drink go down your throat and towards your stomach

name: blue
trans: 蓝色；[复数]（美国海、陆、空三军穿的）蓝色制服；蓝颜料；[the blue(s)][用作单数或复数]布鲁斯（歌曲）（一种伤感的美国黑人民歌
蓝色的；沮丧的，忧郁的；下流的
把…染成蓝色；使成蓝色；给…用上蓝剂；用上蓝剂于

sentences.english: the blue waters of the lake
sentences.chinese: 蓝蓝的湖水

sentences.english: She nearly always dresses in blue.
sentences.chinese: 她几乎总是穿蓝色的衣服。

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of the sky or the sea on a fine day
the colour of the sky or the sea on a fine day

sentences.english: We want to encourage good teamwork and communication.
sentences.chinese: 我们要鼓励良好的团队合作和沟通。

detailed_translations.english: when a group of people work effectively together

sentences.english: wax crayons
sentences.chinese: 蜡笔

detailed_translations.english: a solid substance made of fat or oil and used to make candles, polish etc
to rub a layer of wax into a floor, surface etc to protect it or make it shine

sentences.english: He saw a dagger sticking in his car's tyre.
sentences.chinese: 他看到一把匕首插在他汽车的轮胎上。

detailed_translations.english: a thick rubber ring that fits around the wheel of a car, bicycle etc

sentences.english: The interview will last about two hours.
sentences.chinese: 面试大概要持续两小时。

sentences.english: I study for an hour every night.
sentences.chinese: 我每晚学习一小时。

sentences.english: I’ll be back in three hours .
sentences.chinese: 我三小时以后回来。

sentences.english: Three hours later he was back.
sentences.chinese: 三小时后他回来了。

sentences.english: Her bag was stolen within hours of her arrival.
sentences.chinese: 她才到没几个小时，手提包就被偷了。

sentences.english: You weren’t interested in my story a half hour ago.
sentences.chinese: 半小时之前你还对我讲的事情不感兴趣呢。

sentences.english: It takes about a quarter of an hour to walk into town.
sentences.chinese: 步行进城大约需要一刻钟。

sentences.english: The hotel is only an hour’s drive from the airport.
sentences.chinese: 那家宾馆离机场只有一小时的车程。

sentences.english: a top speed of 120 miles an hour
sentences.chinese: 120英里的最高时速

sentences.english: Please call during office hours.
sentences.chinese: 请在办公时间来电。

sentences.english: There was a knock on the door in the early hours of the morning.
sentences.chinese: 凌晨时分有人敲门。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring time. There are 60 minutes in one hour, and 24 hours in one day.

sentences.english: But all too often, a relationship becomes a battleground where each partner becomes well schooled in the art of inflicting pain on the other.
sentences.chinese: 不过一切太频繁，一段关系成为一个战场，在每一方在对别人造成伤害的艺术中成为好的学校。

sentences.english: Well, one can debate what these data show. But this much is clear: that little strip of plastic is a mini-battleground.
sentences.chinese: 你可以质疑这些数据显示的结果，但是有一点是不容质疑的：小小的塑料扶手已成为了一个争夺战场。

sentences.english: I sometimes have to work late.
sentences.chinese: 我有时得工作到很晚。

sentences.english: Sometimes, Grandma would tell us stories about her childhood in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，祖母会跟我们讲讲她儿时在意大利的经历。

sentences.english: ‘Do you ever wish you were back in Japan?’ ‘Sometimes. Not very often.’
sentences.chinese: “你有没有想过希望回到日本？”“有时候吧，但不经常这么想。”

sentences.english: The journey takes an hour, sometimes even longer.
sentences.chinese: 路上需要一小时，有时甚至更长。

detailed_translations.english: on some occasions but not always

name: mud
trans: 泥；诽谤的话；无价值的东西

sentences.english: They daubed mud all over themselves.
sentences.chinese: 他们用泥涂满全身。

sentences.english: I dirty my trousers when I step on the mud.
sentences.chinese: 我一脚擩在烂泥里， 把裤子弄脏了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 泥；诽谤的话；无价值的东西
detailed_translations.english: wet earth that has become soft and sticky

name: office
trans: 办公室；政府机关；官职；营业处

sentences.english: The department occupies an office just a mile from the White House.
sentences.chinese: 该部门就在离白宫一英里远的地方有个办公楼。

sentences.english: Did you go to the office (= the office where you work ) today?
sentences.chinese: 今天你去办公室了吗？

sentences.english: the increased demand for office space
sentences.chinese: 对办公室空间日益增长的需求

sentences.english: the Foreign Office
sentences.chinese: 外交部

detailed_translations.english: a building that belongs to a company or organization, with rooms where people can work at desks

sentences.english: a young boy with skinny legs
sentences.chinese: 双腿干瘦的小男孩

sentences.english: She fell and broke her leg.
sentences.chinese: 她摔断了腿。

detailed_translations.english: one of the long parts of your body that your feet are joined to, or a similar part on an animal or insect

name: melon
trans: 瓜；甜瓜；大肚子；圆鼓鼓像瓜似的东西

sentences.english: ...some juicy slices of melon.
sentences.chinese: …几片多汁的甜瓜。

detailed_translations.chinese: 瓜；甜瓜；大肚子；圆鼓鼓像瓜似的东西
detailed_translations.english: a large round fruit with sweet juicy flesh

name: race
trans: 属，种；种族，人种；家庭，门第
使参加比赛；和…竞赛；使急走，使全速行进

sentences.english: The race is on to develop more environmentally friendly forms of energy.
sentences.chinese: 人们正在竞相开发更环保的能源形式。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which one group of people tries to obtain or achieve something before another group does

sentences.english: three optional courses
sentences.chinese: 三门选修课

sentences.english: The other excursions are optional.
sentences.chinese: 其他的短途旅行是自选项目。

detailed_translations.english: if something is optional, you do not have to do it or use it, but you can choose to if you want to

sentences.english: Stop throwing those stones!
sentences.chinese: 别再扔那些石头了！

detailed_translations.english: to block a hole or pipe so that water, smoke etc cannot go through it
if an activity comes to a stop, it stops happening

sentences.english: A bomb planted in a dustbin exploded early today.
sentences.chinese: 一枚安置在一个垃圾桶内的炸弹今天清早爆炸了。

detailed_translations.english: a large container outside your house, used for holding waste until it is taken away

sentences.english: a computer with an 18-inch colour screen
sentences.chinese: 带18英寸彩色屏幕的电脑

sentences.english: He went on staring at the TV screen .
sentences.chinese: 他继续盯着电视屏幕看。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a television or computer where the picture or information appears

detailed_translations.chinese: 掩蔽， 遮蔽； 放映， 播放； 审查， 甄别
detailed_translations.english: if something screens something else, it is in front of it and hides it

sentences.english: I want you stuffed in my stocking.
sentences.chinese: 我只要你塞在我的袜子里。

sentences.english: The Christmas stocking bulged with goodies.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节袜子里塞满了好吃的东西。

sentences.english: She ran her silk stocking on a nail last night.
sentences.chinese: 她昨天夜晚丝袜被钉子钩住，抽了丝。

detailed_translations.english: a thin close-fitting piece of clothing that covers a woman’s leg and foot

name: flat
trans: 平的；单调的；不景气的；干脆的；平坦的；扁平的；浅的
（尤指贴着另一表面）平直地；断然地；水平地；直接地，完全地
使变平；[音乐]使（音调）下降，尤指降半音
逐渐变平；[音乐]以降调唱（或奏）

sentences.english: The bed can be folded flat for storage.
sentences.chinese: 这张床可以折扁存放。

sentences.english: He lay flat on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 他平躺在地板上。

sentences.english: That night I lay flat on my back and stared up at the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 那一夜，我仰面平躺，眼睛直直地盯着天花板。

detailed_translations.chinese: 平直地； 直截了当地
detailed_translations.english: in a position in which the surface of something is against another surface without curving or sloping

detailed_translations.chinese: 平的；固定的；漏气的；单调的，沉闷的；浅的
detailed_translations.english: smooth and level, without raised or hollow areas, and not sloping or curving
a place for people to live that consists of a set of rooms that are part of a larger building

sentences.english: She lives alone.
sentences.chinese: 她一个人生活。

sentences.english: You shouldn’t leave a child alone in the house.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该把小孩独自留在家里。

sentences.english: My wife and I like to spend time alone together away from the kids.
sentences.chinese: 我和妻子喜欢没有孩子打扰，过二人世界。

sentences.english: She has lived alone in this house for almost five years now.
sentences.chinese: 她现在已经独自在这所房子里住了差不多五年了。

detailed_translations.english: if you are alone in a place, there is no one with you
without any help from other people

name: print
trans: 印刷业；印花布；印刷字体；印章；印记
印刷；打印；刊载；用印刷体写；在…印花样

sentences.english: Over five million copies of the paper are printed every day.
sentences.chinese: 这份报纸每日印量超过五百万。

sentences.english: When the book was first written no publisher would print it.
sentences.chinese: 这本书刚写成时没有出版商愿意出版。

sentences.english: There was no print at all on the backs of the tickets.
sentences.chinese: 门票背面没有印任何文字。

detailed_translations.english: to produce many printed copies of a book, newspaper etc
writing that has been printed, for example in books or newspapers

sentences.english: He died in 1985 at the age of 76.
sentences.chinese: 他1985年去世，终年76岁。

sentences.english: Her father died suddenly in an accident when she was only ten.
sentences.chinese: 她年仅10岁时父亲突然死于一场意外事故。

sentences.english: She died peacefully in her sleep at the age of 98.
sentences.chinese: 她在睡眠中安然辞世，享年98岁。

sentences.english: The bullet went straight through his head, and he died instantly.
sentences.chinese: 子弹穿过他的头部，他当场死亡。

sentences.english: Our love will never die.
sentences.chinese: 我们的爱始终不渝。

detailed_translations.english: to stop living and become dead

name: mouse
trans: 鼠标；老鼠；胆小羞怯的人

sentences.english: The cat laid a dead mouse at my feet.
sentences.chinese: 猫把一只死老鼠放在我的脚边。

sentences.english: a field mouse
sentences.chinese: 田鼠

detailed_translations.chinese: 鼠标；老鼠；胆小羞怯的人
detailed_translations.english: a small furry animal with a pointed nose and a long tail that lives in people’s houses or in fields

sentences.english: How much space is there on each disk?
sentences.chinese: 每张磁盘有多大容量？

sentences.english: The hedge takes up too much space .
sentences.chinese: 这树篱占了太多的地方。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of an area, room, container etc that is empty or available to be used

sentences.english: We arrived early.
sentences.chinese: 我们提早到了。

sentences.english: They must have come home early.
sentences.chinese: 他们肯定提早回到家了。

sentences.english: the early morning sunshine
sentences.chinese: 清晨的阳光

detailed_translations.english: before the usual, arranged, or expected time
in the first part of a period of time, event, or process

name: athletic
trans: 运动的，运动员的；体格健壮的

sentences.english: a tall athletic man
sentences.chinese: 一个高大强壮的男子

detailed_translations.english: physically strong and good at sport

sentences.english: the cubic capacity of an engine
sentences.chinese: 引擎汽缸的容积

detailed_translations.english: relating to a measurement of space which is calculated by multiplying the length of something by its width and height

sentences.english: I can’t tell you. It’s a secret.
sentences.chinese: 我不能告诉你，这是个秘密。

sentences.english: It was no secret that the two men hated each other.
sentences.chinese: 这两个男人相互仇视，这算不得什么秘密。

sentences.english: Don’t worry. Your secret is safe with me (= I won’t tell anyone about it ) .
sentences.chinese: 别担心，我会替你保守秘密。

sentences.english: Your hair always looks so great – what’s your secret ?
sentences.chinese: 你的头发看起来总是很漂亮——你的秘诀是什么？

sentences.english: They kept their relationship secret from their parents.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩的关系瞒着父母。

detailed_translations.english: something that is kept hidden or that is known about by only a few people
known about by only a few people and kept hidden from others

name: bush
trans: 以灌木装饰；使…精疲力竭
如灌木般长得低矮的；粗野的

sentences.english: a rose bush
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰丛

sentences.english: The child was hiding in the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子躲在灌木丛里。

detailed_translations.english: a plant with many thin branches growing up from the ground

detailed_translations.chinese: 以灌木装饰；使…精疲力竭
如灌木般长得低矮的；粗野的

sentences.english: These instruments calculate distances precisely.
sentences.chinese: 这些仪器计算距离非常精确。

detailed_translations.chinese: 计算， 推算； 计划， 打算
detailed_translations.english: to find out how much something will cost, how long something will take etc, by using numbers

name: super
trans: 特级品，特大号；临时雇员

sentences.english: an old car in super condition
sentences.chinese: 一辆状况极好的旧车

sentences.english: That sounds super.
sentences.chinese: 那听起来棒极了。

sentences.english: What a super idea!
sentences.chinese: 这个主意太妙了！

detailed_translations.english: extremely good

detailed_translations.chinese: 特级品，特大号；临时雇员

sentences.english: How many people were at the meeting?
sentences.chinese: 有多少人到会？

sentences.english: At least 40 people were killed.
sentences.chinese: 至少有40人遇害。

sentences.english: He pledged that he would never lie to the American people.
sentences.chinese: 他保证绝不对美国人民撒谎。

detailed_translations.english: used as the plural of ‘person’ to refer to men, women, and children

sentences.english: Test your brakes after driving through water.
sentences.chinese: 车子涉水之后要检验一下刹车。

sentences.english: I managed to put the brakes on just in time.
sentences.chinese: 我最终及时刹了车。

sentences.english: Moira slammed on the brakes (=  used them suddenly and with a lot of force  ) .
sentences.chinese: 莫伊拉猛踩刹车。

sentences.english: the screech of brakes
sentences.chinese: 刹车的刺耳噪音

sentences.english: He braked sharply to avoid the dog.
sentences.chinese: 他突然急刹车，想避开那条狗。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that makes a vehicle go more slowly or stop
to make a vehicle or bicycle go more slowly or stop by using its brake

sentences.english: Fuel is cheaper on the French side of the border.
sentences.chinese: 燃料在边境那边的法国要便宜些。

sentences.english: A man stood watching me from the other side of the road.
sentences.chinese: 有个男人站在马路的对面看着我。

sentences.english: His friends and family were all on the other side of the world.
sentences.chinese: 他的朋友和家人都在地球的另一边。

sentences.english: The restaurant was empty apart from another couple on the far side of the room (= the area that is furthest away from you ) .
sentences.chinese: 饭店里空空的，只有最那边还有一对夫妇。

sentences.english: He is in charge of the civilian side of the UN mission.
sentences.chinese: 他在联合国使团中负责平民方面的事务。

sentences.english: Frank sided with David against their mother.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克站在戴维一边反对妈妈。

sentences.english: Hannah slipped out through a side exit.
sentences.chinese: 汉娜从一个侧门溜了出去。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two areas that are on the left or the right of an imaginary line, or on the left or the right of a border, wall, river etc
to support or argue against a person or group in a quarrel, fight etc
in or on the side of something

name: safety
trans: 安全；保险；安全设备；保险装置；安打

sentences.english: You shouldn’t travel alone, for safety’s sake .
sentences.chinese: 为安全起见，不要独自一人旅行。

sentences.english: For your own safety , please do not smoke inside the plane.
sentences.chinese: 为了您自身的安全，请不要在飞机上吸烟。

detailed_translations.chinese: 安全；保险；安全设备；保险装置；安打
detailed_translations.english: when someone or something is safe from danger or harm

sentences.english: We had a massive snowball fight .
sentences.chinese: 我们打了一场大雪仗。

detailed_translations.english: a ball of snow that children make and throw at each other
if a plan, problem, business etc snow-balls, it grows bigger at a faster and faster rate

name: address
trans: 演说；从事；忙于；写姓名地址；向…致辞；与…说话；提出；处理
地址；演讲；致辞；说话的技巧；称呼

detailed_translations.english: if you address a problem, you start trying to solve it

sentences.english: At Christmas the stores stay open late.
sentences.chinese: 在圣诞节期间，商店营业到很晚。

sentences.english: a store of wood
sentences.chinese: 木料储备

detailed_translations.english: a place where goods are sold to the public. In British English, a store is large and sells many different things, but in American English, a store can be large or small, and sell many things or only one type of thing.

name: institution
trans: 制度；建立；（社会或宗教等）公共机构；习俗

sentences.english: powerful institutions such as world banks
sentences.chinese: 诸如世界银行之类的强大机构

sentences.english: the Institution of Electrical Engineers
sentences.chinese: 电机工程师学会

detailed_translations.english: a large organization that has a particular kind of work or purpose

name: neat
trans: 灵巧的；整洁的；优雅的；齐整的；未搀水的；平滑的

sentences.english: neat handwriting
sentences.chinese: 工整的笔迹

sentences.english: His clothes were always neat and clean.
sentences.chinese: 他的衣服总是很整洁。

sentences.english: Everything in the house was neat and tidy.
sentences.chinese: 房子里的每样物品都干净整齐。

sentences.english: She arranged the books in a nice neat pile.
sentences.chinese: 她把书摞成整齐的一堆。

detailed_translations.english: tidy and carefully arranged

sentences.english: Foster joined in the laughter.
sentences.chinese: 福斯特也跟着笑了起来。

sentences.english: He looked shocked, then burst into laughter (= started laughing ).
sentences.chinese: 他一脸的震惊，接着便放声大笑起来。

detailed_translations.english: when people laugh, or the sound of people laughing

sentences.english: She ran back to the classroom to get her schoolbag.
sentences.chinese: 她跑回教室去取书包。

sentences.english: I was straightening my schoolbag when you phoned me.
sentences.chinese: 你给我打电话时，我正在整理书包。

sentences.english: Mom, could you buy me a new green leather schoolbag?
sentences.chinese: 妈妈，你能为我买一个新的绿色皮书包吗？

detailed_translations.english: A schoolbag is a bag that children use to carry books and other things to and from school

sentences.english: One man began to clap, and others joined in.
sentences.chinese: 一个人鼓起了掌，其他人也跟着鼓掌。

sentences.english: The couple were cheered and clapped on their arrival.
sentences.chinese: 这对夫妇抵达时人群为他们欢呼鼓掌。

sentences.english: The audience clapped politely but without much enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 观众礼貌地鼓了掌，但并不热烈。

detailed_translations.english: to hit your hands against each other many times to make a sound that shows your approval, agreement, or enjoyment
the loud sound that you make when you hit your hands together many times to show that you enjoyed something

sentences.english: the Great Wall of China
sentences.chinese: 中国的长城

sentences.english: We climbed over the wall into the orchard.
sentences.chinese: 我们翻墙进了果园。

detailed_translations.english: an upright flat structure made of stone or brick, that divides one area from another or surrounds an area

name: duck
trans: 鸭子；鸭肉；（英）宝贝儿；零分

sentences.english: If she hadn’t ducked, the ball would have hit her.
sentences.chinese: 如果她没有弯腰躲闪的话，那个球就可能击中她了。

sentences.english: Tim ducked down to comb his hair in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆低下身在镜子前梳头发。

sentences.english: She ducked her head to look more closely at the inscription.
sentences.chinese: 她低下头更仔细地看碑文。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鸭子似的突然扎入水中； 突然低下
detailed_translations.english: to lower your head or body very quickly, especially to avoid being seen or hit
a very common water bird with short legs and a wide beak, used for its meat, eggs, and soft feathers

sentences.english: games that can be downloaded free from the Internet
sentences.chinese: 可以从因特网上免费下载的游戏

detailed_translations.english: to move information or programs from a computer network to a small computer

sentences.english: I pine for the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 我渴望乡下的生活。

detailed_translations.english: If you pine for something, you want it very much, especially when it is unlikely that you will be able to have it
a tall tree with long hard sharp leaves that do not fall off in winter

name: agree
trans: 同意，赞成；承认；约定，商定

sentences.english: Teenagers and their parents rarely agree.
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的孩子跟父母意见很少一致。

detailed_translations.english: to have or express the same opinion about something as someone else

sentences.english: Do you remember Rosa Davies?
sentences.chinese: 你记得罗莎·戴维斯吗？

sentences.english: I can’t remember her exact words.
sentences.chinese: 我记不得她的原话了。

sentences.english: I remember it well ; I’d never seen my mother so angry.
sentences.chinese: 这件事我记得很清楚；我从未见过母亲这么生气。

sentences.english: She clearly remembers the excitement as they boarded the train.
sentences.chinese: 她清楚地记得他们登上火车时的激动心情。

sentences.english: I vaguely remember reading something about it in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 我隐约记得在报纸上看到过有关情况。

sentences.english: They had three children, if I remember rightly .
sentences.chinese: 如果我没记错，他们有三个孩子。

sentences.english: You left your keys on the table, remember?
sentences.chinese: 你把钥匙放在桌子上了，想起来了吗？

sentences.english: I hope he remembers the wine.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他记得带酒。

detailed_translations.english: to have a picture or idea in your mind of people, events, places etc from the past

sentences.english: Los Angeles is the second largest city in the US.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶是美国的第二大城市。

sentences.english: The T-shirt comes in Small, Medium and Large.
sentences.chinese: 这种T恤有小号、中号和大号。

sentences.chinese: 除一人外，其他死亡患者都在疾病爆发的中心地墨西哥。

detailed_translations.english: work such as writing letters or reports, which must be done but is not very interesting

sentences.chinese: 她丈夫向来胃口极大。

sentences.english: Symptoms include tiredness and loss of appetite.

name: dish
trans: 盘；餐具；一盘食物；外貌有吸引力的人
盛于碟盘中；分发；使某人的希望破灭；说（某人）的闲话

sentences.english: a serving dish
sentences.chinese: 上菜用的盘子

sentences.english: an ovenproof dish
sentences.chinese: 耐热盘

sentences.english: The menu includes a wide selection of vegetarian dishes.
sentences.chinese: 菜单上有品种丰富的素食。

detailed_translations.english: a flat container with low sides, for serving food from or cooking food in

sentences.chinese: 她觉得有人轻轻拍了拍她的肩膀。

sentences.english: I went up and tapped on the window.
sentences.chinese: 我走上去轻轻敲敲窗户。

detailed_translations.english: an act of hitting something lightly, especially to get someone’s attention
to hit your fingers lightly on something, for example to get someone’s attention

sentences.english: Mr White has converted to Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 怀特先生已改信佛教。

sentences.english: The custom derives its origin from Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 这种习惯起源于佛教。

sentences.english: This concept is one of the fundamental doctrines in Buddhism and Hinduism.
sentences.chinese: 这一概念是佛教和印度教最基本的教义之一。

detailed_translations.english: a religion of east and central Asia, based on the teaching of Gautama Buddha

name: come
trans: 来；开始；出现；发生；变成；到达

sentences.english: Let me know when they come.
sentences.chinese: 他们来了就告诉我。

sentences.english: Can you come here for a minute?
sentences.chinese: 你到这里来一会儿好吗？

sentences.english: Come a bit closer and you’ll be able to see better.
sentences.chinese: 靠近一些就能看得更清楚。

sentences.english: What time will you be coming home ?
sentences.chinese: 你什么时候能回家？

detailed_translations.english: to move towards you or arrive at the place where you are

name: university
trans: 大学；综合性大学；大学校舍

sentences.english: He teaches Esperanto at that university.
sentences.chinese: 他在那所大学教世界语。

sentences.english: She buddied up with a student from another university.
sentences.chinese: 她与来自另一大学的一名学生交朋友。

sentences.english: The student left the university to go out into the world and find himself.
sentences.chinese: 这个学生离开了大学进入社会去发现自己的才能所在。

detailed_translations.english: an educational institution at the highest level, where you study for a degree

sentences.english: You should go to bed early.
sentences.chinese: 你应该早点上床。

sentences.english: She got into bed and turned out the light.
sentences.chinese: 她上了床，关掉灯。

sentences.english: rose beds
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰花坛

sentences.english: the sea bed
sentences.chinese: 海底

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture that you sleep on

sentences.english: They caravaned through Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 他们结队在埃及坐大篷车旅行。

sentences.english: The established religion of Egypt is Islam.
sentences.chinese: 埃及的国教是伊斯兰教。

sentences.english: Glazes had been used from ancient times in Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 埃及自古代起就使用釉料。

sentences.english: She was wearing a coral necklace.
sentences.chinese: 她戴着一串珊瑚项链。

detailed_translations.english: a string of jewels, beads etc or a thin gold or silver chain to wear around the neck

sentences.english: Closure of the plant means 80 workers are facing unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂的关闭意味着 80 个工人面临失业。

sentences.english: a town where there is high unemployment
sentences.chinese: 高失业率城镇

detailed_translations.english: when someone does not have a job

sentences.english: Which football team do you support?
sentences.chinese: 你支持哪个球队？

sentences.english: kids playing football in the street
sentences.chinese: 在街上踢球的小孩子

sentences.english: My Dad took me to watch my first football match .
sentences.chinese: 爸爸带我去看了我人生第一场足球比赛。

sentences.english: a football club
sentences.chinese: 足球俱乐部

detailed_translations.english: a game played by two teams of eleven players who try to kick a round ball into the other team’s  goal

name: ahead
trans: 向前地；领先地；在（某人或某事物的）前面；预先；在将来，为未来

sentences.english: He kept his gaze fixed on the car ahead.
sentences.chinese: 他的目光一直盯着前面的那辆汽车。

sentences.english: We could see the lights of Las Vegas up ahead .
sentences.chinese: 我们能看到前方拉斯维加斯的灯光。

sentences.english: Henry hurried on ahead.
sentences.chinese: 亨利赶紧跑到前面。

sentences.english: The party was planned weeks ahead.
sentences.chinese: 聚会提前几个星期就已筹划好了。

detailed_translations.english: further forward in space or time; in front

name: impression
trans: 印象；效果，影响；压痕，印记；感想；曝光（衡量广告被显示的次数。打开一个带有该广告的网页，则该广告的impression 次数增加一次）

sentences.english: When we looked around the school we got a very good impression.
sentences.chinese: 我们参观了学校，对它的印象很好。

sentences.english: I got the impression that she wasn’t very happy with her job.
sentences.chinese: 我有这样的印象，她的工作干得并不愉快。

sentences.english: Some of the fallen trees had left a clear impression in the hardened mud.
sentences.chinese: 有一些倒下的树木在坚硬的泥地上留下了清晰的压痕。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion or feeling you have about someone or something because of the way they seem

sentences.english: People say the judge had been bought by the Mafia.
sentences.chinese: 人们都说法官被黑手党收买了。

detailed_translations.english: to pay money to someone, especially someone in a position of authority, in order to persuade them to do something dishonest
to pay money to someone, especially someone in a position of authority, in order to persuade them to do something dishonest

name: spit
trans: 吐痰；吐口水；发出劈啪声

sentences.english: Nick rolled down his window and spat.
sentences.chinese: 尼克摇下窗子，啐了口唾沫。

detailed_translations.chinese: 吐痰；吐口水；发出劈啪声
detailed_translations.english: to force a small amount of  saliva (= the liquid in your mouth )  out of your mouth
the watery liquid that is produced in your mouth

sentences.english: He walked across the field.
sentences.chinese: 他走过田地。

sentences.english: There's a bank right across the street.
sentences.chinese: 街对面就有一家银行。

detailed_translations.english: from one side to the other side of sth

sentences.english: ‘Are you Italian?’ ‘No, I’m Spanish.’
sentences.chinese: “你是意大利人吗？”“不，我是西班牙人。”

sentences.english: ‘Do you want any more?’ ‘No thanks.’
sentences.chinese: “你还要再来点吗？”“不要了，谢谢。”

sentences.english: ‘Could you help me write this?’ ‘No, sorry, I haven’t got time at the moment.’
sentences.chinese: “你能帮我写这个吗？”“抱歉，不行，我现在没时间。”

sentences.english: He wanted to take me to a disco but I said no.
sentences.chinese: 他想带我去迪斯科舞厅，但是我拒绝了。

sentences.english: Sixty percent of people voted no.
sentences.chinese: 60%的人投了反对票。

sentences.english: If you’re asking whether I feel the same way about her, the answer is no.
sentences.chinese: 如果你问的是我对她是否也有相同的感觉，答案是没有。

detailed_translations.english: used to give a negative reply to a question, offer, or request

sentences.english: All visitors to the apartment building must be announced.
sentences.chinese: 那幢公寓楼的访客都必须通报。

sentences.english: After announcing himself at the reception desk, James was led upstairs.
sentences.chinese: 在接待处通报姓名后，詹姆斯被领上楼去。

detailed_translations.english: to officially tell people that someone has arrived at a particular place

sentences.english: It is unlikely that the marine industry will fare any better in September.
sentences.chinese: 海运业不大可能在9月份有所好转。

detailed_translations.english: If you say that someone or something fares well or badly, you are referring to the degree of success they achieve in a particular situation or activity
the price you pay to travel somewhere by bus, train, plane etc

name: possible
trans: 可能性；合适的人；可能的事物

sentences.chinese: 有没有可能弄到比赛的门票？

sentences.english: It might be possible for the documents to be sent over.
sentences.chinese: 这些文件也许可以发送过去。

sentences.english: Computer technology makes it possible for many people to work from home.
sentences.chinese: 计算机技术让很多人可以在家里工作。

sentences.english: I want to avoid the rush hour traffic if possible .
sentences.chinese: 如有可能我想避开交通高峰时间。

sentences.english: I walk or use public transport whenever possible .
sentences.chinese: 只要有可能我就步行或者乘坐公共交通工具。

sentences.english: We are doing everything possible to track down the killer.
sentences.chinese: 我们正竭尽全力追捕杀人凶手。

sentences.chinese: 我们的员工会尽力帮助你。

sentences.english: Even if it were technically possible , we do not have the money to do it.
sentences.chinese: 即使技术上可行，我们也没有钱去做。

sentences.chinese: 她决定尽可能离他远点。

detailed_translations.english: if something is possible, it can be done or achieved

sentences.english: a house with a view across the bay
sentences.chinese: 能看到海湾全景的一幢房子

sentences.english: Montego Bay
sentences.chinese: 蒙特哥湾

sentences.chinese: 一只狗忽然嚎叫起来，对月长嗥。

detailed_translations.english: a part of the sea that is partly enclosed by a curve in the land
If a dog or wolf bays, it makes loud, long cries

name: quarter
trans: 四分之一；地区；季度；一刻钟；两角五分；节

sentences.english: It’s about a page and a quarter.
sentences.chinese: 大概是一又四分之一页。

sentences.chinese: 把蛋糕切成四等份。

sentences.chinese: 我们一刻钟之后见。

detailed_translations.english: one of four equal parts into which something can be divided

name: bang
trans: 直接地；砰然地；突然巨响地

sentences.english: The baby kept banging the table with his spoon.
sentences.chinese: 宝宝不停地拿调羹敲桌子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 猛击， 猛撞； 发出砰的一声， 砰砰地响
detailed_translations.english: to hit something hard, making a loud noise
a painful blow to the body when you hit against something or something hits you
to hit something hard, making a loud noise

name: stubborn
trans: 顽固的；顽强的；难处理的

sentences.english: Why are you so stubborn?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么这么固执？

sentences.english: I’ve got a very stubborn streak (= a tendency to be stubborn ) .
sentences.chinese: 我的个性很固执。

sentences.english: Paul can be as stubborn as a mule (= very stubborn ) .
sentences.chinese: 保尔有时倔得像头驴。

detailed_translations.english: determined not to change your mind, even when people think you are being unreasonable

sentences.english: Earthquakes are extremely difficult to predict.
sentences.chinese: 地震非常难以预测。

sentences.english: I’m extremely sorry to have troubled you.
sentences.chinese: 给你添了麻烦，我十分抱歉。

detailed_translations.english: to a very great degree

trans: 花费；使付出；使花许多钱

sentences.chinese: 我提出支付出租车费。

sentences.english: Insurance to cover the cost of a funeral is possible.
sentences.chinese: 可以用保险支付葬礼费用。

sentences.english: This doesn’t include the cost of repairing the damage.
sentences.chinese: 这不包括修理破损的费用。

sentences.english: the terrible cost of the war in death and suffering
sentences.chinese: 这场战争造成的死亡与苦难的惨重代价

sentences.english: low cost housing
sentences.chinese: 低成本住宅

sentences.english: the high cost of production
sentences.chinese: 很高的生产成本

sentences.english: A cassette/radio is included at no extra cost .
sentences.chinese: 附送一台卡式收录机。

sentences.english: The funds will just cover the museum’s running costs .
sentences.chinese: 这些资金只够支付博物馆的运转费用。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of money that you have to pay in order to buy, do, or produce something

sentences.chinese: 半公斤干酪

sentences.chinese: 干酪三明治

sentences.english: Sprinkle with the grated cheese.
sentences.chinese: 撒上磨碎的干酪。

sentences.english: a selection of English cheeses
sentences.chinese: 精选英国干酪

detailed_translations.english: a solid food made from milk, which is usually yellow or white in colour, and can be soft or hard

name: straightforward
trans: 简单的；坦率的；明确的；径直的

sentences.chinese: 在这个示例中，我们将使用所有方法中最直截了当的一种 — 将对象引用写入一个文件，该 文件将由客户机选取。

name: traveler
trans: 旅行者；旅客；旅行推销员（等于traveller）

sentences.english: The message is the traveler, moving from one specific airport to another specific airport.
sentences.chinese: 消息是这个旅行者，要从一个特定的机场到另一个特定的机场。

sentences.english: By thus sweeping over centuries and minds, by miming man as he can be and as he is, the actor has much in common with that other absurd individual, the traveler.
sentences.chinese: 就这样，演员不知经历了多少世纪，横跨过多少心智，模仿着他们的所能与所是，渐渐的，他和那个荒谬的个体，那个旅行者，有了许多共同之处。

detailed_translations.english: a person who is travelling or who often travels

name: international
trans: 国际组织；国际体育比赛；外国居留者；国际股票
国际的；两国（或以上）国家的；超越国界的；国际关系的；世界的

sentences.english: the response of the international community
sentences.chinese: 国际社会的反响

sentences.english: the UN and other international organizations
sentences.chinese: 联合国和其他国际组织

detailed_translations.english: relating to or involving more than one nation

name: acute
trans: 严重的，[医] 急性的；敏锐的；激烈的；尖声的

sentences.english: Young children have a particularly acute sense of smell.
sentences.chinese: 幼儿的嗅觉特别灵敏。

detailed_translations.english: acute senses such as hearing, taste, touch etc are very good and sensitive

sentences.english: Arthur was a very gentle, caring person.
sentences.chinese: 阿瑟是一个非常温柔体贴的人。

sentences.english: After a little gentle persuasion , she agreed to go back to her family.
sentences.chinese: 经过几句温和的劝说，她同意回到家里去。

detailed_translations.english: kind and careful in the way you behave or do things, so that you do not hurt or damage anyone or anything

sentences.english: Imagine that you have just won a million pounds.
sentences.chinese: 设想你刚刚赢得一百万英镑。

sentences.english: He didn’t quite dare to imagine himself as a real artist.
sentences.chinese: 他不太敢把自己想象成一个真正的艺术家。

detailed_translations.english: to form a picture or idea in your mind about what something could be like

sentences.chinese: 他把手深深地伸进雨衣口袋里。

sentences.english: The dark clouds remembered me to take my raincoat along.
sentences.chinese: 乌云提醒我带上雨衣。

sentences.english: If I had taken my raincoat with me this morning, I would not be wet now.
sentences.chinese: (从句指过去,主句指现在)。如果我今天早上带了雨衣，现在就不会被淋湿了。

detailed_translations.english: a coat that you wear to protect yourself from rain

name: humorous
trans: 诙谐的，幽默的；滑稽的，可笑的

sentences.english: humorous stories
sentences.chinese: 诙谐的故事

sentences.english: The film has some mildly humorous moments.
sentences.chinese: 那部电影中有些略显幽默的片段。

detailed_translations.english: funny and enjoyable

sentences.english: This gruel is too thin.
sentences.chinese: 粥太稀了。

sentences.english: Mrs. March gave the mother tea and gruel , and comforted her with promises of help, while she dressed the little baby as tenderly as if it had been her own.
sentences.chinese: 马奇太太一边为做母亲的端茶递粥，一边安慰她，让她宽心，又像对待自己的亲生骨肉一样轻柔地为小宝宝穿上衣服。

sentences.english: The food was very simple-teachers ate millet gruel three times a day.
sentences.chinese: 吃的食物非常简单，老师一天三顿喝小米稀粥。

detailed_translations.english: a food made of  oats  cooked in water or milk, which poor people ate in the past

name: fine
trans: 好的；优良的；细小的，精美的；健康的；晴朗的

sentences.english: Many people regard Beethoven’s fifth symphony as his finest work.
sentences.chinese: 很多人认为贝多芬的第五交响曲是他最杰出的作品。

sentences.english: He’s a very fine player.
sentences.chinese: 他是个很优秀的选手。

sentences.english: It’s a fine idea.
sentences.chinese: 这是个很妙的主意。

sentences.english: Hatfield House is a fine example of Jacobean architecture.
sentences.chinese: 哈特菲尔德宅第是英王詹姆斯一世时期建筑的典范。

sentences.english: The restaurant was chosen for its good food and fine wines .
sentences.chinese: 这家餐厅因其美酒佳肴而入选。

detailed_translations.english: very good or of a very high standard

sentences.english: He quit his job after an argument with a colleague.
sentences.chinese: 他和一个同事争吵后就辞职了。

sentences.english: I quit school at 16.
sentences.chinese: 我十六岁辍学。

sentences.english: She has decided to quit show business.
sentences.chinese: 她已决定退出娱乐圈。

sentences.english: People are now calling on the chairman to quit.
sentences.chinese: 人们现在正要求主席辞职。

sentences.english: I've quit smoking.
sentences.chinese: 我戒了烟。

detailed_translations.english: to leave a job, school etc, especially without finishing it completely

sentences.english: In the dry season, it could be attacked by another species of ant.
sentences.chinese: 在干燥的季节里,它可能会遭到另一个种类的蚂蚁攻击。

sentences.english: He later learned that another entomologist in New Jersey, 260 miles away, observed a wedding flight by the same species of ant, on the same day, and at exactly the same time!
sentences.chinese: 他后来知道，在260英里以外纽泽西州另一个昆虫学家也观察到同一种类蚂蚁举行飞行婚礼的时间，竟和他记录的在同一天、同一个时刻！

detailed_translations.english: a small insect that lives in large groups

sentences.english: She smiled as he squeezed her hand.
sentences.chinese: 他捏了捏她的手，她笑了。

sentences.english: He squeezed the trigger, but nothing happened.
sentences.chinese: 他扣动扳机，但没有反应。

detailed_translations.english: to press something firmly together with your fingers or hand

detailed_translations.chinese: 挤； 握手； 拮据， 紧缺
detailed_translations.english: an act of pressing something firmly with your fingers or hand

sentences.english: A trunk distinguishes the elephant.
sentences.chinese: 长鼻是象的特征。

sentences.english: So the part of the elephant I experience applies what we know about people and how we apply that to UX design.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我体验的那部分的大象就是我们对人的了解和我们将我们的了解应用于用户体验设计。

sentences.english: Tom: No.Although 75% of its raw materials is elephant dung, it is light delicate fragrance instead of stink. This is due to its special fabrication technology.
sentences.chinese: 不，尽管这种纸里75％的原料都是大象的粪便，但它不但不臭，反而有一种淡淡的清香，这是源于它的特殊的制造工艺。

detailed_translations.english: a very large grey animal with four legs, two tusks(= long curved teeth ) and a trunk(= long nose ) that it can use to pick things up

name: pest
trans: 害虫；有害之物；讨厌的人

sentences.english: a chemical used in pest control
sentences.chinese: 用于防治虫害的一种化学品

detailed_translations.chinese: 害虫；有害之物；讨厌的人
detailed_translations.english: a small animal or insect that destroys crops or food supplies

name: separate
trans: 单独的；分开的；不同的；各自的；

sentences.english: The gym and the sauna are in separate buildings.
sentences.chinese: 健身房和桑拿浴室在不同的大楼里。

detailed_translations.english: not joined to or touching something else

trans: 随便的；非正式的；临时的；偶然的

不存在的；毫无结果的；不知名的

sentences.chinese: 这个程序占用2.5 兆字节的磁盘空间，可以在标准个人电脑上运行。

name: loaf
trans: 游荡；游手好闲；虚度光阴

sentences.chinese: 一条面包

detailed_translations.english: bread that is shaped and baked in one piece and can be cut into slices

detailed_translations.chinese: 游荡；游手好闲；虚度光阴

sentences.chinese: 他遭到逮捕并被指控谋杀。
