sentences.english: The country’s wealth comes from its oil.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家的财富来自石油。

sentences.english: the distribution of wealth
sentences.chinese: 财富的分配

sentences.english: The purpose of industry is to create wealth.
sentences.chinese: 工业的目的就是创造财富。

detailed_translations.chinese: 财富； 财产； 丰富
detailed_translations.english: a large amount of money, property etc that a person or country owns

sentences.english: a mother hen with her chicks
sentences.chinese: 和小鸡在一起的鸡妈妈

detailed_translations.english: a baby bird

sentences.english: For ten years he had been her constant companion .
sentences.chinese: 十年来他一直陪伴她左右。

sentences.english: His dog became his closest companion .
sentences.chinese: 他的狗成了他最亲密的伙伴。

sentences.english: a travelling companion
sentences.chinese: 旅伴

detailed_translations.english: someone you spend a lot of time with, especially a friend

name: mouth
trans: 做作地说，装腔作势地说；喃喃地说出

sentences.english: He lifted his glass to his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 他把玻璃杯举到嘴边。

sentences.english: Liam was fast asleep with his mouth wide open.
sentences.chinese: 利亚姆大张着嘴，睡得很熟。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your face which you put food into, or which you use for speaking

name: find
trans: 查找，找到；发现；认为；感到；获得

sentences.english: I can’t find the car keys.
sentences.chinese: 我找不到汽车钥匙。

sentences.english: Hold on while I find a pen.
sentences.chinese: 别挂电话，我找支笔。

sentences.english: Her body was later found hidden in the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 后来有人发现她的尸体被藏在了灌木丛里。

sentences.english: I have to find somewhere else to live.
sentences.chinese: 我得另找住处。

sentences.english: She had almost given up hope of finding a husband.
sentences.chinese: 她差不多要放弃找个丈夫的希望了。

sentences.english: Her mother went to the shops, and on her return, Kathleen was nowhere to be found (= could not be found ) .
sentences.chinese: 妈妈去买东西，回来的时候凯思琳找不到了。

detailed_translations.english: to discover, see, or get something that you have been searching for

sentences.english: an industrial town in the Midlands
sentences.chinese: 英格兰中部的一座工业城镇

sentences.english: I walked to the nearest town.
sentences.chinese: 我走到最近的镇上。

detailed_translations.english: a large area with houses, shops, offices etc where people live and work, that is smaller than a city and larger than a village

sentences.english: His trousers were slightly too short.
sentences.chinese: 他的裤子有点短。

sentences.english: I need a new pair of trousers for work.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一条上班穿的新裤子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that covers the lower half of your body, with a separate part fitting over each leg

sentences.english: circus performers
sentences.chinese: 马戏演员

sentences.english: He was a better songwriter than performer.
sentences.chinese: 他更擅长写歌，而不是演唱。

detailed_translations.english: an actor, musician etc who performs to entertain people

sentences.english: unleaded petrol
sentences.chinese: 无铅汽油

sentences.english: petrol prices
sentences.chinese: 汽油价格

sentences.english: The petrol tank is leaking.
sentences.chinese: 油箱漏了。

detailed_translations.english: a liquid obtained from  petroleum that is used to supply power to the engine of cars and other vehicles

name: solid
trans: 固体的；可靠的；立体的；结实的；一致的

sentences.english: The lake was frozen solid .
sentences.chinese: 湖水冻得结结实实。

sentences.english: It was good to be back on solid ground again.
sentences.chinese: 又能踏上坚实的土地感觉真好。

sentences.english: Is the baby eating solid food (= bread, meat etc ) yet?
sentences.chinese: 宝宝吃固体食物了吗？

sentences.english: The ship’s sonar can detect the presence of solid objects in the water.
sentences.chinese: 船上的声呐能够探测出水中的固体物。

sentences.english: the properties of liquids and solids
sentences.chinese: 液体和固体的特性

detailed_translations.english: hard or firm, with a fixed shape, and not a liquid or gas
a firm object or substance that has a fixed shape, not a gas or liquid

sentences.english: This sofa is so uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 这张沙发太不舒服了。

detailed_translations.english: not feeling physically comfortable, or not making you feel comfortable

sentences.english: He borrowed £150,000 and used the money for legal expenses.
sentences.chinese: 他借了15万英镑用于支付律师费。

sentences.english: Conference rooms were equipped at great expense.
sentences.chinese: 装备会议室花费巨大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 花费， 消费， 费用； 开支， 业务费用
detailed_translations.english: the amount of money that you spend on something

sentences.english: Do you want to go bowling with us Friday?
sentences.chinese: 星期五想和我们一起去打保龄球吗？

detailed_translations.english: an indoor game in which you roll a large heavy ball along a wooden track in order to knock down a group of  pin s (=  wooden objects shaped like bottles  )

sentences.english: She's running the 1,500 metres here.
sentences.chinese: 她正在这儿跑1500米。

sentences.english: A man came to read the electricity metre .
sentences.chinese: 有个男的来抄电表。

detailed_translations.english: the basic unit for measuring length in the  metric system

sentences.english: My office is just along the passage.
sentences.chinese: 我的办公室就在过道旁边。

sentences.english: We walked down a narrow passage to the back of the building.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着一条狭窄的通道来到大楼的后面。

sentences.english: an underground passage
sentences.chinese: 地下通道

sentences.english: The bridge isn’t strong enough to allow the passage of heavy vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 那座桥不够坚固，无法让重型车辆通过。

detailed_translations.english: a way through something

sentences.english: It took nearly two hours to get here.
sentences.chinese: 到这里花了将近两小时。

sentences.english: Michelle’s nearly twenty.
sentences.chinese: 米歇尔年近二十。

sentences.english: Is the job nearly finished?
sentences.chinese: 这工作快干完了吗？

sentences.english: Louise is nearly as tall as her mother.
sentences.chinese: 路易丝差不多和她母亲一样高。

sentences.english: I nearly always go home for lunch.
sentences.chinese: 我几乎总是回家吃午饭。

sentences.english: He very nearly died.
sentences.chinese: 他差点送命。

detailed_translations.english: almost, but not quite or not completely

name: institute
trans: 开始（调查）；制定；创立；提起（诉讼）

sentences.english: We will institute a number of measures to better safeguard the public.
sentences.chinese: 我们将制定许多措施更好地保护公众。

sentences.english: research institutes
sentences.chinese: 研究所

detailed_translations.english: If you institute a system, rule, or course of action, you start it

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔从事科研或教育等的〕机构；学院；研究院
detailed_translations.english: an organization that has a particular purpose such as scientific or educational work, or the building where this organization is based

sentences.english: Katie had drawn a cottage with a little stream running next to it.
sentences.chinese: 凯蒂画了一间小茅舍，旁边流淌着一条小溪。

sentences.english: She asked the little girl to draw a picture of the man she’d spoken to.
sentences.chinese: 她让小女孩把刚才和她说话的那个男人画出来。

sentences.english: Keith was drawing a complicated-looking graph.
sentences.chinese: 基思在画一张看上去很复杂的图表。

sentences.english: I’ve never been able to draw very well.
sentences.chinese: 我从来就画不好图画。

detailed_translations.english: to produce a picture of something using a pencil, pen etc

name: as
trans: 因为；随着；虽然；依照；当…时

sentences.english: I saw Peter as I was getting off the bus.
sentences.chinese: 我下公共汽车的时候看见了彼得。

sentences.english: As time passed, things seemed to get worse.
sentences.chinese: 随着时间的推移，情况似乎变得更加糟糕了。

sentences.english: Just as the two men were leaving, a message arrived.
sentences.chinese: 那两个男子刚要离开，消息就传来了。

detailed_translations.english: while or when

sentences.english: We must have a meal together some time.
sentences.chinese: 我们一定要找个时间一起吃顿饭。

sentences.english: Dinner is the main meal of the day for most people.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭是大多数人一天中的主餐。

detailed_translations.english: an occasion when you eat food, for example breakfast or dinner, or the food that you eat on that occasion

sentences.english: She started coughing and sneezing.
sentences.chinese: 她开始咳嗽、打喷嚏。

sentences.english: The dust was making him sneeze .
sentences.chinese: 灰尘使他打起了喷嚏。

detailed_translations.english: if you sneeze, air suddenly comes from your nose, making a noise, for example when you have a cold
the act or sound of sneezing

name: bit
trans: [计] 比特（二进位制信息单位）；少量；马嚼子；辅币；老一套；一点，一块

sentences.english: He’s taken the engine to bits .
sentences.chinese: 他把发动机拆开了。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of something

sentences.english: It’s an old car, but it’s very reliable.
sentences.chinese: 这是一辆旧车，但是性能非常可靠。

sentences.english: They rushed to the hospital, but they were too late.
sentences.chinese: 他们急忙赶到医院，但是已经太迟了。

sentences.english: We’ve invited the boss, but she may decide not to come.
sentences.chinese: 我们邀请过老板，但她有可能决定不来。

sentences.english: an expensive but extremely useful book
sentences.chinese: 价钱很贵却是非常有用的一本书

sentences.english: ‘Has he got any experience?’ ‘No, but he’s keen to learn.’
sentences.chinese: “他有经验吗？”“没有，但他非常好学。”

detailed_translations.english: used to connect two statements or phrases when the second one adds something different or seems surprising after the first one

name: monitor
trans: 监视器；监听器；监控器；显示屏；班长

sentences.english: a heart monitor
sentences.chinese: 心脏监测仪

detailed_translations.chinese: 班长；监视器，检测器；显示器
detailed_translations.english: a television or part of a computer with a screen, on which you can see pictures or information
to carefully watch and check a situation in order to see how it changes over a period of time

name: thrill
trans: 使…颤动；使…紧张；使…感到兴奋或激动

sentences.english: Winning first place must have been quite a thrill.
sentences.chinese: 赢得第一名肯定让人非常激动。

sentences.english: Even though I’ve been acting for years, I still get a thrill out of going on stage.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我演了多年戏，走上舞台我仍然感到十分激动。

sentences.english: It gave Pat a thrill to finally see the group perform live.
sentences.chinese: 帕特终于看到这个乐队现场表演，感到十分激动。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden strong feeling of excitement and pleasure, or the thing that makes you feel this

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…颤动；使…紧张；使…感到兴奋或激动
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel excited and happy

sentences.english: You should have followed my advice.
sentences.chinese: 你真该听我的建议。

detailed_translations.english: an opinion you give someone about what they should do

sentences.english: The receding tide stranded the whale.
sentences.chinese: 退潮把鲸鱼搁浅在海滩上。

sentences.english: So whale come out fish, because they are fish obviously.
sentences.chinese: 所以鲸鱼就是鱼，因为他们显然是鱼。

sentences.english: This sense of revelation is in part due to our changing attitude towards the whale.
sentences.chinese: 与鲸鱼感到关联部分是由于和我们对鲸鱼态度发生了变化。

detailed_translations.english: a very large animal that lives in the sea and looks like a fish, but is actually a mammal

name: vacant
trans: 空虚的；空的；空缺的；空闲的；茫然的

sentences.english: Only a few apartments were still vacant.
sentences.chinese: 只有几套公寓仍然空着。

sentences.english: There was only a vacant lot (= empty unused area of land in a city ) where her house used to be.
sentences.chinese: 她以前房子所在的地方只剩下一块空地了。

detailed_translations.english: a vacant seat, building, room or piece of land is empty and available for someone to use

name: underground
trans: 地下的；秘密的；先锋派的
地下；地铁；地道；地下组织；秘密活动；先锋派团体

sentences.english: This animal spends most of its life underground.
sentences.chinese: 这种动物一生中的大部分时间都待在地下。

sentences.english: nuclear waste buried deep underground
sentences.chinese: 深埋在地下的核废物

detailed_translations.english: under the earth’s surface

detailed_translations.chinese: 地下的；秘密的；先锋派的
detailed_translations.english: below the surface of the earth

detailed_translations.chinese: 地下；地铁；地道；地下组织；秘密活动；先锋派团体
detailed_translations.english: a railway system under the ground

name: rocket
trans: 飞驰，飞快地移动；迅速增加

sentences.english: The rocket was launched from a space research base.
sentences.chinese: 火箭从一个太空研究基地发射升空。

sentences.english: a space rocket
sentences.chinese: 航天火箭

sentences.english: Interest rates rocketed up.
sentences.chinese: 利率飞涨。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle used for travelling or carrying things into space, which is shaped like a big tube
if a price or amount rockets, it increases quickly and suddenly

sentences.english: The trial is due to start next week.
sentences.chinese: 审理定于下周开始。

detailed_translations.chinese: 试， 试验； 审判； 讨厌的人
detailed_translations.english: a legal process in which a judge and often a  jury  in a court of law examine information to decide whether someone is guilty of a crime

sentences.english: He once lived in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 他曾经在上海住过。

sentences.english: He chauffeurs for a company in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 他为上海一家公司开汽车。

sentences.english: We should not wind down our business in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 我们不该逐渐结束在上海的生意。

sentences.english: tree roots
sentences.chinese: 树根

sentences.english: These plants produce a number of thin roots.
sentences.chinese: 这些植物会长出一些细根。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a plant or tree that grows under the ground and gets water from the soil
to grow roots

sentences.english: a nationwide search for a missing British tourist
sentences.chinese: 在全国范围内对一名失踪英国游客的搜寻

sentences.english: nationwide television
sentences.chinese: 全国性的电视节目

sentences.english: The figures show unemployment falling nationwide last month.
sentences.chinese: 数字显示，上个月失业数字正全国性地下降。

detailed_translations.english: happening or existing in every part of the country
Nationwide is also an adverb

sentences.english: I’ve booked the flights and the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我已订好机票和酒店。

sentences.english: We’ll be staying at the Hotel Ibis.
sentences.chinese: 我们将住在宜必思酒店。

detailed_translations.english: a building where people pay to stay and eat meals

sentences.english: a heart specialist
sentences.chinese: 心脏专科医生

detailed_translations.english: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, or is very skilled at it

sentences.english: Have you got any money?
sentences.chinese: 你身上有没有钱？

sentences.english: Any child who breaks the rules will be punished.
sentences.chinese: 凡违反规定的孩子都要受罚。

detailed_translations.english: some or even the smallest amount or number

sentences.english: In the thirties, air travel really began to take off.
sentences.chinese: 在30年代，乘飞机旅行迅速流行了起来。

detailed_translations.english: the number 30
the number 30

name: attractive
trans: 吸引人的；有魅力的；引人注目的

sentences.english: an attractive young woman
sentences.chinese: 妩媚动人的年轻女子

sentences.english: Women seem to find him attractive .
sentences.chinese: 女性似乎觉得他很有吸引力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 有吸引力的， 引起注意的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is attractive is good looking, especially in a way that makes you sexually interested in them

sentences.english: Homelessness is not a new phenomenon .
sentences.chinese: 无家可归已不是什么新现象。

detailed_translations.english: something that happens or exists in society, science, or nature, especially something that is studied because it is difficult to understand

name: counter
trans: 柜台；对立面；计数器；（某些棋盘游戏的）筹码
反击，还击；反向移动，对着干；反驳，回答

sentences.english: He wondered if the girl behind the counter recognised him.
sentences.chinese: 他在想柜台后面的那个女孩是否认出了他。

sentences.english: Set the video counter to zero before you press play.
sentences.chinese: 在按播放键之前，把录像机上的计数器调到零。

detailed_translations.english: the place where you pay or are served in a shop, bank, restaurant etc

name: scarf
trans: 围巾；嵌接，嵌接处；头巾领巾

sentences.english: Hey, your scarf is slipping off.
sentences.chinese: 喂， 你的围巾快掉了。

sentences.english: The scarf flapped her face.
sentences.chinese: 围巾轻拂着她的脸。

sentences.english: She muffled her throat with a scarf.
sentences.chinese: 她用围巾围住脖子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of cloth that you wear around your neck, head, or shoulders, especially to keep warm

sentences.english: The dog wagged its tail .
sentences.chinese: 那条狗摇了摇尾巴。

detailed_translations.english: the part that sticks out at the back of an animal’s body, and that it can move

sentences.english: Remember that you have sworn an oath and so must tell the truth.
sentences.chinese: 记住你已经宣过誓了，所以必须讲真话。

sentences.english: Presidents must swear allegiance to the US constitution.
sentences.chinese: 总统必须宣誓效忠美国宪法。

detailed_translations.english: to make a public official promise, especially in a court of law
to use rude and offensive language

name: high
trans: 高的；高级的；崇高的；高音调的
高水平；天空；由麻醉品引起的快感；高压地带

sentences.english: This is the highest mountain in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 这是日本最高的山。

sentences.english: The camp was surrounded by a high fence.
sentences.chinese: 营地四周围着高高的栅栏。

sentences.english: a ten-foot high statue
sentences.chinese: 10英尺高的雕像

sentences.english: How high is the Eiffel Tower?
sentences.chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔有多高？

sentences.english: He kicked the ball high into the air, over the heads of the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 他把球高高地踢向空中，越过了人群。

detailed_translations.english: measuring a long distance from the bottom to the top
at or to a level high above the ground, the floor etc

sentences.english: a period of adjustment
sentences.chinese: 一段调整期

detailed_translations.english: a small change made to a machine, system, or calculation

sentences.english: I knew I could rely on David.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我可以信赖戴维。

sentences.english: They relied heavily on the advice of their professional advisers.
sentences.chinese: 他们非常依赖专业顾问的建议。

detailed_translations.english: to depend on something in order to continue to live or exist

sentences.english: What have I done to deserve this?
sentences.chinese: 我做了什么事，要得到这样的报应？

sentences.english: I’m sorry for the kids. They deserve better (= deserve to be treated in a better way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我为这些孩子感到难过，他们应该过得更好。

sentences.english: Ledley deserves a place in the team.
sentences.chinese: 莱德利应该在队里占有一席之地。

sentences.english: Paula deserves a special mention for all the help she has given us.
sentences.chinese: 应该特别提一下葆拉，她给了我们许多帮助。

sentences.english: I would never hit anyone, even if they deserved it.
sentences.chinese: 我决不会打人，哪怕他欠揍。

sentences.english: What has he done to deserve this punishment ?
sentences.chinese: 他做了什么，竟会受到这样的惩罚？

sentences.english: People who are sent to prison for drunk-driving get what they deserve .
sentences.chinese: 那些醉酒驾车被送进监狱的人是罪有应得的。

detailed_translations.english: to have earned something by good or bad actions or behaviour

name: mine
trans: 矿，矿藏；矿山，矿井；地雷，水雷

sentences.english: It was Glen’s idea, not mine.
sentences.chinese: 这是格伦的主意，不是我的。

sentences.english: ‘Is that your car?’ ‘No, mine is parked over the road.’
sentences.chinese: “那是你的车吗？”“不是，我的车停在路对面。”

sentences.english: You’ve got good legs – mine are too thin.
sentences.chinese: 你的腿很美——我的腿太细了。

sentences.english: His English is better than mine.
sentences.chinese: 他英语比我好。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with himself or herself

name: AIDS
trans: 获得性免疫缺乏综合征；爱滋病（Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome）

sentences.english: the AIDS virus
sentences.chinese: 艾滋病病毒

sentences.english: Aids sufferers
sentences.chinese: 艾滋病患者

sentences.english: {"GLOSS":["AIDS at its most advanced stage"],"COLLOINEXA":["full-blown AIDS"]}
sentences.chinese: 完全型艾滋病

detailed_translations.english: a very serious disease that stops your body from defending itself against infections, and usually causes death

sentences.english: The prime minister promised farmers a new deal (= a new and fairer system ) .
sentences.chinese: 首相向农民保证推行一项新政策。

detailed_translations.english: treatment of a particular type that is given or received

name: apron
trans: 围裙；[航] 停机坪；舞台口

sentences.english: She wiped her eyes with her apron.
sentences.chinese: 她用她的围裙擦干了眼泪。

sentences.english: She had put her louis in the pocket of her new apron.
sentences.chinese: 她已把她的那枚路易放在她新围裙的口袋里了。

sentences.english: The research involves collecting data from two random samples.
sentences.chinese: 该项研究需要从两个随机样本里收集资料。

detailed_translations.english: information or facts
information or facts

sentences.english: She was a casual acquaintance of my family in Vienna.
sentences.chinese: 她是我们家在维也纳的一个交情不深的朋友。

sentences.english: They developed an acquaintance over the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 他们在因特网上相识。

sentences.english: The practice of a lawyer requires acquaintance with court procedures.
sentences.chinese: 当律师要熟悉法庭程序。

detailed_translations.english: someone you know, but who is not a close friend

name: great
trans: 伟大的，重大的；极好的，好的；主要的

sentences.english: The movie was a great success.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片大获成功。

sentences.english: The news came as possibly the greatest shock of my life.
sentences.chinese: 这个消息可能是我一生中最大的打击。

sentences.english: The paintings cost a great deal (= a lot ) of money.
sentences.chinese: 这些画价值不菲。

sentences.english: John always takes great care over his work.
sentences.chinese: 约翰工作时总是非常小心。

sentences.english: It’s a great pity that none of his poems survive.
sentences.chinese: 非常遗憾，他的诗歌没有一首保存下来。

sentences.english: The temptation was too great to resist.
sentences.chinese: 诱惑太大，难以抵挡。

sentences.english: one of the greatest scientific achievements of our time
sentences.chinese: 我们这个时代最伟大的科学成就之一

detailed_translations.english: very large in amount or degree

sentences.english: We put some ointment and a bandage on his knee.
sentences.chinese: 我们在他的膝盖上涂了些药膏，还缠了一条绷带。

sentences.english: The nurse bandaged up his sprained ankle.
sentences.chinese: 护士用绷带包扎他扭伤的脚踝。

detailed_translations.english: a narrow piece of cloth that you tie around a wound or around a part of the body that has been injured
to tie or cover a part of the body with a bandage

sentences.english: oral history
sentences.chinese: 口述的历史

sentences.english: an oral agreement
sentences.chinese: 口头协议

detailed_translations.english: spoken, not written

sentences.english: The bus stopped suddenly and we were all thrown forwards.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车猛地停住，我们都往前栽。

detailed_translations.english: to make an object such as a ball move quickly through the air by pushing your hand forward quickly and letting the object go

sentences.english: The company is closing down two of its factories, leading to 430 job losses .
sentences.chinese: 公司要关闭其中的两家工厂，这将造成430人失业。

sentences.english: Weight loss should be gradual.
sentences.chinese: 减肥应该循序渐进。

sentences.english: a type of hearing loss that affects language development
sentences.chinese: 一种会影响语言能力发展的听力丧失

sentences.english: Brazil's 2–1 loss to Argentina
sentences.chinese: 巴西对阿根廷1:2的落败

detailed_translations.english: the fact of no longer having something, or of having less of it than you used to have, or the process by which this happens

sentences.english: There seem to be so many rules and regulations these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今好像条条框框很多。

sentences.english: regulations governing the safety of toys
sentences.chinese: 监控玩具安全的条例

sentences.english: All companies must comply with the regulations .
sentences.chinese: 所有公司都必须遵守规定。

detailed_translations.english: an official rule or order

sentences.english: Put the spaghetti into plenty of boiling salted water.
sentences.chinese: 把意大利面放入大量煮沸的盐水中。

sentences.english: We were advised to boil the water before drinking it.
sentences.chinese: 有人建议我们把这水烧开后再喝。

detailed_translations.english: when a liquid boils, or when you boil it, it becomes hot enough to turn into gas
the act or state of boiling

sentences.chinese: 亚历山大大帝打败了希腊和印度之间的每个敌手。

sentences.english: Spain and Greece have not.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙和希腊还没有。

sentences.english: But there are no special arrangements for Greece or for any other country.
sentences.chinese: 但是对于希腊和任何别的国家，我们都不会特别对待。

name: chart
trans: 绘制…的图表；在海图上标出；详细计划；记录；记述；跟踪（进展或发展

sentences.english: a chart showing last year’s sales
sentences.chinese: 显示去年销售情况的一份图表

sentences.english: a weather chart
sentences.chinese: 天气图

sentences.english: the theatre’s seating chart
sentences.chinese: 剧场的座位图

detailed_translations.english: information that is clearly arranged in the form of a simple picture, set of figures,  graph  etc, or a piece of paper with this information on it

detailed_translations.chinese: 用图表表示， 在图上表示
detailed_translations.english: if a record charts, it enters the weekly list of the most popular records

name: shape
trans: 形成；塑造，使成形；使符合

sentences.english: What shape is the table?
sentences.chinese: 那张桌子是什么形状的？

sentences.english: You can recognize a tree by the shape of its leaves.
sentences.chinese: 可以根据树叶的形状辨认出是什么树。

sentences.english: His battered old hat had completely lost its shape.
sentences.chinese: 他那顶破旧的帽子已经完全变形了。

sentences.english: The plants grow in every shape and size .
sentences.chinese: 这些植物有各种形状，各种大小。

sentences.english: The children cut out shapes (= squares, triangles etc ) from the piece of cardboard.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们把卡纸片剪成各种形状。

detailed_translations.english: the form that something has, for example round, square,  triangular  etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 形成；塑造，使成形；使符合
detailed_translations.english: to influence something such as a belief, opinion etc and make it develop in a particular way

sentences.english: a bottle of milk
sentences.chinese: 一瓶奶

sentences.english: Would you like some milk in your tea?
sentences.chinese: 你茶里要加点奶吗？

sentences.english: a pint of semi-skimmed milk
sentences.chinese: 一品脱半脱脂奶

sentences.english: I helped to milk the cows.
sentences.chinese: 我帮忙挤牛奶。

detailed_translations.english: a white liquid produced by cows or goats that is drunk by people
to take milk from a cow or goat

sentences.english: He was surrounded by a group of admirers.
sentences.chinese: 他的身边围了一群仰慕者。

sentences.english: The photo shows four men grouped round a jeep.
sentences.chinese: 照片上是四个男人围着一辆吉普车。

detailed_translations.english: several people or things that are all together in the same place
to come together and form a group, or to arrange things or people together in a group

sentences.english: The rules are intended to prevent accidents.
sentences.chinese: 这些规定旨在预防事故。

sentences.english: We were prevented from entering the site.
sentences.chinese: 我们被阻止进入现场。

sentences.english: Wrap small ornaments in paper to prevent them being damaged.
sentences.chinese: 把小饰品用纸包上以免损坏。

detailed_translations.english: to stop something from happening, or stop someone from doing something

sentences.english: Through science we've got the idea of associating progress with the future.
sentences.chinese: 通过科学我们已有了将进步与未来联系起来的观念。

detailed_translations.english: to make a connection in your mind between one thing or person and another
someone who is a member etc of something, but who is at a lower level and has fewer rights
someone who you work or do business with

name: plug
trans: 塞住；用插头将与电源接通

sentences.english: the bath plug
sentences.chinese: 浴缸塞子

sentences.english: an electric plug
sentences.chinese: 电源插头

sentences.english: We used mud to plug up the holes in the roof.
sentences.chinese: 我们用泥堵住了房顶上的漏洞

detailed_translations.english: a round flat piece of rubber used for stopping the water flowing out of a bath or  sink
to fill or block a small hole

sentences.english: She hired a detective to find out if her husband was having an affair.
sentences.chinese: 她雇了一个私人侦探调查她丈夫是否有外遇。

detailed_translations.english: a police officer whose job is to discover information about crimes and catch criminals

sentences.english: I don’t drink alcohol anymore.
sentences.chinese: 我不再喝酒了。

sentences.english: alcohol abuse

sentences.english: people with alcohol problems
sentences.chinese: 有酗酒问题的人

detailed_translations.english: drinks such as beer or wine that contain a substance which can make you drunk

name: offshore
trans: 离岸的；[海洋] 近海的；吹向海面的

sentences.chinese: 近海油田

sentences.english: an offshore island
sentences.chinese: 近海岛屿

detailed_translations.chinese: 离岸的；[海洋] 近海的；吹向海面的
detailed_translations.english: in or under the sea and not far from the coast

sentences.english: He was smoking a big cigar.
sentences.chinese: 他在抽一只大雪茄。

detailed_translations.english: a thick tube-shaped thing that people smoke, and which is made from tobacco leaves that have been rolled up

name: jacket
trans: 羽绒滑雪衫；西装短外套；短上衣，夹克；土豆皮；书籍的护封；文件套，公文夹
给…穿夹克；给…装护套；给…包上护封；〈口〉打

sentences.chinese: 他拉开夹克衫的拉链。

sentences.english: The bitter wind cut through his jacket.
sentences.chinese: 刺骨的冷风吹透了他的夹克衫。

sentences.english: When I grew out of my jacket,I gave it to my little brother.
sentences.chinese: 我长得穿不下我的夹克衫了，便把它给我弟弟穿。

detailed_translations.english: a short light coat

sentences.chinese: 我们把门漆成鲜红色。

sentences.english: a red balloon
sentences.chinese: 一个红气球

sentences.english: I like the way the artist uses red in this painting.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢画家在这幅作品中对红色的运用。

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of blood
the colour of blood

sentences.chinese: 基督教

sentences.english: the Christian church

sentences.english: a Christian minister
sentences.chinese: 基督教牧师

detailed_translations.english: related to Christianity

trans: 理论的；理论上的；假设的；推理的

sentences.chinese: 这些发现具有理论和实际的应用。

sentences.chinese: 在这个过程中，要加强理论的探讨和工作推进的互动作用。

sentences.chinese: 研究者在过去辗转不安的进行理论计算，仅仅只用铝和水作为火箭燃料。

sentences.chinese: 还可以获得有关女性保健方面的资料。

sentences.chinese: 这本小册子提供了关于那所学院的所有必需信息。

sentences.chinese: 工厂倒闭是来自国外的竞争加剧的必然结果。

sentences.chinese: 纯金手表

sentences.english: gold watch/chain/ring etc
sentences.chinese: 金表/链/戒指 等

detailed_translations.english: a valuable soft yellow metal that is used to make coins, jewellery etc. It is a chemical element: symbol Au
made of gold

sentences.chinese: 我们向受害者家庭表示慰问。

sentences.chinese: 他用竹竿支撑起西红柿秧。

sentences.chinese: 第二，放一些西红柿在面包上粘贴。

sentences.english: The salmon was brought to the table whole, garnished with parsley and slices of tomato and cucumber.
sentences.chinese: 整条大麻哈鱼被端上了桌，并用欧芹、西红柿片和黄瓜片作为花色配菜。

sentences.chinese: 有些人认为宇宙是通过一次大爆炸创造出来的。

sentences.chinese: 她的行为引起了很多问题。

sentences.english: The new factory is expected to create more than 400 new jobs.
sentences.chinese: 这家新工厂预计能创造400多个新的就业机会。

sentences.english: The announcement only succeeded in creating confusion.
sentences.chinese: 那通告反而引起了混乱。

detailed_translations.english: to make something exist that did not exist before

name: anyhow
trans: 总之；无论如何；不管怎样

sentences.english: "Anyhow," she added briskly, "it's none of my business."
sentences.chinese: “不管怎样”，她轻松地补充说，“这不关我的事。”

detailed_translations.english: anyway

sentences.chinese: 已宣布进入紧急状态。

sentences.english: Mr Steel has been declared bankrupt
sentences.chinese: 斯蒂尔先生被宣布破产了。

sentences.english: We celebrate September 16, the day when Mexico declared independence from Spain (= officially stated that it was no longer ruled by Spain ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们在9月16日举行庆祝活动，这一天是墨西哥摆脱西班牙统治宣布独立的日子。

detailed_translations.english: to state officially and publicly that a particular situation exists or that something is true

name: recommend
trans: 推荐，介绍；劝告；使受欢迎；托付

sentences.english: I recommend the butter chicken - it’s delicious.
sentences.chinese: 我推荐黄油焗鸡，非常好吃。

sentences.english: Can you recommend a good lawyer?
sentences.chinese: 你能介绍一位好律师吗？

detailed_translations.english: to say that something or someone is good, or suggest them for a particular purpose or job

sentences.english: He was nursed in London.
sentences.chinese: 他是在伦敦长大的。

sentences.english: I trained to London.
sentences.chinese: 我乘火车到伦敦。

sentences.english: He hopped to and fro between London and Paris for the business.
sentences.chinese: 为了这笔生意他曾不停地往返于伦敦和巴黎。

name: addicted
trans: 沉溺于某种（尤其是不良的）嗜好的；入了迷的，上了瘾的

sentences.english: Many of the women are addicted to heroin and cocaine.
sentences.chinese: 这些妇女中的很多吸食海洛因和可卡因成瘾。

detailed_translations.chinese: 沉溺于某种（尤其是不良的）嗜好的；入了迷的，上了瘾的
detailed_translations.english: unable to stop taking a harmful substance, especially a drug

sentences.english: She tried to focus her mind on her work.
sentences.chinese: 她试图集中精神干活。

sentences.english: He focused his blue eyes on her.
sentences.chinese: 他那蓝色的眼睛注视着她。

sentences.english: Eggs became the focus for the food poisoning scare.
sentences.chinese: 鸡蛋成了食物中毒恐慌的焦点。

detailed_translations.english: to give attention, effort, etc. to one particular subject, situation or person rather than another
the thing, person, situation etc that people pay special attention to

sentences.english: I’m sorry, I’ve forgotten your name.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我忘记你的名字了。

sentences.english: I know you told me, but I forgot.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你告诉过我，但是我忘了。

sentences.english: What happened that day will never be forgotten.
sentences.chinese: 那一天的事永远难忘。

sentences.english: He’s someone who never forgets a face (= forgets who someone is ).
sentences.chinese: 他是那种见人一面就不会忘记的人。

detailed_translations.english: to not remember facts, information, or people or things from the past

name: sailing
trans: 航行，起航（sail的现在分词形式）

sentences.english: Bud has invited us to go sailing this weekend.
sentences.chinese: 巴德邀请我们这个周末驾船出游。

detailed_translations.english: the sport or activity of travelling in or directing a small boat with sails

detailed_translations.chinese: 航行，起航（sail的现在分词形式）

name: serious
trans: 严肃的，严重的；认真的；庄重的；危急的

sentences.english: the serious problem of unemployment
sentences.chinese: 严重的失业问题

sentences.english: Luckily, the damage was not serious.
sentences.chinese: 还好，损坏不算严重。

sentences.english: Serious crimes have increased dramatically.
sentences.chinese: 重大犯罪案件大幅度增加了。

sentences.english: Oil spills pose a serious threat to marine life.
sentences.chinese: 原油泄漏对海洋生物构成了严重威胁。

sentences.english: The president was in serious trouble .
sentences.chinese: 总统遇到大麻烦了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 严肃的，严重的；认真的；庄重的；危急的
detailed_translations.english: a serious situation, problem, accident etc is extremely bad or dangerous

sentences.english: She lives with her mom and dad.
sentences.chinese: 她和爸爸妈妈一起住。

sentences.english: Dad, will you help me?
sentences.chinese: 爸爸，帮我一下好吗？

detailed_translations.english: father

sentences.english: Do not scold the puppy, but simply and firmly say ‘no’.
sentences.chinese: 不要责骂小狗，但要干脆利落地说“不”。

detailed_translations.english: to angrily criticize someone, especially a child, about something they have done

sentences.english: What will you do this vacation?
sentences.chinese: 你这个假期将干什么？

sentences.english: Do you have any vacation plans?
sentences.chinese: 您假期有什么安排吗？

sentences.english: Do you have any idea for this vacation?
sentences.chinese: 这个假期你有什么想法吗？

detailed_translations.english: to go somewhere for a holiday
a holiday, or time spent not working

name: immediate
trans: 立即的；直接的；最接近的

sentences.english: Our immediate response to the attack was sheer horror.
sentences.chinese: 我们对攻击的第一反应就是非常惊恐。

sentences.english: They promise immediate action to help the unemployed.
sentences.chinese: 他们承诺立即采取行动帮助失业者。

sentences.english: If the eyes are affected, seek immediate medical attention.
sentences.chinese: 如果眼睛感染了要立即就医。

sentences.english: The funeral was attended by her immediate family (= her parents, children, brothers and sisters) only.
sentences.chinese: 只有她的直系亲属参加了葬礼。

detailed_translations.english: happening or done at once and without delay

sentences.english: The timetable was hopelessly optimistic.
sentences.chinese: 这个时间表过于乐观。

detailed_translations.english: a list of the times at which buses, trains, planes etc arrive and leave

sentences.english: The fashion world just keeps recycling old ideas.
sentences.chinese: 时装界就是不停地翻新旧观念。

detailed_translations.english: to use something such as an idea, writing etc again instead of developing something new

sentences.english: The tree was about to fall.
sentences.chinese: 那棵树快要倒下了。

sentences.english: The book fell from his hands.
sentences.chinese: 书从他手上跌落。

sentences.english: Enough rain had fallen to flood the grounds.
sentences.chinese: 雨量很大，淹没了地面。

sentences.english: She flushed and her eyes fell (= she looked down ) .
sentences.chinese: 她脸一红，垂下了眼帘。

detailed_translations.english: to move or drop down from a higher position to a lower position

sentences.english: Many sacrificed their weekend to join the hunt for the missing girl.
sentences.chinese: 许多人牺牲周末时间，加入了寻找失踪女孩的行动。

sentences.chinese: 他在后来的十五年里绘制了安格尔西岛的地图。

sentences.chinese: 她爬上梯子。

sentences.chinese: 他很难击败。我确信这一点，不过我准备好了。

感觉；认为（feel的现在分词）；触摸

sentences.chinese: 当太阳在在东京落下时，在一座横跨意大利面条似的铁路线的桥上，另一事件正要到达它的巅峰。

sentences.chinese: 站在下一个房间里，在这一大堆看起来就像水泥做的意大利细面条中间，我真有点受不了了。

sentences.chinese: 点评： 瑞士面条大丰收是第一个上电视的恶作剧，尽管该主意在今天看来仍然有点不足为道，但当时恶作剧中的主角“面条”成为了英国饭桌上的精美食物。

sentences.chinese: 这一丑闻在全国媒体上被广泛报道。

sentences.chinese: 新闻媒体对于社会舆论的形成具有非常重要的作用。

sentences.english: The temperature of the water was just right for swimming.
sentences.chinese: 这水温游泳正好。

sentences.english: Water boils at a temperature of 100˚C.
sentences.chinese: 水在100摄氏度沸腾。

sentences.english: The nurse took (= measured ) my temperature .
sentences.chinese: 护士给我量了体温。

detailed_translations.english: a measure of how hot or cold a place or thing is

sentences.english: Both Helen’s parents are doctors.
sentences.chinese: 海伦的父母都是医生。

detailed_translations.english: used to talk about two people, things etc together, and emphasize that each is included

name: fresh
trans: 新鲜的；清新的；淡水的；无经验的

sentences.english: I’ll just make some fresh coffee.
sentences.chinese: 我来重新煮点咖啡。

sentences.english: The report provides fresh evidence about the way the business was run.
sentences.chinese: 报告提供了有关该公司运营方式的新证据。

sentences.english: You’ll have to start again on a fresh sheet of paper.
sentences.chinese: 你得拿张新的纸重新开始。

sentences.english: The beans are fresh from the garden.
sentences.chinese: 这些豆子是刚从园子里摘来的。

detailed_translations.english: adding to or replacing something

sentences.english: the United Kingdom
sentences.chinese: 联合王国

sentences.english: the animal/plant/mineral kingdom
sentences.chinese: 动物界/植物界/矿物界〔大自然三界〕

detailed_translations.english: a country ruled by a king or queen

sentences.english: Let’s go boating on the lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们到湖上划船去吧。

detailed_translations.english: the activity of travelling in a small boat for pleasure

sentences.english: children with aggressive or anti-social tendencies
sentences.chinese: 具有攻击性倾向或反社会倾向的儿童

detailed_translations.chinese: 趋向， 趋势， 倾向
detailed_translations.english: if someone or something has a tendency to do or become a particular thing, they are likely to do or become it

name: concert
trans: 音乐会用的；在音乐会上演出的

sentences.english: a rock concert
sentences.chinese: 摇滚音乐会

sentences.english: a concert of French choral music
sentences.chinese: 法国合唱音乐会

sentences.english: We were going to a concert in Bath Abbey.
sentences.chinese: 我们要去听一场在巴斯修道院内举行的音乐会。

sentences.english: She still does about 100 concerts every year.
sentences.chinese: 她每年仍然举行100场左右的演唱会。

detailed_translations.english: a performance given by musicians or singers

detailed_translations.chinese: 音乐会用的；在音乐会上演出的

sentences.english: Some of the most efficient refrigerators consume 70 percent less electricity than traditional models.
sentences.chinese: 一些能效最高的冰箱比传统型号少消耗70%的电。

detailed_translations.english: To consume an amount of fuel, energy, or time means to use it up
to use time, energy, goods etc

sentences.english: six months ago
sentences.chinese: 六个月前

sentences.english: She arrived just after six (= six o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 她六点刚过就到了。

sentences.english: He learnt to play the violin when he was six (= six years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 他六岁学拉小提琴。

detailed_translations.english: the number 6
the number 6

name: refresh
trans: 更新；使……恢复；使……清新；消除……的疲劳

sentences.english: A shower will refresh you.
sentences.chinese: 洗个淋浴你就凉快了。

sentences.english: He refreshed himself with a glass of iced tea.
sentences.chinese: 他喝了杯冰茶提了提神。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel less tired or less hot

name: broad
trans: 宽的，辽阔的；显著的；大概的

sentences.english: We went along a broad passage.
sentences.chinese: 我们走在一条宽阔的走廊上。

sentences.english: He was six feet tall, with broad shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 他身高六英尺，肩膀宽阔。

detailed_translations.english: a road, river, or part of someone’s body etc that is broad is wide

sentences.english: Let’s go back to camp – it’s getting dark.
sentences.chinese: 我们回营地吧，天快黑了。

sentences.english: a camp near Lake Ellen Wilson
sentences.chinese: 埃伦•威尔逊湖边的营地

sentences.english: The soldiers broke camp (= took down their tents etc ) and left before dawn.
sentences.chinese: 士兵们在黎明前拔营出发了。

sentences.english: We set up camp (= made the camping place ready ) at nearby Icicle Lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们在附近的冰柱湖边建了营地。

sentences.english: The expedition’s base camp (= main camp ) was 6,000 feet below the summit.
sentences.chinese: 探险队的大本营在山峰下面6,000英尺处。

detailed_translations.english: a place where people stay in tents, shelters etc for a short time, usually in the mountains, a forest etc
to set up a tent or shelter and stay there for a short time

name: gale
trans: [气象] 大风，狂风；（突发的）一阵

sentences.english: a severe gale
sentences.chinese: 一阵狂风

detailed_translations.chinese: [气象] 大风，狂风；（突发的）一阵
detailed_translations.english: a very strong wind

name: borrow
trans: 借；借用；从其他语言中引入

sentences.english: Can I borrow your pen for a minute?
sentences.chinese: 我可以借你的笔用一下吗？

sentences.english: They borrowed heavily (=  borrowed a lot of money  ) from the bank to start their new business.
sentences.chinese: 他们向银行贷了巨款来创办新公司。

detailed_translations.english: to use something that belongs to someone else and that you must give back to them later

sentences.english: Angry demonstrators demanded the resignation of two senior officials.
sentences.chinese: 愤怒的示威者要求两名高级官员辞职。

sentences.english: ‘Where are you going?’ she demanded angrily.
sentences.chinese: “你要去哪里？” 她气愤地质问道。

detailed_translations.english: to ask for something very firmly, especially because you think you have a right to do this
the need or desire that people have for particular goods and services

sentences.english: I knocked and knocked but nobody answered.
sentences.chinese: 我把门敲了又敲，但无人回应。

sentences.english: He got a nasty knock on the head.
sentences.chinese: 他头部遭到重重一击。

detailed_translations.english: to hit a door or window with your closed hand to attract the attention of the people inside
a sharp blow from sth hard

name: sour
trans: 酸的；发酵的；刺耳的；酸臭的；讨厌的

sentences.english: Rachel sampled the wine. It was sour.
sentences.chinese: 雷切尔尝了尝葡萄酒，是酸的。

sentences.english: sour cherries
sentences.chinese: 酸樱桃

detailed_translations.chinese: 酸的；发酵的；刺耳的；酸臭的；讨厌的
detailed_translations.english: having a sharp acid taste, like the taste of a  lemon  or a fruit that is not ready to be eaten
if milk sours, or if something sours it, it begins to have an unpleasant sharp taste

sentences.english: Grandpa was not yet back from the war.
sentences.chinese: 爷爷那时还没从战场归来。

detailed_translations.english: grandfather

name: zip
trans: 拉链；活力，精力；尖啸声，撕裂声；一种程序压缩的档案文件格式
拉开或拉上；以尖啸声行进

sentences.english: The zip on my skirt had broken.
sentences.chinese: 我裙子上的拉链坏了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拉链；活力，精力；尖啸声，撕裂声；一种程序压缩的档案文件格式
detailed_translations.english: two lines of small metal or plastic pieces that slide together to fasten a piece of clothing

detailed_translations.chinese: 拉开或拉上；以尖啸声行进
detailed_translations.english: to fasten something using a zip

sentences.english: There were several pairs of riding boots ranked neatly in the hall.
sentences.chinese: 门厅里整齐地摆放着几双马靴。

detailed_translations.english: to arrange objects in a line or row

detailed_translations.chinese: 军衔，职衔；地位，社会阶层；排，行列
detailed_translations.english: the position or level that someone holds in an organization, especially in the police or the army, navy etc
to have a particular position in a list of people or things that have been put in order of quality or importance

sentences.english: Pigs were butchered, hams were hung to dry from the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 猪被宰杀了，火腿吊在屋顶下风干。

detailed_translations.english: to kill animals and prepare them to be used as meat
A butcher is a shopkeeper who cuts up and sells meat. Some butchers also kill animals for meat and make foods such as sausages and meat pies.

name: ready
trans: 准备好；现成的；迅速的；情愿的；快要…的

sentences.english: Come on. Aren’t you ready yet?
sentences.chinese: 快点，你还没准备好吗？

sentences.english: When the doorbell rang he was ready and waiting .
sentences.chinese: 门铃响的时候，他已经准备好在等着了。

sentences.english: Why does it take you so long to get ready to go out?
sentences.chinese: 你外出怎么要准备那么长时间？

sentences.english: He's always ready to help his friends.
sentences.chinese: 他总是乐意帮助朋友。

detailed_translations.english: fully prepared for what you are going to do

sentences.english: He kept pigs and poultry.
sentences.chinese: 他养过猪和家禽。

detailed_translations.english: a farm animal with short legs, a fat body and a curved tail. Pigs are kept for their meat, which includes  pork  ,  bacon  and  ham  .

name: trap
trans: 诱捕；使…受限制；使…陷入困境
陷阱；圈套；[建] 存水湾

sentences.english: Mr Smith has walked straight into a trap laid by the Tories.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯先生直接落入了保守党布设的圈套。

sentences.english: He felt he had been trapped into accepting the terms of the contract.
sentences.chinese: 他觉得自己是中了圈套才接受这合同条款的。

sentences.english: Were you just trying to trap her into making some admission?
sentences.chinese: 你仅仅是在试图诱骗她招供吗？

detailed_translations.english: a clever trick that is used to catch someone or to make them do or say something that they did not intend to
to trick sb into sth

sentences.english: A lot of cancers can now be treated successfully.
sentences.chinese: 现在许多癌症可以治愈。

sentences.english: She was told last year that she had cancer .
sentences.chinese: 去年她得知自己患了癌症。

sentences.english: He died of cancer last month.
sentences.chinese: 上个月他死于癌症。

sentences.english: a new treatment which effectively kills cancer cells
sentences.chinese: 一种能有效杀死癌细胞的新疗法

detailed_translations.english: a very serious disease in which cells in one part of the body start to grow in a way that is not normal

name: vice
trans: 恶习；缺点；[机] 老虎钳；卖淫

sentences.english: Smoking is my only vice.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟是我唯一的恶习。

detailed_translations.english: a bad habit

sentences.english: The scandal did his career a lot of harm.
sentences.chinese: 丑闻对他的职业生涯造成很大损害。

sentences.english: Our children deserve protection from harm.
sentences.chinese: 我们的儿童理应得到保护免受伤害。

sentences.english: chemicals that harm the environment
sentences.chinese: 损害环境的化学品

detailed_translations.english: damage, injury, or trouble caused by someone’s actions or by an event
to have a bad effect on something

sentences.english: This species of plant is becoming increasingly rare.
sentences.chinese: 这种植物越来越罕见。

sentences.english: I only saw Helen on the rare occasions when I went into her shop.
sentences.chinese: 我只有偶尔去海伦店里时才会见到她。

sentences.english: It is very rare for her to miss a day at school.
sentences.chinese: 她很少有哪一天不上学的。

detailed_translations.english: not seen or found very often, or not happening very often

sentences.english: The brewery will remain open to the public throughout its ten-year transformation, so the architects wanted to test how a construction site can be used for public activities.
sentences.chinese: 啤酒厂在它转型的十年内都将持续对公众开放，所以建筑师希望测试一个施工基地怎样才能用于公共活动。

sentences.english: The Muller family have been making specialist beers at their brewery in Munster for 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 马勒家族已经在他们位于明斯特的啤酒厂专门从事啤酒酿制达200年之久。

detailed_translations.english: a place where beer is made, or a company that makes beer

sentences.english: You can’t go anywhere until you’ve finished your homework.
sentences.chinese: 没完成家庭作业前你哪儿也不能去。

sentences.english: Have you finished that book yet?
sentences.chinese: 那本书你看完了吗？

sentences.english: ‘How’s the decorating going?’ ‘We’ve nearly finished.’
sentences.chinese: “装修进行得怎么样了？”“差不多快完成了。”

sentences.english: The football season finishes in May.
sentences.chinese: 足球赛季在 5 月份结束。

sentences.english: a dramatic finish to the race
sentences.chinese: 赛跑的戏剧性结局

detailed_translations.english: to complete the last part of something that you are doing
the end or last part of something

sentences.english: A cock crowed in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 远处有只公鸡在打鸣。

detailed_translations.english: an adult male chicken

sentences.english: The house had a fairly large garden.
sentences.chinese: 那幢房子有个不小的花园。

sentences.english: She speaks English fairly well.
sentences.chinese: 她英语讲得还不错。

sentences.english: I felt I hadn’t been treated fairly.
sentences.chinese: 我感到自己没有受到公正对待。

detailed_translations.english: more than a little, but much less than very

name: grandparents
trans: 祖父母（grandparent的复数）；外祖父母

sentences.english: Tammy was raised by her grandparents.
sentences.chinese: 塔米是由她的祖父母抚养大的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 祖父母（grandparent的复数）；外祖父母
detailed_translations.english: Your grandparents are the parents of your father or mother

sentences.english: an instant success
sentences.chinese: 马到成功

sentences.english: a system that provides instant access to client information
sentences.chinese: 能立即查到客户信息的系统

sentences.english: The women took an instant dislike to one another.
sentences.chinese: 这些女人立刻就彼此厌恶起来。

sentences.english: The programme brought an instant response.
sentences.chinese: 节目立即引起了反响。

sentences.english: For an instant, Barney was tempted to flee.
sentences.chinese: 那一瞬间，巴尼很想逃走。

detailed_translations.chinese: 立即的； 紧急的； 可以速食的
detailed_translations.english: happening or produced immediately
An instant is an extremely short period of time

sentences.english: The moment we saw the house, we knew we wanted to buy it.
sentences.chinese: 我们一看到这房子就知道我们要买。

sentences.english: He crouched down so he couldn’t be seen.
sentences.chinese: 他蹲下来好让别人看不见他。

sentences.english: Can I see your ticket, please?
sentences.chinese: 我能看看你的票吗？

sentences.english: I saw the offer advertised in the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 我在报纸上看到这个减价的广告。

sentences.english: Have you seen Chris (= do you know where he is ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你见过克里斯吗？

sentences.english: The accommodation was so awful it had to be seen to be believed (= you would not believe it if you did not see it yourself ) .
sentences.chinese: 住宿条件太糟了，不是亲眼所见是不会相信的。

detailed_translations.english: to notice or examine someone or something, using your eyes

name: back
trans: 后面；背部；靠背；足球等的后卫；书报等的末尾
以前；向后地；来回地；上溯；回来；回原处

sentences.english: I’ll be back in a minute.
sentences.chinese: 我马上回来。

sentences.english: Put that book back where you found it!
sentences.chinese: 把那本书放回原处！

sentences.english: He was back home by half past eleven.
sentences.chinese: 他是11点半之前回家的。

sentences.english: It’s possible to travel there and back in a day.
sentences.chinese: 到那里一天来回是可以的。

sentences.english: Kirov stepped back a pace.
sentences.chinese: 基洛夫往后退了一步。

detailed_translations.english: in, into, or to the place or position where someone or something was before

sentences.english: Only cheeses made in this area may be labelled ‘Roquefort.’
sentences.chinese: 只有这个地区出产的干酪才能被称作“罗克福尔干酪”。

sentences.english: Crime rates are much higher in urban areas.
sentences.chinese: 城镇地区的犯罪率要高很多。

sentences.english: an area of 2,000 square miles
sentences.chinese: 2,000平方英里的面积

sentences.english: The course covers three main subject areas.
sentences.chinese: 这门课程涵盖三大学科领域。

detailed_translations.english: a particular part of a country, town etc

sentences.english: The minister stressed the need for economic sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 部长强调了在经济上作出牺牲的必要性。

sentences.english: The workforce were willing to make sacrifices in order to preserve jobs.
sentences.chinese: 雇员为了保住饭碗情愿作出牺牲。

sentences.english: She brought three children up single-handedly, often at great personal sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 她独自一人把三个孩子带大，常常需要作出巨大的个人牺牲。

sentences.english: They made sacrifices to ensure a good harvest.
sentences.chinese: 他们举行献祭以保丰收。

sentences.english: He sacrificed a promising career to look after his kids.
sentences.chinese: 他为了照看孩子牺牲了很有前途的事业。

detailed_translations.english: when you decide not to have something valuable, in order to get something that is more important
to willingly stop having something you want or doing something you like in order to get something more important

sentences.english: The giraffe ranges in Africa.
sentences.chinese: 长颈鹿生长在非洲。

sentences.english: The practice still prevails in some parts of Africa.
sentences.chinese: 这种做法在非洲某些地区仍然很盛行。

sentences.english: He traversed alone the whole continent of Africa from east to west.
sentences.chinese: 他只身长途跋涉， 从东向西横穿整个非洲大陆。

name: collision
trans: 碰撞；冲突；（意见，看法）的抵触；（政党等的）倾轧

sentences.english: Two people were killed in a head-on collision (= between two vehicles that are moving directly towards each other ) on highway 218.
sentences.chinese: 218号公路上有两辆汽车迎面相撞，两人死亡。

sentences.english: a collision between the two countries over fishing rights
sentences.chinese: 两国为捕鱼权而发生的冲突

detailed_translations.english: an accident in which two or more people or vehicles hit each other while moving in different directions

sentences.english: Many are planning to return to their homeland.
sentences.chinese: 很多人正计划回到自己的祖国去。

detailed_translations.english: the country where someone was born

name: technical
trans: 工艺的，科技的；技术上的；专门的

sentences.english: Our staff will be available to give you technical support .
sentences.chinese: 有我们的员工向你提供技术支持。

sentences.english: I have no technical knowledge at all.
sentences.chinese: 我一点技术知识都没有。

sentences.english: technical training
sentences.chinese: 技术培训

detailed_translations.english: connected with knowledge of how machines work

sentences.english: Please write in black ink.
sentences.chinese: 请用黑色墨水书写。

detailed_translations.english: a coloured liquid that you use for writing, printing or drawing

sentences.english: People have lost faith in the government.
sentences.chinese: 人们已失去了对政府的信心。

sentences.english: deep religious faith
sentences.chinese: 坚定的宗教信仰

detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of trust or confidence in someone or something

sentences.english: He’s never been to Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他从未去过澳大利亚。

sentences.english: I’m never going back there again, not as long as I live.
sentences.chinese: 只要我活着，我再也不会回到那儿去。

sentences.english: It is never too late to give up smoking.
sentences.chinese: 戒烟不言晚。

sentences.english: (= never after a particular time ) would he return to Naples.
sentences.chinese: 他再也不会回到那不勒斯。

detailed_translations.english: not at any time, or not once

name: quarrel
trans: 吵架；反目；怨言；争吵的原因；方头凿

sentences.english: I wish you two would stop quarreling.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你们两个别再吵了。

sentences.english: Jacob left after a quarrel with his wife.
sentences.chinese: 雅各布和妻子吵了一架后走了。

detailed_translations.english: to have an argument
an angry argument or disagreement

name: undivided
trans: 专心的；专一的；未分开的；完整的
未分开（undivide的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.english: I’ll give the matter my undivided attention.
sentences.chinese: 我会全力关注此事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 专心的；专一的；未分开的；完整的
detailed_translations.english: complete

detailed_translations.chinese: 未分开（undivide的过去式和过去分词）

name: separation
trans: 分离，分开；间隔，距离；[法] 分居；缺口

sentences.english: the separation of church and state
sentences.chinese: 政教分离

detailed_translations.chinese: 分离，分开；间隔，距离；[法] 分居；缺口
detailed_translations.english: when something separates or is separate

sentences.english: A survey of retired people has indicated that most are independent and enjoying life.
sentences.chinese: 一项对退休人员的调查表明，他们中的大部分人生活自立而愉快。

sentences.english: Our vote today indicates a change in United States policy.
sentences.chinese: 我们今天的投票表明了美国政策的变化。

detailed_translations.english: If one thing indicates another, the first thing shows that the second is true or exists

name: will
trans: 意志；决心；情感；遗嘱；意图；心愿
决心要；遗赠；用意志力使

trans: 快速的，迅速的；紧的，稳固的

moving quickly

detailed_translations.english: a large building where sick or injured people receive medical treatment

sentences.english: an ear of corn

trans: 学生；[解剖] 瞳孔；未成年人

sentences.english: About 20 pupils study music here.
sentences.chinese: 大约20名小学生在这里学习音乐。

sentences.english: a third-grade pupil

sentences.english: I was still in New York, trying to get a visa to visit Russia.
sentences.chinese: 我仍在纽约，正在办理去俄罗斯的签证。

sentences.chinese: 然后你们三个人要都在协议上签名，并把它贴在冰箱上。

sentences.chinese: 它可以是任何玩意儿：从你冰箱后面那些变质的牛奶到沥青和羽毛。

sentences.english: I turned to speak to the person standing behind me.
sentences.chinese: 我转身和站在我后面的那人说话。

trans: 摇摆；摆动；秋千；音律；涨落
摇摆；转向；悬挂；大摇大摆地行走
旋转的；悬挂的；强节奏爵士音乐的

sentences.english: Let your arms swing as you walk.
sentences.chinese: 边走边摆动双臂。

detailed_translations.english: to make regular movements forwards and backwards or from one side to another while hanging from a particular point, or to make something do this
a swinging movement or rhythm

sentences.english: He decided to adopt a different approach and teach the Bible through story-telling.
sentences.chinese: 他决定采用一种不同的方法，通过讲故事来教授《圣经》。

sentences.chinese: 这本书采用的是非传统的艺术评论方法。

detailed_translations.english: a method of doing something or dealing with a problem

sentences.chinese: 如果我计算得没错的话，我们离埃克塞特大约十英里。

sentences.english: Score one point for each correct answer .
sentences.chinese: 答对一题得一分。

sentences.chinese: 你说的完全正确，密苏里河是美国最长的河流。

sentences.chinese: 有些视力问题比较容易矫正。

name: at
trans: 在（表示存在或出现的地点、场所、位置、空间）；以（某种价格、速度等）；向；达；因为；朝；忙于
阿特（老挝货币基本单位att）；[化]砹（极不稳定放射性元素）

sentences.english: They live at 18 Victoria Street.
sentences.chinese: 他们住在维多利亚街18 号。

sentences.english: Does this train stop at Preston?

sentences.english: I was waiting at the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 我在公共汽车站等着。

sentences.english: Liz and her friend sat down at a corner table.
sentences.chinese: 莉兹和她的朋友在靠角落的一张桌子旁坐下。

sentences.chinese: 在教堂那里朝左转。

sentences.english: We’ll meet at Harry’s (=  at Harry’s house  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们将在哈里家碰头。

sentences.english: I spent an unpleasant hour at the dentist’s.
sentences.chinese: 我在牙医诊所度过了难熬的一小时。

detailed_translations.english: used to say exactly where something or someone is, or where something happens

name: pill
trans: 药丸；弹丸，子弹；口服避孕药
把…制成丸剂；使服用药丸；抢劫，掠夺（古语）

sentences.english: He has to take pills to control his blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 他必须服药控制血压。

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["sleeping pills"]}
sentences.chinese: 安眠药

sentences.english: a bottle of vitamin pills
sentences.chinese: 一瓶维生素片

detailed_translations.chinese: 药丸；弹丸，子弹；口服避孕药
detailed_translations.english: a small solid piece of medicine that you swallow whole

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…制成丸剂；使服用药丸；抢劫，掠夺（古语）

sentences.english: This tragic incident underlines the need for immediate action.
sentences.chinese: 这一悲剧事件突显了立即采取行动的必要性。

detailed_translations.english: to draw a line under a word to show that it is important

sentences.chinese: 配亮色衬衫的黑裤子

sentences.english: You can team up with one other class member if you want.
sentences.chinese: 例句：如果你愿意的话，可以找一个同学组成一组。

detailed_translations.english: to put two things or people together, because they will look good or work well together

sentences.english: She won a scholarship to Iowa State University.
sentences.chinese: 她获得了艾奥瓦州立大学的奖学金。

sentences.english: Her latest publication is a fine piece of scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 她最新出版的作品是一部优秀的学术著作。

sentences.english: a committee meeting
sentences.chinese: 委员会会议

detailed_translations.english: a group of people chosen to do a particular job, make decisions etc

sentences.english: a pair of drum sticks
sentences.chinese: 一对鼓槌

sentences.english: a measuring stick
sentences.chinese: 量尺

sentences.english: Aunt Lou walks with a stick (= uses a stick to help her walk ) .

if a pointed object sticks into something, or if you stick it there, it is pushed into it

sentences.chinese: 男孩子们过去常玩牛仔和印第安人的游戏。

name: unconditional
trans: 无条件的；绝对的；无限制的

sentences.english: unconditional surrender
sentences.chinese: 无条件投降

detailed_translations.chinese: 无条件的；绝对的；无限制的
detailed_translations.english: not limited by or depending on any conditions

sentences.chinese: 你若要买烘干机，找一台带感应器的，可以在衣服干的时候自动断电。

trans: 结束；目标；尽头；末端；死亡

sentences.chinese: 他的眼镜架在鼻尖上。

sentences.chinese: 我可以用一下你的电话吗？

sentences.chinese: 有听力障碍的儿童

sentences.chinese: 安装了大铁门的私家车道

sentences.chinese: 对食物中铁的吸收

sentences.chinese: …一个头脑冷静、意志坚强的男人。

to make clothes smooth using an iron
You can use iron to describe the character or behaviour of someone who is very firm in their decisions and actions, or who can control their feelings well

sentences.english: The school has a system of rewards and punishments to encourage good behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 学校有奖惩制度以鼓励良好行为。

sentences.chinese: 俱乐部的董事们奖给他一张免费季票。

to give something to someone because they have done something good or helpful or have worked fo

sentences.chinese: 他按了一下红色报警信号钮，检查一下它是开著的还是关著的。

detailed_translations.english: important
a sound or action that you make in order to give information to someone or tell them to do something
to make a sound or action in order to give information or tell someone to do something

sentences.english: One likes to do it oneself.
sentences.chinese: 人都喜欢亲自去做。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize one

trans: 论证；论据；争吵；内容提要

sentences.chinese: 她和丈夫大吵了一架。

sentences.english: We need to provide a convincing argument as to why the system should be changed.
sentences.chinese: 我们得提出有说服力的论据，证明为何要改变体制。

name: character
trans: 性格，品质；特性；角色；[计] 字符

sentences.chinese: 他的性格乐观文静。

sentences.chinese: 迪士尼的卡通人物尽人皆知。

sentences.english: The whole character of the school has changed.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校的特色已经完全变了。

sentences.chinese: 我们向北航行。

sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚戴着一顶漂亮的新帽子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that you wear on your head
