sentences.chinese: 为想提高英语水平的学生开设的一门课

sentences.english: The doctors say she is improving (= after being ill ).
sentences.chinese: 医生说她正在康复。

sentences.english: You could use the money for improving your home.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用这笔钱改善家居。

sentences.english: Many wines improve with age (= get better as they get older ).
sentences.chinese: 很多葡萄酒年代越久越香醇。

detailed_translations.english: to make something better, or to become better
to make something better, or to become better

name: fail
trans: 失败，不及格；破产；缺乏；衰退

sentences.english: It looks likely that the peace talks will fail.
sentences.chinese: 看来和平谈判可能会失败。

sentences.english: Millions of people have tried to quit smoking and failed miserably (= been completely unsuccessful ).
sentences.chinese: 数百万人戒过烟，都以惨败告终。

sentences.english: his efforts to save his failing marriage
sentences.chinese: 他挽救自己濒危婚姻的努力

sentences.english: The brakes on my bike failed half way down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 我骑自行车下山到中途刹车失灵了。

detailed_translations.english: to not succeed in achieving something

sentences.english: a Shakespearean scholar
sentences.chinese: 研究莎士比亚的学者

detailed_translations.english: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, especially one that is not a science subject

sentences.english: Campbell’s broken leg will probably require surgery.
sentences.chinese: 坎贝尔的一条腿骨折，可能需要手术。

sentences.english: What’s required is a complete reorganization of the system.
sentences.chinese: 需要做的是彻底整顿整个系统。

sentences.english: Most house plants require regular watering.
sentences.chinese: 大多数室内盆栽植物需要定期浇水。

sentences.english: The bill failed to get the required number of votes.
sentences.chinese: 法案没有得到规定的票数。

detailed_translations.english: to need something

name: mention
trans: 提到，谈到；提及，论及；说起

sentences.english: Was my name mentioned at all?
sentences.chinese: 我的名字被提到过吗？

sentences.english: Some of the problems were mentioned in his report.
sentences.chinese: 其中的一些问题在他的报告里提到了。

sentences.english: (= it is important enough to mention ) that they only studied a very small number of cases.
sentences.chinese: 必须说明的是他们仅研究了几个个案。

sentences.english: As I mentioned earlier , there have been a lot of changes recently.
sentences.chinese: 正如我刚才所说的，最近变化很大。

sentences.english: She mentioned in passing (= mentioned in a quick unimportant way ) that you had just been to Rome.
sentences.chinese: 她只是随口提了一下你刚刚去过罗马。

sentences.english: They all get a mention (= they are all mentioned ) in the book.
sentences.chinese: 他们在书中全都被提到了。

detailed_translations.english: to talk or write about something or someone, usually quickly and without saying very much or giving details
when someone mentions something or someone in a conversation, piece of writing etc

sentences.english: It’s only eight days till Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 还有8天就到圣诞节了。

sentences.english: They woke at eight (= eight o’clock ).
sentences.chinese: 他们是8点钟醒的。

sentences.english: My parents died when I was eight (= eight years old ).
sentences.chinese: 我8岁时父母就去世了。

detailed_translations.english: the number 8

sentences.english: My attention wasn’t really on the game.
sentences.chinese: 我的注意力其实不在比赛上。

sentences.english: She tried to pay attention to what he was saying.
sentences.chinese: 她尽量注意听他说话。

sentences.english: If you paid more attention in class, you might actually learn something!
sentences.chinese: 要是你上课更认真些，也许能实实在在地学到些东西！

sentences.english: Scott sat down at his desk and turned his attention to the file he had in front of him.
sentences.chinese: 斯科特在自己的办公桌前坐下，将注意力转向面前的文件。

sentences.english: As a society we need to give more attention to the needs of older people.
sentences.chinese: 生活在同一社会里，我们得更加关注长者的需求。

sentences.english: Now he’s gone, I can give you my undivided attention .
sentences.chinese: 现在他已经走了，我可以把全部注意力都放在你身上。

sentences.english: This game is fun and is sure to keep the attention of any young student.
sentences.chinese: 这个游戏很有趣，一定能使年幼学生保持注意力。

sentences.english: They listened to the speech with close attention .
sentences.chinese: 他们很认真地听演讲。

sentences.english: Attention to detail is essential in this job.
sentences.chinese: 关注细节是这份工作所必需的。

sentences.english: During the lecture Sarah’s attention began to wander .
sentences.chinese: 上课时，萨拉开始走神了。

detailed_translations.english: when you carefully listen to, look at, or think about someone or something

sentences.english: Offered the position of chairman, Smith declined, preferring to keep his current job.
sentences.chinese: 对担任主席的邀约，史密斯拒绝了，他宁愿留在现在的职位上。

sentences.english: Mary declined a hot drink and went to her room.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽谢绝了热饮料，到自己的房间去了。

sentences.english: The minister declined to comment (= refused to speak to people who report the news ) about the progress of the peace talks.
sentences.chinese: 部长拒绝就和谈进程发表评论。

detailed_translations.english: to say no politely when someone invites you somewhere, offers you something, or wants you to do something

sentences.english: The police played an elaborate game of cat and mouse to trap him.
sentences.chinese: 警方跟他玩了一场精心布局的猫捉老鼠游戏，诱他落网。

detailed_translations.english: a small animal with four legs that people often keep as a pet

name: last
trans: 末尾，最后；上个；鞋楦（做鞋的模型）
最后的；最近的，最新的；仅剩的；最不可能…的
最后地；上次，最近；最后一点

sentences.english: I didn’t read the last chapter of the book.
sentences.chinese: 我没有看这本书的最后一章。

sentences.english: Add the flour last.
sentences.chinese: 最后加面粉。

detailed_translations.english: happening or existing at the end, with no others after
after everything or everyone else

sentences.english: Look at yourself in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 照照镜子吧。

sentences.english: Come and warm yourselves by the fire.
sentences.chinese: 到火边来暖暖身子。

sentences.english: Have you hurt yourself?
sentences.chinese: 你伤到自己了吗？

sentences.english: Go and buy yourself an ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 去给你自己买个冰激凌吧。

detailed_translations.english: used when talking to someone to show that they are affected by their own action

sentences.english: I like your jacket.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢你这件上衣。

sentences.english: I don’t really like classical music.
sentences.chinese: 我不是很喜欢古典音乐。

sentences.english: Do you like this colour?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢这种颜色吗？

sentences.english: I like my coffee quite weak.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢喝很淡的咖啡。

sentences.english: I don’t like it when you get angry.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢你生气时的样子。

sentences.english: How do you like living in London (= how much do you like it )?
sentences.chinese: 住在伦敦你感觉怎样？

sentences.english: I quite like their new album.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢他们的新专辑。

sentences.english: We really liked the film.
sentences.chinese: 我们非常喜欢这部影片。

sentences.english: The time I like best (= like most of all ) is the evening when it’s cool.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢的时间是凉爽的傍晚。

sentences.english: I didn’t like the idea of being a single parent.
sentences.chinese: 我可不想当单亲家长。

sentences.english: Would you like a drink?
sentences.chinese: 你想喝一杯吗？

detailed_translations.english: to enjoy something or think that it is nice or good

sentences.english: The route then heads west over Gerrick Moor.
sentences.chinese: 之后这条路折向西，穿过格里克漠泽。

sentences.english: the west door of the church
sentences.chinese: 教堂的西门

sentences.english: A damp wind blew from the west.
sentences.chinese: 从西面吹来一股潮湿的风。

sentences.english: a west-facing window
sentences.chinese: 朝西的窗户

detailed_translations.english: towards the west
in the west or facing the west
the direction towards which the sun goes down, and which is on the left if you are facing north

sentences.english: ...a heart surgeon.
sentences.chinese: …一位心脏外科医生。

detailed_translations.english: a doctor who does operations in a hospital

name: flow
trans: 流动，涌流；川流不息；飘扬

sentences.english: a new road system to improve traffic flow through the city centre
sentences.chinese: 疏导市中心车流的新道路系统

sentences.english: These gates regulate the amount of water flowing into the canal.
sentences.chinese: 这些闸门调节流入运河的水量。

detailed_translations.english: a smooth steady movement of liquid, gas, or electricity
when a liquid, gas, or electricity flows, it moves in a steady continuous stream

sentences.english: He never even stopped to congratulate me.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至没有过来向我祝贺。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that you are happy because they have achieved something or because something nice has happened to them

sentences.english: You have your whole life ahead of you!
sentences.chinese: 你有一辈子要过呢！

sentences.english: His whole attitude bugs me.
sentences.chinese: 他的整个态度都让我讨厌。

sentences.english: We ate the whole cake in about ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 大约十分钟的时间，我们就把整个蛋糕都给吃完了。

sentences.english: The whole thing (= everything about the situation ) just makes me sick.
sentences.chinese: 这一切简直让我恶心。

sentences.english: We just sat around and watched TV the whole time (= the only thing we did was watch television ).
sentences.chinese: 我们一直都只是坐着看看电视。

sentences.english: I don’t believe she’s telling us the whole story (= all the facts ).
sentences.chinese: 我认为她没有告诉我们全部实情。

sentences.english: It was months before the whole truth came out.
sentences.chinese: 几个月以后才真相大白。

detailed_translations.english: all of something
something that consists of a number of parts, but is considered as a single unit

name: Miss
trans: 女士，小姐，年轻未婚女子

sentences.english: It was nice talking to you, Miss Ellis.
sentences.chinese: 很高兴与你交谈，埃利斯小姐。

detailed_translations.chinese: 女士，小姐，年轻未婚女子
detailed_translations.english: You use Miss in front of the name of a girl or unmarried woman when you are speaking to her or referring to her

name: brief
trans: 简短的，简洁的；短暂的，草率的

sentences.english: We stopped by Alice’s house for a brief visit.
sentences.chinese: 我们顺路在艾丽斯家小坐片刻。

sentences.english: Let’s keep this conversation brief; I have a plane to catch.
sentences.chinese: 我们长话短说吧，我还要赶飞机。

sentences.english: A Defense Department spokesman briefed reporters.
sentences.chinese: 一位国防部发言人向记者们介绍了情况。

detailed_translations.english: continuing for a short time

detailed_translations.chinese: 向…介绍基本情况，做…的提要
detailed_translations.english: If someone briefs you, especially about a piece of work or a serious matter, they give you information that you need before you do it or consider it
a short spoken or written statement giving facts about a law case

sentences.english: furry little animals
sentences.chinese: 毛茸茸的小动物

sentences.english: The cosmetics have not been tested on animals.
sentences.chinese: 这些化妆品没有进行过动物试验。

sentences.english: Beth is an animal lover (=  someone who likes animals  ) .
sentences.chinese: 贝丝是个喜欢动物的人。

detailed_translations.english: a living creature such as a dog or cat, that is not an insect, plant, bird, fish, or person
human feelings, desires etc that are connected with sex, food, and other basic needs

sentences.english: Can I ask you a question?
sentences.chinese: 我能问你个问题吗？

sentences.english: I’m afraid I can’t answer that question.
sentences.chinese: 我恐怕无法回答那个问题。

detailed_translations.english: a sentence, phrase or word that asks for information

sentences.english: We’re staying at the Holiday Inn.
sentences.chinese: 我们住在假日酒店。

detailed_translations.english: a small hotel or pub, especially an old one in the countryside

name: polish
trans: 磨光，擦亮；擦亮剂；优雅，精良

sentences.english: Your essay is good, you just need to polish it a bit.
sentences.chinese: 你的文章不错，只要稍加润色就可以了。

detailed_translations.english: to improve a piece of writing, a speech etc by making slight changes to it before it is completely finished
a liquid, powder, or other substance that you rub into a surface to make it smooth and shiny

name: principle
trans: 原理，原则；主义，道义；本质，本义；根源，源泉

sentences.english: Schools try to teach children a set of principles.
sentences.chinese: 学校设法教给孩子们一套道德准则。

sentences.english: He’s got no principles at all!
sentences.chinese: 他毫无道德准则！

sentences.english: It’s against my principles to accept gifts from clients.
sentences.chinese: 收受客户礼物违背我的原则。

detailed_translations.english: a moral rule or belief about what is right and wrong, that influences how you behave

name: satisfaction
trans: 满意，满足；赔偿；乐事；赎罪

sentences.english: She got great satisfaction from helping people to learn.
sentences.chinese: 她在帮助人们学习的过程中得到很大的满足。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of happiness or pleasure because you have achieved something or got what you wanted

sentences.english: Are your hands clean?
sentences.chinese: 你的手干净吗？

sentences.english: clean towels
sentences.chinese: 干净的毛巾

sentences.english: Make sure you keep the wound clean .
sentences.chinese: 一定要保持伤口清洁。

sentences.english: Wipe that sink clean when you’re done.
sentences.chinese: 洗完后将水槽擦干净。

sentences.english: As usual, she left her room clean and tidy before going to school.
sentences.chinese: 和往常一样，她去上学之前把房间收拾得干干净净。

sentences.english: a spotlessly clean kitchen
sentences.chinese: 一尘不染的厨房

sentences.english: Oh, don’t get mad - it’s just good clean fun !
sentences.chinese: 噢，不要生气——这不过是个正经的玩笑嘛！

detailed_translations.english: without any dirt, marks etc

sentences.english: Alice Munro has a reputation for being a very depressing writer.
sentences.chinese: 艾丽斯•门罗有文风抑郁的名声。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion that people have about someone or something because of what has happened in the past

sentences.english: She laid her hands on her swollen belly.
sentences.chinese: 她把手放在隆起的肚子上。

detailed_translations.english: the middle part of an animal’s body, near its stomach
to fill with air and become rounder in shape

sentences.english: They waited in silence and sucked their sweets.
sentences.chinese: 他们静静地等着，吮着糖果。

detailed_translations.english: to take air, liquid etc into your mouth by making your lips form a small hole and using the muscles of your mouth to pull it in
an act of sucking

sentences.english: public toilets
sentences.chinese: 公共厕所

detailed_translations.english: a room or building containing a toilet

sentences.english: bacon and eggs
sentences.chinese: 咸猪肉煎蛋

detailed_translations.english: salted or smoked meat from the back or sides of a pig, often served in narrow thin pieces

name: poison
trans: 污染；使中毒，放毒于；败坏；阻碍
毒药，毒物；酒；有毒害的事物；[助剂] 抑制剂

sentences.english: Belladonna and red arsenic are deadly poisons .
sentences.chinese: 颠茄和雄黄都是致命的毒物。

sentences.english: a box of rat poison
sentences.chinese: 一盒鼠药

sentences.english: He killed several people by poisoning their tea.
sentences.chinese: 他在茶里下毒杀死了几个人。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that can cause death or serious illness if you eat it, drink it etc
to give someone poison, especially by adding it to their food or drink, in order to harm or kill them

sentences.english: The motorbike is supposed to make annoying noise.
sentences.chinese: 摩托车当然会发出令人感到烦恼的噪音。

sentences.english: Some earlier witness reports cited by police or security officials had explosives being thrown from a motorbike or the upper storey's of an adjacent hotel.
sentences.chinese: 一些更早的证词报道引用警方或安全部门的话说，爆炸物从摩托车上扔下，或是从领进旅馆的楼上扔下来。

detailed_translations.english: a small fast two-wheeled vehicle with an engine

sentences.english: Their motorboat struck a rock and began to sink.
sentences.chinese: 他们的摩托艇触了礁，开始下沉。

sentences.english: The kids watched as the coin sank to the bottom of the pool.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们看着那枚硬币沉到池底。

sentences.english: The heavy guns sank up to their barrels in the mud.
sentences.chinese: 这些沉重的大炮深陷在泥里，只露出炮管。

detailed_translations.chinese: 下沉，沉没；降低，下落；陷入；衰退，恶化
detailed_translations.english: to go down below the surface of water, mud etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 使下沉，使沉没；降低；掘，挖，凿
detailed_translations.english: to go down below the surface of water, mud etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 水槽， 水池， 洗涤槽
detailed_translations.english: a large open container that you fill with water and use for washing yourself, washing dishes etc

sentences.english: Joe ran his tongue over his dry lips.
sentences.chinese: 乔舔了舔干燥的嘴唇。

sentences.english: The taste of the chocolate was still on her tongue.
sentences.chinese: 巧克力的余味依然留在她的舌尖。

sentences.english: The girl scowled at me, then stuck out her tongue .
sentences.chinese: 女孩怒视着我，然后吐了一下舌头。

detailed_translations.english: the soft part inside your mouth that you can move about and use for eating and speaking
to use your tongue to make separate sounds when playing a musical instrument

sentences.english: He plays the violin in an orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 他在管弦乐队中演奏小提琴。

sentences.english: She is first violin of an orchestra .
sentences.chinese: 她是管弦乐队的第一小提琴手。

sentences.english: All this from playing the violin and the cello.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些都来自于小提琴和大提琴的演奏。

detailed_translations.english: a small wooden musical instrument that you hold under your chin and play by pulling a bow(= special stick ) across the strings

name: delicate
trans: 微妙的；精美的，雅致的；柔和的；易碎的；纤弱的；清淡可口的

sentences.english: his delicate hands
sentences.chinese: 他纤细的手

sentences.english: delicate hand-cut glass
sentences.chinese: 易碎的手工刻花玻璃

sentences.english: The sun can easily damage a child’s delicate skin .
sentences.chinese: 阳光很容易晒伤小孩娇嫩的皮肤。

detailed_translations.english: small and having a beautiful shape or appearance

name: embassy
trans: 大使馆；大使馆全体人员

sentences.english: the American Embassy in Paris
sentences.chinese: 美国驻巴黎大使馆

detailed_translations.chinese: 大使馆； 大使馆全体成员
detailed_translations.english: a group of officials who represent their government in a foreign country, or the building they work in

sentences.english: There must be an error in our calculations.
sentences.chinese: 我们的计算肯定有错。

detailed_translations.english: a mistake

sentences.english: Criminal behaviour can be linked to economic disadvantage.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪行为可能会与经济困难有关。

detailed_translations.english: something that causes problems, or that makes someone or something less likely to be successful or effective

sentences.english: beautiful green eyes
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的碧眼

sentences.english: Raw coffee beans are green in colour.
sentences.chinese: 生咖啡豆是绿色的。

sentences.english: a room decorated in pale blues and greens
sentences.chinese: 用浅蓝色和浅绿色装修的房间

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of grass or leaves
the colour of grass and leaves

sentences.english: new graduates seeking employment
sentences.chinese: 正在求职的刚毕业的大学生

sentences.english: Drivers are advised to seek alternative routes.
sentences.chinese: 驾车者被告知需另寻其他路线。

sentences.english: They quickly sought to distance themselves from the protesters.
sentences.chinese: 他们迅速设法远离抗议者。

detailed_translations.english: to look for someone or something

sentences.english: Maybe it’s all just a big misunderstanding.
sentences.chinese: 也许这只是一个很大的误会。

sentences.english: ‘Do you think he’ll come back?’ ‘Maybe.’
sentences.chinese: “你认为他会回来吗？”“也许会吧。”

sentences.english: Maybe they’re right, but maybe not .
sentences.chinese: 也许他们是对的，但也许不是。

sentences.english: You have talent, maybe even genius.
sentences.chinese: 你很有才能，甚至可以说有天赋。

sentences.english: He said he’d finish the work soon – maybe tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 他说他很快就会完成那项工作——也许是明天。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something may happen or may be true but you are not certain

sentences.english: Martin showed me a graph of their recent sales.
sentences.chinese: 马丁给我看了他们最近销售情况的图表。

detailed_translations.english: a drawing that uses a line or lines to show how two or more sets of measurements are related to each other

name: recipe
trans: 食谱；[临床] 处方；秘诀；烹饪法

sentences.english: a recipe book
sentences.chinese: 一本烹饪书

detailed_translations.english: a set of instructions for cooking a particular type of food

sentences.english: laser surgery
sentences.chinese: 激光(外科)手术

detailed_translations.english: a beam of light produced by a laser

sentences.english: the station entrance
sentences.chinese: 车站的入口处

sentences.english: Bridget made a dramatic entrance into the room.
sentences.chinese: 布里奇特动作夸张地进了房间。

detailed_translations.english: a door, gate etc that you go through to enter a place

sentences.english: I pay the rent at the beginning of every month.
sentences.chinese: 我每逢月初交付房租。

sentences.english: She rents out two rooms to students.
sentences.chinese: 她把两个房间出租给学生

detailed_translations.english: the money that someone pays regularly to use a room, house etc that belongs to someone else
to let someone live in a house, room etc that you own, or use your land, in return for money

name: match
trans: 使比赛；使相配；敌得过，比得上；相配；与…竞争
比赛，竞赛；匹配；对手；火柴

sentences.english: It’s our last match of the season.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们本赛季最后一场比赛。

sentences.english: They’re preparing for a big match tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 他们在为明天的一场大赛做准备。

sentences.english: McClaire’s goal earned him the title of man of the match (= the person in a team who plays best ) .
sentences.chinese: 麦克莱尔的进球为他赢得了“本场最佳球员”的称号。

sentences.english: Carlos was no match for the champion.
sentences.chinese: 卡洛斯根本不是冠军的对手。

detailed_translations.english: an organized sports event between two teams or people

name: very
trans: 恰好是，正是；甚至；十足的；特有的

sentences.english: It feels very cold today.
sentences.chinese: 今天很冷。

sentences.english: The fishing industry is very important to the area.
sentences.chinese: 捕鱼业对于该地区非常重要。

sentences.english: The traffic’s moving very slowly this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上车流非常缓慢。

sentences.english: problems that are very similar to mine
sentences.chinese: 和我非常相似的问题

sentences.english: I feel a lot better – thank you very much.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉好多了，非常感谢。

sentences.english: I’m very, very (= used for emphasis ) pleased you can come.
sentences.chinese: 你能来我真是非常高兴。

sentences.english: It’s very kind of you to help.
sentences.chinese: 您来帮忙真是太好了。

sentences.english: My sister and I were married on the very same (= exactly the same ) day.
sentences.chinese: 我和姐姐在同一天结婚。

sentences.english: He died in this very room.
sentences.chinese: 他就是在这个房间里去世的。

sentences.english: I’ll start at the very beginning.
sentences.chinese: 我要从头开始。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize an adjective, adverb, or phrase
used to emphasize that you are talking exactly about one particular thing or person

name: raw
trans: 生的；未加工的；阴冷的；刺痛的；擦掉皮的；无经验的；（在艺术等方面）不成熟的

sentences.english: raw meat
sentences.chinese: 生肉

sentences.english: grated raw carrots
sentences.chinese: 磨碎的生胡萝卜

sentences.english: Cabbage can be eaten raw.
sentences.chinese: 洋白菜可以生吃。

sentences.english: raw sugar
sentences.chinese: 原糖

detailed_translations.english: not cooked

sentences.english: It seems an absurd idea.
sentences.chinese: 这似乎是个荒唐的想法。

detailed_translations.english: completely stupid or unreasonable

name: possibility
trans: 可能性；可能发生的事物

sentences.english: There were several possibilities open to each manufacturer.
sentences.chinese: 每个制造商都可以有几种不同的选择。

detailed_translations.english: A possibility is one of several different things that could be done.

name: garage
trans: 车库；汽车修理厂；飞机库
把……送入车库；把（汽车）开进车库

sentences.english: I’ll just go and put the car in the garage.
sentences.chinese: 我把车停到车库去。

sentences.english: an automatic garage door
sentences.chinese: 车库自动门

detailed_translations.english: a building for keeping a car in, usually next to or attached to a house

sentences.english: The human brain needs to be without oxygen for only four minutes before permanent damage occurs.
sentences.chinese: 人脑缺氧只需4分钟就会造成永久性损伤。

detailed_translations.english: a gas that has no colour or smell, is present in air, and is necessary for most animals and plants to live. It is a chemical element: symbol O

name: goat
trans: 山羊；替罪羊（美俚）；色鬼（美俚）

sentences.english: The tiger sprang on the goat.
sentences.chinese: 老虎向山羊扑去。

sentences.english: The goat bunted the calf.
sentences.chinese: 山羊用角抵小牛。

sentences.english: They staked the goat in the back yard.
sentences.chinese: 他们把山羊拴在后院的木桩上。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that has horns on top of its head and long hair under its chin, and can climb steep hills and rocks. Goats live wild in the mountains or are kept as farm animals.

sentences.english: An accident at the power station could result in large amounts of radiation being released.
sentences.chinese: 发电站事故会造成大量核辐射泄漏。

sentences.english: a lethal dose of radiation
sentences.chinese: 致命剂量的辐射

sentences.english: Sun creams work by blocking harmful ultraviolet radiation.
sentences.chinese: 防晒霜可隔离有害的紫外线辐射。

detailed_translations.english: a form of energy that comes especially from nuclear reactions, which in large amounts is very harmful to living things

name: fog
trans: 使模糊；使困惑；以雾笼罩

sentences.english: It will be a cold night, and there may be fog patches .
sentences.chinese: 今夜天气寒冷，部分地区可能有雾。

sentences.english: A blanket of fog covered the fields.
sentences.chinese: 大雾笼罩了田野。

sentences.english: The fog lifted (= disappeared ) in the afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 下午，雾散了。

detailed_translations.english: cloudy air near the ground which is difficult to see through

detailed_translations.chinese: 使模糊；使困惑；以雾笼罩
detailed_translations.english: if something made of glass fogs or becomes fogged, it becomes covered in small drops of water that make it difficult to see through

name: host
trans: [计] 主机；主人；主持人；许多

sentences.english: Which country is going to host the next World Cup?
sentences.chinese: 哪个国家将主办下一届世界杯？

detailed_translations.english: to provide the place and everything that is needed for an organized event

sentences.english: He’s an amazing player to watch.
sentences.chinese: 看他比赛那才叫精彩呢。

sentences.english: an amazing bargain
sentences.chinese: 令人惊喜的便宜货

detailed_translations.english: very good, especially in an unexpected way

sentences.english: It’s warm enough to eat outdoors tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚很暖和，可以在户外用餐。

sentences.english: He likes to work outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢在户外工作。

detailed_translations.english: outside, not in a building
the countryside far away from buildings and cities

sentences.english: The police are disappointed by the slow pro-gress of the investigation.
sentences.chinese: 警方对调查进度缓慢感到失望。

sentences.english: We made good progress despite the snow.
sentences.chinese: 尽管下雪，我们的行程还是很顺利。

sentences.english: I asked the nurse how my son was progressing.
sentences.chinese: 我询问护士我儿子身体恢复得如何。

detailed_translations.english: the process of getting better at doing something, or getting closer to finishing or achieving something
to improve, develop, or achieve things so that you are then at a more advanced stage

sentences.english: an authentic account
sentences.chinese: 真实可信的说法

detailed_translations.chinese: 真的， 真正的； 可靠的， 可信的
detailed_translations.english: based on facts

sentences.english: a cheese omelette
sentences.chinese: 奶酪煎蛋卷

detailed_translations.english: eggs mixed together and cooked in hot fat, sometimes with other foods added

sentences.english: "We've got life-size cutouts of William and Kate, " boasts one headmistress, claiming: "The children are really excited."
sentences.chinese: “我们制作了真人大小的威廉和凯特的人像，”一名女校长沾沾自喜地炫耀着：“孩子们可兴奋了。”

sentences.english: When I was growing up in the colony of Hong Kong, my British headmistress would glare when we asked to learn Chinese, and hiss: “If you want to learn Chinese, go onto the streets!”
sentences.chinese: 我成长在当时还是英国殖民地的香港，我的英籍女校长对我们要求学习中文的请求不屑一顾，并嘶声说道：“如果你想学习中文，就到街上去！”

sentences.english: In 1987 the school headmistress referred the case to the Institute of Child Health at University College London.
sentences.chinese: 1987年，学校校长将这些儿童的案例提交至伦敦大学学院儿童健康研究所。

detailed_translations.english: a female teacher who is in charge of a school

name: trip
trans: 绊倒；远足；犯错误；轻快地走

sentences.english: Two lucky employees won a round-the-world trip.
sentences.chinese: 两名幸运的雇员赢得一次环游世界的机会。

sentences.english: It’s an 80-mile round trip (= a journey to a place and back again ) to Exeter.
sentences.chinese: 到埃克塞特往返有80英里。

sentences.english: I’m afraid you’ve had a wasted trip (= a trip in which you do not achieve your purpose ) . Mr Burgess has already left.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕你是白来一趟了，伯吉斯先生已经走了。

sentences.english: He was unable to make the trip to accept the award.
sentences.chinese: 他无法前去领奖。

detailed_translations.english: a visit to a place that involves a journey, for pleasure or a particular purpose
to hit something with your foot by accident so that you fall or almost fall

name: transport
trans: 运输；运输机；狂喜；流放犯

sentences.english: trucks used for transporting oil
sentences.chinese: 运输石油的卡车

sentences.english: Canals were used for the transport of goods.
sentences.chinese: 利用运河来运输货物。

detailed_translations.english: to take goods, people etc from one place to another in a vehicle
the process or business of taking goods from one place to another

sentences.english: Violence erupted after police shot a student during the demonstration.
sentences.chinese: 警察向示威人群中的一名学生开枪，暴乱随之发生。

sentences.english: A political row erupted over the MP’s comments.
sentences.chinese: 这名下院议员的评论引发了一场政治论战。

sentences.english: The volcano erupted in 1980, devastating a large area of Washington state.
sentences.chinese: 这座火山1980年喷发，摧毁了华盛顿州的大片地区。

detailed_translations.english: if fighting, violence, noise etc erupts, it starts suddenly

name: forgetful
trans: 健忘的；不注意的；疏忽的；使遗忘的

sentences.english: My mother has become very forgetful and confused.
sentences.chinese: 我母亲已变得很健忘很糊涂了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 健忘的；不注意的；疏忽的；使遗忘的
detailed_translations.english: often forgetting things

name: sir
trans: 先生；（用于姓名前）爵士；阁下；（中小学生对男教师的称呼）先生；老师

sentences.english: ‘Report back to me in an hour, sergeant.’ ‘Yes, sir.’
sentences.chinese: “一小时后向我报告，中士。”“是，长官。”

sentences.english: Can I help you, sir?
sentences.chinese: 我能为您效劳吗，先生？

sentences.english: Sir! You dropped your wallet.
sentences.chinese: 先生！ 您的钱包掉了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 先生；（用于姓名前）爵士；阁下；（中小学生对男教师的称呼）先生；老师
detailed_translations.english: used when speaking to a man in order to be polite or show respect

sentences.english: Jerry, this is my friend Sue.
sentences.chinese: 杰里，这是我的朋友休。

sentences.english: She’s always out with her friends.
sentences.chinese: 她常同朋友们一起出去。

sentences.english: One of her closest friends died at the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 她的一位密友周末过世了。

sentences.english: I met Jim through a friend.
sentences.chinese: 经一位朋友介绍，我认识了吉姆。

detailed_translations.english: someone who you know and like very much and enjoy spending time with

sentences.english: The school holidays start tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 学校假期从明天开始。

sentences.english: a national holiday
sentences.chinese: 全国假日

detailed_translations.english: a time of rest from work, school etc

sentences.english: You should drink plenty of water.
sentences.chinese: 你应该大量喝水。

sentences.english: What would you like to drink?
sentences.chinese: 你想喝点什么？

sentences.english: Take a seat while I get you something to drink .
sentences.chinese: 请坐，我去给你倒杯喝的。

sentences.english: She filled the glass and drank.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯子倒满后喝了起来。

detailed_translations.english: to take liquid into your mouth and swallow it
to take liquid into your mouth and swallow it
an amount of liquid that you drink, or the act of drinking something

name: commercial
trans: 商业的；营利的；靠广告收入的

sentences.english: Our top priorities must be profit and commercial growth.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须把利润和贸易增长作为我们的第一要务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 商业的， 商务的； 商品化的， 商业性的
detailed_translations.english: related to business and the buying and selling of goods and services

name: whenever
trans: 不论何时；随便什么时候

sentences.english: They were always there by you， whenever you needed them.
sentences.chinese: 无论何时你需要他们，他们总是在你身边。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不论何时；随便什么时候
detailed_translations.english: at any time

sentences.english: They  bowed before the emperor as he entered the court.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝进入朝廷时他们都向他鞠躬致敬。

sentences.english: The daughter of an emperor does not worry about finding a husband.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝女儿不愁嫁。

sentences.english: The old chancellor who had offended against the emperor was relegated to the distant boundaries of the country.
sentences.chinese: 触犯了皇帝的老宰相被流放到遥远的边疆。

detailed_translations.english: the man who is the ruler of an empire

sentences.english: Vera won £20 at bingo.
sentences.chinese: 薇拉玩宾戈赢了20英镑。

detailed_translations.english: a game played for money or prizes, in which numbers are chosen by chance and called out, and if you have the right numbers on your card, you win

name: operator
trans: 经营者；操作员；话务员；行家

sentences.english: Hello, operator? Could you put me through to Room 31?
sentences.chinese: 喂，接线员吗？请帮我接31号房间。

sentences.english: computers which can be used by untrained operators
sentences.chinese: 未经训练的操作者也可使用的电脑

detailed_translations.english: someone who works on a telephone switchboard, who you can call for help

name: apology
trans: 道歉；谢罪；辩护；勉强的替代物

sentences.english: Edward can’t be here today, but he sends his apologies .
sentences.chinese: 爱德华今天来不了，他向大家表示歉意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 道歉；谢罪；辩护；勉强的替代物
detailed_translations.english: something that you say or write to show that you are sorry for doing something wrong

name: pure
trans: 纯的；纯粹的；纯洁的；清白的；纯理论的

sentences.english: rings made of pure gold
sentences.chinese: 纯金制成的戒指

sentences.english: Our beef patties are 100% pure.
sentences.chinese: 我们的牛肉饼是100%的纯牛肉。

sentences.english: His motives were pure.
sentences.chinese: 他动机纯正。

detailed_translations.english: not mixed with anything else; with nothing added

sentences.english: her devotion to duty
sentences.chinese: 她对职责的忠诚

sentences.english: Her devotion to the job left her with very little free time.
sentences.chinese: 她全身心投入工作，几乎没有闲暇。

detailed_translations.english: the action of spending a lot of time or energy on sth

name: grade
trans: 年级；等级；成绩；级别；阶段

sentences.english: Pencils are graded according to softness.
sentences.chinese: 铅笔按软硬度分级。

sentences.english: The best grades of tea are expensive.
sentences.chinese: 最上等的茶叶价格很贵。

detailed_translations.english: to say what level of a quality something has, or what standard it is
a particular level of quality that a product, material etc has

sentences.english: She's a widow now.
sentences.chinese: 她现在是一个寡妇。

sentences.english: But we are now a much more fragmented society.
sentences.chinese: 但是我们现在是一个更加四分五裂的社会。

sentences.english: If we leave now we’ll be there before dark.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们现在出发，天黑之前就能赶到那里。

detailed_translations.english: (at) the present time

sentences.english: a wounded soldier
sentences.chinese: 受伤的士兵

detailed_translations.english: injured by a weapon such as a gun or knife

sentences.english: The chickens gathered under the hen.
sentences.chinese: 小鸡聚集在母鸡翅膀下面。

sentences.english: The chickens gathered under the hen.
sentences.chinese: 小鸡集聚在母鸡翅膀下面。

sentences.english: The hen sits in the hencoop [henroost].
sentences.chinese: 母鸡卧窝。

detailed_translations.english: an adult female chicken

sentences.english: I thought the medicine would make him sleep, but it had the opposite effect.
sentences.chinese: 我以为这药会让他睡觉，但是它却起了反作用。

sentences.english: At the opposite extreme, Ashworth’s style is very simple and modern.
sentences.chinese: 截然相反的是，阿什沃思的风格非常简单和现代。

sentences.english: Bob was quicker than Ed? It’s usually the opposite way round.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃比埃德快？通常是反过来的。

detailed_translations.english: as different as possible from something else
a person or thing that is as different as possible from someone or something else

sentences.english: The shop’s daily profit is usually around $500.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店每天的利润一般在500美元左右。

sentences.english: She sold the business and bought a farm with the profits.
sentences.chinese: 她卖了公司，用所得利润买下了一座农场。

sentences.english: They sold their house at a healthy profit.
sentences.chinese: 他们卖掉房子，赚了一大笔钱。

sentences.english: There’s no profit in letting meetings drag on.
sentences.chinese: 会议拖拖拉拉没什么好处。

detailed_translations.english: money that you gain by selling things or doing business, after your costs have been paid
to get money from doing something

sentences.english: Sue showed great courage throughout her illness.
sentences.chinese: 休在生病期间表现出了极大的勇气。

sentences.english: Driving again after his accident must have taken a lot of courage (= needed courage ) .
sentences.chinese: 他出事故后再驾车肯定需要很大的勇气。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being brave when you are facing a difficult or dangerous situation or when you are very ill

name: outstanding
trans: 杰出的；显著的；未解决的；未偿付的

sentences.english: an outstanding example of a 13th-century castle
sentences.chinese: 13世纪城堡的杰出典范

sentences.english: an outstanding success
sentences.chinese: 了不起的成功

sentences.english: His performance was outstanding.
sentences.chinese: 他的表演相当出色。

detailed_translations.chinese: 杰出的；显著的；未解决的；未偿付的
detailed_translations.english: extremely good

sentences.english: The men took shelter in a bombed-out farmhouse.
sentences.chinese: 那些男人躲在一间被炸毁的农舍里。

sentences.english: All around me, people were running for shelter .
sentences.chinese: 我周围的人都在奔跑着寻找地方躲避。

sentences.english: ...a wooden house, sheltered by a low pointed roof.
sentences.chinese: …一座由低矮的尖屋顶遮蔽的木房子。

detailed_translations.english: protection from danger or from wind, rain, hot sun etc
If a place or thing is sheltered by something, it is protected by that thing from wind and rain

name: look
trans: 看；期待；注意；面向；看上去像

sentences.english: We sneaked out while Jessie’s mom wasn’t looking.
sentences.chinese: 我们趁杰茜的妈妈没有看到，偷偷地溜了出去。

sentences.english: If you look carefully you can see that the painting represents a human figure.
sentences.chinese: 如果仔细看，就会看出画上是一个人形。

sentences.english: Gina covered her eyes, afraid to look.
sentences.chinese: 吉娜捂住眼睛，不敢看。

sentences.english: Let me have a look at that – I think it’s mine.
sentences.chinese: 让我看一下那个东西——我想它是我的。

detailed_translations.english: to turn your eyes towards something, so that you can see it
an act of looking at something

sentences.english: He pushed in the clutch and coasted to a halt.
sentences.chinese: 他踩下离合器，滑行了一会儿便停下来了。

detailed_translations.english: if a car or bicycle coasts, it moves without any effort from you or any power from the engine
the area where the land meets the sea

sentences.english: The phone rang, but she ignored it.
sentences.chinese: 电话铃响了，但她只当没听见。

sentences.english: Sam rudely ignored the question.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆粗鲁地对这个问题不予理睬。

detailed_translations.english: to behave as if you had not heard or seen someone or something

name: different
trans: 不同的；个别的，与众不同的

sentences.english: The place looks completely different now.
sentences.chinese: 这地方现在完全变了。

sentences.english: They decided to try a radically different approach.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定尝试一种全然不同的办法。

sentences.english: We found women had significantly different political views from men.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现女性的政治观点与男性大不相同。

sentences.english: a slightly different way of doing things
sentences.chinese: 稍有区别的做事方法

sentences.english: What actually happened was subtly different from the PR people’s version.
sentences.chinese: 实际情况与公关部那些人的说法有细微的差别。

sentences.english: The show is refreshingly different from most exhibitions of modern art.
sentences.chinese: 这次展览与大多数现代艺术展不一样，令人耳目一新。

sentences.english: The publishing business is no different from any other business in this respect.
sentences.chinese: 从这一点来讲，出版业和其他任何行业没有什么差别。

sentences.english: It’s a different world here in London.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦这儿的情况完全不同。

detailed_translations.english: not like something or someone else, or not like before

sentences.english: She had never seen a real live elephant before.
sentences.chinese: 她以前从未见过活生生的大象。

sentences.english: a coat made of real fur
sentences.chinese: 真皮大衣

sentences.english: Things don’t happen quite that easily in real life.
sentences.chinese: 现实生活中不会动不动就有这样的事情发生。

detailed_translations.english: something that is real is actually what it seems to be and not false or artificial

name: typical
trans: 典型的；特有的；象征性的

sentences.english: typical British weather
sentences.chinese: 典型的英国天气

sentences.english: This advertisement is a typical example of their marketing strategy.
sentences.chinese: 这则广告是他们营销策略的一个典型例子。

detailed_translations.english: having the usual features or qualities of a particular group or thing

name: handy
trans: 便利的；手边的，就近的；容易取得的；敏捷的

sentences.english: It’s quite a handy little tool.
sentences.chinese: 这件小工具非常有用。

sentences.english: It’s very handy having a light above your desk.
sentences.chinese: 书桌上方有盏灯很有用。

sentences.english: Take your swimming trunks with you – they might come in handy (= be useful ).
sentences.chinese: 带上你的游泳裤，可能会派上用场的。

detailed_translations.english: useful

name: broken
trans: 折断；打碎；损坏（break的过去分词）

sentences.english: Mind the broken glass.
sentences.chinese: 当心碎玻璃。

sentences.english: a badly broken leg
sentences.chinese: 严重骨折的腿

sentences.english: Gibbs had an X-ray, which revealed no broken bones.
sentences.chinese: 吉布斯拍了X光片，显示没有骨折。

detailed_translations.english: in small pieces because it has been hit, dropped etc

sentences.english: When we were children, our father read aloud to us.
sentences.chinese: 当我们是孩子时，我们的父亲大声地朗读给我们听。

detailed_translations.english: if you read, laugh, say something etc aloud, you read etc so that people can hear you

name: appear
trans: 出现；显得；似乎；出庭；登场

sentences.english: Police have found what appear to be human remains.
sentences.chinese: 警方发现了疑似人体遗骸的东西。

sentences.english: He tried to make it appear that she had committed suicide.
sentences.chinese: 他试图制造她自杀的假象。

sentences.english: It may be less useful than it appears at first.
sentences.chinese: 这可能没有一开始显得那么有用。

sentences.english: Two faces appeared at our window.
sentences.chinese: 两张面孔出现在我们的窗口。

sentences.english: The car seemed to appear from nowhere.
sentences.chinese: 这辆车好像是突然间从哪里冒出来的。

detailed_translations.english: used to say how something seems, especially from what you know about it or from what you can see

sentences.english: a barbershop quartet
sentences.chinese: 男声四重唱

detailed_translations.english: a style of singing popular songs with parts for four men, usually without music

sentences.english: The student trotted out his knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 这个学生炫耀他的知识。

sentences.english: She buddied up with a student from another university.
sentences.chinese: 她与来自另一大学的一名学生交朋友。

sentences.english: The student left the university to go out into the world and find himself.
sentences.chinese: 这个学生离开了大学进入社会去发现自己的才能所在。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is studying at a university, school etc

name: yummy
trans: 美味的东西；令人喜爱的东西

sentences.english: Spread low-fat cream cheese on a whole-wheat bagel (or English muffin) and then top with sliced tomatoes for a yummy sandwich.
sentences.chinese: 低脂全麦面包圈（或英式松饼）脂肪奶酪，然后用美味的三明治切片西红柿涂在上面。

sentences.english: Make something yummy, like popcorn or a cup of special herb tea, to make reading time something your daughter looks forward to.
sentences.chinese: 做些美味的食品，比如说爆米花或一杯特别的香草茶，使你女儿更加期待阅读时光。

sentences.english: So quite quickly you can use your intelligence to change your perception of yummy bread to toxic sludge.
sentences.chinese: 因此，你可以用你的聪明才智修改你对美味的面包印象，把它设为一团有毒污泥吧。

sentences.english: You can’t phone her now – it’s gone midnight (= after midnight ) !
sentences.chinese: 你现在不能打电话给她，都过午夜了！

sentences.english: By the time he arrived, it was well past midnight (= after midnight ) .
sentences.chinese: 他到的时候早已经是后半夜了。

sentences.english: He’s gone for a midnight swim.
sentences.chinese: 他深更半夜去游泳了。

detailed_translations.english: 12 o’clock at night

name: addition
trans: 添加；[数] 加法；增加物

sentences.english: This is a fine book; a worthy addition to the series.
sentences.chinese: 这是一本好书——是对这套丛书有价值的增补。

detailed_translations.chinese: 加， 加法； 附加物
detailed_translations.english: something that is added to something else, often in order to improve it

sentences.english: In just 50 weeks Dan tried everything from being a lobster catcher, a jazz conductor, a TV weatherman and even a Las Vegas wedding planner.
sentences.chinese: 于是在50个礼拜之内，从捕龙虾、爵士乐指挥，电视天气预报，甚至拉斯维加斯的婚庆服务，他都一一尝试。

sentences.english: The weatherman says we’ll have a cold spell before the end of this week.
sentences.chinese: 天气预报员说,在这个周末之前,会有一阵子的冷天气。

detailed_translations.english: a man on television or radio who tells you what the weather will be like

sentences.english: Smoking is only permitted in the public lounge.
sentences.chinese: 只允许在公共休息室里抽烟。

sentences.english: He had more than the permitted level of alcohol in his blood.
sentences.chinese: 他血液中的酒精含量超出了允许的水平。

detailed_translations.english: to allow something to happen, especially by an official decision, rule, or law
an official written statement giving you the right to do something

sentences.english: Steve gripped the steering wheel tightly with both hands.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫双手紧握方向盘。

sentences.english: In her hand was a tattered old photograph.
sentences.chinese: 她手中拿着的是一张破旧的老照片。

sentences.english: the hour hand
sentences.chinese: 时针

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body at the end of your arm, including your fingers and thumb, that you use to hold things

sentences.english: These conditions no longer obtain.
sentences.chinese: 这些状况已不复存在。

detailed_translations.chinese: 通用， 流行； 存在
detailed_translations.english: if a situation, system, or rule obtains, it continues to exist
to get something that you want, especially through your own effort, skill, or work

sentences.english: In this month’s competition you could win a prize worth £3,000.
sentences.chinese: 在本月的竞赛中您可以赢得价值3,000英镑的奖品。

sentences.english: The first prize has gone to Dr John Gentle.
sentences.chinese: 获得一等奖的是约翰·金特尔博士。

sentences.english: The prizes are awarded (= given ) every year to students who have shown original thinking in their work.
sentences.chinese: 这些奖项每年颁发给在学习中表现出创造性思维的学生。

sentences.english: The total prize money was £30,000.
sentences.chinese: 奖金总额为3万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: something that is given to someone who is successful in a competition, race, game of chance etc
to think that someone or something is very important or valuable
good enough to win a prize or having won a prize

sentences.english: The content of the media course includes scripting, editing and camera work.
sentences.chinese: 大众传媒课程的内容包括稿件写作、剪辑和摄像操作。

detailed_translations.english: the ideas, facts, or opinions that are contained in a speech, piece of writing, film, programme etc

name: firmly
trans: 坚定地，坚决地；坚固地，稳固地

detailed_translations.chinese: 坚定地，坚决地；坚固地，稳固地

name: colour
trans: 把…涂颜色，粉饰；歪曲；使脸红
颜色；风格；气色，面色；外貌

sentences.english: Her eyes suddenly met his and she coloured slightly.
sentences.chinese: 她的目光突然和他相遇，她微微有点脸红了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…涂颜色，粉饰；歪曲；使脸红
detailed_translations.english: when someone colours, their face becomes redder because they are embarrassed

detailed_translations.chinese: 颜色；风格；气色，面色；外貌
detailed_translations.english: red, blue, yellow, green, brown, purple etc

name: tired
trans: 疲倦；对…腻烦（tire的过去分词形式）

sentences.english: He looks tired out (= very tired ) .
sentences.chinese: 他看起来累坏了。

sentences.english: ‘No,’ Frank said in a tired voice.
sentences.chinese: “不。”弗兰克语带疲倦地说。

detailed_translations.english: feeling that you want to sleep or rest

detailed_translations.chinese: 疲倦；对…腻烦（tire的过去分词形式）

name: vague
trans: 模糊的；含糊的；不明确的；暧昧的

sentences.english: The governor gave only a vague outline of his tax plan.
sentences.chinese: 州长只是含糊地大致说了一下他的税务计划。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不明确的； 含糊的； 暧昧的
detailed_translations.english: unclear because someone does not give enough detailed information or does not say exactly what they mean

name: classic
trans: 经典的；古典的，传统的；最优秀的
名著；经典著作；大艺术家

sentences.english: The Coca-Cola bottle is one of the classic designs of the last century.
sentences.chinese: 可口可乐瓶是上个世纪的经典设计之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 最优秀的，典型的，标准的；传统式样的，典雅的
detailed_translations.english: having all the features that are typical or expected of a particular thing or situation

detailed_translations.chinese: 文学名著， 经典作品， 杰作； 优秀的典范； 古典文学， 古典语文研究
detailed_translations.english: a book, play, or film that is important and has been admired for a long time

name: concern
trans: 关系；关心；关心的事；忧虑

sentences.english: He was moved by her obvious concern.
sentences.chinese: 她明显的关心使他感动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 关切的事，有关的事；关心，挂念；关系，关联；公司，企业
detailed_translations.english: a feeling of wanting someone to be happy and healthy

detailed_translations.chinese: 涉及， 有关； 使关心， 使担心
detailed_translations.english: if a story, book, report etc concerns someone or something, it is about them

sentences.english: He has a lot of talent , and his work is fresh and interesting.
sentences.chinese: 他很有天赋，作品新颖有趣。

sentences.english: a persuasive speaker with a natural talent for leadership
sentences.chinese: 有领导天赋、颇有辩才的演说者

sentences.english: His latest book reveals hidden talents.
sentences.chinese: 他最新的一本书展现了他深藏不露的才能。

sentences.english: Sadly, she inherited none of her father’s musical talent.
sentences.chinese: 可惜的是，她一点都没有继承她父亲的音乐天赋。

sentences.english: He is a great talent.
sentences.chinese: 他是个了不起的人才。

sentences.english: Britain’s footballing talent
sentences.chinese: 英国的足球天才

detailed_translations.english: a natural ability to do something well

sentences.english: I have several suggestions.
sentences.chinese: 我有几个建议。

sentences.english: I have several methods.
sentences.chinese: 我有几个方法。

sentences.english: I have several reasons to support my view.
sentences.chinese: 我有几个理由来支持我的观点。

name: simply
trans: 简单地；仅仅；简直；朴素地；坦白地

sentences.english: Try to express yourself more simply.
sentences.chinese: 尽量把你的意思表达得更简单明了。

sentences.english: To put it simply, the tax cuts mean the average person will be about 3% better off.
sentences.chinese: 简单地说，这次减税意味着普通人的收入将增加 3% 左右。

sentences.english: We had to live very simply on my father’s small salary.
sentences.chinese: 我们只能靠父亲微薄的工资过着非常简朴的生活。

detailed_translations.english: if you say or explain something simply, you say it in a way that is easy for people to understand

sentences.english: Burma borders on India.
sentences.chinese: 缅甸与印度毗邻。

sentences.english: This book treats of the caste system in India.
sentences.chinese: 这本书论述了印度的种姓制度。

sentences.english: If you come to India for just one thing, this should be it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你只为一件事来到印度，那就到这儿来吧。

sentences.english: They own 200 acres of farmland.
sentences.chinese: 他们拥有200英亩农田。

sentences.english: a 200-acre wood
sentences.chinese: 一片200英亩的林地

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring area, equal to 4,840 square yards or 4,047 square metres

name: potato
trans: [作物] 土豆，[作物] 马铃薯

sentences.english: Marie stood at the sink, peeling potatoes (= cutting off the skin ) .
sentences.chinese: 玛丽站在洗涤槽边削土豆皮。

detailed_translations.chinese: [作物] 土豆，[作物] 马铃薯
detailed_translations.english: a round white vegetable with a brown, red, or pale yellow skin, that grows under the ground

name: adopt
trans: 采取；接受；收养；正式通过

sentences.english: The courts were asked to adopt a more flexible approach to young offenders.
sentences.chinese: 法庭被要求对少年犯采取更为灵活的处理方法。

sentences.english: The store recently adopted a drug testing policy for all new employees.
sentences.chinese: 这家商店近来实行新雇员一律要做药检的政策。

sentences.english: California has adopted a tough stance on the issue.
sentences.chinese: 加利福尼亚州对这一问题持强硬立场。

detailed_translations.english: to start to deal with or think about something in a particular way

sentences.english: Lucy had a bandage round her knee.
sentences.chinese: 露西的膝盖上缠着绷带。

sentences.english: a knee injury
sentences.chinese: 膝伤

detailed_translations.english: the joint that bends in the middle of your leg
to hit someone with your knee

sentences.english: She had read about it in the newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 关于这件事她已经在报纸上看到了。

sentences.english: a series of newspaper articles about life in Cuba
sentences.chinese: 刊登在报纸上的一系列关于古巴生活的文章

detailed_translations.english: a set of large folded sheets of printed paper containing news, articles, pictures, advertisements etc which is sold daily or weekly

name: uniform
trans: 统一的；一致的；相同的；均衡的；始终如一的

sentences.english: Grade A eggs must be of uniform size.
sentences.chinese: A 级鸡蛋必须大小相同。

detailed_translations.chinese: 统一的；一致的；相同的；均衡的；始终如一的
detailed_translations.english: being the same in all its parts or among all its members
a particular type of clothing worn by all the members of a group or organization such as the police, the army etc

name: support
trans: 支持，支撑，支援；扶持，帮助；赡养，供养
支持，维持；支援，供养；支持者，支撑物

sentences.english: The bill was supported by a large majority in the Senate.
sentences.chinese: 这项法案得到参议院绝大多数人的支持。

sentences.english: We strongly support the peace process.
sentences.chinese: 我们大力拥护和平进程。

detailed_translations.english: to say that you agree with an idea, group, or person, and usually to help them because you want them to succeed

detailed_translations.chinese: 支持， 支撑物， 支持者
detailed_translations.english: something that presses on something else to hold it up or in position

sentences.english: wildlife conservation
sentences.chinese: 野生生物保护

sentences.english: a local conservation group
sentences.chinese: 当地的一个环境保护团体

detailed_translations.english: the protection of natural things such as animals, plants, forests etc, to prevent them from being spoiled or destroyed

sentences.english: We have to tackle the fundamental cause of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须解决问题的根本原因。

sentences.english: the fundamental principles of liberty and equality
sentences.chinese: 自由和平等这两个基本原则

detailed_translations.english: relating to the most basic and important parts of something

sentences.chinese: 当其他人跌倒在路旁时，他们是如何激发自己坚持下去的？

sentences.chinese: 只要举个例子就看得出来了：在这之前，我很少留意于草木花卉，可是现在我发现自己对路边每朵绽开的鲜花、每根生长的小草都兴趣十足。

sentences.english: She beheld the minister advancing along the path, entirely alone, and leaning on a staff which he had cut by the wayside.
sentences.chinese: 她看到牧师正沿着小径走来，他只身一人，只是手中接着一根从路边砍下的手杖。

detailed_translations.english: the side of a road

sentences.english: They have made an urgent request for international aid.
sentences.chinese: 他们紧急请求国际援助。

sentences.english: To request more information, please call our toll free number.
sentences.chinese: 欲知详情，请拨打我们的免费电话。

detailed_translations.english: a polite or formal demand for something
to ask for something in a polite or formal way

sentences.english: ...a coke-burning stove.
sentences.chinese: …一个烧焦炭的炉子。

detailed_translations.english: the drink Coca-Cola, or a bottle, can, or glass of this drink

sentences.chinese: 他在两餐之间吃点东西来补充正餐。

sentences.english: The object of these experiments was to find the connection, if any, between the two phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 这些实验的目的就是探索这两种现象之间的联系，如果存在着任何联系的话。

name: opener
trans: [五金] 开启工具；开启的人

sentences.english: a can opener
sentences.chinese: 开罐器

sentences.english: a bottle opener
sentences.chinese: 开瓶器

detailed_translations.chinese: [五金] 开启工具；开启的人
detailed_translations.english: a tool that is used to open cans, bottles etc

name: credit
trans: 信用，信誉；[金融] 贷款；学分；信任；声望
相信，信任；把…归给，归功于；赞颂

sentences.english: We found his statement hard to credit.
sentences.chinese: 我们觉得他的说法令人难以信服。

sentences.english: The witness’s story gained credit with the jury.
sentences.chinese: 证人的陈述被陪审团采信了。

detailed_translations.english: to believe that something is true
the belief that something is true or correct

trans: 吸收；吸引；承受；理解；使…全神贯注

sentences.chinese: 植物从土壤中吸收养分。

sentences.english: The movement and noise of the machines absorbed him completely.
sentences.chinese: 机器的运转和声响把他完全吸引住了。

detailed_translations.english: to take in liquid, gas, or another substance from the surface or space around something

name: multiply
trans: 乘；使增加；使繁殖；使相乘

sentences.chinese: 儿童在二年级学习乘法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 乘；使增加；使繁殖；使相乘
detailed_translations.english: to do a calculation in which you add a number to itself a particular number of times

name: chocolate
trans: 巧克力，巧克力糖；巧克力色
巧克力色的；巧克力口味的

sentences.chinese: 巧克力条

sentences.english: a chocolate cake
sentences.chinese: 巧克力蛋糕

sentences.english: a packet of chocolate biscuits
sentences.chinese: 一包巧克力饼干

sentences.english: I prefer milk chocolate to dark chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 和黑巧克力比起来，我更喜欢牛奶巧克力。

sentences.english: a box of chocolates
sentences.chinese: 一盒巧克力糖

detailed_translations.english: a sweet brown food that you can eat as a sweet or use in cooking to give foods such as cakes a special sweet taste

sentences.english: a tennis/golf/cricket etc ball
sentences.chinese: 网球/高尔夫球/板球等

sentences.english: Shape the dough into balls
sentences.chinese: 把面团搓成丸子。

sentences.english: The air of the ball began to hum.
sentences.chinese: 舞会的气氛开始活跃起来了。

detailed_translations.english: a round object that is thrown, kicked, or hit in a game or sport

sentences.chinese: 你可以给她开张支票。

detailed_translations.english: a printed piece of paper that you write an amount of money on, sign, and use instead of money to pay for things

sentences.chinese: 这套节目是对俄罗斯广播的。

sentences.english: That transmitter was beamed at Russia.
sentences.chinese: 那台发射机曾用于对俄罗斯广播。

sentences.english: He was doubling for America and Russia.
sentences.chinese: 他给美国和俄罗斯当双重间谍。

detailed_translations.english: Tibetan means belonging or relating to Tibet, or to its people, language, or culture
A Tibetan is an inhabitant of Tibet or a person of Tibetan origin

sentences.english: They lighted the temple with many candles.
sentences.chinese: 他们用许多蜡烛照亮这个寺庙。

sentences.english: The entire valley reverberated with the sound of the temple bells.
sentences.chinese: 整个山谷回荡着庙宇的钟声。

sentences.english: After the fire, nothing remained of the magnificent buildings of the temple.
sentences.chinese: 大火过后， 寺院里的那些雄伟建筑已荡然无存。

detailed_translations.english: a building where people go to  worship  , in the Jewish, Hindu, Buddhist, Sikh, and Mormon religions

name: fire
trans: 火；火灾；炮火；炉火；热情；激情；磨难
点燃；解雇；开除；使发光；烧制；激动；放枪

sentences.english: The warehouse was completely destroyed by fire.
sentences.chinese: 仓库全给烧毁了。

sentences.english: Thirty people died in a fire in downtown Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 30人死于芝加哥市中心的一场火灾。

sentences.english: Police think that the fire was started deliberately.
sentences.chinese: 警方认为有人故意纵火。

sentences.english: Rioters set fire to a whole row of stores (= made them start burning ) .
sentences.chinese: 暴徒纵火焚烧了一整排商店。

sentences.english: Soldiers fired on the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 士兵朝人群开枪。

detailed_translations.english: uncontrolled flames, light, and heat that destroy and damage things
to shoot bullets or bombs

sentences.english: His playing is technically brilliant, but it doesn’t excite me.
sentences.chinese: 他的演奏技巧娴熟，但并不让我激动。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel happy, interested, or eager

sentences.english: The parcel was delivered last week.
sentences.chinese: 那个邮包上周送到了。

sentences.english: He sends regular food parcels to his family in Libya.
sentences.chinese: 他定期给在利比亚的家人邮寄食品包裹。

detailed_translations.english: an object that has been wrapped in paper or put in a special envelope, especially so that it can be sent by post

sentences.english: the ability to walk
sentences.chinese: 行走的能力

sentences.english: The test measures your mathematical ability.
sentences.chinese: 这种测试考查的是数学能力。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being able to do something

sentences.english: My baby gets upset when I leave the room.
sentences.chinese: 我一离开房间宝宝就会不安。

sentences.english: Before leaving the train, make sure you have all your belongings with you.
sentences.chinese: 下火车前一定要带好随身物品。

sentences.english: Leave the motorway at Junction 7.
sentences.chinese: 请在七号交叉路口驶离高速公路。

sentences.english: My youngest boy has not left my side (= has stayed near me ) since his daddy was killed.
sentences.chinese: 我最小的儿子自从他爸爸死后就没有离开过我的身边。

detailed_translations.english: to go away from a place or a person
to go away from a place or a person

name: handle
trans: 处理；操作；运用；买卖；触摸

sentences.english: I handled most of the paperwork.
sentences.chinese: 大部分文书工作是我做的。

sentences.english: The case is being handled by a top lawyer.
sentences.chinese: 此案正由一位顶尖律师负责处理。

sentences.english: The finance department handles all the accounts.
sentences.chinese: 财务部处理所有账目。

sentences.english: Computers can handle huge amounts of data.
sentences.chinese: 计算机能处理大量数据。

detailed_translations.english: to do the things that are necessary to complete a job

sentences.english: Wicky peeked at John's flashlight.
sentences.chinese: 威奇向约翰的手电筒瞥了一眼。

sentences.english: Do you have a flashlight?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有手电筒？

detailed_translations.english: a small electric light that you can carry in your hand

name: keyboard
trans: 键入；用键盘式排字机排字

sentences.english: a computer keyboard
sentences.chinese: 计算机键盘

detailed_translations.english: a board with buttons marked with letters or numbers that are pressed to put information into a computer or other machine

detailed_translations.chinese: 键入；用键盘式排字机排字
detailed_translations.english: to put information into a computer, using a keyboard

sentences.english: a presidential candidate
sentences.chinese: 总统候选人

sentences.english: Candidates are not allowed to use a calculator in this exam.
sentences.chinese: 这次考试的应试者不可以使用计算器。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is being considered for a job or is competing in an election

sentences.english: a colour photograph
sentences.chinese: 彩色照片

sentences.english: a black and white photograph
sentences.chinese: 黑白照片

sentences.english: Tim was looking through an old photograph album (= book in which you put photographs ) .
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆在翻看一本旧相册。

sentences.english: Did you see Leo’s photograph (= a photograph of Leo ) in the newspaper?
sentences.chinese: 你看到报纸上利奥的照片了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a picture obtained by using a camera and film that is sensitive to light
to take a photograph of someone or something

sentences.english: a glass bowl
sentences.chinese: 玻璃碗

sentences.english: a piece of broken glass
sentences.chinese: 一块碎玻璃片

sentences.english: the cathedral’s stained glass windows
sentences.chinese: 教堂的彩色玻璃窗

sentences.english: Nigel raised his glass in a toast to his son.
sentences.chinese: 奈杰尔举杯向儿子祝酒。

detailed_translations.english: a transparent solid substance used for making windows, bottles etc

sentences.english: the traditions of South East Asia
sentences.chinese: 东南亚的传统

sentences.english: the tradition that the eldest son inherits the property
sentences.chinese: 长子继承家产的传统

sentences.english: By tradition, it’s the bride’s parents who pay for the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 根据传统习俗，婚礼的费用由新娘的父母承担。

detailed_translations.english: a belief, custom, or way of doing something that has existed for a long time, or these beliefs, customs etc in general

sentences.english: We all defer to her in these matters.
sentences.chinese: 在这些事情上我们都听她的。

sentences.english: Are these all yours?
sentences.chinese: 这些都是你的吗?

sentences.english: Bear these thoughts with you as you go out into the world.
sentences.chinese: 当你出去走入社会时你把这些思想牢记在心。

sentences.english: They are both teachers. Otherwise they are quite unlike.
sentences.chinese: 他们两位都是教师；除此之外他们迥然不同。

sentences.english: Music is quite unlike any other art form.
sentences.chinese: 音乐与其他艺术形式迥然不同。

detailed_translations.english: not alike
completely different from a particular person or thing

sentences.english: Karen had seldom seen him so angry.
sentences.chinese: 卡伦很少见他这么生气过。

detailed_translations.english: very rarely or almost never

sentences.english: a business that wants to please its customers
sentences.chinese: 希望让顾客满意的一家公司

sentences.english: She did everything she could to please him.
sentences.chinese: 她千方百计讨好他。

sentences.english: Most children are eager to please .
sentences.chinese: 大多数孩子都渴望取悦别人。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone happy or satisfied

sentences.english: He struggled to overcome his shyness.
sentences.chinese: 他努力克服自己的羞怯。

detailed_translations.chinese: 起义( rise的过去式)；升起；（数量）增加；休会

sentences.chinese: 这些女性访问了七个州的城市。

detailed_translations.english: the number 7
the number 7

sentences.chinese: 她想当芭蕾舞演员。

trans: 生气的；愤怒的；狂暴的；（伤口等）发炎的

sentences.chinese: 他的话激起反对派政客愤怒的回应。

sentences.chinese: “冷静一下。”她看着他那张生气的脸说道。

sentences.chinese: 杰西笑了起来，这令我更加恼火。

trans: 到期的；预期的；应付的；应得的

sentences.chinese: 她经常出国公干。

name: sunny

trans: (Ever)人名；(英)埃弗；(俄)叶韦尔；(西、法)埃韦尔

sentences.chinese: 那片礁石周围的水域生活着1,500多种不同的鱼类。

sentences.chinese: 白葡萄酒一般配鱼喝

sentences.chinese: 爸爸很喜欢钓鱼。

sentences.chinese: 明亮的光线刺痛了她的眼睛。

sentences.chinese: 明亮的大房间

sentences.chinese: 他是个特别聪明的孩子。

sentences.english: They sat around the campfire, watching the flickering flames .
sentences.chinese: 他们围坐在篝火旁，看着跳动的火焰。

sentences.chinese: 火焰很快吞噬了大楼。

trans: 光；光线；灯；打火机；领悟；浅色；天窗

sentences.chinese: 你可以拿这个袋子——它很轻。

detailed_translations.chinese: 实物， 物体； 目的， 目标； 对象， 客体； 宾语

name: workday
trans: 日常的，工作日的；平凡的

sentences.english: Have you seen any good films recently?
sentences.chinese: 你最近看过什么好的影片吗？

sentences.english: I shot five rolls of film on vacation.
sentences.chinese: 我在度假时拍了五卷胶卷。

sentences.english: a film of oil on the surface of the water

sentences.chinese: 战争一结束他就退休了。

sentences.english: Those most immediately involved in the disaster will be given support.
