sentences.chinese: 你比萨莉大吗？

sentences.english: You’re old enough to get your own breakfast now.
sentences.chinese: 你现在已经长大，可以自己弄早餐了。

sentences.english: I’m not coming skating. I’m too old for that now.
sentences.chinese: 我不去玩溜冰，我现在太老玩不动了。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is old has lived for a very long time

sentences.english: a big house
sentences.chinese: 大房子

sentences.english: I need a bigger desk.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一张大一点的桌子。

sentences.english: She had a big grin on her face.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上挂着大大的笑容。

sentences.english: a big increase in crime
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率的大幅上升

sentences.english: Los Angeles is the biggest city in California.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶是加利福尼亚最大的城市。

sentences.english: The garage isn’t big enough for two cars.
sentences.chinese: 这个车库不够大，停不下两辆汽车。

sentences.english: When they lose, they lose in a big way (=  to a large degree  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们要输就输得很惨。

sentences.english: There was this great big (=  extremely big  ) spider in the sink.
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽里有只特大的蜘蛛。

detailed_translations.english: of more than average size or amount

name: anyway
trans: 无论如何，不管怎样；总之

sentences.english: I know I'll be confronted with difficulties, but I will squeak by anyway.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我会遇到许多困难，可我无论如何总能应付过去。

detailed_translations.english: used to indicate that a statement explains or supports a previous statement

sentences.english: So when you fry, bake, grill, or roast potatoes you could be generating potentially harmful carcinogens.
sentences.chinese: 因此当你油炸、烘烤、烧烤或者炒土豆时，有可能会产生有害的致癌物。

detailed_translations.english: the young of various species of fish
to cook something in hot fat or oil, or to be cooked in hot fat or oil

name: commitment
trans: 承诺，保证；委托；承担义务；献身

sentences.english: Are you ready to make a long-term commitment ?
sentences.chinese: 你是否准备好作出长久的承诺？

detailed_translations.english: a promise to do something or to behave in a particular way

sentences.english: It looks like we’ll have to stand – there are no seats left.
sentences.chinese: 看来我们只能站着——没有座位了。

sentences.english: She stood in the doorway.
sentences.chinese: 她站在门口。

sentences.english: (= do not move ) and listen to me.
sentences.chinese: 站好别动，听我说。

sentences.english: Don’t just stand there (= stand and not do anything ) – help me!
sentences.chinese: 不要光站在那里，帮帮我！

detailed_translations.english: to support yourself on your feet or be in an upright position
used to say that you do not like someone or something at all, or that you think that something is extremely unpleasant
a piece of furniture or equipment used to hold or support something

sentences.english: He transplanted his family to Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他把家迁到澳大利亚。

sentences.english: He went out to Australia about five years ago.
sentences.chinese: 他大约在五年前移居澳大利亚。

sentences.english: Australia won the toss and put England in to bat.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚队掷币获胜，要求英格兰队首先击球。

sentences.english: After a few days of fever, she began to recover.
sentences.chinese: 发烧几天之后，她开始恢复。

sentences.english: Two bodies were recovered from the wreckage.
sentences.chinese: 残骸中找到了两具尸体

detailed_translations.english: to get better after an illness, accident, shock etc

name: pint
trans: 品脱；一品脱的量；一品脱牛奶或啤酒

sentences.english: Add two pints of water to the mixture.
sentences.chinese: 在混合物中加入两品脱的水。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring an amount of liquid, especially beer or milk. In Britain a pint is equal to 0.568 litres, and in the US it is equal to 0.473 litres.

sentences.english: a pack of wolves
sentences.chinese: 一群狼

detailed_translations.english: a wild animal that looks like a large dog and lives and hunts in groups
to eat something very quickly, swallowing it in big pieces

sentences.english: all the living creatures in the sea
sentences.chinese: 海洋中所有的生物

detailed_translations.english: anything that is living, such as an animal, fish, or insect, but not a plant

name: sentence
trans: [语][计] 句子，命题；宣判，判决

sentences.english: She received an eight-year prison sentence.
sentences.chinese: 她被判八年徒刑。

sentences.english: He has just begun a life sentence for murder.
sentences.chinese: 他犯了谋杀罪，刚开始服无期徒刑。

sentences.english: Sanchez was sentenced to three years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 桑切斯被判了三年监禁。

detailed_translations.english: a punishment that a judge gives to someone who is guilty of a crime
if a judge sentences someone who is guilty of a crime, they give them a punishment

sentences.english: We moved to Center Street when I was young.
sentences.chinese: 在我小时候，我们搬到了中心大街。

sentences.english: She lives just a few streets away.
sentences.chinese: 她的住处就在几条街外。

sentences.english: I walked on further down the street .
sentences.chinese: 我继续沿着马路走。

sentences.english: Someone just moved in across the street .
sentences.chinese: 街对面有人刚刚搬进来。

sentences.english: a car parked on the other side of the street
sentences.chinese: 停在街对面的一辆车

detailed_translations.english: a public road in a city or town that has houses, shops etc on one or both sides

sentences.english: Two flashes mean danger.
sentences.chinese: 两次闪光表示危险。

sentences.english: Lightning flashed overhead.
sentences.chinese: 头顶上电光闪闪。

detailed_translations.english: a bright light that shines for a short time and then stops shining
to shine suddenly and brightly for a short time, or to make something shine in this way

sentences.english: ...equality of the sexes.
sentences.chinese: …性别平等。

detailed_translations.chinese: 等同； 平等； 相等
detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people have the same rights, advantages etc

sentences.english: The report seeks to relate the rise in crime to an increase in unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 报告试图把犯罪率上升和失业增加联系起来。

sentences.english: He later related the whole story to me.
sentences.chinese: 他后来给我讲了整件事的来龙去脉。

detailed_translations.english: if you relate two different things, you show how they are connected

sentences.english: The country has made great advances since independence.
sentences.chinese: 该国自独立以来发展迅速。

detailed_translations.chinese: 独立； 自主； 自立
detailed_translations.english: political freedom from control by the government of another country

sentences.english: the basic principles of chemistry
sentences.chinese: 化学的基本原理

sentences.english: The basic idea is simple.
sentences.chinese: 基本思想很简单。

sentences.english: basic research
sentences.chinese: 基础研究

sentences.english: basic information
sentences.chinese: 基本信息

detailed_translations.english: forming the most important or most necessary part of something

sentences.english: My diet consisted almost exclusively of chocolate-covered cookies and glasses of milk.
sentences.chinese: 我的饮食几乎只包含裹上巧克力的曲奇饼和一杯杯牛奶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 由…组成； 在于； 一致

sentences.english: They own a lot of land.
sentences.chinese: 他们拥有许多土地。

sentences.english: He bought a piece of land.
sentences.chinese: 他买了一块地。

sentences.english: After 21 days at sea, we sighted land.
sentences.chinese: 经过21天的海上航行，我们见到了陆地。

detailed_translations.english: an area of ground, especially when used for farming or building

sentences.english: road users
sentences.chinese: 道路使用者

sentences.english: a computer user
sentences.chinese: 电脑用户

sentences.english: library users
sentences.chinese: 图书馆的读者

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that uses a product, service etc

sentences.english: Messages from the brain are carried by the central nervous system.
sentences.chinese: 大脑发出的信息是通过中枢神经系统传递的。

sentences.english: the chemistry of the brain
sentences.chinese: 大脑的化学性质

sentences.english: the human brain
sentences.chinese: 人脑

sentences.english: She died of a brain tumour.
sentences.chinese: 她死于脑瘤。

sentences.english: The job requires brains.
sentences.chinese: 做这工作需要头脑。

detailed_translations.english: the organ inside your head that controls how you think, feel, and move

sentences.english: I think London was a good choice as a venue.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得伦敦是个很好的选址。

sentences.english: choice steak
sentences.chinese: 上等牛排

detailed_translations.english: the person or thing that someone chooses
(especially of food) of very good quality

sentences.english: Several senators introduced legislation aimed at sexual harassment.
sentences.chinese: 几位参议员提交了针对性骚扰的立法议案。

detailed_translations.english: to formally present a possible new law to be discussed

name: ride
trans: 骑；乘坐；交通工具；可供骑行的路；（乘坐汽车等的）旅行；乘骑；（乘车或骑车的）短途旅程；供乘骑的游乐设施

sentences.english: She learned to ride when she was seven.
sentences.chinese: 她七岁时学会了骑马。

sentences.english: He was riding a large grey mare.
sentences.chinese: 他骑着一匹灰色的大母马。

sentences.english: He prefers travelling on the subway to riding in a limousine.
sentences.chinese: 他宁愿乘坐地铁出行而不愿乘坐豪华加长轿车。

sentences.english: She took some friends for a ride in the family car.
sentences.chinese: 她用私家车载了朋友们一程。

detailed_translations.english: to sit on an animal, especially a horse, and make it move along
a trip on a horse or bicycle, or in a vehicle.

sentences.english: Swimming helps to get the blood circulating through the muscles.
sentences.chinese: 游泳有助于肌肉的血液循环。

sentences.english: Ceiling fans circulated warm air around the room.
sentences.chinese: 吊扇使暖空气在房间里循环。

detailed_translations.english: to move around within a system, or to make something do this
to move around within a system, or to make something do this

sentences.english: He was a very nice person, always pleasant and friendly.
sentences.chinese: 他是个很好的人，始终彬彬有礼。

sentences.english: The only person who really said anything helpful was Jack.
sentences.chinese: 只有一个人真正说了些有用的话，就是杰克。

sentences.english: I like her as a person , but not as a boss.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢她这个人，但作为老板我就不喜欢了。

sentences.english: I still know quite a lot of people in the village.
sentences.chinese: 我仍然认识村里的很多人。

sentences.english: a group of young people
sentences.chinese: 一群年轻人

sentences.english: You have to sign for it in person.
sentences.chinese: 你必须亲自签收。

detailed_translations.english: a human being, especially considered as someone with their own particular character

sentences.english: She puts her baby in this nursery and then goes back to work.
sentences.chinese: 她把孩子送到这家托儿所然后回去上班。

sentences.english: The garden, developed over the past 35 years, includes a nursery.
sentences.chinese: 这个有35年历史的花园里有一个苗圃。

detailed_translations.english: a place where young children are taken care of during the day while their parents are at work

name: regards
trans: 视为，注意（regard的第三人称单数）

sentences.english: Please give him my regards.
sentences.chinese: 请转达我对他的问候。

sentences.english: Should you happen to see him, please give him my regards.
sentences.chinese: 如果你碰巧见到他，请代我向他致意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 视为，注意（regard的第三人称单数）

sentences.english: That postman is in charge of this route.
sentences.chinese: 那个邮递员负责这条投递线路。

sentences.english: The old man often stands here to watch out for the postman.
sentences.chinese: 老人常常站在这儿等邮递员。

sentences.english: At the door he met an intelligent postman coming out with letters for the morning delivery.
sentences.chinese: 他在邮政总局门口碰见一个伶俐的邮差，拿着信从邮局走出来，去送早班信。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to collect and deliver letters

name: sceptical
trans: 怀疑的；怀疑论的；习惯怀疑的

sentences.english: Others here are more sceptical about the chances for justice being done.
sentences.chinese: 这里的其他人更为怀疑正义能否得到伸张。

detailed_translations.chinese: 怀疑的；怀疑论的；习惯怀疑的
detailed_translations.english: If you are sceptical about something, you have doubts about it

name: cruel
trans: 残酷的，残忍的；使人痛苦的，让人受难的；无情的，严酷的

sentences.english: His death was a cruel blow .
sentences.chinese: 他的死是个无情的打击。

sentences.english: Sometimes life seems unbearably cruel.
sentences.chinese: 有时候生活残酷得让人无法承受。

detailed_translations.chinese: 残酷的，残忍的；使人痛苦的，让人受难的；无情的，严酷的
detailed_translations.english: making someone suffer or feel unhappy

sentences.english: Ann didn’t seem very sure.
sentences.chinese: 安看来并不十分肯定。

sentences.english: It seems a foolish decision now.
sentences.chinese: 现在看来这是一个愚蠢的决定。

sentences.english: It seems like you’re catching a cold, Taylor.
sentences.chinese: 你好像感冒了，泰勒。

sentences.english: ‘So Bill’s leaving her?’ ‘ So it seems (= that seems to be true ) .’
sentences.chinese: “这么说来，比尔要离开她？”“好像是这样。”

detailed_translations.english: if something seems to be true, there are qualities or facts that make people think it is true

sentences.english: Access is by means of a small door on the right.
sentences.chinese: 入口是右边的一扇小门。

detailed_translations.chinese: 接近；通道，入口；接近的机会
detailed_translations.english: the way you use to enter a building or reach a place
to find information, especially on a computer

name: statement
trans: 声明；陈述，叙述；报表，清单

sentences.english: In an official statement, she formally announced her resignation.
sentences.chinese: 在一份官方声明中，她正式宣布辞职。

detailed_translations.chinese: 陈述， 声明； 结算单， 报表
detailed_translations.english: something you say or write, especially publicly or officially, to let people know your intentions or opinions, or to record facts

name: ambiguous
trans: 模糊不清的；引起歧义的

sentences.english: The language in the Minister’s statement is highly ambiguous.
sentences.chinese: 部长的声明措辞很含糊。

sentences.english: His role in the affair is ambiguous.
sentences.chinese: 他在这起事件中的角色并不明确。

detailed_translations.english: that can be understood in more than one way; having different meanings

sentences.english: I live on an island.
sentences.chinese: 我住在一个岛上。

sentences.english: Then one day, an English ship anchored near the island.
sentences.chinese: 然后有一天，一艘英国船在岛附近抛锚了。

sentences.english: This is because the island is so close to the equator. So you can choose to go whenever you like.
sentences.chinese: 就因为这个岛是如此接近赤道。所以只要你愿意你任何时候都可以去。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of land completely surrounded by water

name: honey
trans: 对…说甜言蜜语；加蜜使甜

sentences.english: Hi, honey.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，亲爱的。

detailed_translations.english: a sweet sticky substance produced by  bees  , used as food

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…说甜言蜜语；加蜜使甜

name: wherever
trans: 无论什么地方；究竟在哪里
无论在哪里；无论什么情况下

sentences.english: Children will play wherever they happen to be.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子走到哪里玩到哪里。

sentences.english: Sit wherever you like.
sentences.chinese: 随便坐吧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无论什么地方；究竟在哪里
detailed_translations.english: to or at any place, position, or situation

detailed_translations.chinese: 无论在哪里；无论什么情况下

sentences.english: ‘Would you like a sandwich?’ ‘Yes, please.’
sentences.chinese: “你想来个三明治吗？”“好的，谢谢。”

sentences.english: ‘Would you like to come with us?’ ‘Yes, I’d love to.’
sentences.chinese: “你想和我们一起去吗？”“好的，我很乐意。”

detailed_translations.english: used as an answer to say that you want something or want to do something

name: breathless
trans: 喘不过气来的；停止呼吸的

sentences.english: The long climb left Jan feeling breathless.
sentences.chinese: 攀爬了那么长时间，简感到喘不过气来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 喘不过气来的；停止呼吸的
detailed_translations.english: having difficulty breathing, especially because you are very tired, excited, or frightened

name: golf
trans: 高尔夫球；高尔夫球运动

sentences.english: He plays golf on Sundays.
sentences.chinese: 他星期天都去打高尔夫球。

sentences.english: a round of golf
sentences.chinese: 一场高尔夫球赛

detailed_translations.chinese: 高尔夫球；高尔夫球运动
detailed_translations.english: a game in which the players hit a small white ball into holes in the ground with a set of golf clubs, using as few hits as possible

sentences.english: Danger! No boats beyond this point.
sentences.chinese: 危险！船只不可越过此处。

sentences.english: The refugees believe that their lives are in danger .
sentences.chinese: 难民认为他们有生命危险。

detailed_translations.english: the possibility that someone or something will be harmed, destroyed, or killed

name: interest
trans: 兴趣，爱好；利息；趣味；同行
使……感兴趣；引起……的关心；使……参与

sentences.english: I watched the first few episodes, but soon lost interest.
sentences.chinese: 我看了前几集，但很快就失去了兴趣。

sentences.english: The last round of bidding aroused considerable interest.
sentences.chinese: 最后一轮竞价引起人们相当大的兴趣。

sentences.english: Our survey reveals a disturbing lack of interest in teacher training.
sentences.chinese: 我们的调查显示人们对教师培训失去了兴趣，这很令人不安。

sentences.english: I read your article with great interest.
sentences.chinese: 我兴致勃勃地拜读了您的文章。

sentences.english: to promote/protect/safeguard sb's interests
sentences.chinese: 为某人的利益游说；保护 / 维护某人的利益

sentences.english: The money was repaid with interest.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱是带息偿还的。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that you have when you want to know or learn more about sb/sth

sentences.english: Residents panicked as flaming petrol poured down the street.
sentences.chinese: 燃烧的汽油沿街流淌，居民惊慌失措。

detailed_translations.english: covered with flames

sentences.english: temporary pain relief
sentences.chinese: 疼痛的暂时缓解

sentences.english: I’m living with my parents, but it’s only temporary.
sentences.chinese: 我和父母住在一起，但这只是暂时的。

sentences.english: You might want to consider temporary work until you decide what you want to do.
sentences.chinese: 在你定下来想做什么之前，也许可以考虑干点临时性工作。

sentences.english: She was employed on a temporary basis .
sentences.chinese: 她是受雇干临时性工作的。

detailed_translations.english: continuing for only a limited period of time

sentences.english: We have accomplished all we set out to do.
sentences.chinese: 所有计划要做的事情，我们都已完成。

sentences.english: Mission accomplished(=  we have done what we intended to do  ) .
sentences.chinese: 大功告成。

detailed_translations.english: to succeed in doing something, especially after trying very hard

sentences.english: stupid mistakes
sentences.chinese: 愚蠢的错误

sentences.english: That was a stupid thing to say.
sentences.chinese: 那样说可真傻。

sentences.english: I can’t believe Kate was stupid enough to get involved in this.
sentences.chinese: 我简直不能相信凯特这么傻，会介入这件事情。

sentences.english: It was stupid of me to lose my temper.
sentences.chinese: 我大发脾气，真是太愚蠢了。

detailed_translations.english: showing a lack of good sense or good judgment
an insulting way of talking to someone who you think is being stupid

sentences.english: a tube of glue
sentences.chinese: 一管胶水

sentences.english: The sheets are glued together with strong adhesive.
sentences.chinese: 薄板用强力胶粘在一起。

detailed_translations.english: a sticky substance used for joining things together
to join two things together using glue

name: exercise
trans: 运动；练习；运用；操练；礼拜；典礼
锻炼；练习；使用；使忙碌；使惊恐

sentences.english: Try to fit some regular exercise into your daily routine.
sentences.chinese: 尽量在日常生活中安排一些经常性的锻炼。

sentences.english: Working in an office, I don’t get much exercise.
sentences.chinese: 由于在办公室工作，我很少运动。

sentences.english: role-play exercises
sentences.chinese: 角色扮演练习

sentences.english: Horses need to be exercised regularly.
sentences.chinese: 马需要有规律的训练。

detailed_translations.english: physical activities that you do in order to stay healthy and become stronger
to do sports or other physical activities in order to stay healthy or become stronger; to make an animal do this

sentences.english: Five lucky winners will each receive a signed copy of the album.
sentences.chinese: 五位幸运的获胜者每人将得到一张签名专辑。

sentences.english: As a jockey he rode 10 winners.
sentences.chinese: 作为骑师他曾十度驾驭获胜赛马。

detailed_translations.english: a person or animal that has won something

name: sandwich
trans: 夹入；挤进；把做成三明治

sentences.english: Carefully split the sponge ring, then sandwich the two halves together with whipped cream.

two pieces of bread with cheese, meat, cooked egg etc between them

sentences.english: national and international economic trends

trans: 种子；根据；精液；萌芽；子孙；原由

name: out
trans: 出现；在外；出局；出声地；不流行地

sentences.chinese: “请给我来杯啤酒。”“好的，先生。”

sentences.chinese: “我可以一起去吗？”“当然可以。”

sentences.chinese: 有人见到我的钥匙吗？我哪儿都找不到。

sentences.chinese: 他从沙发上猛然跳了起来。

sentences.chinese: 圣城瓦拉纳西

behaviour that is not morally right

detailed_translations.english: not correct, and not based on true facts
Wrong is also an adverb

sentences.chinese: 主要作物是燕麦和大麦。

强调；使紧张；加压力于；用重音读

sentences.chinese: 克劳福德强调市中心需要建更多的住宅。

sentences.chinese: 今天早上我去了一个以自助早午餐而闻名的餐厅。

sentences.chinese: 工会领袖们在争取工作场所权利的斗争中正迈向胜利。

sentences.chinese: 她独自一人在家感到不安全。

sentences.chinese: 我持爱尔兰护照。

sentences.chinese: 孕妇保健

sentences.chinese: 我们往上走了四段楼梯。

sentences.chinese: 他们不得不同各种困境斗争。

sentences.chinese: 充足的淡水供应

sentences.chinese: 提供给高素质的员工的大量机会

sentences.chinese: 她给出了这个单词的法语发音。

sentences.chinese: 她被找到时还活着，但已不省人事。

detailed_translations.english: unable to see, move, feel etc in the normal way because you are not conscious

sentences.chinese: 种族歧视的受害者

sentences.chinese: 需保护社区里的这一部分人，使其免受种族偏见的伤害。

sentences.chinese: 争取种族平等的运动

sentences.english: the need for tolerance and racial harmony
sentences.chinese: 包容与种族融洽的必要性

detailed_translations.english: relating to the relationships between different races of people who now live in the same country or area

sentences.chinese: 你犯了许多愚蠢的错误。

sentences.chinese: 我干了件傻事，把钥匙落在家里了。

sentences.chinese: “我们去散步吧？”“别犯傻了，天都黑了。”

sentences.chinese: 一个偏远的边境小镇

sentences.chinese: 偏远山区的火灾

sentences.english: From whom shall I get comfort?
sentences.chinese: 我从谁那儿能得到安慰呢?

sentences.english: The dispute at the moment revolved about the question of whom to send.
sentences.chinese: 当时的争论是围绕着派谁去好这一问题而进行的。

name: mind
trans: 理智，精神；意见；智力；记忆力

sentences.english: It is impossible to understand the complex nature of the human mind.
sentences.chinese: 要想了解人类思维复杂的特性是不可能的。

sentences.english: Mind and body are closely related.
sentences.chinese: 思想和肉体紧密相连。

sentences.english: Meditation involves focusing the mind on a single object or word.
sentences.chinese: 冥想需要把思想集中在一个物体或单词上。

sentences.english: Sorry─your name has gone right out of my mind.
sentences.chinese: 对不起——我完全想不起你的名字了。

detailed_translations.english: your thoughts or your ability to think, feel, and imagine things

sentences.english: A strong gust of wind blew the car sideways into the ditch.
sentences.chinese: 一阵狂风把汽车横着掀进了沟里。

sentences.english: Alfred shot him a sideways glance.
sentences.chinese: 艾尔弗雷德斜着眼看了他一下。

detailed_translations.english: to or towards one side
Sideways is also an adjective

name: spare
trans: 节约，吝惜；饶恕；分出，分让

sentences.english: Sorry, I can’t spare the time.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我抽不出时间。

sentences.english: Have you got any spare boxes?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有多余的盒子？

sentences.english: You could sleep in the spare bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 你可以睡那间空着的客房。

sentences.english: Do you have any spare cash?
sentences.chinese: 你手头有闲钱吗？

sentences.english: I’ll go and see if there are any spare seats.
sentences.chinese: 我去看看是否还有空余的座位。

sentences.english: A decline in beer sales had left the industry with spare capacity (= the ability to produce more than can be sold ) .
sentences.chinese: 啤酒销售量的下降使该行业出现产能闲置。

detailed_translations.english: to make something such as time, money, or workers available for someone, especially when this is difficult for you to do
not being used or not needed at the present time

name: unique
trans: 独特的，稀罕的；[数] 唯一的，独一无二的

sentences.english: Each person’s fingerprints are unique.
sentences.chinese: 每个人的指纹都是独一无二的。

detailed_translations.english: being the only one of its kind

sentences.english: Italian food has been exported all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 意大利食品已传遍世界。

detailed_translations.english: to sell goods to another country
to sell goods to another country
the business of selling and sending goods to other countries

name: success
trans: 成功，成就；胜利；大获成功的人或事物

sentences.english: The experiment was a big success.
sentences.chinese: 实验非常成功。

detailed_translations.chinese: 成功，成就；胜利；大获成功的人或事物
detailed_translations.english: when you achieve what you want or intend

name: mess
trans: 混乱；食堂，伙食团；困境；脏乱的东西

sentences.english: What a mess!
sentences.chinese: 太乱了！

sentences.english: Sorry – the place is a bit of a mess .
sentences.chinese: 对不起——这里有些乱。

sentences.english: When I got home, the house was a complete mess .
sentences.chinese: 我回到家时，屋子里一片狼藉。

sentences.english: You can make cookies if you promise not to make a mess in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 如果你答应不把厨房搞得乱七八糟，你可以去做甜饼。

sentences.english: She hates mess.
sentences.chinese: 她讨厌到处乱糟糟的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 凌乱状态，混乱的局面；困境
detailed_translations.english: if there is a mess somewhere or a place is a mess, things there are dirty or not neatly arranged

detailed_translations.chinese: 弄糟， 弄脏， 搞乱
detailed_translations.english: to make something look untidy or dirty

sentences.english: Send the letter by airmail.
sentences.chinese: 这封信用航空邮寄。

detailed_translations.english: letters and packages that are sent somewhere using a plane, or the system of doing this

sentences.english: Nobody would believe that I was innocent.
sentences.chinese: 没人肯相信我是清白的。

sentences.english: The court found him innocent and he was released.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判他无罪，他被释放了。

sentences.english: She had always regarded Greg as a hopeless innocent where women were concerned.
sentences.chinese: 她过去一直认为格雷格在关于女人方面是一个不可救药的无知者。

detailed_translations.english: not guilty of a crime
An innocent is someone who is innocent

sentences.english: ‘He looked angry.’ ‘ I don’t care !’
sentences.chinese: “他好像很生气。”“我不管！”

sentences.english: She felt that nobody cared.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得没有人在乎。

sentences.english: The picture had been drawn with great care.
sentences.chinese: 这幅图画得非常用心。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is important, so that you are interested in it, worried about it etc
when you are careful to avoid damage, mistakes etc

name: grand
trans: 宏伟的；豪华的；极重要的

sentences.english: a grand country house
sentences.chinese: 豪华的乡间大宅

sentences.english: The party was a grand affair.
sentences.chinese: 这个聚会场面隆重。

sentences.english: New Yorkers build on a grand scale.
sentences.chinese: 纽约人喜欢建高楼大厦。

detailed_translations.english: big and very impressive

name: triangle
trans: 三角（形）；三角关系；三角形之物；三人一组

sentences.english: Yes, it is like a triangle.
sentences.chinese: 是的，它象一个三角形。

sentences.english: So, we have to find the area of the triangle.
sentences.chinese: 因此我们必须求出三角形的面积。

sentences.english: It can measure not only the sine wave, square wave, triangle wave, a sharp pulse but also can measure other characteristics of the signal wave.
sentences.chinese: 它不仅可以测量正弦波、方波、三角波、尖脉冲信号和其他具有周期特性的信号的频率，而且还可以测量它们的周期。

detailed_translations.english: a flat shape with three straight sides and three angles

name: full
trans: 完全的，完整的；满的，充满的；丰富的；完美的；丰满的；详尽的

sentences.english: The train was completely full.
sentences.chinese: 火车坐得满满的。

sentences.english: Don’t talk with your mouth full.
sentences.chinese: 嘴里塞满东西时不要说话。

sentences.english: The class is full, but you can register for next term.
sentences.chinese: 这个班已经满了，不过你可以注册下学期的。

sentences.english: The Health Centre offers a full range of services.
sentences.chinese: 医疗中心提供全套服务。

detailed_translations.english: containing as much or as many things or people as possible, so there is no space left

sentences.english: She read the letter and gave us a rough translation (= she did not translate everything exactly ) .
sentences.chinese: 她看了信，给我们大概翻译了一下。

sentences.english: I’ve only read ‘Madame Bovary’ in translation (= not in its original language ) .
sentences.chinese: 我只读过《包法利夫人》的翻译本。

sentences.english: Much of the book’s humour has been lost in translation (= is no longer effective when translated ) .
sentences.chinese: 本书的许多幽默元素已在翻译过程中丢失。

detailed_translations.english: when you translate something, or something that has been translated

name: pound
trans: 英镑；重击，重击声；兽栏；拘留所

sentences.english: They spent over a thousand pounds.
sentences.chinese: 他们花了一千多英镑。

sentences.english: a multi-million pound business
sentences.chinese: 一笔几百万英镑的生意

sentences.english: a five pound note
sentences.chinese: 五英镑的纸币

sentences.english: She pounded the corn kernels.
sentences.chinese: 她捣碎了玉米粒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 英镑；重击，重击声；兽栏；拘留所
detailed_translations.english: the standard unit of money in Britain, which is divided into 100 pence
If you pound something, you crush it into a paste or a powder or into very small pieces

sentences.english: Davis was found not guilty on all counts .
sentences.chinese: 戴维斯受到指控的各项罪名均不成立。

detailed_translations.english: one of the crimes that someone is charged with

name: or
trans: (Or)人名；(中)柯(广东话·威妥玛)；(柬)奥；(土、匈、土库、阿塞、瑞典)奥尔

sentences.english: Shall we go out to the cinema or stay at home?
sentences.chinese: 我们是出去看电影还是待在家里？

sentences.english: You can have ham, cheese, or tuna.
sentences.chinese: 你可以选择火腿、干酪或者金枪鱼。

sentences.english: She wasn’t involved in drugs or anything like that.
sentences.chinese: 她没有涉毒之类的行为。

sentences.english: Grapes are usually either green or red.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄一般要么是绿色，要么是红色。

sentences.english: He’s going to do it whether we like it or not.
sentences.chinese: 不管我们喜欢与否，他都会去做这件事。

sentences.english: It’s going to snow tomorrow, or that’s what the forecast says.
sentences.chinese: 明天要下雪，确切地说，气象预报是这样说的。

detailed_translations.english: used between two words or phrases to show that either of two things is possible, or used before the last in a list of possibilities or choices

sentences.english: Each man had a paddle for an hour and then a rest.
sentences.chinese: 每人划一小时桨， 然后休息一下。

sentences.english: We strive to paddle to follow the stream, however, we are unsure if how and when we will reach the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着河流奋力划桨，但是我们无法确定我们什么时候和怎样才能到达地平线。

sentences.english: If you run your team as if they were self-leading, but in reality they’re chaos, then before long you’ll be heading up a certain creek without a paddle.
sentences.chinese: 如果你当他们是自我引导型的团队在运作，但其实他们事实上还是在混乱的状态，那么不久你就会在一条河上像没有桨似的乱窜。

detailed_translations.english: a short pole that is wide and flat at the end, used for moving a small boat in water
to move a small light boat through water, using one or more paddles

sentences.english: an invitation to speak at a scientific conference
sentences.chinese: 在科学大会上发言的邀请

sentences.english: We sent out more than 300 wedding invitations.
sentences.chinese: 我们发出了超过300份婚礼请柬。

detailed_translations.english: a written or spoken request to someone, inviting them to go somewhere or do something

sentences.english: Did you get a good mark in the test?
sentences.chinese: 你这次测验成绩好吗？

detailed_translations.english: a set of questions, exercises, or practical activities to measure someone’s skill, ability, or knowledge
to examine a substance or thing in order to find out its qualities or what it contains

sentences.english: Clean out the bathtub when you are done.
sentences.chinese: 洗完澡后请把浴缸洗干净。

sentences.english: His students are generally much better at bathtub dynamics by the end of his course, which gives him hope.
sentences.chinese: 在完成他的课程之后，他的学生对浴缸动力学的理解普遍好多了，这给了他希望。

sentences.english: And the neighbor down the street found in the bathtub… And the kid who ran his motorcycle into a tree an accident but for the note left behind saying that's exactly what he intended to do… And so on.
sentences.chinese: 还有那个街上的邻居，被人发现在浴缸里自杀了……还记着有个小年轻骑摩托车撞到了树上，大家认为这是个意外，但是这个小孩留的字条上说他是一心寻死的，等等。

detailed_translations.english: a long large container that you fill with water and sit or lie in to wash yourself

sentences.english: What’s your opinion of Cathy?
sentences.chinese: 你对凯茜的看法如何？

detailed_translations.english: your ideas or beliefs about a particular subject

sentences.english: The kids were screaming with delight.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在高兴地尖叫。

sentences.english: He is delighting audiences with his wit and humour.
sentences.chinese: 他在用自己的智慧和幽默娱乐观众。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of great pleasure and satisfaction
to give someone great satisfaction and enjoyment

sentences.english: Ice water is the only thing that really quenches my thirst (= gets rid of it ) .
sentences.chinese: 只有冰水才能让我真正解渴。

sentences.english: We had worked up a thirst (= done something that made us thirsty ) ，and so we decided to stop for a beer.
sentences.chinese: 我们干得口渴了，因此决定停下来喝杯啤酒。

sentences.english: Maggie woke up with a raging thirst (= an extremely strong thirst ) .
sentences.chinese: 玛吉醒来时感到口干舌燥。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of wanting or needing a drink
to be thirsty

name: register
trans: 登记；注册；记录；挂号邮寄；把…挂号；正式提出
登记；注册；记录；寄存器；登记簿

sentences.english: Have you signed the hotel register ?
sentences.chinese: 你在酒店登记簿上签名了吗？

sentences.english: Police want a national register of DNA samples.
sentences.chinese: 警方想要一个全国范围的DNA样本登记册。

sentences.english: How many students have registered for English classes?
sentences.chinese: 有多少学生注册选修英语课了？

detailed_translations.english: an official list of names of people, companies etc, or a book that has this list
to put someone’s or something’s name on an official list

name: opening
trans: 开始；机会；通路；空缺的职位

sentences.english: the opening match of the season
sentences.chinese: 本赛季的首场比赛

sentences.english: the opening chapter of the book
sentences.chinese: 本书的第一章

sentences.english: at the opening of the trial
sentences.chinese: 审判伊始

detailed_translations.english: first or beginning
the beginning or first part of something

name: puzzle
trans: 使…困惑；使…为难；苦思而得出

sentences.english: The meaning of the poem has always been a puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 那首诗的含义始终是个谜。

sentences.english: He thought he had solved the puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 他认为他已经解开了那个谜。

sentences.english: What puzzles me is why his books are so popular.
sentences.chinese: 令我不解的是，他的书为什么如此受欢迎。

detailed_translations.english: something that is difficult to understand or explain
to confuse someone or make them feel slightly anxious because they do not understand something

name: we
trans: 我们（主格）；笔者，本人（作者或演讲人使用）；朕，寡人

sentences.english: ‘Did you go into the supermarket?’ ‘No, we didn’t.’
sentences.chinese: “你们进超级市场了吗？”“我们没有进去。”

sentences.english: Shall we stop for a coffee?
sentences.chinese: 我们停下来喝杯咖啡好吗？

sentences.english: So we all travelled down to Brighton together.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们一起都去了布赖顿。

sentences.english: We declare our support for a government of national unity.
sentences.chinese: 我们宣布支持一个全国统一的政府。

sentences.english: We Italians are proud of our history.
sentences.chinese: 我们意大利人为自己的历史感到自豪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 我们（主格）；笔者，本人（作者或演讲人使用）；朕，寡人
detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself and one or more other people

sentences.english: a mother bear and her cubs
sentences.chinese: 母熊和它的熊崽们

detailed_translations.english: a large strong animal with thick fur, that eats flesh, fruit, and insects

name: bedroom
trans: 两性关系的；城郊住宅区的

sentences.english: a hotel with 50 bedrooms
sentences.chinese: 有50间客房的旅馆

detailed_translations.english: a room for sleeping in

detailed_translations.chinese: 两性关系的；城郊住宅区的

sentences.english: I still remember a hurricane that hit us thirty years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我还记得三十年前袭击我们的一次飓风。

sentences.english: Our love is not fierce, not hot, but despite the tsunami hurricane, also vowed.
sentences.chinese: 我们的爱，不剧烈，不炙热，可是任凭海啸飓风，也矢志不渝。

sentences.english: If an earthquake, hurricane, winter storm, or other disaster strikes your community, you might not have access to food , water, and electricity for days or even weeks.
sentences.chinese: 如果有地震、飓风、暴风雪或其他的灾害突袭你的家园，你可能会好几天甚至好几个星期都得不到食物、水和电。

detailed_translations.english: a storm that has very strong fast winds and that moves over water

sentences.english: She took a mouthful of water.
sentences.chinese: 她喝了一大口水。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of food or drink that you put into your mouth at one time

sentences.english: I’m so sorry, I do apologize.
sentences.chinese: 非常对不起，我真心道歉。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that you are sorry that you have done something wrong

sentences.english: Hydra selected the step ladder/handtruck.
sentences.chinese: 而女队则选择推销梯子/手推车。

sentences.english: He was pushing a handtruck with difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 他费力地推着手推车。

sentences.english: He crashed the handtruck through the doors.
sentences.chinese: 他推着手推车乒乒乓乓地过了几道门。

sentences.english: Can you take out the garbage when you go?
sentences.chinese: 你走的时候把垃圾带出去好吗？

detailed_translations.english: waste material, such as paper, empty containers, and food thrown away

name: spelling
trans: 拼写；意味着（spell的ing形式）；迷住

sentences.english: Her spelling has improved.
sentences.chinese: 她的拼写进步了。

sentences.english: an essay full of spelling mistakes
sentences.chinese: 一篇满是拼写错误的文章

detailed_translations.chinese: 拼字， 拼法， 拼写法
detailed_translations.english: the act of spelling words correctly, or the ability to do this

name: useful
trans: 有用的，有益的；有帮助的

sentences.english: useful information
sentences.chinese: 有用的信息

sentences.english: A little Japanese can be really useful.
sentences.chinese: 懂一点日语非常有用。

sentences.english: Can you come and make yourself useful(= help people to do something )?
sentences.chinese: 你能不能过来帮点忙？

detailed_translations.chinese: 有用的，有益的；有帮助的
detailed_translations.english: helping you to do or get what you want

sentences.english: The book treats of astronomy.
sentences.chinese: 这本书是讲天文学的。

sentences.english: This was the birth of astronomy.
sentences.chinese: 这就是天文学的起源。

sentences.english: You could study astronomy , or space engineering , and be good at it.
sentences.chinese: 你可以学习天文学，或是空间工程学，可以学的很棒。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of the stars and  planet s

sentences.english: piano lessons
sentences.chinese: 钢琴课

detailed_translations.english: a period of time in which someone is taught a particular skill, for example how to play a musical instrument or drive a car

sentences.english: I think he’s harbouring some sort of grudge against me.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得他对我有点怀恨在心。

sentences.english: Sinks and draining boards can harbour germs.
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽和沥水板可能藏有病菌。

sentences.english: Accusations of harbouring suspects were raised against the former Hungarian leadership.
sentences.chinese: 匈牙利前领导人被指控窝藏疑犯。

detailed_translations.chinese: 怀着（不好的想法、恐惧或希望）；包含，藏有；窝藏
detailed_translations.english: to keep bad thoughts, fears, or hopes in your mind for a long time

name: herself
trans: 她自己（she的反身代词）；她亲自

sentences.english: She hurt herself.
sentences.chinese: 她弄伤了自己。

sentences.english: She must be very proud of herself.
sentences.chinese: 她一定非常自豪。

detailed_translations.english: used when the woman or girl who performs an action is also affected by it

name: quiet
trans: 安静的；安定的；不动的；温顺的

sentences.english: We’ll have to be quiet so as not to wake the baby.
sentences.chinese: 我们得安静点，免得吵醒宝宝。

sentences.english: It’s a nice car. The engine’s really quiet.
sentences.chinese: 这车真好，发动机声音很小。

sentences.english: I’ll be as quiet as a mouse (= very quiet ).
sentences.chinese: 我会像老鼠一样悄无声息的。

sentences.english: It was a Sunday, about three o’clock, and the streets were quiet.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个星期天，三点钟左右，街上一片寂静。

detailed_translations.english: not making much noise, or making no noise at all

sentences.english: Rosie ran downstairs to answer the door.
sentences.chinese: 罗茜跑下楼去开门。

sentences.english: Charles was downstairs in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 查尔斯在楼下厨房里。

sentences.english: She repainted the downstairs rooms and closed off the second floor.
sentences.chinese: 她重新粉刷了楼下的房间，并把二楼封上了。

detailed_translations.english: towards or on a lower floor of a building, especially a house
Downstairs means situated on the ground floor of a building or on a lower floor than you are
the rooms on the ground floor in a house

sentences.english: the increase in violent crime
sentences.chinese: 暴力犯罪的增多

sentences.english: violent clashes between the police and demonstrators
sentences.chinese: 警方与示威者之间发生的暴力冲突

sentences.english: 31 people have been injured in violent incidents throughout the day.
sentences.chinese: 今天一天有31人在暴力事件中受伤。

sentences.english: The riots ended in the violent deaths of three teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 动乱以三名少年的惨死而告终。

detailed_translations.english: involving actions that are intended to injure or kill people, by hitting them, shooting them etc

sentences.english: There were no secretaries available to take dictation (= write down what someone is saying ).
sentences.chinese: 身边没有秘书记录口授内容。

sentences.english: I hate doing French dictations.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌做法语听写。

detailed_translations.english: when you say words for someone to write down

sentences.english: This Gothic cathedral has attracted visitors from all around the world .
sentences.chinese: 这座哥特式的大教堂吸引了世界各地的游客。

sentences.chinese: 她就是那一位，唯一的一人若没有她，水晶宫大教堂不会存在，这事工永远不会展开。

name: expression
trans: 表现，表示，表达；表情，脸色，态度，腔调，声调；式，符号；词句，语句，措辞，说法

sentences.english: Student leaders are demanding greater freedom of expression (= the right to say what you think without being punished ).
sentences.chinese: 学生领袖要求得到更多的言论自由。

detailed_translations.english: something you say, write, or do that shows what you think or feel

detailed_translations.english: help and advice that is given to someone about their work, education, or personal life

sentences.chinese: 这些裙子有灰色的吗？

sentences.chinese: 在他的讲话中，他提到了最近的加拿大之行。

sentences.english: I called her from a public phone booth near the entrance to the bar.
sentences.chinese: 我在酒吧入口附近的一个公用电话亭给她打了电话。

sentences.chinese: 用一个电子书签保存找到的内容使以后再次访问变得非常简单。

sentences.english: I like music, and I like this walkman, too.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢音乐，我也喜欢这个随身听。

detailed_translations.english: A Walkman is a small cassette player with headphones which people carry around so that they can listen to music, for example, while they are travelling

name: ha
trans: 哈！（表示惊异，愉快，怀疑，胜利等）

sentences.english: Ha! I thought it might be you hiding there!
sentences.chinese: 哈！我想可能就是你藏在那里！

detailed_translations.chinese: 哈！（表示惊异，愉快，怀疑，胜利等）
detailed_translations.english: used when you are surprised or have discovered something interesting
used when you are surprised or have discovered something interesting

sentences.chinese: 我们在家说丹麦语，这样男孩子们就不会脱离他们的语言和文化。

sentences.chinese: 在我们的文化里，问别人收入多少是不礼貌的。

detailed_translations.english: the beliefs, way of life, art, and customs that are shared and accepted by people in a particular society

sentences.english: The priest prepared the body for burial.
sentences.chinese: 牧师为尸体做好了下葬的准备。

sentences.english: the burial of solid waste

detailed_translations.english: the act or ceremony of putting a dead body into a grave

sentences.english: He was easily bored.
sentences.chinese: 他很容易感到厌烦。

name: possess
trans: 控制；使掌握；持有；迷住；拥有，具备

sentences.chinese: 不同的工人拥有不同技能。

sentences.chinese: 他再也吓不倒她了。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular quality or ability

sentences.chinese: 她过着悠闲自在的生活。

sentences.chinese: 这项计划对城里的交通拥挤状况应该有所缓解。

to become or to make sth less unpleasant, painful, severe, etc.

sentences.chinese: 今天下午我可能会干些园艺活。

sentences.chinese: 凡是与科学有关的她都没有表现出任何兴趣。

sentences.chinese: 这只是一场无聊的争论，和你的工作没有任何关系。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize a negative statement

sentences.chinese: 这是座很不错的城市，唯一的不足就是天气。

detailed_translations.english: a disadvantage of a situation, plan, product etc

sentences.chinese: 存储在数据库内的客户详细信息

detailed_translations.english: a large amount of data stored in a computer system so that you can find and use it easily

sentences.chinese: 一些蘑菇有剧毒。

sentences.english: poisonous gases such as hydrogen sulfide
sentences.chinese: 硫化氢等有毒气体

sentences.english: poisonous substances

sentences.chinese: 她被毒蛇咬了脚踝。

detailed_translations.english: containing poison or producing poison

detailed_translations.english: wise decisions and actions are sensible and based on good judgment

name: Baby
trans: 纵容，娇纵；把……当婴儿般对待

sentences.chinese: 她曾在我还是婴儿的时候照看过我。

sentences.chinese: 我妻子刚生小孩。

sentences.chinese: 把这些小土豆连皮煮。

detailed_translations.chinese: 纵容，娇纵；把……当婴儿般对待

detailed_translations.english: Baby vegetables are vegetables picked when they are very small

sentences.english: The hunters stalked their prey.
sentences.chinese: 猎人们隐伏跟踪猎物。

sentences.english: sulphuric acid
sentences.chinese: 硫酸

sentences.english: a juicy apple with a slightly acid flavour

sentences.chinese: 我等着他再说一句刻薄的话，但他不吭声了。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance that has a  pH  of less than 7. Strong acids can burn holes in material or damage your skin
having a sharp sour taste

sentences.chinese: 她的签字完全无法辨认。

detailed_translations.english: a group of people in a company or other organization who make the rules and important decisions

sentences.chinese: 我家的母牛又怀胎了。

sentences.chinese: 你这车不错啊，戴夫。

sentences.chinese: 恭喜你生了个女儿！

sentences.chinese: 房子位于林木茂密的小山坡上，环境十分优美。

sentences.chinese: 我喜欢冬天因为我们踢足球！

sentences.chinese: 不过，冬天最糟糕的一段日子总该过去了。

sentences.chinese: 你喜欢夏天吗？是的，但是我更喜欢冬天。

sentences.chinese: 质量的差异显而易见。

sentences.chinese: 不知什么原因，他突然离开了。

sentences.chinese: 我们决定在湖边野餐。

sentences.chinese: 野餐桌

sentences.chinese: 除了餐厅和野餐区，我们还为游客提供免费停车位。

sentences.chinese: 我都不敢想象为了运这些煤产生了多少碳足迹，但我们没有选择。

sentences.chinese: 由于猎杀鲸鱼，鲨鱼和大型鱼类，我们也就减少了碳在这些物种群的储存量。

sentences.chinese: 纵观全球，森林与它们脚下的土壤能吸收大约碳排放总量的四分之一。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance that exists in a pure form as diamonds,  graphite  etc, or in an impure form as coal, petrol etc. It is a chemical  element  : symbol C

sentences.english: a proud man who would not admit his mistakes
sentences.chinese: 自以为是、不愿认错的男子

sentences.english: Seth was the proud owner of a new sports car.
sentences.chinese: 赛思因为有了新跑车而扬扬得意。

detailed_translations.english: thinking that you are more important, skilful etc than you really are – used to show disapproval

sentences.chinese: 他们决定今年夏天去意大利游逛。

sentences.chinese: 法军成功地越过了阿尔卑斯山脉，行军在意大利的国土上。

sentences.chinese: 所有的报纸都报道了法国队对意大利队的足球比赛。

sentences.chinese: 那些孩子哪来这么多精力？

sentences.english: I really put a lot of energy into what I do.
sentences.chinese: 我做起事来总是投入很大精力。

sentences.english: kinetic energy
sentences.chinese: 动能

sentences.chinese: 这种机会你一辈子也只能碰到一次。

detailed_translations.english: the period of time during which someone is alive or something exists

name: entry
trans: 进入；入口；条目；登记；报关手续；对土地的侵占

sentences.english: You can leave your umbrella in the entry.
sentences.chinese: 你可以把伞放在入口处。

sentences.english: More keyboarding staff are required for data entry.
sentences.chinese: 需要更多的键盘录入人员来录入这些资料。

sentences.english: There was no sign of a forced entry.
sentences.chinese: 没有强行闯入的迹象。

sentences.chinese: 窃贼是怎样进入的？

detailed_translations.english: a door, gate or passage where you enter a building; an entrance hall

name: general
trans: 一般的，普通的；综合的；大体的

sentences.english: There has been a general decline in standards.
sentences.chinese: 道德水准普遍下降。

sentences.english: ways to improve your general health
sentences.chinese: 全面提高身体素质的方法

sentences.english: There is one exception to this general principle.
sentences.chinese: 这个一般性原则有一例外

name: bean
trans: 豆；嘴峰；毫无价值的东西

sentences.chinese: 烘豆

sentences.english: Soak the beans overnight.
sentences.chinese: 把豆子浸泡一夜。

sentences.english: kidney beans
sentences.chinese: 芸豆

sentences.english: green beans
sentences.chinese: 青刀豆，四季豆

detailed_translations.chinese: 豆；嘴峰；毫无价值的东西
detailed_translations.english: a seed or a  pod (=  case containing seeds  )  , that comes from a climbing plant and is cooked as food. There are very many types of beans.
to hit someone on the head with an object

sentences.english: How dared they do such a thing?
sentences.chinese: 他们怎么敢做出这样的事?

sentences.english: He would not succumb to such an item.
sentences.chinese: 他不会对这样的条款做出让步的。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that you think that something is not good enough or that there is not enough of it

sentences.english: Eva went straight to the hotel, as instructed (= as she had been told ).
sentences.chinese: 伊娃按照指示径直去了宾馆。

sentences.english: Greater effort is needed to instruct children in road safety.
sentences.chinese: 在指导儿童注意道路安全方面需要更大的努力。

sentences.english: I was instructed that £20,000 had been paid into my account.
sentences.chinese: 我得到通知两万英镑已存入我的账户。

detailed_translations.english: to officially tell someone what to do

sentences.english: Steve couldn’t hide his amusement.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫忍俊不禁。

sentences.english: The cats are a constant source of amusement to us.
sentences.chinese: 那些猫给我们带来无穷的乐趣。

sentences.chinese: 之后不久，警方逮捕了４名嫌疑犯。

detailed_translations.english: If you do something or if something happens afterward, you do it or it happens after a particular event or time that has already been mentioned

name: defense
trans: 防卫，防护；防御措施；防守

sentences.english: Of course, we'll consult closely with our allies every step of the way, because the security and defense of our allies, both in Europe and Asia, is not negotiable.
sentences.chinese: 当然，我们将在前行道路上就每一步骤与我们的盟国密切磋商，因为我们欧洲和亚洲盟国的安全与防卫是不容讨价还价的。

name: fellow
trans: 使…与另一个对等；使…与另一个匹敌

sentences.english: Paul’s an easy-going sort of fellow.
sentences.chinese: 保罗人很随和。

detailed_translations.english: a man

sentences.english: It is unjust that a privileged few should continue to accumulate wealth.
sentences.chinese: 少数特权阶级继续积聚财富，这是不公平的。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually get more and more money, possessions, knowledge etc over a period of time
to gradually get more and more money, possessions, knowledge etc over a period of time

sentences.english: We go to the opera (= go to a performance of opera ) regularly.
sentences.chinese: 我们常去听歌剧。

sentences.english: an opera singer
sentences.chinese: 歌剧演员

detailed_translations.english: a musical play in which all of the words are sung

name: phrase
trans: 短语, 习语, 措辞, 乐句
措词, 将(乐曲)分成乐句

sentences.english: It is impossible to hypnotise someone simply by saying a particular word or phrase.
sentences.chinese: 不可能仅通过说某个词或短语就能把人催眠。

sentences.english: Who first used the phrase ‘survival of the fittest’?
sentences.chinese: “适者生存”这一说法最早是谁说的？

sentences.english: Shakespeare’s plays are full of well-known phrases .
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亚的戏剧中写满了众所周知的名言警句。

detailed_translations.english: a group of words without a finite verb, especially when they are used to form part of a sentence, such as ‘walking along the road’ and ‘a bar of soap’

name: cheap
trans: 便宜的；小气的；不值钱的

sentences.english: cheap rail fares
sentences.chinese: 便宜的火车票

sentences.english: the cheapest TV on the market
sentences.chinese: 市场上最便宜的电视机

sentences.english: Property is cheaper in Spain than here.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙的房地产比这里便宜。

sentences.english: a cheap shop (= one that sells goods cheaply )
sentences.chinese: 廉价商店

sentences.english: The equipment is relatively cheap and simple to use.
sentences.chinese: 这种设备相对比较便宜，而且操作简单。

sentences.english: Cheap wine gives me a headache.
sentences.chinese: 我喝劣质的葡萄酒会头痛。

detailed_translations.english: not at all expensive, or lower in price than you expected

sentences.english: The hunter wounded the deer.
sentences.chinese: 猎人打伤了鹿。

sentences.english: The hound found the place where the deer lodged.
sentences.chinese: 猎狗找到了那头鹿躲藏过的地方。

sentences.english: The lions in this area prey on deer and other wild animals.
sentences.chinese: 这个地方的狮子捕食鹿和其他野生动物。

detailed_translations.english: a large wild animal that can run very fast, eats grass, and has horns
The Internet is the network that allows computer users to connect with computers all over the world, and that carries e-mail

name: course
trans: 科目；课程；过程；进程；道路；路线，航向；一道菜

sentences.english: Andy’s doing a one-year journalism course.
sentences.chinese: 安迪正在修读为期一年的新闻课程。

sentences.english: During the course of our conversation, it emerged that Bob had been in prison.
sentences.chinese: 我们在谈话过程中得知鲍勃坐过牢。

sentences.english: We had fish for the main course.
sentences.chinese: 我们的主菜是鱼。

detailed_translations.english: a series of lessons in a particular subject

name: glare
trans: 刺眼；耀眼的光；受公众注目

sentences.english: The old woman glared at him.
sentences.chinese: 那个老妇人怒视着他。

sentences.english: The sun glared down on us.
sentences.chinese: 刺眼的阳光照在我们身上。

sentences.english: She gave him a hostile glare.
sentences.chinese: 她狠狠地瞪了他一眼。

sentences.english: a special screen to reduce glare
sentences.chinese: 一种可以减弱刺眼强光的特殊屏幕

detailed_translations.english: to look angrily at someone for a long time
a long angry look

sentences.english: It’s a long walk. Maybe we should get the bus.
sentences.chinese: 走着去很远，或许我们应该乘公共汽车。

sentences.english: Rosanna and Forbes walked in silence.
sentences.chinese: 罗莎娜与福布斯默默地走着。

sentences.english: We walked into the foyer.
sentences.chinese: 我们走进前厅。

sentences.english: I walked a few steps toward the fence.
sentences.chinese: 我向栅栏走了几步。

detailed_translations.english: a journey that you make by walking, especially for exercise or enjoyment
When you walk, you move forward by putting one foot in front of the other in a regular way

name: weep
trans: 哭泣；流泪；哀悼；滴落；渗出液体

sentences.english: James broke down and wept.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯控制不住感情，哭了起来。

sentences.english: He wept bitterly (= cried a lot ) when it was time for us to leave.
sentences.chinese: 我们要分别的时候他痛哭了一场。

detailed_translations.english: to cry, especially because you feel very sad

name: brilliant
trans: 灿烂的，闪耀的；杰出的；有才气的；精彩的，绝妙的

sentences.english: She closed her eyes against the brilliant light.
sentences.chinese: 强烈的光线下，她闭起了眼睛。

sentences.english: We sat outside in the brilliant sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐在外面，沐浴在灿烂的阳光下。

sentences.english: She was dressed in brilliant white.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着一身耀眼的白色。

sentences.english: The film was absolutely brilliant.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影极为出色。

detailed_translations.english: brilliant light or colour is very bright and strong

sentences.english: the problem of how to dispose of radioactive waste
sentences.chinese: 如何处理放射性废物的问题

sentences.english: a consignment of highly radioactive plutonium
sentences.chinese: 发送的一批高放射性钚

detailed_translations.chinese: 放射性的， 有辐射能的
detailed_translations.english: a radioactive substance is dangerous because it contains  radiation (= a form of energy that can harm living things )

name: wave
trans: 波动；起伏；挥手示意；摇动；呈波形
波动；波浪；高潮；挥手示意；卷曲

sentences.english: Dee watched the waves breaking on the shore.
sentences.chinese: 迪伊凝视着拍岸的波涛。

sentences.english: The ship tipped over, and finally vanished beneath the waves.
sentences.chinese: 船倾覆了，最终沉没在海浪之下。

detailed_translations.english: a line of raised water that moves across the surface of the sea
if you wave something, or if it waves, it moves from side to side

sentences.english: the family tomb
sentences.chinese: 家族坟墓

detailed_translations.english: a stone structure above or below the ground where a dead person is buried

sentences.english: Suddenly he seized my hand.
sentences.chinese: 他突然抓住我的手。

sentences.english: The rebels have seized power.
sentences.chinese: 叛乱分子夺取了政权。

sentences.english: The gunmen were seized at 1 a.m.
sentences.chinese: 这几名持枪歹徒在凌晨1点被抓获。

detailed_translations.english: to take hold of something suddenly and violently

sentences.english: The tower was designed by Gilbert Scott.
sentences.chinese: 这座塔楼是吉尔伯特·斯科特设计的。

detailed_translations.english: to make a drawing or plan of something that will be made or built

detailed_translations.chinese: 设计， 构想； 图样； 企图
detailed_translations.english: the art or process of making a drawing of something to show how you will make it or what it will look like

name: small
trans: 少的，小的；微弱的；几乎没有的；不重要的；幼小的

sentences.english: a small piece of paper
sentences.chinese: 一小片纸

sentences.english: a small car
sentences.chinese: 一辆小汽车

sentences.english: a small town
sentences.chinese: 小镇

sentences.english: a small dark woman
sentences.chinese: 一个皮肤黝黑的小个子女人

sentences.english: The T-shirt was too small for him.
sentences.chinese: 这件 T 恤衫他穿太小了。

sentences.english: The sweater comes in three sizes - small, medium and large.
sentences.chinese: 这羊毛衫有三个尺寸: 小号、中号和大号。

sentences.english: Only a relatively small number of people were affected.
sentences.chinese: 只有相对少数的人受到了影响。

sentences.english: a small amount of money
sentences.chinese: 一小笔钱

sentences.english: A much smaller proportion of women are employed in senior positions.
sentences.chinese: 受雇担任高级职位的女性比例要小得多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 少的，小的；微弱的；几乎没有的；不重要的；幼小的
detailed_translations.english: not large in size or amount

sentences.english: Ice needs heat to melt.
sentences.chinese: 冰需要热才能融化。

sentences.english: Insulating the attic is a good way to reduce heat loss.
sentences.chinese: 为阁楼安装隔热层是减少热量流失的好方法。

sentences.english: The heat was making them tired.
sentences.chinese: 炎热的天气令他们疲倦。

sentences.english: Heat the milk until it boils.
sentences.chinese: 把牛奶煮开。

detailed_translations.english: warmth or the quality of being hot
to make something become warm or hot

sentences.english: This cupboard’s full of junk.
sentences.chinese: 这个壁橱里塞满了杂物。

detailed_translations.english: old or unwanted objects that have no use or value
to get rid of something because it is old or useless

sentences.english: the family’s joys and sorrows
sentences.chinese: 这家人的喜与悲

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of great sadness, usually because someone has died or because something terrible has happened to you
to feel or express sorrow

sentences.english: I remember changing cars twice when visiting her bungalow in New Delhi in 1998.
sentences.chinese: 我记得1998年去她在新德里的小平房拜访时，中途两次换车。

sentences.english: Belinda and Clive, who worked on the railways, moved to a bungalow not far from Barry Island.
sentences.chinese: 贝琳达和克里夫在铁路工作，并且搬到离巴厘岛不远的一处平房居住。

sentences.english: It would never have happened if he had stayed in Australia, for Australia is still the land of the bungalow.
sentences.chinese: 要是他居住在澳大利亚的话这种情况绝对不可能发生，因为现在澳大利亚土地上所座落的依然是平房。

detailed_translations.english: a house that is all on ground level

sentences.english: Modern technology makes moving money around much easier than it used to be.
sentences.chinese: 现代科技使货币流动比以前便捷得多。

sentences.english: Advances in technology have improved crop yields by over 30%.
sentences.chinese: 科技的进步使庄稼产量提高了30%以上。

sentences.english: There have been major new developments in satellite technology.
sentences.chinese: 卫星技术有了重大的新发展。

sentences.english: Many people are unwilling to embrace new technologies.
sentences.chinese: 很多人不愿意接受新科技。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工艺学； 工艺， 技术
detailed_translations.english: new machines, equipment, and ways of doing things that are based on modern knowledge about science and computers

sentences.english: My parents divorced when I was six, and I hardly knew my father.
sentences.chinese: 我六岁时父母离婚，我对父亲几乎一无所知。

sentences.english: The children were so excited they could hardly speak.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们兴奋得几乎连话都说不出来了。

sentences.english: I can hardly believe it.
sentences.chinese: 这简直让我难以置信。

sentences.english: (= almost no one ) writes to me these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今几乎没有人给我写信了。

sentences.english: Dad ate hardly anything (= almost nothing ).
sentences.chinese: 爸爸几乎没吃什么东西。

sentences.english: There was hardly any (= very little ) traffic.
sentences.chinese: 路上车少人稀。

sentences.english: She lives in Spain, so we hardly ever (= almost never ) see her.
sentences.chinese: 她住在西班牙，所以我们几乎见不到她。

detailed_translations.english: almost not

sentences.english: You can use the gym and pool for a fee of £35 a month.
sentences.chinese: 月付35英镑，即可使用健身房和游泳池。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that you pay to do something or that you pay to a professional person for their work

name: promise
trans: 允诺，许诺；给人以…的指望或希望

sentences.english: If you make a promise, you should keep it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你许下一个诺言，你就应该遵守它。

sentences.english: Last night the headmaster promised a full investigation.
sentences.chinese: 校长昨晚允诺进行全面调查。

detailed_translations.english: a statement that you will definitely do or provide something or that something will definitely happen
to tell someone that you will definitely do or provide something or that something will happen

name: mass
trans: 块，团；群众，民众；大量，众多；质量
群众的，民众的；大规模的，集中的

sentences.english: a mass protest
sentences.chinese: 大规模的抗议

sentences.english: weapons of mass destruction
sentences.chinese: 大规模杀伤性武器

sentences.english: the problem of mass unemployment
sentences.chinese: 大批人失业的问题

detailed_translations.english: involving or intended for a very large number of people
to come together, or to make people or things come together, in a large group

detailed_translations.chinese: 众多，大量；团，块，堆；群众；质量
detailed_translations.english: a large crowd

sentences.english: When the children had settled, Miss Brown gave out the new reading books.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们静下来后，布朗小姐给他们发新的故事书。

sentences.english: She breathed deeply to settle her nerves (= stop herself from feeling worried or frightened ) .
sentences.chinese: 她深深地吸了口气平静自己的情绪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 安排， 安放； 调停； 支付， 核算； 安家； 飞落， 停留； 安定
detailed_translations.english: to become quiet and calm, or to make someone quiet and calm

sentences.english: Last year they sold twice as many computers as their competitors.
sentences.chinese: 去年他们的计算机销量是竞争对手的两倍。

detailed_translations.english: a person, team, company etc that is competing with another

name: chapter
trans: 章，回；（俱乐部、协会等的）分会；人生或历史上的重要时期

sentences.english: Read Chapter 11 as your homework.
sentences.chinese: 家庭作业是阅读第 11 章。

sentences.english: This chapter discusses power, and how people use it.
sentences.chinese: 这一章节讲权力，以及人们如何运用权力。

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts into which a book is divided

name: electricity
trans: 电力；电流；强烈的紧张情绪

sentences.english: The farm was very isolated, but it had electricity.
sentences.chinese: 那个农场非常偏远，但有电力供应。

detailed_translations.english: the power that is carried by wires, cables etc, and is used to provide light or heat, to make machines work etc

sentences.english: a sudden change in the weather
sentences.chinese: 天气的突然变化

sentences.english: Life is cruel, she thought, with a sudden rush of anger.
sentences.chinese: 生活真残酷，她想，心头突然涌上一股怒气。

sentences.english: a sudden movement
sentences.chinese: 突然的一动

sentences.english: Her death was sudden.
sentences.chinese: 她的死很突然。

detailed_translations.english: happening, coming, or done quickly or when you do not expect it

name: supreme
trans: 最高的；至高的；最重要的

sentences.english: the Supreme Allied Commander in Europe
sentences.chinese: 欧洲盟军最高指挥官

sentences.english: a country where the car reigns supreme
sentences.chinese: 汽车占绝对优势地位的国家

detailed_translations.chinese: 最高的；至高的；最重要的
detailed_translations.english: having the highest position of power, importance, or influence

sentences.english: One eyewitness said he saw her talking to a man in a blue car.
sentences.chinese: 一名目击者说他看见她在跟一个坐在蓝色汽车里的男子说话。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has seen something such as a crime happen, and is able to describe it afterwards

name: information
trans: 信息，资料；知识；情报；通知

sentences.english: I need more information.
sentences.chinese: 我需要更多信息。

detailed_translations.english: facts or details that tell you something about a situation, person, event etc

sentences.english: You’ll have to join the queue.
sentences.chinese: 你得排队。

sentences.english: Some of the people queuing for tickets had been there since dawn.
sentences.chinese: 购票队伍中有些人天刚亮就来了。

detailed_translations.english: a line of people waiting to enter a building, buy something etc, or a line of vehicles waiting to move
to form or join a line of people or vehicles waiting to do something or go somewhere

name: candy
trans: 用糖煮；使结晶为砂糖；美化
糖果（等于sweets）；冰糖（等于sugar candy，rock candy）；毒品
新潮的（服饰）；甜言蜜语的

sentences.english: ...a piece of candy.
sentences.chinese: …一块糖果。

detailed_translations.chinese: 用糖煮；使结晶为砂糖；美化
糖果（等于sweets）；冰糖（等于sugar candy，rock candy）；毒品
detailed_translations.english: Candy is sweet foods such as chocolate or toffees

detailed_translations.chinese: 新潮的（服饰）；甜言蜜语的

sentences.english: I usually sleep on my back.
sentences.chinese: 我一般仰卧着睡觉。

sentences.english: Did you sleep well?
sentences.chinese: 你睡得好吗？

sentences.english: He’s lucky because at least he has somewhere to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 他算是幸运的，至少还有个睡觉的地方。

detailed_translations.english: to rest your mind and body, usually at night when you are lying in bed with your eyes closed
the natural state of resting your mind and body, usually at night

name: act
trans: 行为，行动；法令，法案；（戏剧，歌剧的）一幕，段；装腔作势

sentences.english: The company acted correctly in sacking him.
sentences.chinese: 公司解雇他做得对。

sentences.english: The jury decided that Walker had acted in self-defence.
sentences.chinese: 陪审团裁定沃克的行为属于自卫。

sentences.english: Politicians will only act when enough people demand that they do something.
sentences.chinese: 只有足够多的民众起来要求，政客们才会采取行动。

sentences.english: The padding acts as a cushion if the player falls or is hit by the ball.
sentences.chinese: 万一球员摔倒或者被球击中，衬垫可以起到缓冲作用。

sentences.english: The new president’s first act should be to end the war.
sentences.chinese: 新总统的第一步行动应当是结束战争。

detailed_translations.english: to do something in a particular way or for a particular reason
one thing that you do

name: belt
trans: 用带子系住；用皮带抽打

sentences.english: He unbuckled his leather belt.
sentences.chinese: 他解开皮带。

detailed_translations.english: a band of leather, cloth etc that you wear around your waist to hold up your clothes or for decoration

detailed_translations.chinese: 用带子系住；用皮带抽打
detailed_translations.english: to fasten something with a belt

name: widespread
trans: 普遍的，广泛的；分布广的

sentences.english: the widespread use of chemicals in agriculture
sentences.chinese: 化学品在农业中的广泛使用

detailed_translations.english: existing or happening in many places or situations, or among many people

name: study
trans: 学习，研究；课题；书房；学问

sentences.english: Recent studies show that women still get paid a lot less than men.
sentences.chinese: 最近的调查表明，女性的薪水仍比男性的要低很多。

sentences.english: The study was carried out between January and May 2008.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究是在 2008 年1月到5月间进行的。

sentences.english: Set aside a period of time specifically for study.
sentences.chinese: 留出一段时间专门用于学习

sentences.english: I’ve been studying English for six years
sentences.chinese: 我学英语已有六年了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 研究 (对某一课题或问题的)；中文释义: 学习 (尤指在家里或放学后的)
detailed_translations.english: a piece of work that is done to find out more about a particular subject or problem, and usually includes a written report

detailed_translations.chinese: 中文释义: 学习，攻读
detailed_translations.english: to learn about a subject at school, university etc

sentences.english: Younger workers tend to be at an advantage (=  have an advantage  ) when applying for jobs.
sentences.chinese: 年轻点的工人申请工作时往往处于优势地位。

sentences.english: One of the many advantages of living in New York is that you can eat out at almost any time of day.
sentences.chinese: 住在纽约的诸多好处之一是几乎任何时候都可以外出吃饭。

detailed_translations.english: something that helps you to be more successful than others, or the state of having this

name: abnormal
trans: 反常的，不规则的；变态的

sentences.english: abnormal behaviour
sentences.chinese: 反常行为

sentences.english: an abnormal level of cholesterol
sentences.chinese: 胆固醇水平异常

sentences.english: My parents thought it was abnormal for a boy to be interested in ballet.
sentences.chinese: 我父母认为一个男孩子对芭蕾舞感兴趣并不正常。

detailed_translations.english: very different from usual in a way that seems strange, worrying, wrong, or dangerous

sentences.english: Output is up 30% on last year.
sentences.chinese: 产量比去年提高了30%。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of goods or work produced by a person, machine, factory etc
if a computer outputs information, it produces it

sentences.english: This headmaster is very modest.
sentences.chinese: 这位校长很谦虚。

sentences.english: Our headmaster rattled on for at least two hours at the opening ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 我们的校长在开学典礼上唠唠叨叨地讲了至少两个小时。

sentences.english: Before the door of the headmaster's office,she stopped and re-collected herself for a while.
sentences.chinese: 在校长办公室门前，她停步片刻使自己镇静下来。

detailed_translations.english: a male teacher who is in charge of a school

name: sport
trans: 运动；游戏；娱乐；运动会；玩笑

sentences.english: the sport of falconry
sentences.chinese: 放鹰狩猎运动

sentences.english: a demonstration by people opposed to blood sports
sentences.chinese: 反对猎杀动物运动的人士举行的示威游行

detailed_translations.chinese: 运动；游戏；娱乐；运动会；玩笑
detailed_translations.english: an activity that people do in the countryside, especially hunting or fishing
to play together happily

name: admirable
trans: 令人钦佩的；极好的；值得赞扬的

sentences.english: an admirable achievement
sentences.chinese: 令人钦佩的成就

detailed_translations.chinese: 令人钦佩的；极好的；值得赞扬的
detailed_translations.english: having many good qualities that you respect and admire

sentences.english: The boat was dashed repeatedly against the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 小船一次又一次撞在岩石上。

sentences.english: When the doors opened, there was a mad dash for seats.
sentences.chinese: 门一开，人们便疯狂地朝座位奔去。

detailed_translations.english: to beat against a surface
an act of going somewhere suddenly and/or quickly

sentences.english: They’ve only sold thirteen tickets so far.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止他们仅仅售出13张票。

sentences.english: When it happened, I was thirteen (= 13 years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 那事发生时，我13岁。

detailed_translations.english: the number 13
the number 13

sentences.english: He was young and full of ambition.
sentences.chinese: 他年轻，而且雄心勃勃。

detailed_translations.english: determination to be successful, rich, powerful etc

sentences.english: Knock before you enter.
sentences.chinese: 进来前先敲门。

sentences.english: The rebels were prepared to enter negotiations (= start discussing something ).
sentences.chinese: 叛乱分子愿意参加谈判。

detailed_translations.english: to come or go into sth

name: able
trans: 能；[经管] 有能力的；能干的

sentences.english: I’ve always wanted to be able to speak Japanese.
sentences.chinese: 我一直想学会讲日语。

sentences.english: one of my more able students
sentences.chinese: 我班上能力比较强的学生之一

detailed_translations.english: to have the skill, strength, knowledge etc needed to do something

name: severe
trans: 严峻的；严厉的；剧烈的；苛刻的

sentences.english: His injuries were quite severe.
sentences.chinese: 他的伤势很严重。

sentences.english: She’s suffering from severe depression.
sentences.chinese: 她患有严重的抑郁症。

sentences.english: The US faces severe economic problems.
sentences.chinese: 美国面临严重的经济问题。

sentences.english: The storm caused severe damage.
sentences.chinese: 这场暴风雨造成了严重的破坏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 严重的； 严厉的， 严格的； 严峻的， 艰难的； 朴素的， 不加装饰的
detailed_translations.english: severe problems, injuries, illnesses etc are very bad or very serious

name: sharpener
trans: 卷笔刀；[机] 磨具；研磨者

sentences.english: ...a pencil sharpener.
sentences.chinese: …一个卷笔刀。

detailed_translations.chinese: 卷笔刀；[机] 磨具；研磨者
detailed_translations.english: A sharpener is a tool or machine used for sharpening pencils or knives

name: dream
trans: 梦的；理想的；不切实际的

sentences.english: I had lots of dreams last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我做了很多梦。

sentences.english: Her dream is to make a movie.
sentences.chinese: 她的梦想是要拍一部电影。

sentences.english: It’s quite common to dream that you’re falling.
sentences.chinese: 梦到自己坠落是常有的事。

detailed_translations.english: a series of thoughts, images, and feelings that you experience when you are asleep
to have a dream while you are asleep

sentences.english: She dusted all the books on the bookshelf.
sentences.chinese: 她把书架上所有书上的灰尘都掸干净。

sentences.english: The book you gave me is now on the bookshelf.
sentences.chinese: 你给我的那本书现在在书架上。

sentences.english: His books were ranked tidily on the bookshelf.
sentences.chinese: 他的书籍整整齐齐地排列在书架上。

detailed_translations.english: a shelf that you keep books on, or a piece of furniture used for holding books

sentences.english: How do you analyze this change?
sentences.chinese: 你该如何分析这种变化？

sentences.english: You have to hoover anything before you can analyze it.
sentences.chinese: 在你不具备分析能力之前，你只得胡乱吸收你所能学到的东西。

sentences.english: We should learn to discern and analyze the essentials of complicated questions.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该学会认识和分析复杂问题的本质。

sentences.english: I was talking to a woman I met on the flight.
sentences.chinese: 我正和一个在飞机上认识的女子交谈。

sentences.english: married women
sentences.chinese: 已婚妇女

sentences.english: a popular women’s magazine
sentences.chinese: 一本受欢迎的女性杂志

sentences.english: When a woman is pregnant, the levels of hormones in her body change.
sentences.chinese: 女人怀孕时，体内的荷尔蒙水平会发生变化。

detailed_translations.english: an adult female person

name: extraordinary
trans: 非凡的；特别的；离奇的；临时的；特派的

sentences.english: It took an extraordinary amount of work.
sentences.chinese: 这费了相当多的功夫。

sentences.english: It’s extraordinary that he should make exactly the same mistake again.
sentences.chinese: 真想不到他又犯了完全相同的错误。

sentences.english: The U.S. has called for an extraordinary emergency meeting of the UN Human Rights Commission to examine the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 美国已要求召开一次联合国人权委员特别紧急会议来调查这次危机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 非同寻常的；特别的（会议）
detailed_translations.english: very unusual or surprising

sentences.english: People who had heard the evidence at the trial were surprised at the outcome.
sentences.chinese: 在审判过程中听过证词的人都对此结果感到吃惊。

detailed_translations.english: the final result of a meeting, discussion, war etc – used especially when no one knows what it will be until it actually happens

sentences.english: a pot of strawberry yogurt
sentences.chinese: 一罐草莓酸奶

detailed_translations.english: a thick liquid food that tastes slightly sour and is made from milk, or an amount of this food

name: make
trans: 使得；进行；布置，准备，整理；制造；认为；获得；形成；安排；引起；构成

sentences.english: I’m going to show you how to make a box for your tools.
sentences.chinese: 我来教你怎么做一个箱子存放工具。

sentences.english: A family of mice had made their nest in the roof.
sentences.chinese: 一窝老鼠在屋顶上安了家。

sentences.english: She made her own wedding dress.
sentences.chinese: 她的婚纱是自己做的。

sentences.english: The company has been making quality furniture for over 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司制作优质家具有两百多年的历史了。

sentences.english: They met while they were making a film.
sentences.chinese: 他们是在拍电影时认识的。

sentences.english: I was made to wait four hours before I was examined by a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 我被迫等了四个小时才有一个医生给我做检查。

detailed_translations.english: to produce something, for example by putting the different parts of it together

name: only
trans: 唯一的，仅有的；最合适的

sentences.english: Naomi was only 17 when she got married.
sentences.chinese: 娜奥米结婚时才17岁。

sentences.english: There are only a few cars on the island.
sentences.chinese: 这个岛上只有几辆汽车。

sentences.english: It’s only eight o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 才8点钟。

sentences.english: I was the only woman there.
sentences.chinese: 我是那里唯一的女性。

detailed_translations.english: not more than a particular number, age etc
used to say that there is one person, thing, or group in a particular situation and no others

name: title
trans: 冠军；标题；头衔；权利；字幕
加标题于；赋予头衔；把…称为

sentences.english: "Patience and Sarah" was first published in 1969 under the title "A Place for Us."
sentences.chinese: 《耐心与萨拉》于1969年以《我们的地方》为书名首次出版。

sentences.english: Pirandello titled his play "Six Characters in Search of an Author."
sentences.chinese: 皮兰德娄将其戏剧命名为《六个寻找作者的剧中人》。

sentences.english: The single is titled "White Love."
sentences.chinese: 这支单曲名为《白色之恋》。

detailed_translations.chinese: 冠军；标题；头衔；权利；字幕
detailed_translations.english: the name given to a particular book, painting, play etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 加标题于；赋予头衔；把…称为
detailed_translations.english: When a writer, composer, or artist titles a work, they give it a name

sentences.english: Employees must show their identity cards at the gate.
sentences.chinese: 雇员在大门口必须出示自己的身份卡。

sentences.english: I haven’t got my membership card yet.
sentences.chinese: 我还没拿到会员卡。

sentences.english: a piece of card
sentences.chinese: 一张卡片纸

sentences.english: My name’s Adam Carver. Here’s my card.
sentences.chinese: 我叫亚当•卡弗，这是我的名片。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of plastic or paper containing information about a person or showing, for example, that they belong to a particular organization, club etc

name: spell
trans: 拼，拼写；意味着；招致；拼成；迷住；轮值

sentences.english: How do you spell ‘juice’?
sentences.chinese: juice 怎么拼？

sentences.english: Pupils should know how to spell commonly used words.
sentences.chinese: 小学生应该知道常用词的拼法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拼，拼写；意味着；招致；拼成；迷住；轮值
detailed_translations.english: to form a word by writing or naming the letters in order
a piece of magic that someone does, or the special words or ceremonies used in doing it

sentences.english: Who’s winning (= who is most successful at this point in the game )?
sentences.chinese: 现在谁领先？

detailed_translations.english: to be the best or most successful in a competition, game, election etc
a success or victory, especially in sport

name: Australian
trans: 澳大利亚的，澳大利亚人的

sentences.english: She went solo backpacking for eight months in the Australian outback.
sentences.chinese: 她在澳大利亚内陆独自背包旅行了八个月。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Australia or its people

sentences.english: the world heavyweight boxing champion
sentences.chinese: 世界重量级拳击冠军

sentences.english: the Olympic champion
sentences.chinese: 奥运会冠军

sentences.english: He passionately championed the poor.
sentences.chinese: 他曾热情地捍卫穷人。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that has won a competition, especially in sport
If you champion a person, a cause, or a principle, you support or defend them

sentences.english: Reporters asked him to clarify his position (= say exactly what his beliefs are ) on welfare reform.
sentences.chinese: 记者们要求他阐明他在福利改革问题上的立场。

detailed_translations.english: to make something clearer or easier to understand

name: comedy
trans: 喜剧；喜剧性；有趣的事情

sentences.english: a career in stand-up comedy
sentences.chinese: 单口喜剧表演职业

detailed_translations.english: entertainment that is intended to make people laugh

sentences.english: ...recent biographies of Stalin.
sentences.chinese: …近年的斯大林传记。

detailed_translations.english: a book that tells what has happened in someone’s life, written by someone else

sentences.english: I heard the clock strike six (= make six loud sounds ) .
sentences.chinese: 我听到钟敲了六下。

sentences.english: The station clock was ten minutes slow (= showed a time ten minutes earlier than the real time ) .
sentences.chinese: 车站的钟慢了十分钟。

detailed_translations.english: an instrument that shows what time it is, in a room or outside on a building

name: employ
trans: 使用，采用；雇用；使忙于，使从事于

sentences.english: The factory employs over 2,000 people.
sentences.chinese: 这家工厂雇用了2,000多名员工。

sentences.english: The report examines teaching methods employed in the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 这个报告探讨了课堂教学方法。

sentences.english: Her days are employed in gardening and voluntary work.
sentences.chinese: 她的时间都花在搞园艺和做义工上。

detailed_translations.english: to pay someone to work for you

name: sixth
trans: 月的第六日，（与the连用的）第六个；六分之一
（与 the 连用）第六的，第六个的；六分之一的

sentences.english: About one sixth of the children admitted to taking drugs.
sentences.chinese: 大约六分之一的儿童承认吸毒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 月的第六日，（与the连用的）第六个；六分之一
detailed_translations.english: one of six equal parts of something

detailed_translations.chinese: （与 the 连用）第六的，第六个的；六分之一的
detailed_translations.english: coming after five other things in a series

sentences.english: Angus injured his leg playing rugby.
sentences.chinese: 安格斯在打橄榄球时弄伤了腿。

detailed_translations.english: to hurt yourself or someone else, for example in an accident or an attack

name: period
trans: 周期，期间；时期；月经；课时；（语法学）句点，句号

sentences.english: Tomorrow’s weather will be dry with sunny periods.
sentences.chinese: 明天天气干燥，间或晴朗。

sentences.english: a double period of Science
sentences.chinese: 一连两节的自然科学课

sentences.english: Pay attention to punctuation, especially to the correct use of commas and periods.
sentences.chinese: 注意标点，特别是逗号和句号的正确使用方法。

detailed_translations.english: a particular length of time with a beginning and an end

sentences.english: I’ll excuse you this time, but don’t be late again.
sentences.chinese: 这次我原谅你，但别再迟到了。

sentences.english: Please excuse my bad handwriting.
sentences.chinese: 请原谅，我的字写得不好。

sentences.english: Can I be excused from swimming today? I have a cold.
sentences.chinese: 我今天能不游泳吗？我感冒了。

detailed_translations.english: to forgive someone for doing something that is not seriously wrong, such as being rude or careless
