sentences.english: The house was large and roomy; just right for us.
sentences.chinese: 那幢房子大而宽敞，正合我们的需要。

sentences.english: She looks just like her mother.
sentences.chinese: 她看上去就像她妈妈。

sentences.english: It’s nothing serious – just a small cut.
sentences.chinese: 不要紧，只不过是个小伤口。

sentences.english: John’s just told me that he’s getting married.
sentences.chinese: 约翰刚刚告诉我他要结婚了。

detailed_translations.english: exactly

name: acknowledge
trans: 承认；答谢；报偿；告知已收到

sentences.english: The family acknowledge the need for change.
sentences.chinese: 全家人都承认需要改变一下。

sentences.english: I would be grateful if you would acknowledge receipt of this letter.
sentences.chinese: 收到此信后请告知，不胜感谢。

detailed_translations.english: to admit or accept that something is true or that a situation exists

sentences.english: There are plans to enlarge the recreation area.
sentences.chinese: 已经有了扩大娱乐场地的计划。

sentences.english: Police will have the pictures enlarged in an attempt to identify the thief.
sentences.chinese: 为了确认窃贼的身份，警方会将这些照片放大。

detailed_translations.english: to make sth bigger; to become bigger

sentences.english: The River Rhine rises in Switzerland.
sentences.chinese: 莱茵河发源于瑞士。

sentences.english: But I did not need to go to Switzerland to learn that.
sentences.chinese: 到瑞士要是就为了知道这些就大可不必去了。

sentences.english: The banks needed to do something, so they turned themselves into the Switzerland of the Gulf.
sentences.chinese: 银行必须做点什么，于是它们把迪拜变成了波斯湾地区的瑞士。

sentences.english: These are the report’s main conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 这些就是这篇报告的主要结论。

sentences.english: It is still too early to reach a conclusion on this point.
sentences.chinese: 在这一点上作出结论还为时过早。

sentences.english: There are perhaps two main conclusions to be drawn from the above discussion.
sentences.chinese: 从以上的讨论也许可以得出两个主要的结论。

sentences.english: All the evidence pointed to the conclusion that he was guilty.
sentences.chinese: 所有证据都表明他是有罪的。

sentences.english: It’s important not to jump to conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 决不要贸然下结论。

sentences.english: The police came to the inescapable conclusion that the children had been murdered.
sentences.chinese: 警方得出了无法回避的结论: 这些儿童被谋杀了。

sentences.english: At the conclusion of the meeting, little progress had been made.
sentences.chinese: 会议开到最后，没有取得多少进展。

detailed_translations.english: something you decide after considering all the information you have

sentences.english: When our washing machine broke, our neighbours let us use theirs.
sentences.chinese: 我们的洗衣机坏了的时候，邻居就让我们用他们的。

sentences.english: Our house is number 25, and theirs is just opposite.
sentences.chinese: 我们的房子是25号，他们的就在对面。

sentences.english: We compared scores and found that theirs were higher than ours.
sentences.chinese: 我们比较了一下，发现他们的得分比我们的高。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with people that have already been mentioned

sentences.english: a farm labourer
sentences.chinese: 农场工人

detailed_translations.english: someone whose work needs physical strength, for example building work

name: forbid
trans: 禁止；不准；不允许；〈正式〉严禁

sentences.english: He was forbidden to leave the house, as a punishment.
sentences.chinese: 作为惩罚，他被禁止离开家。

sentences.english: Lack of space forbids listing the names of all those who contributed.
sentences.chinese: 由于篇幅限制，无法列出所有捐款人的姓名。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that they are not allowed to do something, or that something is not allowed

name: weekly
trans: 每周的；周刊的；一周一次的

sentences.english: The group meets weekly.
sentences.chinese: 小组每周见面一次。

detailed_translations.english: Weekly is also an adverb
happening or done every week

sentences.english: They saw the man with a little girl skipping along behind him.
sentences.chinese: 他们看到那个男人身后跟着一个蹦蹦跳跳的小女孩。

detailed_translations.english: to go from one subject to another in no fixed order
a skipping movement

name: something
trans: 重要的人；值得重视的事

sentences.english: There’s something in my eye.
sentences.chinese: 我眼睛里有什么东西。

sentences.english: Sarah said something about coming over later.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉说她等一会儿过来什么的。

sentences.english: I don’t know what he does exactly, but I know it has something to do with computers (= is related to them in some way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道他具体是干什么的，只知道和电脑有关。

detailed_translations.english: used to mean a particular thing when you do not know its name or do not know exactly what it is

detailed_translations.chinese: 重要的人；值得重视的事

sentences.english: Teachers have no choice but to take measures to protect themselves.
sentences.chinese: 教师们别无选择，只能采取措施来保护自己。

sentences.english: Our neighbours have just bought themselves a jacuzzi.
sentences.chinese: 我们邻居刚刚买了一个按摩浴缸。

sentences.english: The kids seem very pleased with themselves.
sentences.chinese: 那些孩子好像自得其乐。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that the people who do something are affected by their own action

sentences.english: We netted three fish in under an hour.
sentences.chinese: 不到一小时我们就网住了三条鱼。

detailed_translations.english: to catch sth, especially fish, in a net

sentences.english: the American rail system
sentences.chinese: 美国铁路系统

sentences.english: a high-speed rail network
sentences.chinese: 一个高速铁路网络

sentences.english: Passengers want a better rail service .
sentences.chinese: 乘客希望有更好的铁路服务。

sentences.english: the Channel Tunnel and its rail links with London
sentences.chinese: 英吉利海峡隧道及其与伦敦之间的铁路连接

sentences.english: I need to buy a rail ticket .
sentences.chinese: 我要买一张火车票。

sentences.english: cheap rail fares
sentences.chinese: 便宜的火车票价

detailed_translations.english: to complain angrily about something, especially something that you think is very unfair

detailed_translations.chinese: 栏杆，横杆；铁轨，轨道；铁路
detailed_translations.english: the railway system

sentences.english: Will you stop interrupting me!
sentences.chinese: 别打断我的话！

sentences.english: Sorry to interrupt, but I need to ask you to come downstairs.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉打扰了，我得请你下楼来。

detailed_translations.english: to stop someone from continuing what they are saying or doing by suddenly speaking to them, making a noise etc

sentences.english: In some cases people have had to wait several weeks for an appointment.
sentences.chinese: 在某些情况下，人们必须等上好几周才能得到约见。

sentences.english: a severe case of typhoid
sentences.chinese: 伤寒重病例

sentences.english: It is simply not the case that prison conditions are improving.
sentences.chinese: 监狱条件得到改善的情况绝非事实。

detailed_translations.english: a particular situation or a situation of a particular type

sentences.english: He’s always willing to help. Bless him!
sentences.chinese: 他一向乐于助人，愿上帝保佑他！

sentences.english: ‘Jess made this card for me.’ ‘Bless!’
sentences.chinese: “杰斯给我做了这张卡。”“真不错！”

detailed_translations.english: used to show that you are fond of someone, amused by them, or pleased by something they have done

name: shoot
trans: 射击，射中；拍摄；发芽；使爆炸；给…注射

sentences.english: Police shot one suspect when he pulled a gun on them.
sentences.chinese: 警方在一名嫌疑人拔枪指着他们时击毙了他。

sentences.english: Smith killed his wife, and then shot himself.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯杀死妻子，然后开枪自杀。

sentences.english: A woman was shot dead in an attempted robbery.
sentences.chinese: 一名女子在一桩未遂抢劫案中中枪身亡。

sentences.english: The guards have orders to shoot intruders on sight (= shoot them as soon as they see them ) .
sentences.chinese: 卫兵们奉命一见到有人闯入就开枪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 射击，射中；拍摄；发芽；使爆炸；给…注射
detailed_translations.english: to deliberately kill or injure someone using a gun
an occasion when someone takes photographs or makes a film

sentences.english: upward pressure on bank interest rates
sentences.chinese: 针对银行利率的越来越大的压力

sentences.english: They climbed upward along the steep cliffs surrounding the village.
sentences.chinese: 他们沿着环绕村庄的陡峭悬崖向上爬。

sentences.english: 'There,' said Jack, pointing upwards.
sentences.chinese: “那儿，”杰克往上指着说。

detailed_translations.english: increasing to a higher level
If someone moves or looks upward, they move or look up towards a higher place

sentences.english: The hotel had a lovely relaxed atmosphere .
sentences.chinese: 那家宾馆的气氛轻松愉快。

sentences.english: The atmosphere at home was rather tense.
sentences.chinese: 家里的气氛很紧张。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that an event or place gives you

name: consistent
trans: 始终如一的，一致的；坚持的

sentences.english: We need to be consistent in our approach.
sentences.chinese: 我们在方法上要前后一致。

detailed_translations.english: always behaving in the same way or having the same attitudes, standards etc – usually used to show approval

sentences.english: The public expect high standards from any large organization.
sentences.chinese: 公众对任何大型机构都期望很高。

sentences.english: the World Trade Organization
sentences.chinese: 世界贸易组织

sentences.english: a voluntary organization which helps disabled people with their transport needs
sentences.chinese: 帮助残疾人士满足其交通需求的一个志愿组织

sentences.english: an illegal terrorist organization
sentences.chinese: 非法的恐怖组织

sentences.english: international organizations such as the UN
sentences.chinese: 诸如联合国之类的国际组织

detailed_translations.english: a group such as a club or business that has formed for a particular purpose

sentences.english: They reviewed each aspect of the plan bit by bit.
sentences.chinese: 他们对计划的各个方面逐一地进行了审核。

sentences.english: a stone wall
sentences.chinese: 石墙

sentences.english: stone steps
sentences.chinese: 石台阶

sentences.english: The floors are made of stone.
sentences.chinese: 地面是石头铺成的。

detailed_translations.english: a hard solid mineral substance
to throw stones at someone or something

sentences.english: There’s a meeting on Thursday afternoon .
sentences.chinese: 星期四下午有个会议。

sentences.english: It was very hot in the afternoon .
sentences.chinese: 下午很热。

sentences.english: See you tomorrow afternoon .
sentences.chinese: 明天下午见。

sentences.english: Are you going into town this afternoon ?
sentences.chinese: 今天下午你进城去吗？

sentences.english: We met in the early afternoon .
sentences.chinese: 下午较早的时候我们见了面。

sentences.english: By late afternoon , Micky had changed his mind.
sentences.chinese: 到了傍晚，米基已改变了主意。

sentences.english: He was having his afternoon nap .
sentences.chinese: 他在睡午觉。

detailed_translations.english: the part of the day after the morning and before the evening

name: loud
trans: 大声的，高声的；不断的；喧吵的

sentences.english: The book fell to the floor with a loud bang.
sentences.chinese: 书砰的一声掉落到地上。

sentences.english: The music was so loud that I had to shout.
sentences.chinese: 音乐太响了，我只得大声地喊。

sentences.english: ‘Who’s there?’ asked David in a loud voice.
sentences.chinese: “是谁？” 戴维大声问道。

detailed_translations.english: making a lot of noise

sentences.english: My foot hurts.
sentences.chinese: 我脚痛。

sentences.english: I had blisters on the soles of my feet .
sentences.chinese: 我的脚底起泡了。

sentences.english: I dropped a glass earlier, so don’t walk around in bare feet .
sentences.chinese: 我刚才打破了一个玻璃杯，所以不要光着脚到处走。

sentences.english: The vet examined the horse’s hind feet .
sentences.chinese: 兽医检查了马的后蹄。

sentences.english: He walked to the foot of the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 他走到楼梯下面。

sentences.english: He’s six feet tall , with blonde hair.
sentences.chinese: 他身高六英尺，一头金发。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body that you stand on and walk on

sentences.english: What do you think of my new sunglasses?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得我的新太阳镜怎么样？

sentences.english: What color should I choose for my sunglasses?
sentences.chinese: 我该挑一副什么颜色的太阳镜呢？

sentences.english: I can’t see her eyes, but I can see her eyebrows above the sunglasses.
sentences.chinese: 我看不到她的眼睛，但是能看到她露在太阳镜上面的眉毛。

detailed_translations.english: dark glasses that you wear to protect your eyes when the sun is very bright

name: hilly
trans: 丘陵的；陡的；多小山的；多坡的

sentences.english: The areas where the fighting is taking place are hilly and densely wooded.
sentences.chinese: 战斗发生的地区丘陵起伏，树木茂密。

detailed_translations.chinese: 丘陵的；陡的；多小山的；多坡的
detailed_translations.english: having a lot of hills

sentences.english: He commanded his men to retreat.
sentences.chinese: 他命令手下撤退。

sentences.english: He commands the 4th Battalion.
sentences.chinese: 他指挥第四营。

sentences.english: the power and finances commanded by the police
sentences.chinese: 警方掌握的权力和资金

detailed_translations.english: (of sb in a position of authority) to tell sb to do sth

sentences.english: Her key hung on a string around her neck.
sentences.chinese: 她的钥匙穿了根绳子挂在脖子上。

sentences.english: a ball of string
sentences.chinese: 一团细绳

sentences.english: I need a piece of string to tie this package.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一根绳子来捆这个包裹。

sentences.english: a string of pearls
sentences.chinese: 一串珍珠

detailed_translations.english: a strong thread made of several threads twisted together, used for tying or fastening things

sentences.english: Most of the evidence was destroyed in the fire. Thus it would be almost impossible to prove him guilty.
sentences.chinese: 大多数证据已在大火中烧毁，因而要证明他有罪几乎是不可能的。

detailed_translations.english: as a result of something that you have just mentioned

name: percent
trans: 百分比，百分率；部分；百分数

sentences.english: At the end of the day, add up the percent DVs.
sentences.chinese: 在一天结束后，把所有营养素的百分比加起来。

sentences.english: Machines are delivering up to only 25 percent of the fuel they combust.
sentences.chinese: 机器的运转效率只能达到所耗燃料的百分之二十五。

sentences.english: But there are billions more people out there who are not in the top one percent, and they’re not in the top two or three either.
sentences.chinese: 但是还有十亿多的人不在其中，他们不在其中的百分之一，也不再其中的两百分之一或者三百分之一的其中。

name: banana
trans: 香蕉；喜剧演员；大鹰钩鼻

sentences.english: The area is under banana cultivation.
sentences.chinese: 这个地区种植香蕉。

sentences.english: The banana bears two crops every year.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉一年收两喷。

sentences.english: He told me that the palm of banana hefted 5 pounds.
sentences.chinese: 他说那把香蕉称重为5磅。

detailed_translations.english: a long curved tropical fruit with a yellow skin

name: thick
trans: 最拥挤部分；活动最多部分；事物的粗大浓密部分

sentences.english: a thick oak door
sentences.chinese: 一扇厚实的橡木门

sentences.english: a thick slice of homemade bread
sentences.chinese: 一片厚厚的自制面包

sentences.english: He was wearing thick glasses.
sentences.chinese: 他戴着厚厚的眼镜。

sentences.english: short thick fingers
sentences.chinese: 短粗的手指

sentences.english: thick wool socks (= socks that are heavy and warm )
sentences.chinese: 厚厚的羊毛袜子

sentences.english: If you want a thicker blanket, there are more here in the closet.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想要更厚的毯子，这个柜子里还有。

sentences.english: The meat is done when the thickest part turns from pink to white.
sentences.chinese: 肉最厚的部分从粉红色变成白色，就说明熟了。

detailed_translations.english: if something is thick, there is a large distance or a larger distance than usual between its two opposite surfaces or sides

name: far
trans: 很；遥远地；久远地；到很远的距离；到很深的程度

sentences.english: We can walk to my house from here. It isn’t far.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以从这里步行去我家，不远。

sentences.english: You could see the mountains in the far distance.
sentences.chinese: 你可以看到远处的群山。

sentences.english: Since I changed jobs, I have to travel further to get to work.
sentences.chinese: 我换了工作，上班更远了。

detailed_translations.english: a long distance away
a long distance

name: astronaut
trans: 宇航员，航天员；太空旅行者

sentences.english: So why become an astronaut at all?
sentences.chinese: 那么，为什么要成为一名宇航员呢？

sentences.english: Yes, I have wanted to be an astronaut.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我想过成为一个宇航员。

sentences.english: Many different qualities go towards the making of an astronaut.
sentences.chinese: 一名宇航员必须具备许多不同的素质。

detailed_translations.english: someone who travels and works in a spacecraft

sentences.english: The day ended much as it began.
sentences.chinese: 这一天结束时还像开始时一样。

sentences.english: I don’t have much money with me.
sentences.chinese: 我身上没带很多钱。

detailed_translations.english: by a great amount
a large amount of something

sentences.english: The trial was held under tight security .
sentences.chinese: 这场审讯是在戒备森严的情况下进行的。

sentences.english: lax security at airline check-in desks
sentences.chinese: 登机手续柜台松懈的安全措施

sentences.english: terrorist activity that is a threat to national security
sentences.chinese: 威胁国家安全的恐怖活动

sentences.english: The prison was ordered to tighten security after a prisoner escaped yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天一名囚犯越狱后，该监狱被勒令加强安全措施。

sentences.english: The Security Commission investigates breaches of security .
sentences.chinese: 安全委员会对违反安全规定的事项进行调查。

sentences.english: We have been asked not to say anything for security reasons .
sentences.chinese: 出于安全考虑，我们被要求守口如瓶。

sentences.english: The security forces opened fire, killing two people.
sentences.chinese: 保安部队开枪打死了两个人。

sentences.english: The thief was caught on a security camera .
sentences.chinese: 小偷被保安摄像机当场拍了下来。

sentences.english: There are strict security checks on everyone entering the Opera House.
sentences.chinese: 每个人进入歌剧院都要接受严格的安全检查。

sentences.english: A large number of homes lack adequate security measures .
sentences.chinese: 许多住宅都未采取足够的安全措施。

detailed_translations.english: things that are done to keep a person, building, or country safe from danger or crime

name: rigid
trans: 严格的；僵硬的，死板的；坚硬的；精确的

sentences.english: rigid plastic
sentences.chinese: 硬塑料

detailed_translations.english: stiff and not moving or bending

name: keeper
trans: 监护人；饲养员；看守人；管理人

sentences.english: a beekeeper
sentences.chinese: 养蜂人

sentences.english: Bob is head lion keeper at the zoo.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃是动物园养狮主管。

sentences.english: a lighthouse keeper
sentences.chinese: 灯塔管理员

detailed_translations.english: someone who looks after animals

name: backward
trans: 向后的；反向的；发展迟缓的

sentences.english: She went without a backward glance.
sentences.chinese: 她头也不回地走了。

sentences.english: He works backward, building a house from the top downward.
sentences.chinese: 他倒着干活，从上往下盖房子。

detailed_translations.english: looking or facing in the direction that is behind you
If you do something backward, you do it in the opposite way to the usual way

name: uncle
trans: 叔叔；伯父；伯伯；舅父；姨丈；姑父

sentences.english: Lily spent years caring for her sick uncle.
sentences.chinese: 莉莉照顾了她生病的叔叔好多年。

sentences.english: After his parents cashed in, he lived with his uncle.
sentences.chinese: 他在父母去世后，与叔叔在一起过。

sentences.english: When she was orphaned,her uncle sent her to orphanage.
sentences.chinese: 她的父母刚一去世，她的叔叔便把她送进了孤儿院。

detailed_translations.english: used by children, in front of a first name, to address or refer to a man who is a close friend of their parents

sentences.english: the distinction between fantasy and reality
sentences.chinese: 幻想和现实之间的区别

sentences.english: TV is used as an escape from reality .
sentences.chinese: 电视成了逃避现实的一种方式。

sentences.english: I think the government has lost touch with reality (= no longer understands what is real or true ) .
sentences.chinese: 我认为政府已经脱离了现实。

sentences.english: political realities
sentences.chinese: 政治现实

sentences.english: The paperless office may one day become a reality .
sentences.chinese: 无纸化办公室有一天可能会成为现实。

detailed_translations.english: what actually happens or is true, not what is imagined or thought

name: rot
trans: （表示厌恶、蔑视、烦恼等）胡说；糟了

sentences.english: the smell of rot
sentences.chinese: 腐烂的气味

sentences.english: wood that is soft with rot
sentences.chinese: 腐烂变软的木头

detailed_translations.english: the natural process of decaying, or the part of something that has decayed
to decay by a gradual natural process, or to make something do this

detailed_translations.chinese: （表示厌恶、蔑视、烦恼等）胡说；糟了

sentences.english: All the children will receive a small gift.
sentences.chinese: 每个孩子都会收到一份小礼物。

sentences.english: Lee received 324 votes (= 324 people voted for him ) .
sentences.chinese: 李得到324票。

sentences.english: If you would like to receive further information , return the attached form.
sentences.chinese: 欲收到详细资料，请交回所附表格。

sentences.english: She isn’t well enough to receive visitors yet.
sentences.chinese: 她身体还不是很好，不能见客。

detailed_translations.english: to be given something

sentences.english: a swarm of bees
sentences.chinese: 一群蜜蜂

sentences.english: a bee sting
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂蜇伤

detailed_translations.english: a black and yellow flying insect that makes  honey  and can sting you

sentences.english: He was presented with a watch in appreciation of his long service.
sentences.chinese: 他获赠一块手表，作为对其长期服务的感谢。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of being grateful for something someone has done

sentences.english: deputy/vice chairman Barrett serves as vice chairman.
sentences.chinese: 巴雷特担任副主席一职。

detailed_translations.english: someone, especially a man, who is in charge of a meeting or directs the work of a committee or an organization

name: swift
trans: 快的；迅速的；敏捷的；立刻的

sentences.english: My letter received a swift reply.
sentences.chinese: 我的信很快就得到了回复。

sentences.english: She shot a swift glance at Paul.
sentences.chinese: 她迅速瞥了保罗一眼。

detailed_translations.english: happening or done quickly and immediately

sentences.english: ...the ladies' lavatory.
sentences.chinese: …女厕所。

detailed_translations.english: a toilet or the room a toilet is in

sentences.english: You should never judge a person by their looks.
sentences.chinese: 决不要以貌取人。

sentences.english: Judge us on the improvements we make in the economy.
sentences.chinese: 请根据我们在经济方面取得的进步来评价我们。

sentences.english: The therapist judged that Margaret had made a serious attempt to kill herself.
sentences.chinese: 治疗专家断定玛格丽特曾真的企图自杀。

sentences.english: pollutants that were judged hazardous to human health
sentences.chinese: 被认为对人体健康有害的污染物

sentences.english: I am in no position to judge whether what she is doing is right or wrong.
sentences.chinese: 我无权评判她在做的事是对是错。

sentences.english: The economic results of the reforms are very difficult to judge.
sentences.chinese: 这些改革所带来的经济成效很难评价。

sentences.english: The likelihood of future bombs was impossible to judge.
sentences.chinese: 未来发生爆炸案的可能性无法预测。

sentences.english: We judge the success of a product by the number of sales it brings in.
sentences.chinese: 我们以销量来评价一种产品成功与否。

sentences.english: His conduct, judged objectively by what he has done, is dishonest.
sentences.chinese: 他的行为，从他所做的这一切客观地来评价，是不诚实的。

sentences.english: Robert wanted to go and help him, but judged it best to stay where he was.
sentences.chinese: 罗伯特想过去帮他，但考虑之后还是觉得待在原地为妙。

sentences.english: Do not judge her too harshly, as she was very young at the time.
sentences.chinese: 对她的评价不要太苛刻，毕竟那时候她还很年轻。

detailed_translations.english: to form or give an opinion about someone or something after thinking carefully about all the information you know about them
the official in control of a court, who decides how criminals should be punished

name: tough
trans: 艰苦的，困难的；坚强的，不屈不挠的；坚韧的，牢固的；强壮的，结实的

sentences.english: It was a tough race.
sentences.chinese: 比赛打得很艰难。

sentences.english: She’s had a tough life.
sentences.chinese: 她的生活十分艰辛。

sentences.english: The company admitted that it had been a tough year.
sentences.chinese: 公司承认那是艰难的一年。

sentences.english: Tough decisions will have to be made.
sentences.chinese: 必须作出艰难的决定。

sentences.english: The reporters were asking a lot of tough questions .
sentences.chinese: 记者们问了很多难以回答的问题。

sentences.english: (= a difficult decision ) , but we had to cancel the game because of the weather.
sentences.chinese: 尽管是一个艰难的决定，但由于天气不好我们只得取消比赛。

sentences.english: I find his books pretty tough going (= difficult to read ) .
sentences.chinese: 我发现他的书很难读。

sentences.english: Gage predicted the president’s proposal would be a tough sell (= something that is difficult to persuade someone about ) before Congress.
sentences.chinese: 盖奇预言总统的提议在国会很难通过。

detailed_translations.english: difficult to do or deal with

sentences.english: ...the effects of air pollutants on the biochemistry of plants or animals.
sentences.chinese: …大气污染物对植物或动物生化过程的影响。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of the chemistry of living things

name: dull
trans: 钝的；迟钝的；无趣的；呆滞的；阴暗的

sentences.english: Life is never dull when Elizabeth is here.
sentences.chinese: 有伊丽莎白在这里生活绝不会无聊。

sentences.english: a dull movie
sentences.chinese: 一部沉闷的电影

sentences.english: It sounded pretty dull to me.
sentences.chinese: 在我听来，这很无聊。

sentences.english: The weekly meeting tends to be deadly dull (= very dull ) .
sentences.chinese: 每周一次的会议总是十分无聊。

sentences.english: The bird is dull brown and gray in colour.
sentences.chinese: 这只鸟是暗淡的棕灰色。

detailed_translations.english: not interesting or exciting

name: king
trans: 主要的，最重要的，最大的

sentences.english: On 2 December Henry VI was crowned king (= made the king at an official ceremony ).
sentences.chinese: 12月2日，亨利六世加冕为王。

detailed_translations.english: a man who rules a country because he is from a royal family

detailed_translations.chinese: 主要的，最重要的，最大的

name: crash
trans: 撞碎；坠毁；破产；轰隆声；睡觉
摔碎；坠落；发出隆隆声；(金融企业等)破产

sentences.english: We watched the waves crashing against the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着海浪哗啦哗啦地冲击岩石。

sentences.english: The plates went crashing to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 盘子哗啦一声摔落到地上。

sentences.english: A large branch came crashing down .
sentences.chinese: 一根大树枝啪啦一声掉落下来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 倒下，坠落；发出撞击声；垮台，破产
detailed_translations.english: to hit something or someone extremely hard while moving, in a way that causes a lot of damage or makes a lot of noise
to have an accident in a car, plane etc by violently hitting something else
a sudden loud noise made by something falling, breaking etc

name: church
trans: 领…到教堂接受宗教仪式

sentences.english: a short church service
sentences.chinese: 简短的教堂礼拜仪式

sentences.english: church bells
sentences.chinese: 教堂的钟

detailed_translations.english: a building where Christians go to worship

detailed_translations.chinese: 领…到教堂接受宗教仪式

name: language
trans: 语言；语言文字；表达能力

sentences.english: How many languages do you speak?
sentences.chinese: 你能说几种语言？

sentences.english: one of the best-known poems in the English language
sentences.chinese: 最著名的英语诗歌之一

detailed_translations.english: a system of communication by written or spoken words, which is used by the people of a particular country or area

sentences.english: National boundaries are becoming increasingly meaningless in the global economy.
sentences.chinese: 在全球经济中，国界已经变得越来越没有意义。

sentences.english: We would need their agreement to build outside the city boundary .
sentences.chinese: 我们在市界以外的地方建房需要他们批准。

sentences.english: The stream curves round to mark the boundary of his property.
sentences.chinese: 小河打了个弯，为他这块地划出了边界。

sentences.english: Anything that crosses the boundary of a black hole cannot get back.
sentences.chinese: 任何物质只要跨越黑洞的界线就再也无法出来。

sentences.english: We walked through the churchyard towards the boundary wall .
sentences.chinese: 我们穿过教堂墓地，向院墙走去。

sentences.english: The property’s boundary line is 25 feet from the back of the house.
sentences.chinese: 这块地产的边界线在屋后25英尺的地方。

sentences.english: boundary disputes between neighbouring countries
sentences.chinese: 邻国之间的边界争端

detailed_translations.english: the real or imaginary line that marks the edge of a state, country etc, or the edge of an area of land that belongs to someone

sentences.english: The company engaged in a deliberate effort to cheat them out of their pensions.
sentences.chinese: 该公司曾蓄意诈取他们的养老金。

detailed_translations.english: If someone cheats you out of something, they get it from you by behaving dishonestly
to behave in a dishonest way in order to win or to get an advantage, especially in a competition, game, or examination

name: cocoa
trans: 可可粉；可可豆；可可饮料；深褐色

sentences.english: a cup of cocoa
sentences.chinese: 一杯可可

detailed_translations.chinese: 可可粉；可可豆；可可饮料；深褐色
detailed_translations.english: a brown powder made from cocoa beans, used to make chocolate and to give a chocolate taste to foods

sentences.english: You should talk to Ken – he's always full of good ideas.
sentences.chinese: 你应该和肯谈谈，他总是满脑子好主意。

sentences.english: I knew it was a bad idea to leave him on his own.
sentences.chinese: 我知道把他独自留下不是个好主意。

sentences.english: It was my wife’s idea to move house.
sentences.chinese: 要搬家是我妻子的主意。

sentences.english: He has some very strange ideas about education.
sentences.chinese: 他对教育有些非常奇怪的看法。

detailed_translations.english: a plan or suggestion for a possible course of action, especially one that you think of suddenly

sentences.english: Harry climbed the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 哈里爬上楼梯。

sentences.english: Boys were climbing trees along the river bank.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们在河边爬树。

detailed_translations.english: to move up, down, or across something using your feet and hands, especially when this is difficult to do
to move up, down, or across something using your feet and hands, especially when this is difficult to do

sentences.english: You’re not still upset with me, are you?
sentences.chinese: 你不是还在生我的气吧？

detailed_translations.chinese: 心烦的， 苦恼的； 不适的
detailed_translations.english: unhappy and worried because something unpleasant or disappointing has happened

detailed_translations.chinese: 使心烦意乱，使苦恼，使不适；搅乱；弄翻，倾覆
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel unhappy or worried
an illness that affects the stomach and makes you feel sick

sentences.english: She was working Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 她星期四在工作。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Wednesday and Friday

name: performance
trans: 性能；绩效；表演；执行；表现

sentences.english: This evening’s performance will begin at 8.00 pm.
sentences.chinese: 今晚的演出8点开始。

sentences.english: the performance of his official duties
sentences.chinese: 履行他的职务

sentences.english: Sean’s performance at school has greatly improved.
sentences.chinese: 肖恩在学校的表现进步很大。

detailed_translations.english: when someone performs a play or a piece of music

name: appeal
trans: 呼吁，恳求；上诉；诉诸，求助；有吸引力，迎合爱好；（体育比赛中）诉诸裁判
呼吁，请求；吸引力，感染力；上诉；诉诸裁判

sentences.english: The girl’s family have made a public appeal for help to try and catch her killer.
sentences.chinese: 那名遇害女孩的家人吁请公众协助捉拿凶手。

sentences.english: an appeal to the European Court of Human Rights
sentences.chinese: 向欧洲人权法庭提出的上诉

sentences.english: Farmers have appealed to the government for help.
sentences.chinese: 农场主请求政府帮助。

sentences.english: She is not happy with the decision and plans to appeal.
sentences.chinese: 她不服判决，打算上诉

detailed_translations.english: an urgent request for something important
to make a serious public request for help, money, information etc

name: national
trans: 国家的；国民的；民族的；国立的

sentences.english: Religion matters very much at a national level.
sentences.chinese: 宗教事务在全国都非常重要。

sentences.english: Between 1929 and 1933 America’s national income fell by more than half.
sentences.chinese: 1929至1933年间，美国的国民收入下降过半。

sentences.english: There are strong indications that the Prime Minister will call national elections in May.
sentences.chinese: 有明显迹象预示首相将于5月召集全国大选。

detailed_translations.english: related to a whole nation as opposed to any of its parts

sentences.english: a headphone socket
sentences.chinese: 耳机插口

detailed_translations.english: a place in a wall where you can connect electrical equipment to the supply of electricity

sentences.english: Burglars broke into their home.
sentences.chinese: 窃贼闯进了他们家。

detailed_translations.english: someone who goes into houses, shops etc to steal things

sentences.english: He was now the proud owner of a bright red sports car.
sentences.chinese: 他现在拥有了一辆亮红色跑车，很是自豪。

detailed_translations.english: someone who owns something

sentences.english: Support for Mr Thompson is growing.
sentences.chinese: 汤普森先生的支持率在上升。

sentences.english: a tree which will grow well in most types of soil
sentences.chinese: 在大部分土壤里都能生长得很好的一种树

detailed_translations.english: to become bigger, taller etc over a period of time in the process of becoming an adult

sentences.english: She was even more beautiful than I had remembered.
sentences.chinese: 她比我记忆中更美。

sentences.english: a beautiful bunch of flowers
sentences.chinese: 一束美丽的花

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is beautiful is extremely attractive to look at

sentences.english: fierce guard dogs
sentences.chinese: 凶猛的看门狗

sentences.english: fierce fighting in the city
sentences.chinese: 城里的激烈战斗

detailed_translations.english: a fierce person or animal is angry or ready to attack, and looks very frightening

sentences.english: More than a third of all pedestrian injuries are to children.
sentences.chinese: 所有受伤的行人中有1/3以上是儿童。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is walking, especially along a street or other place used by cars

name: court
trans: 招致（失败、危险等）；向…献殷勤；设法获得

sentences.english: It could not be proved in a court of law.
sentences.chinese: 这无法在法庭上证实。

sentences.english: The court case lasted six weeks.
sentences.chinese: 这场诉讼持续了六个星期。

sentences.english: Four people will appear in court today, charged with fraud.
sentences.chinese: 今天将有四个人因被指控犯有欺诈罪出庭受审。

sentences.english: The court ruled that no compensation was due.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判决不予赔偿。

sentences.english: She threatened to take the magazine to court (= take legal action against them ) if they didn’t publish an immediate apology.
sentences.chinese: 她威胁说如果这家杂志不立刻刊登道歉声明，她就要把他们告上法庭。

detailed_translations.english: the place where a trial is held, or the people there, especially the judge and the jury who examine the evidence and decide whether someone is guilty or not guilty

sentences.english: Can I try you new badminton racket?
sentences.chinese: 我可以试用你的羽毛球拍吗？

sentences.english: I like playing basketball and  badminton.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢的篮球和羽毛球。

sentences.english: My friend and I take part in sports like tennis,badminton and swimming.
sentences.chinese: 我和我的朋友参加体育运动如打网球,羽毛球和游泳.

detailed_translations.english: a game that is similar to tennis but played with a  shuttlecock (=  small feathered object  )  instead of a ball

sentences.english: I was so certain that it had happened, that I wrote a letter to my parents that same night and put it in the postbox at the corner of the street.
sentences.chinese: 我如此地肯定这件事的发生，当晚我写信给我的父母，把信投进了街角的邮箱。

sentences.english: He feels the floor of the post office move beneath him, and he tries to turn his eyes from her, to ground his gaze in something solid: postbox, ceiling tile, window.
sentences.chinese: 他感到邮局的地板在脚下移动，他试图把视线从她身上挪开，让他的注视停留在某种结实可靠的东西上：邮箱、天花板上的瓷砖、窗户。

detailed_translations.english: a box in a public place, into which you put letters that you want to send

sentences.english: Can you take a photo of me and Rachel?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我和雷切尔拍张照吗？

detailed_translations.english: a photograph

sentences.english: Chop the onions finely.
sentences.chinese: 把洋葱切碎。

sentences.english: red onions
sentences.chinese: 红皮洋葱

sentences.english: home-made onion soup
sentences.chinese: 自制的洋葱汤

detailed_translations.english: a round white vegetable with a brown, red, or white skin and many layers. Onions have a strong taste and smell.

sentences.english: I gave up eating meat a few months ago.
sentences.chinese: 我几个月以前开始不吃肉了。

sentences.english: raw meat
sentences.chinese: 生肉

sentences.english: a meat pie
sentences.chinese: 肉馅饼

sentences.english: a selection of cold meats
sentences.chinese: 各种冷盘肉

detailed_translations.english: the flesh of animals and birds eaten as food

sentences.english: They underlaid the Atlantic with a cable.
sentences.chinese: 他们在大西洋海底铺设了一条电缆。

sentences.english: The Straits of Gibraltar are the strategic passage between the Mediterranean and the Atlantic.
sentences.chinese: 直布罗陀海峡是地中海通向大西洋的咽喉。

detailed_translations.english: relating to or bordering the Atlantic Ocean
Atlantic Ocean

sentences.english: The voyage from England to India used to take six months.
sentences.chinese: 过去从英格兰到印度要航行六个月。

sentences.english: the Titanic’s maiden voyage
sentences.chinese: “泰坦尼克”号的首航

sentences.english: I don’t want to make the voyage single-handed.
sentences.chinese: 我不想独自航行。

sentences.english: These are the voyages of the starship Enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 这些就是“企业”号星舰几次航行的经历。

detailed_translations.english: a long journey in a ship or spacecraft
to travel to a place, especially by ship

sentences.english: an excellent suggestion
sentences.chinese: 极好的建议

sentences.english: His car is in excellent condition.
sentences.chinese: 他的汽车状况极佳。

sentences.english: Second-hand computers can be excellent value.
sentences.chinese: 二手计算机买得好会非常合算。

detailed_translations.english: extremely good or of very high quality

sentences.english: Once he knew where we were, Lewis telegraphed every few hours.
sentences.chinese: 一知道我们在哪里，刘易斯就每隔几小时发一份电报来。

detailed_translations.english: an old-fashioned method of sending messages using radio or electrical signals
to send a message by telegraph

sentences.english: The company looks poised to make a significant breakthrough in China.
sentences.chinese: 该公司看上去稳将在中国实现一次重大突破。

detailed_translations.english: an important new discovery in something you are studying, especially one made after trying for a long time

sentences.english: It’s our job to establish the cause of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 查明起火原因是我们的责任。

sentences.english: There is no cause for alarm.
sentences.chinese: 不必惊慌。

sentences.english: My father fought for the Nationalist cause.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲为民族党的事业而奋斗。

detailed_translations.english: a person, event, or thing that makes something happen

sentences.english: a fair swap
sentences.chinese: 公平交换

sentences.english: We can do a swap if you like.
sentences.chinese: 如果你愿意我们可以交换。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which you give something to someone and get another thing in return
to give something to someone and get something in return

name: nervous
trans: 神经的；紧张不安的；强健有力的

sentences.english: I wish you’d stop looking at me like that. You’re making me nervous.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你不要再那样看着我了，你让我紧张。

sentences.english: By the time I got into the interview I was a nervous wreck (= was extremely nervous ).
sentences.chinese: 到了面试的时候，我紧张得要命。

detailed_translations.english: worried or frightened about something, and unable to relax

sentences.english: The doctor gave him a thorough check-up.
sentences.chinese: 医生给他做了一次全面的体检。

sentences.english: a thorough and detailed biography
sentences.chinese: 详尽的传记

sentences.english: The police investigation was very thorough.
sentences.chinese: 警方的调查十分彻底。

sentences.english: thorough notes of the meeting
sentences.chinese: 详尽的会议记录

detailed_translations.english: including every possible detail

name: seal
trans: 密封；印章；海豹；封条；标志

sentences.english: The document carried the seal of the governor’s office.
sentences.chinese: 文件上盖有州长办公室的章。

sentences.english: He broke the wax seal and unrolled the paper.
sentences.chinese: 他揭去封蜡，把纸卷展开。

sentences.english: The window was sealed shut.
sentences.chinese: 这扇窗户被封了起来。

detailed_translations.english: a mark that has a special design and shows the legal or official authority of a person or organization
to close an entrance or a container with something that stops air, water etc from coming in or out of it

name: tissue
trans: 饰以薄纱；用化妆纸揩去

sentences.english: ...a small package wrapped in tissue paper.
sentences.chinese: …一个小包裹，用薄棉纸包着。

sentences.english: As we age we lose muscle tissue.
sentences.chinese: 随着年纪的增大，我们会失去一些肌肉组织。

detailed_translations.english: light thin paper used for wrapping, packing etc

name: damp
trans: 使潮湿；使阻尼；使沮丧，抑制

sentences.english: Damp had stained the walls.
sentences.chinese: 墙上留下了潮湿的痕迹。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使潮湿；使阻尼；使沮丧，抑制
detailed_translations.english: to dampen something
water in walls or in the air that causes things to be slightly wet
slightly wet, often in an unpleasant way

sentences.english: Politicians were quick to condemn the bombing.
sentences.chinese: 政治家们立即对爆炸事件进行了谴责。

sentences.english: He was found guilty and condemned to death.
sentences.chinese: 他被裁定有罪，判了死刑。

detailed_translations.english: to say very strongly that you do not approve of something or someone, especially because you think it is morally wrong

sentences.english: Alan stretched and yawned.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦伸伸懒腰，打了个呵欠。

sentences.english: Kay shook her head and stifled a yawn (= tried to stop yawning ).
sentences.chinese: 凯摇摇头，忍住呵欠。

detailed_translations.english: to open your mouth wide and breathe in deeply because you are tired or bored
an act of yawning

name: biology
trans: （一个地区全部的）生物；生物学

sentences.english: a degree in biology
sentences.chinese: 生物学学位

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of living things

sentences.english: The minister made the announcement at a news conference.
sentences.chinese: 部长在记者招待会上发表了这项声明。

detailed_translations.english: an important or official statement

name: punish
trans: 惩罚；严厉对待；贪婪地吃喝

sentences.english: Smacking is not an acceptable way of punishing a child.
sentences.chinese: 要惩罚孩子，不应该用打的方式。

sentences.english: He promised to punish severely any officials found guilty of electoral fraud.
sentences.chinese: 他承诺要严惩任何在选举中有欺诈行为的官员。

sentences.english: They deserve to be punished for putting passengers at risk.
sentences.chinese: 他们置乘客于危险之中，理应受到惩罚。

sentences.english: I felt I was being punished for what my mother had done.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得自己在为妈妈的所作所为接受惩罚。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone suffer because they have done something wrong or broken the law

sentences.english: The army are helping to clear up after the floods.
sentences.chinese: 陆军部队正协助洪灾后的清理工作。

sentences.english: an army officer
sentences.chinese: 陆军军官

sentences.english: Army units launched attacks on bases near Jounieh port.
sentences.chinese: 陆军部队对朱尼耶港附近的基地发动了进攻。

sentences.english: He joined the army when he was 17.
sentences.chinese: 他17岁参加了陆军。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a country’s military force that is trained to fight on land in a war

sentences.english: Try to satisfy your hunger by eating some fruit.
sentences.chinese: 吃些水果充充饥吧。

sentences.english: her hunger for knowledge
sentences.chinese: 她的求知欲

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that you need to eat

sentences.english: ...a successful businesswoman who runs her own international cosmetics company.
sentences.chinese: …一个经营着自己的国际化妆品公司的成功的女商人。

detailed_translations.english: a woman who works in business

name: well
trans: 很好地；充分地；满意地；适当地

sentences.english: Did you sleep well?
sentences.chinese: 你睡得好吗？

sentences.english: James reads quite well for his age.
sentences.chinese: 就詹姆斯的年龄来说，他的阅读能力算不错了。

sentences.english: All the team played very well today.
sentences.chinese: 今天所有队员都打得很不错。

sentences.english: Simon doesn’t work well under pressure.
sentences.chinese: 有压力时西蒙的工作表现就不好。

sentences.english: The festival was very well organized.
sentences.chinese: 节庆活动组织得很好。

sentences.english: The concert went very well.
sentences.chinese: 音乐会进行得非常顺利。

detailed_translations.chinese: 很好地；充分地；满意地；适当地
detailed_translations.english: in a successful or satisfactory way
healthy

sentences.english: The airplane cracked up in landing.
sentences.chinese: 这架飞机在着陆时坠毁。

sentences.english: The new airplane flies at twice the speed of sound.
sentences.chinese: 这架新式飞机以两倍于音速的速度飞行。

sentences.english: We beamed the airplane down safely.
sentences.chinese: 我们给飞机导航使它安全降落。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that flies through the air and has one or more engines

sentences.english: I’ll have to ask my boss for a day off.
sentences.chinese: 我得向老板请一天假。

sentences.english: Since I’m my own boss (=  I work for myself, rather than for an employer  ) , my hours are flexible.
sentences.chinese: 我自己当老板，所以我的时间很灵活。

sentences.english: Five-year-old girls love to boss people around.
sentences.chinese: 五岁的女孩就爱支使别人。

detailed_translations.english: the person who employs you or who is in charge of you at work
to tell people to do things, give them orders etc, especially when you have no authority to do it

sentences.english: The house was lovely and warm.
sentences.chinese: 那房子漂亮温暖。

sentences.english: I hope we get some warm weather soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望天气很快就会回暖。

sentences.english: I’ve put your dinner in the oven to keep it warm.
sentences.chinese: 我把你的饭菜放进了烤箱里保温。

sentences.english: warm water
sentences.chinese: 温水

detailed_translations.english: slightly hot, especially in a pleasant way
to make someone or something warm or warmer, or to become warm or warmer

name: figure
trans: 数字；人物；图形；价格；（人的）体形；画像

sentences.english: Reform now figures high on the agenda.
sentences.chinese: 眼下，改革是当务之急。

detailed_translations.english: to be an important part of a process, event, or situation, or to be included in something

detailed_translations.chinese: 数字；人物；算术；体型，风姿；轮廓；画像，塑像；图，图形
detailed_translations.english: the activity of adding, multiplying etc numbers

detailed_translations.chinese: 计算； 认为， 猜想
detailed_translations.english: to form a particular opinion after thinking about a situation

name: condition
trans: 决定；使适应；使健康；以…为条件

sentences.english: Profits increased by £1.5m, despite the difficult economic conditions.
sentences.chinese: 尽管经济形势不佳，利润还是增长了150万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: the state that something is in, especially how good or bad its physical state is

sentences.english: I took a bus to San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 我乘公共汽车去旧金山。

sentences.english: Buses run at 15 and 30 minutes past the hour.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车在每小时的15分和30分时发车。

detailed_translations.english: a large vehicle that people pay to travel on

name: bargain
trans: 讨价还价；议价；(谈价钱后)卖

sentences.english: I’ve kept my side of the bargain and I expect you to keep yours.
sentences.chinese: 我履行了我的承诺，希望你也履行你的承诺。

sentences.english: women bargaining with traders
sentences.chinese: 和商贩讨价还价的女人

detailed_translations.english: an agreement, made between two people or groups to do something in return for something else
to discuss the conditions of a sale, agreement etc, for example to try and get a lower price

name: Dynamic
trans: 动态的；动力的；动力学的；有活力的

sentences.english: He seemed a dynamic and energetic leader.
sentences.chinese: 他看来是个富有创新力与活力的领导。

sentences.english: The dynamic of the market demands constant change and adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 市场的动力要求有不断的变化和调整。

detailed_translations.chinese: 动态的；动力的；动力学的；有活力的
detailed_translations.english: If you describe someone as dynamic, you approve of them because they are full of energy or full of new and exciting ideas
The dynamic of a system or process is the force that causes it to change or progress

sentences.english: We used to listen to pop songs on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 我们以前常常听收音机里播放的流行歌曲。

sentences.english: They sat round with guitars, singing folk songs.
sentences.chinese: 他们弹着吉他围坐在一起唱民歌。

sentences.english: ...dance, music, mime, and song.
sentences.chinese: …舞蹈、音乐、哑剧和歌唱。

detailed_translations.english: a short piece of music with words that you sing

sentences.english: Your goal as a parent is to help your child become an independent adult.
sentences.chinese: 身为父母，你的目标就是要培养孩子成为独立的成年人。

sentences.english: be in goal/keep goal (=be the goalkeeper)
sentences.chinese: 守球门

sentences.english: I scored the first goal.
sentences.chinese: 我踢进了第一个球。

detailed_translations.english: something that you hope to achieve in the future

name: grain
trans: 粮食；颗粒；[作物] 谷物；纹理

sentences.english: There were crumbs and grains of sugar on the table.
sentences.chinese: 桌子上有面包屑和糖粒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谷物， 谷粒， 颗粒； 少量， 微量
detailed_translations.english: a single very small piece of a substance such as sand or salt

sentences.english: If the mixture seems dry, add water.
sentences.chinese: 如果混合物看上去干，加点水。

detailed_translations.english: to put something with something else or with a group of other things

sentences.english: one of Dublin’s premier hotels
sentences.chinese: 都柏林最好的酒店之一

detailed_translations.english: best or most important
a  prime minister  – used in news reports

sentences.english: Thousands of people will starve if food doesn’t reach the city.
sentences.chinese: 如果食品不能运到那座城市，成千上万的人就要饿死。

sentences.english: pictures of starving children
sentences.chinese: 饥饿儿童的照片

sentences.english: They’ll either die from the cold or starve to death (= die from lack of food ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们要么会冻死，要么会饿死。

detailed_translations.english: to suffer or die because you do not have enough to eat

sentences.english: He repossessed himself of his farm.
sentences.chinese: 他收回自己所有的农场。

sentences.english: He barred himself in.
sentences.chinese: 他把自己关在里面。

sentences.english: He stroked the name of himself with his pen.
sentences.chinese: 他用钢笔划掉了他自己的名字。

sentences.english: Would you like another piece of apple pie?
sentences.chinese: 想再来一块苹果派吗？

detailed_translations.english: fruit baked inside a  pastry  covering

sentences.english: a slave to fashion
sentences.chinese: 时尚的奴隶

detailed_translations.english: someone who is owned by another person and works for them for no money
to work very hard with little time to rest

sentences.english: In the dark of December.
sentences.chinese: 在十二月的黑夜里。

sentences.english: Our summers are short and our winters long.In December, when it is darkest, we only have a few hours of very weak sunlight per day.
sentences.chinese: 我们的夏天很短但是冬天很长，在十二月，也就是最黑的时候，我们的一天中只有很短的时间可以看到微弱的阳光。

sentences.english: I send out Valentine’s cards with the girls’ photo, instead of trying to mail cards in December.
sentences.chinese: ——我寄出有女孩子照片的情人节贺卡，以代替试图在十二月寄出的贺卡。

detailed_translations.english: the 12th month of the year, between November and January

sentences.english: We’ll have to budget more carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须更仔细地安排开支。

sentences.english: This scheme enables you to budget the cost through fixed monthly payments.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划可以让你把费用分摊在每个月里等额偿还。

sentences.english: Cheap flights are available from budget travel agents from $240.
sentences.chinese: 起价$240的廉价机票可从一些经济旅行社那里买到。

detailed_translations.english: to carefully plan and control how much money you spend and what you will buy with it

detailed_translations.chinese: 低廉的， 收费公道的
detailed_translations.english: Budget is used in advertising to suggest that something is being sold cheaply
the money that is available to an organization or person, or a plan of how it will be spent

sentences.english: What time do you usually have dinner?
sentences.chinese: 你通常什么时候吃饭？

sentences.english: We’re having fish for dinner tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我们今天晚饭吃鱼。

sentences.english: What’s for dinner?
sentences.chinese: 晚饭吃什么？

sentences.english: the Club’s annual dinner
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部的年度晚宴

detailed_translations.english: the main meal of the day, eaten in the middle of the day or the evening

sentences.english: He doesn't have the patience to wait.
sentences.chinese: 他没有耐心等。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to stay calm and accept a delay or sth annoying without complaining

sentences.english: He shouldn’t be so selfish.
sentences.chinese: 他不该这么自私。

sentences.english: Why should anyone want to marry Tony?
sentences.chinese: 怎么竟然会有人意嫁给托尼？

detailed_translations.english: used to say what is the right or sensible thing to do

name: mistaken
trans: 错误的；弄错的；被误解的

sentences.english: It can’t have been my car. You must be mistaken.
sentences.chinese: 那不可能是我的车，你一定弄错了。

sentences.english: I thought he said 12 o’clock, but I might have been mistaken.
sentences.chinese: 我以为他说的是12点，但我有可能弄错了。

sentences.english: We bought the rug in Turkey, if I’m not mistaken .
sentences.chinese: 如果我没弄错的话，我们是在土耳其买的这块地毯。

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误的；弄错的；被误解的
detailed_translations.english: if you are mistaken, you are wrong about something that you thought you knew or saw

sentences.english: They’ll soon settle in – kids are very good at adjusting.
sentences.chinese: 他们很快就会习惯的——小孩子适应能力很强。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually become familiar with a new situation
to change or move something slightly to improve it or make it more suitable for a particular purpose

name: possession
trans: 拥有；财产；领地；自制；着迷

sentences.english: That information is not in our possession.
sentences.chinese: 那则信息不归我们所有。

sentences.english: How did the painting come into your possession (= how did you get it ) ?
sentences.chinese: 这幅画是怎么到你手上的？

sentences.english: The finance company now has possession of the house.
sentences.chinese: 这家金融公司目前拥有这所房子。

sentences.english: We didn’t take possession of (= get and start using ) the car until a few days after the auction.
sentences.chinese: 拍卖会过后几天我们才正式拿到那辆车。

detailed_translations.english: if something is in your possession, you own it, or you have obtained it from somewhere

name: blanket
trans: 毛毯，毯子；毯状物，覆盖层
总括的，全体的；没有限制的

sentences.english: She huddled herself in the blanket.
sentences.chinese: 她用毯子紧紧裹住自己。

sentences.english: They muffled up her head with a blanket.
sentences.chinese: 他们用毯子蒙住了她的头。

sentences.english: He lapped his daughter in a warm blanket.
sentences.chinese: 他把女儿裹在一个暖和的毯子里。

detailed_translations.english: a cover for a bed, usually made of wool

name: ashamed
trans: 惭愧的，感到难为情的；耻于……的

sentences.english: Everyone cries sometimes – it’s nothing to be ashamed of.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都会有哭的时候——没什么好难为情的。

detailed_translations.english: feeling very sorry and embarrassed because of something you have done

sentences.english: a crowded room
sentences.chinese: 拥挤的房间

sentences.english: a crowded street
sentences.chinese: 拥挤的街道

sentences.english: The train was very crowded, and we had to stand.
sentences.chinese: 火车很挤，我们只好站着。

detailed_translations.english: too full of people or things

name: long
trans: 长时间；[语] 长音节；（服装的）长尺寸；长裤
长的；过长的；做多头的；长时间的；冗长的，长音

sentences.english: He longed to see her again.
sentences.chinese: 到那里去要多长时间？

sentences.english: She longed for the chance to speak to him in private.
sentences.chinese: 她渴望有机会和他私下交谈。

detailed_translations.english: to want something very much, especially when it seems unlikely to happen soon

name: review
trans: 回顾；复习；评论；检讨；检阅

sentences.english: The government will review the situation later in the year.
sentences.chinese: 政府将在今年晚些时候对形势重新加以研究。

sentences.english: The decision will be reviewed by the Supreme Court.
sentences.chinese: 这个判决将由最高法院复核。

sentences.english: The team manager’s position will be reviewed at the end of the season.
sentences.chinese: 球队主教练的人选将在赛季末重新考虑。

sentences.english: If you have to cover 12 chapters in American history, begin by planning on three two-hour reviews with four chapters per session.
sentences.chinese: 如果你必须涵盖美国史的12个章节，首先计划3次2小时的复习，每次4章。

detailed_translations.english: to carefully examine or consider sth again, especially so that you can decide if it is necessary to make changes
(North Amercian English) a lesson in which you look again at sth you have studied, especially in order to prepare for an exam

name: shine
trans: 发出光；反射光，闪耀；出类拔萃，表现突出；露出；照耀；显露；出众
光亮，光泽；好天气；擦亮；晴天；擦皮鞋；鬼把戏或诡计

sentences.english: The sun was shining .
sentences.chinese: 阳光照耀。

sentences.english: The moon shone brightly in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 皓月当空。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发出光；反射光，闪耀；出类拔萃，表现突出；露出；照耀；显露；出众
detailed_translations.english: to produce bright light

detailed_translations.chinese: 光亮，光泽；好天气；擦亮；晴天；擦皮鞋；鬼把戏或诡计
detailed_translations.english: the brightness that something has when light shines on it

sentences.english: a promise to rid the country of nuclear weapons
sentences.chinese: 销毁本国核武器的承诺

detailed_translations.english: to take action so that a person, place etc is no longer affected by something bad or no longer has it

sentences.english: What’s the best way to learn a language?
sentences.chinese: 学习语言的最佳方法是什么？

sentences.english: The teacher’s task is to help the pupil learn.
sentences.chinese: 老师的任务是帮助学生学习。

sentences.english: The student will learn from experience about the importance of planning.
sentences.chinese: 学生将从经验中学到制订计划的重要性。

detailed_translations.english: to gain knowledge of a subject or skill, by experience, by studying it, or by being taught

sentences.english: We’ve had a few disagreements , but we’re still good friends.
sentences.chinese: 虽然有过一些分歧，但我们仍是好朋友。

sentences.english: There is disagreement between these two estimates.
sentences.chinese: 这两种估算不符。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people express different opinions about something and sometimes argue

name: lose
trans: 浪费；使沉溺于；使迷路；遗失；错过

sentences.english: I’ve lost my appetite.
sentences.chinese: 我已经没有了胃口。

sentences.english: Try not to lose heart (= become sad and hopeless ) - there are plenty of other jobs.
sentences.chinese: 不要灰心―还有很多其他的工作。

sentences.english: By the time the ambulance arrived, Douglas had lost consciousness .
sentences.chinese: 救护车赶到时，道格拉斯已经失去知觉。

sentences.english: I followed her on foot, but lost her in the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 我走在她后面，可是在人群中跟丢了。

sentences.english: Klinger lost his seat in the election.
sentences.chinese: 克林格在选举中失去了他的席位。

detailed_translations.english: to stop having a particular attitude, quality, ability etc, or to gradually have less of it

name: graduate
trans: 授予…学位；分等级；标上刻度

sentences.english: a graduate student
sentences.chinese: 研究生

detailed_translations.english: relating to or involved in studies done at a university after completing a first degree
to obtain a degree, especially a first degree, from a college or university
someone who has completed a university degree, especially a first degree

sentences.english: Everybody knows Tom.
sentences.chinese: 人人都认识汤姆。

detailed_translations.english: everyone

sentences.english: The police asked her to describe the man.
sentences.chinese: 警察叫她描述一下那名男子。

sentences.english: Another approach to the problem is described in Chapter 3.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题的另一种解决方法在第三章有所阐述。

detailed_translations.chinese: 形容， 描写； 画出
detailed_translations.english: to say what something or someone is like by giving details about them

sentences.english: I never liked long walks, especially in winter.
sentences.chinese: 我向来不喜欢长距离散步，尤其在冬天。

sentences.english: Art books are expensive to produce, especially if they contain colour illustrations.
sentences.chinese: 美术类书籍制作成本很高，尤其是那些带彩色插图的。

sentences.english: I was especially fond of chocolate biscuits.
sentences.chinese: 我特别爱吃巧克力饼干。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that something is more important or happens more with one particular thing than with others

sentences.english: I’ll see you Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 星期二见。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Monday and Wednesday

name: crossroads
trans: 十字路口；交叉路口；聚会的中心地点（crossroad的复数形式）

sentences.english: The car was approaching the crossroads.
sentences.chinese: 汽车正驶近交叉路口。

detailed_translations.chinese: 十字路口；交叉路口；聚会的中心地点（crossroad的复数形式）
detailed_translations.english: a place where two roads meet and cross each other

name: soon
trans: 快；不久，一会儿；立刻；宁愿

sentences.english: It will be dark soon.
sentences.chinese: 天很快就要黑了。

sentences.english: David arrived sooner than I expected.
sentences.chinese: 戴维到得比我预料的快。

sentences.english: ‘Who?’ ‘You’ll find out soon enough (= fairly soon ) .’
sentences.chinese: “谁？”“你很快就会知道的。”

detailed_translations.chinese: 快；不久，一会儿；立刻；宁愿
detailed_translations.english: in a short time from now, or a short time after something else happens

sentences.english: I got out of the car to inspect the damage.
sentences.chinese: 我下车查看损坏情况。

sentences.english: Police inspected the scene and interviewed all the staff.
sentences.chinese: 警察仔细检查了现场并询问了所有员工。

sentences.english: General Allenby arrived to inspect the troops.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦比将军前来检阅部队。

detailed_translations.english: to examine something carefully in order to find out more about it or to find out what is wrong with it

sentences.english: the protection of the environment
sentences.chinese: 环境保护

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something is protected

name: fasten
trans: 使固定；集中于；扎牢；强加于

sentences.english: ‘I’m going now,’ she said, fastening her coat.
sentences.chinese: “现在我要走了。”她一边说，一边扣上大衣。

sentences.english: Fasten your seat belt.
sentences.chinese: 请系好安全带。

detailed_translations.english: to join together the two sides of a coat, shirt, bag etc so that it is closed
to firmly close a window, gate etc so that it will not open, or to become firmly closed

sentences.english: Her lies hurt my father deeply.
sentences.chinese: 她的谎言深深地伤害了我父亲。

detailed_translations.english: a long way into something

name: tanker
trans: 油轮；运油飞机；油槽车；坦克手

sentences.english: A Greek oil tanker has run aground.
sentences.chinese: 一艘希腊油轮已经搁浅了。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle or ship specially built to carry large quantities of gas or liquid, especially oil

name: lion
trans: 狮子；名人；勇猛的人；社交场合的名流

sentences.english: The wounded lion bellowed out.
sentences.chinese: 受伤的狮子发出了怒吼。

sentences.english: The lion bounded on the prey.
sentences.chinese: 那头狮子向猎物猛扑过去。

sentences.english: The savages darted spears at the lion.
sentences.chinese: 野蛮人们把矛掷向狮子。

detailed_translations.english: a large animal of the cat family that lives in Africa and parts of southern Asia. Lions have gold-coloured fur and the male has a mane(= long hair around its neck ).

sentences.english: Reading and writing are two different skills.
sentences.chinese: 阅读和写作是两种不同的技能。

sentences.english: Many jobs today require computer skills.
sentences.chinese: 如今的许多工作都需要计算机技能。

detailed_translations.english: an ability to do something well, especially because you have learned and practised it

sentences.english: a familiar tune
sentences.chinese: 熟悉的曲调

sentences.english: It was a relief to be back in familiar surroundings .
sentences.chinese: 回到熟悉的环境里让人松了一口气。

sentences.english: Beggars on the street are becoming a familiar sight .
sentences.chinese: 街上出现乞丐的情况逐渐变得屡见不鲜。

sentences.english: This kind of situation was all too familiar (= very familiar ) to John.
sentences.chinese: 这种情形对约翰来说太熟悉了。

sentences.english: Her face seems vaguely familiar , but I can’t quite place her.
sentences.chinese: 她看起来有点面熟，但我还是认不出她来。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is familiar is well-known to you and easy to recognize

name: silence
trans: 沉默；寂静；缄默；不谈；无声状态
使沉默；使安静；压制；消除噪音

sentences.english: There was a brief silence before anyone answered.
sentences.chinese: 沉默了片刻才有人回答。

sentences.english: ‘Silence in court!’ roared the judge.
sentences.chinese: “法庭上请保持肃静！”法官吼道。

sentences.english: The accused exercised his right to silence (= the legal right to choose to say nothing ) .
sentences.chinese: 被告行使了沉默权。

sentences.english: She held up her hand to silence the children.
sentences.chinese: 她抬手示意孩子们安静下来。

detailed_translations.english: complete quiet because nobody is talking
to make someone stop talking, or stop something making a noise

name: send
trans: 发送，寄；派遣；使进入；发射

sentences.english: Lyn sent some pictures of the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 琳恩寄了几张婚礼照片。

detailed_translations.chinese: [sent-sent] 送， 寄； 派遣， 打发； 发送； 发射
detailed_translations.english: to arrange for something to go or be taken to another place, especially by post

sentences.english: It’s my birthday on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 星期一是我的生日。

sentences.english: My aunt called to wish me a happy birthday.
sentences.chinese: 我姑妈打电话来祝我生日快乐。

sentences.english: The City of Cleveland Orchestra is celebrating its 200th birthday.
sentences.chinese: 克利夫兰市管弦乐队正在庆祝乐队成立200周年。

detailed_translations.english: the day in each year which is the same date as the one on which you were born

sentences.english: The report compares the different types of home computer available.
sentences.chinese: 这份报告比较了市场上不同类型的家用计算机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比较， 对照； 把…比作
detailed_translations.english: to consider two or more things or people, in order to show how they are similar or different

sentences.english: She had all the normal childhood illnesses.
sentences.chinese: 儿童的常见病她小时候都得过。

sentences.english: Her mother was recovering from a serious illness.
sentences.chinese: 她母亲重病后正在逐渐康复。

sentences.english: I’ve never missed a day’s work through illness.
sentences.chinese: 我从未因病耽误过一天工作。

sentences.english: ways to improve your health and reduce the risk of illness
sentences.chinese: 增进健康减少疾病的方法

detailed_translations.english: a disease of the body or mind, or the condition of being ill

name: universal
trans: 普遍的；通用的；宇宙的；全世界的；全体的

sentences.english: free universal healthcare
sentences.chinese: 免费的全民保健制度

sentences.english: These stories have universal appeal.
sentences.chinese: 这些故事人人都喜欢。

sentences.english: a topic of universal interest
sentences.chinese: 人们普遍感兴趣的一个话题

sentences.english: a universal truth
sentences.chinese: 普遍的真理

detailed_translations.chinese: 宇宙的，全世界的；普遍的
detailed_translations.english: involving everyone in the world or in a particular group

sentences.english: A crisis has arisen in the Foreign Office.
sentences.chinese: 外交部出现了危机。

sentences.english: More problems like those at the nuclear power plant are certain to arise.
sentences.chinese: 核电厂肯定还会出现那样的问题。

detailed_translations.english: if a problem or difficult situation arises, it begins to happen

sentences.english: She has reason to feel guilty.
sentences.chinese: 她有理由感到内疚。

sentences.english: the human power of reason
sentences.chinese: 人类的理性

sentences.english: They reasoned that other businesses would soon copy the idea.
sentences.chinese: 他们推断其他企业也会很快仿效这个点子。

detailed_translations.english: why something happens, or why someone does something
to form a particular judgment about a situation after carefully considering the facts

name: picture
trans: 照片，图画；影片；景色；化身

sentences.english: The room had several pictures on the walls.
sentences.chinese: 那个房间墙上有几幅画。

sentences.english: a book with pictures in it
sentences.chinese: 带插图的书

sentences.english: He asked her permission to paint her picture (= paint a picture of her ) .
sentences.chinese: 他请求她允许为她画像。

detailed_translations.english: shapes, lines etc painted or drawn on a surface, showing what someone or something looks like
to show someone or something in a photograph, painting, or drawing

sentences.english: Alex’s real problem is that he lacks confidence.
sentences.chinese: 亚历克斯的真正问题是缺乏信心。

detailed_translations.english: to not have something that you need, or not have enough of it

name: westerner
trans: 西方人，欧美人；美国西部的人

sentences.english: It's the first time a Westerner has been convicted for a drug-related offence in recent years in China.
sentences.chinese: 这是近年来第一次有西方人在中国被判犯有与毒品有关的罪行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 西方人，欧美人；美国西部的人
detailed_translations.english: A westerner is a person who was born in or lives in the United States, Canada, or Western, Northern, or Southern Europe

sentences.english: Unless some extra money is found, the theatre will close.
sentences.chinese: 要是不能找到更多资金，剧院将要关闭。

sentences.english: I think you should complain – unless, of course, you are happy with the way things are.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得你应该发发牢骚——当然，除非你对现状很满意。

sentences.english: He won’t go to sleep unless you tell him a story.
sentences.chinese: 要是你不给他讲故事他就不睡觉。

sentences.english: I can’t leave her unless I know she’s all right.
sentences.chinese: 除非我知道她没事，否则我不能离开她。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that something will happen or be true if something else does not happen or is not true

sentences.english: the problems of everyday life
sentences.chinese: 日常生活中的问题

sentences.english: wearing everyday clothes
sentences.chinese: 穿平常衣服

sentences.english: a simple, everyday object
sentences.chinese: 简单的日常物品

sentences.english: Describe it in ordinary everyday language.
sentences.chinese: 用一般的日常语言把它描述一下。

detailed_translations.english: ordinary, usual, or happening every day

sentences.english: The earrings were a gift from my aunt.
sentences.chinese: 这副耳环是我姑姑送给我的礼物。

sentences.english: The clock was given as a retirement gift when he left the police.
sentences.chinese: 这个钟表是他退休离开警局时收到的礼物。

sentences.english: expensive wedding gifts
sentences.chinese: 昂贵的结婚礼物

sentences.english: Enjoy a free gift with any purchase of $20 or more.
sentences.chinese: 购物满20美元奉送礼品一份。

sentences.english: This excellent cookbook would make an ideal gift for anyone just going away to college.
sentences.chinese: 这本精美的烹饪书送给要离家上大学的人是很好的礼物。

sentences.english: a gift for languages
sentences.chinese: 语言天赋

detailed_translations.english: something that you give someone, for example to thank them or because you like them, especially on a special occasion

name: soap
trans: 将肥皂涂在……上；对……拍马屁（俚语）

sentences.english: Wash thoroughly with soap and water .
sentences.chinese: 用肥皂和水彻底洗一洗。

sentences.english: a bar of soap
sentences.chinese: 一块肥皂

detailed_translations.english: the substance that you use to wash your body

detailed_translations.chinese: 将肥皂涂在……上；对……拍马屁（俚语）
detailed_translations.english: to rub soap on or over someone or something

sentences.english: a collection of valuable paintings
sentences.chinese: 一批珍贵的画作

sentences.english: Can you help me hang this painting (= put it on a wall ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你帮我把这幅画挂起来好吗？

sentences.english: painting and decorating
sentences.chinese: 油漆和装潢

detailed_translations.english: a picture that has been painted

name: advance
trans: 提出；预付；使……前进；将……提前

sentences.english: I should warn you in advance that I’m not a very good dancer.
sentences.chinese: 我要先提醒你，我跳舞不是很好。

sentences.english: Many thanks, in advance, for your help.
sentences.chinese: 对你的帮助预先表示万分感谢。

sentences.english: Could you distribute copies well in advance of the meeting?
sentences.chinese: 开会前把复印件早早分发下去，好吗？

sentences.english: A line of US tanks slowly advanced.
sentences.chinese: 一列美军坦克缓缓前进。

detailed_translations.english: before something happens or is expected to happen
to move towards someone or something, especially in a slow and determined way – used especially to talk about soldiers

name: sex
trans: 引起…的性欲；区别…的性别

sentences.english: All you see on TV is sex and violence these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今在电视上看到的尽是性和暴力。

sentences.english: They had sex in the back seat of his car.
sentences.chinese: 他们在他的汽车后座上做了爱。

sentences.english: She no longer wanted to have sex with him.
sentences.chinese: 她再也不想和他做爱了。

sentences.english: the dangers of casual sex
sentences.chinese: 性关系随便的危险性

detailed_translations.english: the physical activity that two people do together in order to produce babies, or for pleasure

detailed_translations.chinese: 引起…的性欲；区别…的性别
detailed_translations.english: to find out whether an animal is male or female

name: thunderstorm
trans: [气象] 雷暴；雷暴雨；大雷雨

sentences.english: We enjoyed the picnic until a thunderstorm intervened.
sentences.chinese: 一场暴风雨影响了我们野餐时的兴致。

sentences.english: It plays an increasingly important part in meteorology for cloud, precipitation, hail and thunderstorm detection as well as the navigation of aircraft and ships.
sentences.chinese: 它在对云层、降水、冰雹和雷暴的气象探测以及在船舰和飞机的导航中，起着日益重要的作用。

sentences.english: The Fermi Space Telescope is so sensitive to these gamma ray bursts that it doesn't even need to be positioned right over a thunderstorm to detect the TGFs.
sentences.chinese: 费米太空望远镜对这些伽马射线脉冲很灵敏，以至于它甚至不需要调整位置对准雷暴的正上方，就能来探测TGF信号。

detailed_translations.english: a storm with thunder and lightning

sentences.english: He had no special privileges and was treated just like every other prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 他不享受特权，待遇和任何其他犯人一样。

detailed_translations.english: a special advantage that is given only to one person or group of people

name: personal
trans: 人事消息栏；人称代名词

sentences.english: My personal view is that we shouldn’t offer him the job.
sentences.chinese: 我个人认为我们不该给他这份工作。

sentences.english: Style and colour are a matter of personal taste .
sentences.chinese: 款式和颜色是个人爱好问题。

sentences.english: She took full personal responsibility for all the arrangements.
sentences.chinese: 她个人对所有的安排承担全部责任。

sentences.english: When I went to her room all her personal belongings had gone.
sentences.chinese: 我到她房间时，她所有的私人物品都已不在了。

sentences.english: After Alan’s death, his mother received his personal effects .
sentences.chinese: 艾伦死后，他母亲接收了他的私人物品。

sentences.english: I know from personal experience that you can’t trust Ralph.
sentences.chinese: 根据我的亲身经验，我认为你不能相信拉尔夫。

sentences.english: the personal qualities needed to be successful in business
sentences.chinese: 生意成功所需要的个人素质

sentences.english: The car is for personal use only.
sentences.chinese: 这辆汽车仅供私人使用。

sentences.english: On a personal level he felt sympathy for them, but he had a job to do.
sentences.chinese: 从个人角度他很同情他们，但是他有任务在身。

sentences.english: celebrities with their own personal trainer
sentences.chinese: 拥有私人健身教练的名流

detailed_translations.english: belonging or relating to one particular person, rather than to other people or to people in general

name: introduction
trans: 介绍；引进；采用；入门；传入

sentences.english: Pete, are you going to make the introductions?
sentences.chinese: 皮特，你来作一下介绍吧。

sentences.english: Our first contestant needs no introduction (= everyone already knows the person ).
sentences.chinese: 我们的第一位参赛者就不用介绍了。

sentences.english: the introduction of Buddhism to China nearly 2,000 years ago
sentences.chinese: 约2,000年前佛教传入中国

sentences.english: In the introduction, he explains why he wrote the book.
sentences.chinese: 在引言里，他解释了写这本书的原因。

detailed_translations.english: the act of formally telling two people each other’s names when they first meet

name: carpet
trans: 在…上铺地毯，把地毯铺在…上；斥责

sentences.english: The building has been carpeted throughout.
sentences.chinese: 大楼里上上下下都铺了地毯。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在…上铺地毯，把地毯铺在…上；斥责
detailed_translations.english: to cover a floor with carpet
heavy woven material for covering floors or stairs, or a piece of this material

sentences.english: inorganic/organic chemistry
sentences.chinese: 无机 / 有机化学

detailed_translations.english: the science that is concerned with studying the structure of substances and the way that they change or combine with each other

sentences.english: Blanche heard a crash as the back door was flung open.
sentences.chinese: 布兰奇听见后门哗啦一声被推开。

sentences.english: Did anyone see or hear anything last night?
sentences.chinese: 昨晚有没有人看见或听见什么？

sentences.english: Old Zeke doesn’t hear too well any more.
sentences.chinese: 老齐克的耳朵已不灵了。

sentences.english: I heard a rumor that he was getting married soon.
sentences.chinese: 我听到传闻，说他马上要结婚了。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court heard the case on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 最高法院于周二审理了此案。

detailed_translations.english: to know that a sound is being made, using your ears

sentences.english: Diets are most effective when combined with exercise.
sentences.chinese: 节食和锻炼相结合是最有效的。

sentences.english: Ruth hesitated, uncertain of how to combine honesty and diplomacy in her answer.
sentences.chinese: 露丝犹豫了，她不知道怎样回答才能既诚实又婉转。

detailed_translations.english: if you combine two or more different things, or if they combine, they begin to exist or work together

detailed_translations.chinese: 联合企业； 联合收割机
detailed_translations.english: a machine used by farmers to cut grain, separate the seeds from it, and clean it

sentences.english: smelly feet
sentences.chinese: 臭脚

detailed_translations.english: having a strong unpleasant smell

sentences.english: The country depends on tourism for much of its income.
sentences.chinese: 该国的大部分收入依靠旅游业。

detailed_translations.english: the business of providing things for people to do, places for them to stay etc while they are on holiday

sentences.english: We set sail from China for Japan.
sentences.chinese: 我们从中国启航驶往日本。

sentences.english: She looked back on those days with affection .
sentences.chinese: 她深情地回顾那些日子。

sentences.english: Their father never showed them much affection .
sentences.chinese: 他们的父亲对他们从来没有表现出多少慈爱。

sentences.english: Anne had two men trying to win her affections.
sentences.chinese: 安妮有两个男人追求。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of liking or loving sb/sth very much and caring about them

sentences.english: a swarm of locusts
sentences.chinese: 一大群蝗虫

detailed_translations.english: an insect that lives mainly in Asia and Africa and flies in a very large group, eating and destroying crops

sentences.english: The professor stands accused of (=  has been accused of  ) stealing his student’s ideas and publishing them.
sentences.chinese: 那位教授被指控剽窃学生的观点拿去发表。

detailed_translations.english: to say that you believe someone is guilty of a crime or of doing something bad

name: beam
trans: 横梁；光线；电波；船宽；[计量] 秤杆
发送；以梁支撑；用…照射；流露

sentences.english: ...high-energy laser beams.
sentences.chinese: …高能激光束。

detailed_translations.chinese: 横梁；光线；电波；船宽；[计量] 秤杆
detailed_translations.english: a long heavy piece of wood or metal used in building houses, bridges etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 发送；以梁支撑；用…照射；流露
detailed_translations.english: to send a radio or television signal through the air, especially to somewhere very distant

name: embarrass
trans: 使局促不安；使困窘；阻碍

sentences.english: He didn’t want to embarrass her by asking questions.
sentences.chinese: 他不想提问让她尴尬。

sentences.english: The revelations in the press have embarrassed the government.
sentences.chinese: 报纸披露的事实让政府很难堪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使困窘,使局促不安；阻碍,麻烦
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel ashamed, nervous, or uncomfortable, especially in front of other people

sentences.english: A businessman will grasp at any chance to make a profit.
sentences.chinese: 一个商人会抓住任何一个机会赚钱。

sentences.english: His parents are so rich that he can just play at being a businessman.
sentences.chinese: 他父母有的是钱，以致他可以敷衍了事地作个商人。

sentences.english: He is a businessman ... and that is what we need right now. Someone who can create jobs for our kids.
sentences.chinese: 他是个商人，也就是我们现在最需要的人，他是一个可以为我们的孩子创造就业机会的人。

detailed_translations.english: a man who works in business

name: bat
trans: 蝙蝠；球棒；球拍；批处理文件的扩展名

sentences.english: A bat echolocates the direction.
sentences.chinese: 蝙蝠凭回声测定方向。

sentences.english: Having been suggested by a bat, people invented sonar.
sentences.chinese: 受到蝙蝠的启发，人们发明了声呐。

detailed_translations.english: the main or most important idea that someone is trying to tell people about in a film, book, speech etc

sentences.chinese: 本书的主题是爱与责任之间的冲突。

detailed_translations.english: the main subject or idea in a piece of writing, speech, film etc

trans: 调频，调谐，调幅（ amplitude modulation）

sentences.chinese: 你使我成了我现在这个样子。

sentences.english: He passes the ball with unerring accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 他传球准确无误。

sentences.chinese: 他们怀疑档案中信息的正确性。

sentences.english: The company’s debt has ballooned in the past year.
sentences.chinese: 在过去一年里，公司的债务激增。

sentences.chinese: 嗨，凯利，你好吗？

sentences.english: You must all listen carefully.
sentences.chinese: 你们大家都必须仔细听着。

sentences.chinese: 我有一些消息要告诉你们。

sentences.english: The letter is addressed to both of you.
sentences.chinese: 信是寄给你们俩的。

sentences.english: Did Robin give you the money?
sentences.chinese: 罗宾把钱给你了吗？

sentences.english: Only you can make this decision.
sentences.chinese: 只有你才能作这个决定。

sentences.english: You idiot!
sentences.chinese: 你这个白痴！

sentences.english: You boys have got to learn to behave yourselves.
sentences.chinese: 你们这些男孩子必须学着规矩点。

sentences.english: Hey, you over there! Get out of the way!
sentences.chinese: 嘿，说你呢，让开！

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a person or group of people when speaking or writing to them

detailed_translations.chinese: (You)人名；(柬)尤；(东南亚国家华语)猷

sentences.chinese: 石油价格的上涨

sentences.chinese: 每天有好几个班次去纽约。

sentences.english: Until then, students could leave after the eighth grade, and a lot of them did.
sentences.chinese: 那时，学生上完八年级就可以辍学，许多学生的确这样做了。

sentences.chinese: 后来，在八、九年级的时候，我在学习天文学，宇宙学和宇宙的起源。

sentences.english: And this whole note obviously can be subdivided into two half notes and each of the half notes into two quarter notes each of these quarter notes into two eighth notes, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 这个全音符,很明显,可以再分为两个半音符,每个半音符又可以再细分为两个四分之一音符,每个四分之一音符可以再分为两个八分之一音符,等等

detailed_translations.english: one of eight equal parts of something
one of eight equal parts of something

trans: 公司；法人（团体）；社团；大腹便便；市政当局

sentences.chinese: …一位男保险推销员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 助理教练；训练员；驯马师；飞行练习器；运动鞋
detailed_translations.english: someone who trains people or animals for sport or work

sentences.english: I want to thank everyone who has encouraged and supported me.
sentences.chinese: 我要感谢每一位鼓励和支持过我的人。
